83b3(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa sgrub pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ston
83b4(mdo sde): pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to//de dag sangs rgyas kyis sngags pa'i//tshul khrims ma nyams ma ral srung //tshul khrims phung po dge ba la//dga' ba nye bar skye bar
83b5(mdo sde): 'gyur//chos rnams mang po tshal byed cing //thos pa mang la legs gnas na//gang gis the tshom gcod byed pa'i//des de'i shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur//skye dang 'chi ba'i rgyun dag/
83b6(mdo sde): las//'di dag ji ltar grol bya zhes//ltos med phan pa'i sems dag gis//dam pa'i chos kyang ston par byed//gnod sems don du mi gnyer bas//byams pa'i sems kyang
83b7(mdo sde): bsgom par byed//mi 'jigs pa dang phan pa'i sems//bdag dang sems can mnyam pa nyid//byang chub la brtan zil gnon pa'i//brtson pa dag kyang legs par rtsom//
83b8(mdo sde): gang dag byang chub la rten pa'i//dge ba'i chos rnams tshol ba dang //bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa dang //spang bar bya ba'ang rnam par spong //ji ltar spang bya spang ba yis//myur
84a1(mdo sde): du mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur//dgon pa'i gnas la mngon phyogs shing //gnod pa dag la rgyab kyis phyogs//thos pa tshol la brtson pa dag/go 'phangs mchog
84a2(mdo sde): ni rtogs par 'gyur//dge slong dge slong ma rnams dang //dge bsnyen de bzhin dge bsnyen ma//thams cad dang ni de dag gis//'dris pa rnam par spang bar bya//byis pa'i lam//
84a3(mdo sde): la rten pa yi//rmongs pa kun kyang slab ma med de//gang zhig chos la rten pa dang //de dag sangs rgyas mchog tu gzhol//mi gang sems can don dga' ba'i//sangs rgyas
84a4(mdo sde): pha dang ma yin//g.yo med chos la 'dod pa dag/byang chub la ni rab tu dang //sangs rgyas dag tu mi lta ba'i//mi rnams mtshan nyid gsum gsungs te//g.yo dang
84a5(mdo sde): chos min 'dod pa dang //snyoms las dag las rtag dga' bo//'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dang //de bzhin sdig pa rab spangs nas//blo ldan brtson 'grus ldan gyur
84a6(mdo sde): pa//byang chub la ni rab gus 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri
84a7(mdo sde): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa chos bzhi sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg
84b1(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pa~M ka rA shri dz+nyA na dang /zhus tshan gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros dang /dge slong dge bo'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing
84b2(mdo sde): zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya tsa tur+d+harma ni rde shai n+yA ma ma hA yAM na sU traM/bod skad du/'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
84b3(mdo sde): mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na lha'i 'dun
84b4(mdo sde): sa chos bzang na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byams pa dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po
84b5(mdo sde): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
84b6(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyu ro//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang /gnyen po kun tu spyod
84b7(mdo sde): pa dang /sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang /rten gyi stobaso//de la rnam par su 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i las spyad na de la 'gyod pa mong ba yino//de la gnyen po kun
85a1(mdo sde): d+hu spyod pa ni mi dge pa'i las byas nas kyang //dge pa'i las la shin du brtson pa'o//de la sor chung par spyod pa'i skyobs ni snyam pa yang dag par blangs pas/
85a2(mdo sde): mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa ni//de la rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/de stobs dang ldan pa la
85a3(mdo sde): rten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so//byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag+ha dang ldan na sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyi
85a4(mdo sde): non par 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'o chen pos medo 'di rtag tu bklag par bya'o//kha ton du bya'o//bsam par bya'o//bsgom par bya'o//mang du bya'o//des na
85a5(mdo sde): nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin par mi nus par 'gyu ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang //dge slong de dag
85a6(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
85a7(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do//'phags pa chos bzhir ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /thus chen gyi l-i tsA bro ban+de
85b1(mdo sde): shes sdes bskur cing bus twe gtan la phab pa/rgya gar skad du/tsat+yad+harmA ku su tra/bod skad du//chos bzhi pa'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
85b2(mdo sde): cad la phyag tsho tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong nyis
85b3(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtan zhing zab la snyan cing rgya che ba'i sgo dbyangs kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
85b4(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong drag rigs kyi bu mkhas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas bzhi la yid brtan par mi bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu mkhas pas bdag ni bud med dag la dgra'
85b5(mdo sde): ba'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya ba dang /dge slong dag rigs kyi bu mkhas pas bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la dga' ba'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid
85b6(mdo sde): brnyan par mi bya ba dang /dge slong dag rigs kyi bu mkhas pas bdag ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes palta na sdug pa nad nyung ba'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya
85b7(mdo sde): pa dang /dge slong dag rigs kyi bu mkhas pas bdag ni phyug pa/nor mang ba/yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ying brtan par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo
86a1(mdo sde): de skad ces pa/Sh+Na snul t+te/bde bar+yag/shogs byas de skad gsung snanas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to//bud med brten du gal rung //
86a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang ga la dga'//dbu ba'i snying po gA la yod//longs spyod rtag pa ga la yin//longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin//gru ci 'dra bar khyim de 'dra//me tog
86a3(mdo sde): cetso'adra gzugs de bzhin//srog ni chu bur 'dra ba yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /
86a4(mdo sde): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//chos bzhi pa'i mdo rdzog so///
86a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya tsaM tur+d+harma ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
86a6(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong
86a7(mdo sde): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs chen po dang yang thabs sog//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rna
86b1(mdo sde): sa bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi po 'di dag rje srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gi phyir yang yongasu mi gtong //bzhi gang zhan//dge/
86b2(mdo sde): slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du byang chub kyi sems srog gi phyir yang yongasu mi gtang ba dang /dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
86b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i ba du dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongasu mi btang ba dang /dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i
86b4(mdo sde): bar du bzod pa dang des pa srog gi phyir yang yongasu mi gtang ba dang /dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa srog gi phyir
86b5(mdo sde): yang yongasu gtang bar mi bya ste//dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos bzhi po 'di dag srog gi phyir yang yongasu gtong bar mi bya'o//
86b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas//ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to//thams cad mkhyen nyid
86b7(mdo sde): sems ni mi gtong zhing //mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed cig/bzod pa des pa'i stobs la rab gnas te/dge ba'i baM shes gnyen yongasu gtang mi bya//
87a1(mdo sde): ri dgas rgyal po bzhin du 'jigs sbyangs te//mkhas pas dgon gnas rtag tu bsten par bya//chos 'di dag la rtag tu rab gnas na//bdud rnams
87a2(mdo sde): bcom nas byang chub de 'tshang rgya/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan
87a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor de yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso///
87a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya tsa tra shrA ni ra hA re nA ma ma hA yA nA sU tA/bod skad du/'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
87a5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad le phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
87a6(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na/dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang go cha chen po bgos pa sha stag dang /'dod pa na
87a7(mdo sde): spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos
87b1(mdo sde): ston to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon+do hU~Mr gyur pas bcom ldan 'dapal mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin ngo che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam thogs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
87b2(mdo sde): gtsug tu 'dzin to//de nus 'khor de nyi du dga' ldan gyis ris kyi lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa g.yog
87b3(mdo sde): dang bcas de/'khod de nyi du 'dus par gyur nas 'dreg pa de stan+da las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/'jam dpel gzho nur
87b4(mdo sde): gyur pa ga la ba de loT su thal mo sbyar ba btud na 'dzi dpal gzhonu gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal khyod da dung de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las mdzad pas ma mchi ma mam/'jam
87b5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rgya mtsho chen po chu thams cad len pas gzhar yang cho ga shes sam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma lagaso//'jam
87b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po mtsho gting dpag dka' ba de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med dpag tu med pa btsal bar bya ste/byang chub sems
87b7(mdo sde): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyis gzhar yang tshim par mi bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas ci la dmigs te de bzhin gshegs pa
88a1(mdo sde): mchod par bgyi/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas dmigs pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na//
88a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa dang /sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol ba la dmigs pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba la dmi
88a3(mdo sde): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu gzung ba la dmigs pa ste/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
88a4(mdo sde): mchod pa bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i nang du tshangs pa gtsug phud can la/byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes
88a5(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa de/'jam dpal legs par bshad du gsol//de la ni bdag dang thams cad dang /ldan pa'i 'khor 'di'ang nyan par 'tshalo//
88a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna ma mchis/slob dpon gyi chos kyi dpe ma khyud kyang ma mchis/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de'i phyir legs
88a7(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ngas khyod la bshad//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
88b1(mdo sde): kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rigs par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dpag tu med pa bsdu ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang /sems
88b2(mdo sde): can dpag tu med pa yongasu smin por bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med
88b3(mdo sde): pa mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa ste/lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o//
88b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yino//bzhi gang zhe na/slong ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /log par zhu
88b5(mdo sde): po rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang /shes rab las ma nyams pa'i sems dang /rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems te/lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
88b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed po mngon par 'phags pa yino//bzhi gang zhe na/
88b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims mngon par 'phags pa dang /thos pa mngon par 'phags pa dang /byams pa chen po mngon par 'phags pa dang /snying rje chen po mngon par 'phags pa ste/bzhi po
89a1(mdo sde): //de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyod pa brtan//skyong ba ma/mi byed du/rdo rje lta bu'o//ban gang nan/
89a2(mdo sde): bsam pa las mi byed pa dang /'adz+ra' ba lnga mi phyed pa dang /nan tan las mi phyed pa dang /theg pa chen po las mi byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/lho'i druM ben po 'di dag ni bya chub
89a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bsnyen dka' ba yino//bzhi gang zhon/nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshigasu bcad pa thams cid
89a4(mdo sde): dang ma 'dres pa dang /theg pa dman pa dang mi 'dres pa dang /skye bo mi 'grangs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//lce'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
89a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bla na med pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na//phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gting ba'i sems dang /byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang /
89a6(mdo sde): par smin pa la ra ba med pa'i sems dang /byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba'i sems te bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor phyin
89a7(mdo sde): pa'o chaso//bzhi gang zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang /dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa dang /sems can yongasu smin par
89b1(mdo sde): byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam ston par byed pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson
89b2(mdo sde): pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjesu mthun pa dang /tshangs pa'i gnas sgrub pa dang /mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
89b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi chos gya nom pa dam pa mchog yino//bzhi gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang /gang dag de dang 'gal bar byed pa de dag nyid la
89b4(mdo sde): rab tu thar par bya bar sems skyed pa dang /ci tsam gyi yul rgya chen po zhig 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang /ci tsam du dbul bas phongs par gyur kyang chos spyod pa ste/bzhi
89b5(mdo sde): po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/khyim par gyur na bdag gi long spyod kyis chog shes po dang /gzhan
89b6(mdo sde): gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang /rab tu byung nas 'phags pa'i rigs kyis cho ga shes pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i
89b7(mdo sde): bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/chos sbyin pa dang /zang zing sbyin pa dang /shog shog dang /snag tsha dang /smyu gu dang /glegs
90a1(mdo sde): bam sbyin pa dang /chos sgrub la bsam pa thag pa nas legasaso zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
90a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi snying po nyid//bzhi gang zhe na/thos pa las nan tan snying po nyid dang /longs spyod rnams las gtong ba'i snying po nyid dang /lus las bla ma la sa bsnyen bkur bya ba
90a3(mdo sde): snying po nyid dang /srog las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i snying po nyid de/bzhi pa de dag go/lho'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu gtang bar mi bya ba'o//
90a4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems yongasu gtong bar mi bya ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongasu gtang bar mi bya ba dang /sems can yongasu gtang bar mi bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa bI/
90a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongasu btsal ba yongasu gtang bar mi bya ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos che lo//bzhi gang zhe na//
90a6(mdo sde): dgon pa la gnas pa dang //dben pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang /thabs mkhas pas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag go///
90a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang //bzhi gang zhe na//tshangs pa'i gnas dang /'bel ba'i gtam gyi chos mnyan pa la dga' ba myong bar
90b1(mdo sde): ba dang /stong pa nyid la nges par sems dpa' dang /skye bo ris mthun pa dang 'dung ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor mi zad pa'o//
90b2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/thos pa'i nor dang /chos ston pa'i nor dang /sems can dbul po sdud pa'i nor dang /byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba'i nor te/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag
90b3(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gte ro//bzhi gang zhe na/gzungs kyi gter dang /spobs pa'i gter dang /chos kyi gter dang /longs spyod zad mi shes par yongasu bsngo ba'i
90b4(mdo sde): gtor te/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'du 'dzi las 'byung ba dang /yul thams cad las
90b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang /'phags pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa las 'byung ba dang /khams gsum thams cad las 'byung ba ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
90b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bde ba'o//bzhi gang zhe na/dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang /yul spangs pas dben pa'i bde ba dang /nyon
90b7(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa'i phyir zhi ba'i bde ba dang /sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bya
91a1(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshol tu dgaka' ba'o//bzhi gang zhe na/de bzhin ma shegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dga' ba dang /chos thos pas mcho tu
91a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /sbyin pa la 'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba dang /sems can thams cad la bde ba skyed pas mchog tu dga' ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
91a3(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba'o//bzhi glang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba daSh+Tha A i dam las mi nyams pa dang /skyabasu song ba dag yongasu mi
91a4(mdo sde): gtong ba dang /ngag bsdams pas tshig thams cad bden pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i tshe so//bzhi gang zhe na/dge
91a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba dang /ma bslabs pa thams cad la mi brnyas pa dang /gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la ba shes gnyen du
91a6(mdo sde): gyur pa dang /yon tan thams cad sgrub pa la phyir bya ba'i re ba med pas lan la mi re ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
91a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/bdag med pa'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /sems can med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang /srog med pa'i
91b1(mdo sde): phyir shes rab rnam par dag pa dang /gang zag med pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
91b2(mdo sde): rkang pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/chos kyi rkang pa dang /don gyi rkang pa dang /spyad pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pas 'jug pa'i rkang pa dang /byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs
91b3(mdo sde): pa'i rkang pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//lce'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/dad pa'i lag pa dang /tshul khrims kyi lag pa dang /
91b4(mdo sde): thos pa'i lhag pa dang /shes rab kyi log pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi migo/bzhi gang zhe na/las legs pa byas pa'i
91b5(mdo sde): phyir sha'i mig dang /mngon pal shes pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir lha'i mig dang /shin tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir she rab kyi mig dang /chos thams cad la nges par
91b6(mdo sde): sems pa'i phyir chos kyi mig ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pas mi ngoms pa dang /
91b7(mdo sde): dgon pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang /chos nyan pas mi ngoms pa dang /dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag
92a1(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba pyod par//bzhi gang zhon/sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang /
92a2(mdo sde): dbul po la bdag pa thams cad yongs btung bar bsam pa da/'ab zung pa /yan lag gi mchog mgo slong bral khong khro med pa'i sems dkyi kyi spyod du dag
92a3(mdo sde): ba shes gnyen du sems bskyed pa dang /skye ba la mi rtog pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'od dag ni byang chub
92a4(mdo sde): sems da' rnams kyinang med pa'i/zin gang zhe na//mas mi nyan seM sa ning med pa dang /n+dan mangs gdu ba med kyis cad myed pa dang /sems can thams cad
92a5(mdo sde): bde bar mnyam par gzhag pas nad med pa dang /chos thams cad la the tshom med pas nud med pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa
92a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdag gi phyog so//bzhi ga zhe na/pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod dag pa'i phyogs
92a7(mdo sde): /sdug pa sems cad mi bya ba'i phyogs te/ngan po dag go/klu'i bri gan pa 'di dgani byang chub sems dpapa rnams kyi mi baspyod pa'o//bzhi gang ne ne/byang chu
92b1(mdo sde): ma byung ba dang /yid dam ma bstod pa d+ma/d+hun smras pang dun du byud ba la sum bapyod pa dang /yang dug du nan tan las myed spyod d+ha sna/phan pa dngag glu/
92b2(mdo sde): thu bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshugaso//ba zhi gang zhe na/zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang /lhab mthong gi tshogs dang /zos pa'i tshogs dang /dge 'artsa pa thas
92b3(mdo sde): kyi tshogs te/bzhi pa de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung du 'brel bar 'gyur ba'o//ba
92b4(mdo sde): grang zhe na/bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel pa dang /gtong ba dang bsde ba zung du 'brel ba dang /byams pa dang snying rje zung du 'brel ba dang /thabs dang shas rab zung du 'phrul
92b5(mdo sde): ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi la mo//bzhi gang zhe na/khron pa rdul can mthong zhing de'i gting
92b6(mdo sde): ni'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /mche'u 'om/rdzing bu'am/khron pa rnyog pa can mthong zhing de'i gting na'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /bar snang la sprin chen
92b7(mdo sde): pos log cing dela'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /bar snang la rlung dang /rdul dang du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste/
93a1(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go/lha'i du bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi la mo//bzhi gang zhe na/g.yangs
93a2(mdo sde): chen po nas bdag g.yang du lhung bar mthong ba dang //lam mthong mo'i can du mthong ba dang /bdag la ma srang dag par zhugs par mthong ba dang /rmi lam na phyogs
93a3(mdo sde): bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi
93a4(mdo sde): lam mo//bzhi gang zhe na/dug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang /gcan gzan gtum po phal po che'i sgra thos pa dang /bdag g.yon can gyi ning na gnas par
93a5(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /bdag gi lus dri ma can dang gros dri ma can du mthong ba ste/bzhi po de drug go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs
93a6(mdo sde): 'thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo//bzhi gang zhe na/gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba mthong ba dang /rdzing bu me tog pad+ma rgyas pas yongasu gang
93a7(mdo sde): ba mthong ba dang /bdag gos dkar po'i phrugs rnyed par mthong ba dang /lha zhig spyi bo'i gtsug na gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi
93b1(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo//bzhi gang zhe na/bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar
93b2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /na mkha' la bya dang pa dkar po thal dkar gyi khyu skad 'byin cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'od mang pos brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog pa mthong ba
93b3(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad+ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba ste bzhi po de dag go/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi re
93b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi la mo//bzhi gang zhe na/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang /me tog
93b5(mdo sde): pad+ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang /tshangs pa'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam mthong ba ste/lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
93b6(mdo sde): mthing ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi la mo//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi la mo//bzhi gang zhe na/shing sA la chen po'i
93b7(mdo sde): 'dab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu sna tshogs kyis grang bar mthong ba dang /khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong ba dang /nam mkha'i ngos gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
94a1(mdo sde): ba dan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
94a2(mdo sde): kyis bdud 'dul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo//bzhi gang zhen gyang chen pos kyang thams cad mnan nas ba dan thogs te 'bro bar mthong ba dang /dpa' bo chen pos g.yul las
94a3(mdo sde): 'das te 'gro bar mthong ba dang /rgyal po dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba ste/bzhi po de dag go lha'i bu
94a4(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo//bzhi gang zhe na mgo la thod dkar pos bcings pa mthong ba dang /bdag
94a5(mdo sde): gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin phyed par mthong ba dang /bdag chos kyi stan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos
94a6(mdo sde): ston par mthong ba ste/bzhi po de dag go//lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po 'thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo//bzhi gang zhe na bum pa mthong ba
94a7(mdo sde): dang /bya tse shes bskor bar mthong ba dang /gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du shing thams cad dang ldan zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang /gser gyi kha dog
94b1(mdo sde): spyub+hu'i snang bzhin pa mabyung ba ste/lci ba ni pa de dag ni byang chub sems dnga' rnams kyi byang chub kyi stong ba 'thab pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmil mo//'jam pa la gnon nur gyur
94b2(mdo sde): bani pa sgrib pa'i chos kyi rnam glengs 'di bshad pa dang /lha'i bu dang lnga bzangs lhun dga' mgu yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/'khor dang
94b3(mdo sde): bcas pas 'jam dpal ga zhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bA ba'i phyir lha'i me tog man+dA rA baM dang /ut+pal dang pad+ma dang /ku mu~M dA dang pad+ma dkar po dag gis thams cad
94b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor lnga gtor to//me tog de dag gtor ma thug tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus snang gi bar snang li me tog pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyi tshang blta na sdug
94b5(mdo sde): pa bsung dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to//me tog de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan
94b6(mdo sde): pa dag byung bar gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzungs ljon gyis 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gong
94b7(mdo sde): nas lcags/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu me tig 'di dag ga las 'ongs pa nyid na so//lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa ste/bdag gis khyod
95a1(mdo sde): lam chod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad du gtor to//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu ji ltar me tog 'di dag sprul pa yin pa ltar byang chub sems dpa'
95a2(mdo sde): de dag gi lus la'ang de bzhin du blta'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sang+yas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos
95a3(mdo sde): nyid de/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan
95a4(mdo sde): dang /shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung //de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du
95a5(mdo sde): mngon par byung ste/gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis gnan nas slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs//
95a6(mdo sde): ldan stan las langs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa laM btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud
95a7(mdo sde): nas rdo bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas bstod pa/gser bzang dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gzi brjid ldan//skyes chen mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs
95b1(mdo sde): mngan/yon tan khrag khrig yon tan gzhal yas gzi brjid can//mgron po ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad//sgra snyan 'byin par mdzad cing rab tu gsung 'brel ba//tshadz+ra//
95b2(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangasu gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gsung ba//nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen bde gshegs blo gros ldan//kal ping+ga'i gsung can tso slad 'dzum pa gsungs//mi mchog skyes bu
95b3(mdo sde): dam po ngan pa'i tshogs can 'dul//bdud kyi stobs ni rtag par mtha' mar 'byin par mdzad//lha dang lha min na mkha' lding gris rtag mchod pa//stobs bcu ldan pas ci slod 'dzum
95b4(mdo sde): ba bstan//dri med dri bral dri ma gsum spangs pa//zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor lto bur zhal rgyas pa//mun pa rab rib sgrib pa'i rdul gyi nyes gcod pa//bde dang bde ldan sbyin par
95b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa 'dzum don gsungs//bde bar gshegs pas dang lha yul phan pa mchog/bred dang bde ldan sbyin mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa//mtshungs shing 'brel lo legs
95b6(mdo sde): gsungs gsal ba'i gsung ldan pa//'dzum bstan 'di yi dan ni ji ltar rtogs par bgyi//ling tog stug po mun pa rabo rib rnam bsal ba//shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi gzi brjid
95b7(mdo sde): ldan pa po//glang chen khyu mchog stobs dang seng ge'i stabs ltar brjod//'gro ba'i don mdzad 'dzum pa'i don ni bstan du gsol//mi yi dam pa mi ngan tshogs can 'dul mdzad
96a1(mdo sde): pa//zab cing mthong bar dka' la gting tshod dpagra da/ka/'bru//srid pa'i chu ni skems mdzad mnyam pa med pa can//sgyu med stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum
96a2(mdo sde): slad bstan//rga shi zhi bar bgyi ba'i bdud rtsi'i don stsol ba//zhabs ni 'jam zhing dri ba dag dang 'khor lor ldan//blun pa spyong mdzad srid pa gsum na menyam med pa//ye
96a3(mdo sde): shes chen po mnga' bras 'dzum don bstan du gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dpal bzongs ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lha'i
96a4(mdo sde): khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' steng gi bar snang la seng ge'i khri la pad+ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom
96a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthong lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzho nur
96a6(mdo sde): gyur pa'i drung du chos mnyan pa dang /bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon pa'i phyir lhab so//yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhi na
96a7(mdo sde): gyur pas ying su smin par byas pa yin//yid byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs kyi
96b1(mdo sde): yin te//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ming sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
96b2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//lha'i bus gsol pa/pi tsam ldan 'das blodag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par rngo mi thog na ji snyed cig mchis/de nas bcom
96b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag pi grangs rtogs par nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
96b4(mdo sde): bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang skar ma'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni skad cig/thang cig yud tsam cig gis bgrang bar spro'i/bcom ldan 'das pa dang /
96b5(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'di dag ni lo brgyar yang bgrang bar spro ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gal te dzaMm+bu'i gling 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul
96b6(mdo sde): gyis gong bar gyur kyang rdul phra rab de dag bgrong ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha'i rtogs par mi nus te/byang
96b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de tsam du tshad mdo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bo'i
97a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu kha rog 'dug de skad ma smra shig/shA rI'i bu
97a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dog de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo //shA ri'i bu yongasu brtags pa bzung ni/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
97a3(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/nyi ma re re thams cad la 'di chos bshad pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
97a4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ltung bstan par gyur la/gang gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa nus//byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan
97a5(mdo sde): mar gzhig kyang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan
97a6(mdo sde): tha mal pas gzigs par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
97a7(mdo sde): gis stong pa la lta ci smos/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu
97b1(mdo sde): 'phrul che/de ltar mthu che/de ltar ye shes gzings pa chen po dang ldan te/bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed//zhes smraso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
97b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa steng gi bar snang la 'khod pa de dag par snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
97b3(mdo sde): bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo //de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing
97b4(mdo sde): sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongasu smin par mdzad pa legs so legs so//'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yong su smin par bgyid pa'i chos
97b5(mdo sde): las brtsams te spobs par mdzod cig/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongasu smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga'o//sum cu
97b6(mdo sde): rtsa lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dus su skul ba dang /tshod la skul ba dang /ran don skul ba dang /dbang po la skul ba dang /bstan par skul ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa la skul ba
97b7(mdo sde): dang /thabs la skul ba dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa la skul ba dang /byams pa chen po la skul ba dang /snying rje chen po la skul ba dang /theg pa chen po la skul ba dang /theg pa
98a1(mdo sde): dman pa la skul ba dang /bdon pa la skul ba dang /de bya ba la srul ba dang /chos srung bar skul ba dang /thos pa bstan par skul ba dang /sems can sna tshogasu mi
98a2(mdo sde): dbye bar skul ba dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan po la sbyin pa'i gnasu mtshungs par skul ba dang /bdud kyis las bstan par skul ba dang /de bcas pa
98a3(mdo sde): nyams 'og tu chud par skul ba dang /'khor bas yongasu mi skyo bar skul ba dang /bdu do gdul bar skul ba dang /byas pa shes pa dang /byas pa gzo bar skul ba dang /rgyu zad pa la 'jug
98a4(mdo sde): par skul ba dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi 'jigs par skul ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya bar skul ba dang sems can thams cad la ci bya snyam
98a5(mdo sde): ba la spro bar skul ba dang /'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'dres par skul ba dang /dgon pa la dga' bar skul ba dang /'dod pa chung zhing cho ga shes par skul ba dang /'das pa dang maM
98a6(mdo sde): 'ongs pa ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs de byung ba dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar skul ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi
98a7(mdo sde): gdung mi 'chad par skul ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu dag par blang bar skul ba ste/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongasu smin par
98b1(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag go/lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yong su smin par byas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bskyod du med pa yin te/de ni
98b2(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis thul bar mi nus so//de ni phyin chad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcus dogs par mi 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang /thas
98b3(mdo sde): pas dregs pa dang /spobs pas dregs pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigasu bcad pas dregs pa dang /dgon par gnas pus dregs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pas
98b4(mdo sde): dregs pa dang gzugs dang /longs spyod dang dbang phyug dang /g.yog 'khor gyis dregs pa dang /brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bsnyen bkur byed pas dregasngo pa dang bsam
98b5(mdo sde): g+hatan dang /mngon par shes pas dregs pa dang /sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dang ba'i lho dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang
98b6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang bstod pa dang bsngags par byed pa des kyang snyems pa med pa yin te/lha'i bu byang chub semos dpa'i dregs pa bcu po de dag gis mi snyems rab tu mi snyems de ni
98b7(mdo sde): 'i dang gzho nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod phyogaso gang na gnas pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa der ni sangs
99a1(mdo sde): rgyus 'byung bar blta'o//de ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bltara'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/de de bzhin no lha'i bu de de bzhin te sgrad smram banan/kha/
99a2(mdo sde): nana'ajam dpal gzho nur gyur pa gnas pa de ni stong pa ma yin par mngon no//gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po nyid
99a3(mdo sde): brtson par mdzad do//gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nyan par byed/mos par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni nga'i yin par 'gyur ro//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa
99a4(mdo sde): dang /mos pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /de bzhin nyi du nan tan byed pa de dag ni bla na med
99a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang tshe dang
99a6(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa dag ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang ba dang /gzung ba dang bshad pa dang kun chub par byed pa'i phyir khyed la gta//
99a7(mdo sde): nga ni ring por mi thogs par yong su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis gnas par
99b1(mdo sde): byar ra/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar sA le pa/byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ga zhi bsgrun pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /byang chub sems dbu'i
99b2(mdo sde): yongasu smin par byed pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'di srung chen po dang /chu dang
99b3(mdo sde): ldan pa srin dga' bo dang /lha dang /mi /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rings te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa bzhi pa
99b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa zhes byu ba leg pa chen po'i mad rdzogs/rgyu gur ska /d+hId+ha ma kI U tre/bod da du/chos gsum zhes bya ba'i mdo/sangs rgyas
99b5(mdo sde): rgyu ku seMm snang 'a thams ca b+h+re/'jug/'di slang bdag gis bas bdus gci gnA/mu~M ldan nyan 'dinani tshul bu rgyal byed kyi ma lnga mngon med pas sbyin gyi kun dag

100a1(mdo sde): yin pa gsum dang ldan na sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed la/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas par mi byed//gsum gang zhe na/'di lta//
100a2(mdo sde): ste/'dod chags dang /ser sna dang /bag med pa ste/dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum po de dag dang ldan pas sbyin pa dag ma byin zhing bsod nams dag
100a3(mdo sde): ma byas la/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma byas pas/lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyuraro//
100a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos gsum dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing /bsod nams dag byed la/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed//gsum po gang
100a5(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/ma chags pa dang /ser sna med pa dang /bgo yod pa'o//dge slong dag dam pa'i chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu dam pa sbyin pa dag byin zhing /bsod
100a6(mdo sde): nams dag byed la/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//bcom
100a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gang phyir ser sna brag med pas/
100b1(mdo sde): n+na sbyin par mi byed de//dpyir bsad rnams 'dod du ye//mkha srangs sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ser sA can gyis 'jigs pa ni//bkres dang rnam pa 'di sbyin na//gang gis 'jigs pas
100b2(mdo sde): 'dir ma byed//de nyid pa yi 'jigs bsnyen//glang gis ser sna'i dbang gas na//yid mkhyen pa'i rig sa pa ste//'jig rten 'di dang la r-ib tu//de mis byis pa gos par 'gyur//
100b3(mdo sde): gang dag ser sna spangs nas kyang //dusu sbyin pa sbyin byed na//shi yang de ni shi ma yin//rgyags bzang po yi 'gron po bzhin//gang dag shin tu btang dka' ba//nyung ngu 'am mang
100b4(mdo sde): gtong byed na//bting dka' gtong pa de dgon//dka'o ba'i las dag byed pa yin//dam pa min pas mi rtogs te//dam pa chos las 'da' mi byed//de phyir dam pa dam pA min//'di nas
100b5(mdo sde): shrI bar 'gyur ba na//dam pa min pa dmyal bar 'gro/dam pa dag ni mtho ris 'gro/rla bas gces pa la ni skabs med de//tshe thung bas ni srog khyer dus kyang nye//'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di
100b6(mdo sde): mang rnams kyis ni//bsod nams byed sbyor dag ni bye ba'i rigs//bud med spangs 'dir sbyor bas 'chi ba gang //dka' bas byin banyudu byin no yang //sdong gi mchod sbyin brgya stong byed
100b7(mdo sde): pa//de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod de//tso phyir mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba//mchod sbyin mthun pa de yi lam mi 'gro/ji ltar stong gi mchod sbyin che rnams kyang //de yi
101a1(mdo sde): bcu drug char mi 'gyur zhe na//byis pa la la gsod cing 'chi byed 'dir//gzhun nor ma byin len byed brlag par 'gyur//mchi ma'i gdong bcwas chud par bcas
101a2(mdo sde): pa yi//yon de'i mchod sbyin mthun pa'i lam mi 'gro/de ltar mchod sbyin yang shing rgya che ba//mchod sbyin mthun pa'i lam du mi 'gro la//de ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang //
101a3(mdo sde): de yi bcu drug char yang mi byed do//la la gang dgra gzu lu mas ma yin po//chos bzhin nor rnams thob pa gtong byed pa//de dag btang dag 'di rnams btang bas no//rang gi bsod nams
101a4(mdo sde): kyis ni lha gnas 'gro/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//chos gsum
101a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de de pa can dras bsgyur/lots+tsha ba dpral brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la
101a6(mdo sde): phub pa///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya d+harma ka tu d+d+ha dza pa re bri tsha na ma ma hA yAn sU tra/bidi skad du/2phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhus pa zhes bya
101a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu
101b1(mdo sde): rgyal khyod kyi rgyalam gon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' thun bzhugs te//de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan nas bya ba 'dug bstan las langs s+ho/bcom ldan 'dasal
101b2(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

101b5(mdo sde): ngag yongasu stsal ba dang /snying rje dang ldan pa dang /mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dang /ting 'dzin dang ldan pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don ma
101b6(mdo sde): lus par sgrub pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /snying rje dang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyu la mtshan dang //thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan
101b7(mdo sde): 'dres kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so//
102a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/d+har+m+ma sa mu dran nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcag na/bcom
102a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i gling phran po tral kau'i ri la rgyal ba'i sras phyir mi ldog pa phal po ches bskor cing mdun du byos te bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dbang po
102a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa chos kyi gtam ci 'dod pa dri bar gyis shig/ces 'dod pa rtog cing mi sten pa dang /mi 'chang ba dang /
102a4(mdo sde): rgyal med pa dang /shes rab dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang /stong pa nyid la shin tu mos pa dang ldan te/yod pa dang med pa spangs pa dang /yang dag pa ma yin pa la rtags pas grangs
102a5(mdo sde): med par 'khor bar gyur/ji ltar na dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags/'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams
102a6(mdo sde): las 'das pa dang /gnas ngani len la rten cing 'jug pa'i sems dang /yid dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'das te/mi gnyis pa'i chos thos de ni shin tu rab tu byung ba'o//
102a7(mdo sde): sems can gang tha dad pa'i de lta bus rab tu byung ba de na yang dag par rab tu byung ba'o//gang rab tu byung yang tshul khrims dang /spyod yul dang /'tsho ba dang /lta ba dang /bsam pa nyams
102b1(mdo sde): paste/de ni mgo dang kha spu bregs kyang don med pa ste/rnyog pa 'chang bas rang rnyog pa des ngan song du gzhol ba yin no//ngas dad pas byin pa spyod du gnang ba ni rigs pas grol ba ste/dge
102b2(mdo sde): slong gang brtson pa mi 'dor ba des gzugs mi 'dir/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi 'dor/phung po lnga tha dad pa dang /ril gyis brtags pa'i ra
102b3(mdo sde): bzhin pas na mi rtag pa dang //sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med par lta ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams dang /skye mched rnams ma yin par spro ba dam par byed
102b4(mdo sde): pas rtag tu sgom mo//snying po med pa dang /'brum pa can/zug rngu can dang ldan pa skyon can/pha rol po slu ba'i chos nyid ces sun 'byin pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sbyor bas/gang
102b5(mdo sde): lus kyis lus la sred pa dang /lus la byams pa dang /lus la bdag yid che so pa dang /lus la zhen pa de dag rab tu spong ngo //gang 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos
102b6(mdo sde): dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/dad pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa yin te/'di lta bu'i dge slong ni lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi sbyin gnas su
102b7(mdo sde): gyur pa'o//de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te 'gro ba tha dod pa'i chos rnams
103a1(mdo sde): la 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams thob pa de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag blang /
103a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa zhes gsungs//gzhan gang ga rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs kyang bdag bslus pa ste/pheM dang ltar byi ba'ang ma yin/byi'ang ma yin pa bzhin du don khyim pa'ad ma yin
103a3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba'angam sbyin pas glen pa'i skyes bu de de lta bu'i tshul du zung zhig/skyes bu dam pa 'gro ma tha dad po'i chos de dag ni sgyu ma lto bu ste/de las 'da' bar yang mi nus/'gro ba
103a4(mdo sde): tha dad dri'i chos ni yongasu ma rdzogs pasaso na de las 'di'abar yang dkai'/sems can gyi khams ni byin 'ang med/nang na 'ang maud de gnyis kar yang dmig su med pas nA/glang sem
103a5(mdo sde): can gyi khams kyi dngos po de ni 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos kyi dngos po ste/de las 'da' bar yang dka' ba de la kye rgyal ba'i sras bac+doMs kyi 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten rdza
103a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos thob pa'i dge slong de ni rab tu byung bar gyur/bsnyen par rdzogs par yang dag par rdzogs pa ste/de ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gan su gyur pa'i zhes gsungs pa'ang kye rgyas
103a7(mdo sde): ba'i sras rten pa'i gnas 'a na de la 'dzi ba gang ciste 'dzi rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ni de ni dmigs par gyur pag//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po
103b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni mi dmigs pa ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgos nas 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'dus shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thar
103b2(mdo sde): pa de ni dge slong yang dag par gyur pa ste/dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas so//de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/bcom
103b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te brtson pa mi 'dor ngo'i dge slong gang gis gzugs mi 'dor/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi 'dor ba de ni rab tu byung
103b4(mdo sde): ba'i dge slong ste/de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la shin tu sa byung bar gyur pas na 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs/'jig
103b5(mdo sde): rten gyi dbang pos smras pa/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid la dgongs te chos kyi dbyings nang na'ang med/phyi na 'ong med/gnyi gar yang dmigasu med pas na nad med par
103b6(mdo sde): btags pa drang /mi skye bar btags pa dang /mi 'gag par btags pa rnams gdag su med pa ste/sems can gyi khams mnyam pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings
103b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyi du mi gnyi ste gnyi sur do//de mi gnyis te gnyi su med pas na de la dor ba'ang med/mi dor ba'ang
104a1(mdo sde): med/gang dor ba'ang med/mi dor ba'ang med pas na de las 'da' ba dang /thob par mi nus te bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas gdag su med pa'i dge slong
104a2(mdo sde): btags pa la mi 'jug go//gang yi ge med pa'i dge slong yi ge las 'das pa ste/de la grangs kyis bstan par yang mi rung ste/de ni mi 'ang mi 'gro mi gnas mi 'dug nyal bar yang
104a3(mdo sde): mi rtog go//zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i dge slong la brtags pa ste/spyod pa rnams kyang brtags pa'o//mag pa la rnam pa mang du rtog pa'i dge slong slo shim rtags pa'o//
104a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgongs nas 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas sbyin pa spyod pa'i sbyin gnasu gyur pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang
104a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la dge ba byin te ngas dgongs te bshad pa bzhin du skyes bu dam po khyod kyis bstan pa ni dge'o dge'o//dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba
104a6(mdo sde): 'di bla na med pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste/'di tshul khrims nyams pa dang /ma dul ba dang /nga rgyal mngon par byed pa rnams kyi mdun du mi bshad par gyis shig/de lta bu
104a7(mdo sde): de dag rnams kyi snyems pa spang po'i phyir phyag rgya 'di la gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis bltas shing mi dmigs pa'i lus mngon du byas na/des yid kyi lus
104b1(mdo sde): myur du 'thob bo//gang gi yid kyi lus des grangs med pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu smin par byed do//de nas chos kyi gzhung 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong bdun stong zag pa med par mi skye ba'i
104b2(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol bar gyur/byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur/dmigs pa can gyi dge slong lnga brgya chos kyi gzhung 'di mi sgrub cing mi 'jug pa dang /
104b3(mdo sde): ma dad pa na stan las langs te dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das ngas dgongs te gsungs pa 'di dag 'jig rten thams cad yid mi ches pa'i gnyen po yin pas na chos kyi gzhung 'di dmigs
104b4(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa rnams mi mthun pa'o//yod pa ma yin pa la brten pa rnams dang mi 'gal te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bzung ba rnaMs dang /zab mo'i rgol mo pa rna saM dang /skyo zhing cho ga shre pra sUng te/
104b5(mdo sde): dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams kyis nga'i chos kyi gzhung 'di la ston par sheso//kye rgyal ba'i spos 'di lta ste/dper
104b6(mdo sde): na skyes bu gang zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam ni 'gro ba mang po'i mdun na smra zhing chos 'chad kyang chos de 'jig rten thams cad las ma grags nA/kye rgyal ba'i sras ci 'gro ba mang ba de
104b7(mdo sde): rnams yod de/gang des sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa dang mi 'gal ba snyam du sems sam/byams pas smras pa/rmi lam ni yang dag par mchis pa ste/'khrul pa tsam zhing mchis
105a1(mdo sde): par bas na de ngan 'gro phal po che la chos 'chad par gyur pa lta ga la zhig mchis/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang mchus
105a2(mdo sde): te/yang dag pa ma yin par 'byung bar byung nas kyang med par gyur pa ste/kun rdzob kyang 'khrul pa tsam zhig yod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no//'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ji
105a3(mdo sde): lta ba mngon du byas na bsaM gtan sem+ba pI bas gtan pa'ang mi mi Da nga ste/de la chos kyi tshul tsam zhig yod kyi kun tu brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang las kyi rnams ni yod pa ma yin no//
105a4(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di ni 'jig rten pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o//chos 'di dag la dmigs pa rnams kyis ni don dam par 'dzin gyi 'phags pa'i rnams ni mi dmig so//
105a5(mdo sde): byis pa rnams mi shes pas de la mngon par zhen pas na dmyal ba dang /yi dgas rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa myong bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi gzhung 'di ji lta ba
105a6(mdo sde): de ni dmigs pa'o//ji ltar dmigs pa de ni chos thams cad do//de ltar dus gsum gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de//mi dmigs pas na gang dmigs pa de ni rtogs
105a7(mdo sde): pa'o//gang rtogs pa de ni thob pa/gang thob pa de ni byang chub gang byang chub pa de ni de bzhin nyid/gang de bzhin nyid pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni stong pa nyid//
105b1(mdo sde): gang stong pa nyid de ni mtshan ma med pa/gang mtshan ma med pa de ni smon pa med pa/gang smon pa med pa de ni don dam pa/gang don dam pa de ni chos kyi dbyings/gang chos kyi dbyings de ni gnyisu
105b2(mdo sde): med pa'i mtha' gang gnyi su med pa'i mtha' de ni dbu mar sgrub pa/gang dbu mar sgrub pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rtag po/brtan pa mi 'gyur ba ste/rtag pa'ang
105b3(mdo sde): ma yin/mi rtag pa'ang ma yin te/de ni gdags pa'ang ma yin/mi gdags pa'ang ma yin/gang gdags pa'ang ma yin/mi gdags pa'ang ma yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin/'jig
105b4(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin/gang 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin pa de ni brjod du med pa/gang brjod du med pa de ni chung zad kyang med pa gang cung zad kyang med pa
105b5(mdo sde): de ni sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing gang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing de ni ston pa/gang ston pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa/gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni dmigs pa med
105b6(mdo sde): pa/gang dmigs pa med pa de ni mi 'gyur ba grub pa/gang mi 'gyur ba grub pa de ni yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ste/'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par
105b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ji ltar mos pa thams cad byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis tshig mthun par smras pa/chos kyi gzhung 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de rdo rje lta bu ste/
106a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs pas na sems can de myur du mngon par shes pa dang /dbang po rnon por 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//gang
106a2(mdo sde): zhig chos kyi gzhung 'di la brjod dam/'dzin tam/klog gam/chub par byed dam/kha ton du byed dam/tshul bzhin du yid la byed na de bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan//
106a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis dgongs pa 'di bshad nas 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams dang /lha dang mir bcas pa
106a4(mdo sde): dang /lha ma yin dang /dri za'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga'o//theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzog so///
106a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rgya mo sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor
106a6(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa sems thag pa nas nyon cig/mang po chags pa yid bsdus te nyon cig/bdag la kun tu ltung ba yod par shes
106a7(mdo sde): na mthol tshangs byos shig/mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro//mthol tshangs ma byas na sdig phyir zhing zab tu skye'o//kun tu ltung ba med na ma smra bar 'khod cig dang /
106b1(mdo sde): kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no//legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnams dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtags par nyon cig/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir na mchod
106b2(mdo sde): rten las chos byed pa'i tshe so sor thar pa la btsud cing lci ba dang /gus shing rin cher byos shig/so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no//tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun
106b3(mdo sde): pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshungaso//mi dbul po las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungaso//nad pa sman rnyed pa dang mtshungs so//btson khri mun nas phyung ba dang mtshung so//la mi rang por
106b4(mdo sde): song ba las slar 'khor ba drang mtshungs te/'di ni kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin rdza mngon pas sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do//'jigs pa'i sems ni skye
106b5(mdo sde): dka'//dge ba'i sems ni g.yo dka' bas na kha na ma tho ba las brnyes te med snyam du byas na chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi rkyen gyis na snod chen po 'gang ngo //yud tsam gyi bar du sdig
106b6(mdo sde): byas pas na bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //re zhig me lus stor na bskal pa khri'i bar du'ang mi lus mi thob bo//dar ba'i tshe mi sdod do//dper na ne rta rgyugs pa dang 'dra/
106b7(mdo sde): mi'i tshe'ang rtag pa med de/dpa' rgal gyi chu 'bab be bas kyang myur te/de rang gison mod kyi//sang gi gnya' yang dka'o//de dus kho na la bab kyis mang po'i rnams
107a1(mdo sde): thams/thamachamamams sams mtham/athas mas ma mas ma ma ma
107a2(mdo sde): sa so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so//bag byas la le lo bla khyud dang //nyal ba dang /gnyid kyis log cing rang nyams kyi
107a3(mdo sde): yid mi bya'o//mtshan zhing ni sems bsdus la rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la phyal ba don med pa la nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la'ang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar
107a4(mdo sde): ci'ang thob pa med par mi bya'o//mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin logs par byos shig/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis mang po'i
107a5(mdo sde): phyir chu bo gang+gA'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo ma'i mdo phye ste/de'i nang nas sems kyis gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo rnyed do//snga mi 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
107a6(mdo sde): thams cad la'ang bshad do//da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la'ang de bzhin 'chad//ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang de bzhin 'chad par 'gyur ro//dus gsum gyi byang chub
107a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' lobs pa dang /slob pa dang /slob par 'gyur ro//ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o//
107a8(mdo sde): khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ngas bshad do cog gcig nas gcig tu son thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye shig/de nas pad+mo'i snying po'i snod kyi khams na gnem gyi 'od
107b1(mdo sde): lham me lhang nge ba'i seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas la spyan te/nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i
107b2(mdo sde): le'u gzungasu zung la deng shig/yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi
107b3(mdo sde): chos kyi ske mo'i le'u shod de khyod la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig/de nas me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas 'dum dra ba brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa pad+mo'i snod kyi
107b4(mdo sde): khams na lham me lhung ba'i seng ge'i khri las 'das te/so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te phyir nur nas lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/kun 'od kyi nang nas grangs med pa'i
107b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byung ste/cig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/ser po//dmar po/dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bsha
107b6(mdo sde): dra'ang khong du chud nas so sor pad+mo'i snod kyi khams kyi nang du nub ste/rang bzhin gyis bskal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnasu slar song ste/dzam+bu'i/
107b7(mdo sde): gling byang chub kyi shing drung du byin nas rang bzhin gyi bskal po me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang /'od shin tu bzang po'i khang par 'dug nas phyogs bcur
108a1(mdo sde): chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa bshad//de nas yang seng ge'i khri las langs te sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas bral bcu'i chos bshad do//de nas
108a2(mdo sde): zung ma'i gnam du phyin te las su bya ba bcu bshad do//de nas yang khri las langs te rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas phyogs shing lta ba bcu ba shad//de nas yang 'dug
108a3(mdo sde): pa'i sa nas langs te/'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad/de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te gnas bde na gnam du phyin nas sa bcu'i chos
108a4(mdo sde): bshad/de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas rdo rje bcu bshad/de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad/de nas yang
108a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas smon lam bcu bshad//de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/
108a6(mdo sde): nga'i thog ma'i phyi mo'i pad+mo me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis sems kyis gnas kyi chos kyi phyi ma'i le'u bshad pa pa shad//gzhan 'dum
108a7(mdo sde): phrag brgya'i yang phrag steng gi shAkya thub pa'ang de bzhin te gnyi su med do//tha dad pa'ang med do//bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do//de'i tshe shAkya thubapa
108b1(mdo sde): pud+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shur phyogs nas byung nas lding pa'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas bdud kyis chos mnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/yas babs te dzam+bu'i gleng gi ka phyi lar
108b2(mdo sde): skyes nas yum gyi mtshan ni lha mdzes chen mo//meb kyi mtshan ni zas gtsang ma/dra dag gi ming ni sid+d+hon+sa zhes bya ste/lo bdun na rab tu byung /lo sum cu nas sangs rgyas phyin nos nga'i
108b3(mdo sde): mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyalnga pa'i pho brang du phyin te/de'i nang gi 'dug pa
108b4(mdo sde): bcu'i gnas kyi mthar gyis bshad/de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gcing mtshan po'i gnam gyi rgyal po dA pa'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir grangs med pa'i khams dper na dra bi'i bu gu dang
108b5(mdo sde): mtshungs par bshad na khams gcig nas gcig so so mi mthun te tha dad pa'i grangs med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o//ngas khams 'dir len brgyad stong
108b6(mdo sde): phyir te/khams dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste/dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo che'o//
108b7(mdo sde): de nas gnam gyi pho dring nas mar babs te dzaM mU'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun pa ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma byi mo rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku
109a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang ba shad do//sems zan ma ga sos pa n+de nag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig 'dun du klogag/rdorje rin po che
109a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma'i phye mo yin no//byang chub sems dpa' thams ca byini thog ma'i bye mo spangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis bon ni//sems
109a3(mdo sde): tsun+da byams cad la'ang song sa rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skul ba yod do//thams cad kyi shes pa dang /kha dog dang /sems dang yid dang //sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas
109a4(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so//tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod nams yod do//rtag pa yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do//so sor thar pa 'di rnams
109a5(mdo sde): bcu ni sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungasu 'dzin to//ngas de mang ba 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha'
109a6(mdo sde): med pa'i tshulo khrims kyi le'u bcu bsgrubs te bshad do//rdzogs long spyod pa bdag ste//pad+mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas//mtha' bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng //shAkya
109a7(mdo sde): thub pa stong du bzhugs//me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya//khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig/kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs//mnyam par sangs rgyas
109b1(mdo sde): gan su son//de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong //rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus//sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po//kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren//cig car nga yi gan su 'ongs//
109b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon//zil dang ra sgo mo de nas byo//'ung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong po//slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin//kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs//nga
109b3(mdo sde): yi mkhan po tshul khrims kha ton lhogs//tshul khrims tshon po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad//tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin//gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra//byang chub sems
109b4(mdo sde): dnga' rdul phran bzhin//'di yi yin gyis yang dag 'grub//gdod ma rdzogs longs spyod pa nyid kyis glegs//ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton blags//byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob
109b5(mdo sde): pa/glad le khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin//thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston//nga yi bde blags rtag par nyon//sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod//so sor thar
109b6(mdo sde): pa shes rab bzhin//meng po yid kun brtags par ches//khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'ong //dra yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang //rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed//tshul
109b7(mdo sde): khrims le'u kun cho ga gtsang zin//yid sems yod pa thams cad ni//kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu//sems can sangs rgyas khrims mnod pa//de nas sangs rgyas
110a1(mdo sde): sa ru phyin//cher chen sa dang mtshungs zin te//sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dang //mAng ba kun gyis gus par byas//sems gcig brtul te daklog nyon//
110a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs bla na me pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dud
110a3(mdo sde): pa ni pa mA dang /dge 'dun dang /dkon mchog gsum la sr-i zhu dang /yang dang mi 'gal bar bya'o//sri zhu byas te bla mu'i yod dang mi 'gal ba ni chos zab mor thob pa'i gzhung ste/
110a4(mdo sde): sri nu'i ming ni tshul khrim so//ming gcig tu sdom pa dang gting ba'o//de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo //de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub sems
110a5(mdo sde): dpe' rnams dang /gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnam bco brgyad dang /'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang /rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/sems
110a6(mdo sde): gcig tu mnyan nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po blags te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas
110a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go/khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha~M ton du lhogs shig/sems g.yos
110b1(mdo sde): te phyogs bcu dang /g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang /rdo rje bcu dang /sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig/'du na tshul khrims kyi 'od kha nas byung ste rgyu yod/
110b2(mdo sde): rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/'di sngon po dang /dmar po dang ser po//dkor pa/nag po'ang ma yin/kha dog kyang ma yin/sems kyang ma yin/yod pa'ang ma yin/med pa
110b3(mdo sde): ma yin//rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo byang chub sems dka' thams cad kyi ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na mang po thams cad dang //sangs rgya
110b4(mdo sde): kye bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o//'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungasu bzung ba'i rigaso//legs par bslabs pa'i rig so//sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams
110b5(mdo sde): rtags par nyon cig/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang /blon po che phra dang /dge slong phos mos dang /gzugs kyi khams kyi gnam bco rgyad dang /'dod
110b6(mdo sde): pa'i khams gnam drug dang /gdol pa dang /nyid grum dang /po g.yem dang /mo g.yem dang /bran pho mos dang /lha ma srin sde brgyad dang /phyag brnyen dang /byol song dang /'phrul
110b7(mdo sde): zhing 'gyur ba'i mi la sogs te chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig brda phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims mnad du rung ste/kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas kyis
111a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/so sor thar pa la phas pham pa bcu yod do//sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrimasnga mnos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton du ma
111a2(mdo sde): blugs na byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin/nga'ang 'di bzhin du kha ton du klog go/lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpe 'thams cad dang /
111a3(mdo sde): phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis bslab cing
111a4(mdo sde): gzungasu gzung ba'i rig so//sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/bdag gis bsad pa dang /mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang /thams cad kyis gsod
111a5(mdo sde): pa gsod pa la sdod pa gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems pa/sngags dang /rngad mi byas te bsad pa/gsad pa'i rgyu/gsad pa'i rkyen/gsad pa'i chos byed pa/gsod pa'i las
111a6(mdo sde): byed pa la sogs te sems yod do cog la ched kar gsad du mi rung /'di lta skye/byang chubo sems dpa'ade ni rtag par snying rje ba dang /sri zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos
111a7(mdo sde): te brags kyis sems can thams cad kyi ra mda' dang /'or ba bya ba'i rig so//bdag gis rang nyams byas te snying tshim par sems can bas dan//de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
111b1(mdo sde): tham an/thathamachamams ams mtham/am/tha sa naHSha sa maaH gama ma/kamana.amsam
111b2(mdo sde): phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blangs sam/pha log po ma byin par len du bcug gamaH/thabs kyis ma byin par blangs sam/ma byin par ben pa'i rgyu/a byin par
111b3(mdo sde): len pa'i rkyen/ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/sngags sgyu ma byas te nor khyer ba la sogs te/lha ma srin dang /bdag 'o yod pa dang /yang blo'i nor rdzas dang /nor rdzas so cog la khab dang /rtsa
111b4(mdo sde): nyag ma gcig langs ched dkar ma byin par blangasu mi rung //byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'ga' zhing /byams zhing snying rje bar byas te rtag par
111b5(mdo sde): sems can no cog gi yon tan dang bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigaso//de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pha mo pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi
111b6(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod dam/gzhan mi tshangs par spyod pa ro bstan nam/bud med de cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang /gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang /
111b7(mdo sde): mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang /mi tshangs por spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang /mi tshangs par spyod pa'i lngas byed pa dang /byol song dang /lha dang /lha mu srin gyi bu mo la mi tshangs por spyod pa dang //
111b8(mdo sde): chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na byang chubo sems dpa'i ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad thar pa'ir mda' bya zhing chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rig so//
112a1(mdo sde): de la slar mi'o cog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de byol song dang /ma dang bu mo dang /sring mo la sogs te gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/byams shing
112a2(mdo sde): snying rje ba med na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis brdzun byas sam//pha rol po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/thabs kyis brdzun byas pa dang /brdzun
112a3(mdo sde): gyi rgya bas pa dang /brdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang /brdzun gyi chos byed pa dang /btsun gyi las byed pa dang /mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer ba dang /ma mthong ba la mthong zhes zer ba dang
112a4(mdo sde): lus dang sems kyis brdzun byas po dang /byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/de la slar log par sems
112a5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi tshig mi drang ba dang /yon po la lta ba dang /yon po'i las byed par bskyod na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu smyo ba'i khu ba bdag
112a6(mdo sde): 'tshong ngam/pha log po smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong par bstan tam/thabs kyis smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ngam/sme ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ngo ba'i rkyen byed dam//
112a7(mdo sde): spro ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i chos byed dam/smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/spro ba'i khu ba'i cog 'tsheng du mi rung /smyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha rna ma tho ba skye'o//
112b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la snang zhing thar pa'i shes rab bskyed nga'i rigs na/slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed na byang chub sems
112b2(mdo sde): dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang /ma byung ba dang //byang chub sems dpa' dag dge slong dang /dge slong ma'i nyes pa bdag gis 'phya su bya so sam/gzhan 'phyas
112b3(mdo sde): byed par bstan tam/'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/'phya ba'i chos dang /'phya ba'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang //thog pa chung ngu rnam gnyis
112b4(mdo sde): byed pa'i mi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/rtag par snying rje bskyed de ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga' yid ches par
112b5(mdo sde): bstan cing bslab pa'i rigs na/de la byang chub sems dpa' slar log par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges shes bshad na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas
112b6(mdo sde): kyi bu la la zhig bdag gis bdag stod cing phar smod pa dang /gzhan la bdag stod/phar smod par ston pa/smod pa'i rgyu/smon pa'i rkyen byed pa/smos pa'i chos dang /smod pa'i las/
112b7(mdo sde): byed na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin par rma dbab cing ngan sems pa ni bdag gis blangs te/dge zhing legs pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na la la zhig
113a1(mdo sde): gis bdag gi legs pa ni bsnyad gzhan gyi legs pa ni bcabs te/gzhan la rma dbab par byas na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas
113a2(mdo sde): kyi bu bdag ser sna che'am/gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ser sna'i chos byed dam/ser sna'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po
113a3(mdo sde): 'ongs so cog dang /gzhan ji 'dod pa bzhin dgos so//byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan du sems shing sems lag she ba dang /dong tshe gcig gam/khab gcig
113a4(mdo sde): gam/rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na tshig gcig le'u gcig/rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/slar dag ngan pas spyos te rma phab na de ni
113a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/mi pha log po khro bar ston ta ma/khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/khro ba'i chos byed
113a6(mdo sde): dA mkhro ba'i las byed na/byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing 'thab cing rtsod pa med par byas la rtag par snying rje bskyed cing bya ba rigs kyi//
113a7(mdo sde): phyir log par sems can thams cad kyi nang na sems can ma yin pa la khang na pas gsho zhing lag pas 'chog pa dang /ral gri dang /dbyig pas gdab cing brdegs kyang
113b1(mdo sde): snying brtse ma bri ste/pa log po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing gnod ba skur kyang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bul la
113b2(mdo sde): zhig gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/gzhan dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang /rkyen byed dam/ma
113b3(mdo sde): yin pa'i chos byed dam/ma yin pa'i las byed na/byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang /ma rabs kyi ngan tshig gcig sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad ma yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong ngam
113b4(mdo sde): thos na mdud rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na/bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/yid ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i
