113b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/slar log par ma rabs log pa la lta zhing ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//dge zhugs smod pa'i rnams
113b6(mdo sde): ni byang chubo sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rigaso//'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na tshul khrims bcu tshang bar bshig pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos/
113b7(mdo sde): la lo zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las ma nus te/rgyal po'i gral yang stor/'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal
114a1(mdo sde): po'i gral yang sbyor/dge slong dang /dge slong ma'i gral yang stor/g.yos shing phyogs pa bcu dang /bskyed cing gsol ba bcu dang /chos rdo rje dang mtshungs//
114a2(mdo sde): pa bcu dang /sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa'o//yon tan zang mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas ngon song gsum du lhung ste//bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dang /
114a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/de bas na gcig kyang gzhig tu mi rung ngo //khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang /slob pa dang //slob par
114a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigaso//gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri ba'i nang nas rgya cher bshadado//sangs
114a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/phas pham pa bcu ni bshad zin to//ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /
114a6(mdo sde): 'khor los bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i rigaso//'ung tang lha ma srin thams
114a7(mdo sde): cad kyang rgyal po'i lus dang /blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang /skyabs byed//sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgye so//tshul khrims thob zin na sri zhu dang mi 'gol ba'i sems dang /
114b1(mdo sde): sems la gus par byas pa'i sems dpa' bskyed do//gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang //theg pa chen po lnga tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang /mtshungs par mthong
114b2(mdo sde): pa dang /las mthun par byed pa mthong na langs te bsu la phyag 'tshal te nang dri ba'i rig so//byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang /le lo'i sems dang /glen pa'i sems bskyed
114b3(mdo sde): de ma langs/ma bsu/phyag ma byas te/ci la'ang chos bzhin du zhes dang /ri mo dang /bdag gis lus dang /yul mkhar dang /po mos dang /nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor
114b4(mdo sde): cotsog btsongs la dgos cog ma sbyar te//de ltar ma nus na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu la la che dkar chang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes te/dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pastor to//la
114b5(mdo sde): la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang log gis tshad snod blangs te mi pha rol po la byin te blung na tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/'di lta
114b6(mdo sde): stemi'o cog thams cad dang /sems can thams cad la chang 'thung ba ro bston tu mi rung //bdag rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/bdag tshad ka raM 'thungs pa dang /pha rol pa la
114b7(mdo sde): bdar ba ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sha che dkar zos pa dang /sha'o cog bzar mi rung ste zos na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas sems can thams cad kyis
115a1(mdo sde): mthong nas 'jigs nas spong ngo //de lta byas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi sha bzar mi rung //sha zos pa ni sdig grangs med de sha zos na ltung ba'o//
115a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu dku ba rnam lnga yang mi rung //sgog pa dang /btsang dang /rgya sgog dang /ri sgog rnams dang /shing kun dang /'di rnams lnga khe zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo //
115a3(mdo sde): la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang /tshul khrims lnga dang /tshul khrims bcu dang /rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi
115a4(mdo sde): bshig pa dang /log pa bdun dang /gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa'i sdig byed pa mthong na mthol tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigaso//de las byang chub sems dpa' ma
115a5(mdo sde): bstan te mthol tshangs byed du ma bcug na/lhan cig 'dug 'dug cing tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims bshad pa'i tshe sdig dngosu
115a6(mdo sde): byung gis nyes pa mthol tshangs byed chug shig/ma bcug na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ba lhan cig tu las byed pa/dge 'dun gyi
115a7(mdo sde): khang khyim dang /mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na rgyang grags stong gi lam na chur 'ongs na ni bsu/'gro ba ni bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/bkur sti dang /ri mo dang /nyin gcig
115b1(mdo sde): ci dus gsum dur mo bya nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha zas dang /khri bstan dang /chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer ta/
115b2(mdo sde): dus gsum du chos bshad de nyin gcig cing dus gsum du phyag bus par 'tshal la khro ba'i sems dang /mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis//chos kyi phyir lus dang bsngos te chos gsol lo//
115b3(mdo sde): de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la'ang rung ste/tshul khrims dang /mdo sde 'chad pa'i khang khyim chen po'i nong na chos 'chad pa yod na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob
115b4(mdo sde): pa tshul khrims kyi glegs pa mkhyer to//chos kyi mkhan po'i gnasu song la/gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so//la la zhig ri dang /tshal dang /shing gi drung dang /dge 'dun gyi sa dang /khyim
115b5(mdo sde): gyi nang dang /chos 'chad de cog gi sar phyin par byas te/mnyan cing 'dod do//de'i gan su song ste ma mnyan/ma mnos na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sems ni theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing
115b6(mdo sde): rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang /tshul khrims la 'dug kyang khar smra na sangs rgyas kyi bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/rtag par theg pa chung ngu rnams gnyis dang /mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing
115b7(mdo sde): 'og pa lta 'i tshul khrims dang /chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab po cog rtag par rim gro byas te/gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par
116a1(mdo sde): byas na dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o//pha ma dang /mkhan po
116a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang /slob ma 'am/dbang po ma tshang ba nad do cog gis btab cing nyon mongs na kun kyang gsos te sos par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la ltag she zhing ngan
116a3(mdo sde): sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang /yul mkhar du ma phyin pa/dbye dang /ri lung dang /mkhar dang /tshal na nad po 'dug pa mthong ste ra mda' dang /rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas
116a4(mdo sde): kyis bu ral gri dang /mda' gzhu dang /mdung dang /ste re la sogs te thab mo'i spyang mtshon cha dang /sems can gsod pa'i smad dang 'dra ba rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chang du mi rung //byang chub
116a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni pha ma gzhan gyis bsad kyang sha mi glan na/sems can thams cad gsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/mtshon cha tshod kar 'chang ba na ltung ba'o//'di lta bu'i tshul khrims
116a6(mdo sde): rnam bcu ni bslabs te/rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so//'og ma le'u drug gi nang ni rgya cher bshad do//sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/
116a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/nyi 'og gi yul du pho nyar 'drul ba dmag gi g.yul bshams te/dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te sems can mang po bsad
116b1(mdo sde): bya chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phan tshun du 'dul yang mang na tshe dkar yul gyi dag byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de la tshwa dkar byed pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu zla 'bangs
116b2(mdo sde): dang /bran pos spros dang /phyugs bdag sna drug dang /gI shin sbom do gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa/khaM dang tshod spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na gzhan la byed par bstan pa
116b3(mdo sde): lta smos kyang ni dgos te/de 'i ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de pa log po dge ba nges pa/chos kyi mkhan po/dge 'dun rgyal po/ya rabs btsun
116b4(mdo sde): pal mnyes par log pa bdun dang /pham pa bcu dang //pha ma dang /phu bo nu bo dang /gnyen pa rlom drug gi tshul khrims bshig go zhes skur na sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing byams shing snying
116b5(mdo sde): nga'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gan su lhung na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bung na sems bskyed de//ched kar me chen po btang la ri dang /
116b6(mdo sde): chalnga dbye dang /ri lung dbyar zlang ba man chad/ston zla tha chungs yun chad/bsregs sam/ya la zhig gis me btang ste/gzhan gyi khang khyi mdang /mkhar dang /grong dang /dge 'dun
116b7(mdo sde): gi khyim dang /zhing dang /bskyed shing dang /lha maM srin dang /bla'i dkor la sogs te bdag po yod do cog gi rdzas bsreg tu mi rung ngo //la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o//
117a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi slob ma bdag dang /mur 'dug dang /gnyen rnam drug la sogs te/dbye bu'i bshes gnyen cog kun kyang ci'ang thog pa chen pa
117a2(mdo sde): yi ge dang /tshul khrims nod cing gzungasu 'dzin por bsten pa'i rig so//gzhung dang lugs shes shing byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang /bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems
117a3(mdo sde): bcu dang /rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/gciganas gcig tu go rims dang /chos kyis cho ga shes par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'o la byang chub sems dpas ngan
117a4(mdo sde): sems dang /zhe sdang bskyed//gzhan nyan thos kyi theg pa chung ngu rnams gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang /yi ge dang /mur 'dug dang log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o//
117a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu legaso ba'i sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang /tshul khrims dang /yi ge bslabs nas rgya cher phye nas gzhung gir ci bya ba shes nas byang chub sems
117a6(mdo sde): dpa' gsar du slob pa rgyang grags brgya stong gi lam nas theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i
117a7(mdo sde): rig so//dka' thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/lag ngar bsregs pa sor mo bsregs pa'o//de la lus dang /lag ngar dang /sor mo bsrogs te/sangs rgyas thams cad
117b1(mdo sde): la yon du mi gsol na/de'i rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no//stag dang /spyang ki dang /seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang /'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi
117b2(mdo sde): sha dang /rkang lag gtong phod par byas te/byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de/sems ni phye/yid ni gol bar bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
117b3(mdo sde): bdag gas pa'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir lon glan po'i rigs pa ni ma blan gyi/yi ge dang /tshul khrims ri mo dang /'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas snga phyi med par dkon mchog gsum la
117b4(mdo sde): 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang /nor rdzas dang /gso bo'i khe dang /ming snyan po'i phyir rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po chen po la sogs pa
117b5(mdo sde): gnyen zhes zer te/snyems shing nun gyi nor skyong la/btsan ngag gis bsdigs te nan gyis nor dang /khe tshol lo tsig gi ming ni ngan pa mang po che la zhes bya'o//gzhan la'ang
117b6(mdo sde): snying rje med cing sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yid med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'i//sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob pa na nyin gcig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems
117b7(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims bzung la/de'i bzhung dang /don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang
118a1(mdo sde): mi shes par smra ra'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba ni bdag la bArnyas shing bslus/gzhan la 'du ban+d+has te chos so cog rnam pa kya ga kyang mo shes pa gnan/
118a2(mdo sde): la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims sto na pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag nu pog snod khyer te/byang chub sems
118a3(mdo sde): dpa'i las byed pa la mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis ba ri du bar bcug ste/'phags pa'i mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing ngan ma byed pa med do zhes skur te/de lta bu tshod kar byas
118a4(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad ci'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing pho'o cog ni bdag gi pha yin mo'o cog ni bdag gi ma yin/bdag sngan chad kyi tshe rabs
118a5(mdo sde): la ger skye so cog na'ang de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag ga pa ma yin te/de bsad cing zos na bdag gi pha ma bsad do//gcig tu na bdag gi lus
118a6(mdo sde): rnying pa bsad do//sa dang chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yin no//me dang rlung ngo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas rtag par gson por btang ba'i las byed/gang
118a7(mdo sde): skyes gar skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de bdag gis 'or ba dang ra mda' byas te/nyon mongs shing phongs pa thar bar bya'o//rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i
118b1(mdo sde): du smran sa sanan // /chung du na rgyu na rna na / ma
118b2(mdo sde): gnyis pa sa ma//'di ste/rgyal khrims tsubagapas na sems shes par ga tu slog nga 'i sbyin rgyu nas kyang chu skyes po kyig dun
118b3(mdo sde): sa rgya che zhing gsal bar ba shad de// sa nas kyis ngas rgyas kyi bul //'astsal pa khrus pa'i la khrom kyis ma 'i mni bag gis ldan/bam+mA de/thun+da
118b4(mdo sde): gzhon rnam drug pa nga gA/kun du /gzhan ga gos padag ga rgyal bags mag blanan sa dang shA/
118b5(mdo sde): skye dge/ ni pas sbyos zhing 'i jigs la nyin gcig c-i las ngan 'arnam gsum brgyad pa 'i med/mon pa dud kyi rdzog byas pa lta sa
118b6(mdo sde): das te/ma ci byang chub sems pa' la sbyi med/gtan rnam drun zhim pa'i shidren che ga byed na kyi 'o//sa kyi rgyas kyi sngon du me la
119a1(mdo sde): thama.an/thathamachamams sams mthama.amaH/tha sa maHtha sa\u0f7fkam/ma ma/mnam
119a2(mdo sde): ste/ci 'ang mi shes par bdag dbang ngo rnol 'dzings par rlom zhing la la ni lo grangs rgan zhing phyug bcan snyems te/la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang /
119a3(mdo sde): mang du shes pa dang /dbang che ba dang /nor rin po che sna bdun mang du 'dog pas rgyags dregs sngan chad chos rishes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang /tshul khrims mi gsol/mi nod/
119a4(mdo sde): chos kyi mkhan po la la ni rlung chung /la la ni nas gzhon/la la ni thabs chung /la la ni dbul/la la ni dbang po mtshang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa yod de/chos kyi
119a5(mdo sde): yi ge dang /tshul khrims so cig zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo//chos kyi slob dpon ma rig pa dang /thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing chos kyi
119a6(mdo sde): mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing nod du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
119a7(mdo sde): 'dod cing nod na sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te/zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol
119a8(mdo sde): tshangs byas la/ltas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob bo//ltas bzang po ma mthong ba ni zhag bdun gnyis/bdun gsum/lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i
119b1(mdo sde): kyis gzung po//lhas bzang po mthong nas sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnong ngo do//ltas bzang po mi mthong nu sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
119b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod kyang ming tshul khrims thob pa zhes mi bya'o//le lo zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod
119b3(mdo sde): nA ltas bzang po momi dgos//de ci'i phyir zhe na//chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu drastan pas na ltas bzang po mi dgos te//chos kyi mthun po de'i mdun du tshul khrims mnos ni tshul
119b4(mdo sde): khyams kyang thob ste gus pa'i sems skye'o//rgyang grags stong mi tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mngon po da la sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar chul khrim
119b5(mdo sde): no na ltas bzang po mthong bar dgos//chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /tshul khrims shes pa dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /zlon pa rnams byams
119b6(mdo sde): shing mdzu' bsnyems te/byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang /tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drir 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang /ngan sems dang /lo lo
119b7(mdo sde): sems kyis gcig pu gcig pu nas 'dri ba'i lan ma glan na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang /theg pa chen po'i dring ba'i chos/drang por
120a1(mdo sde): mthong ba drang po'i ngo bo nyid/drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom mi nus pa rnams ni dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/slar log par bltas te
120a2(mdo sde): theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang /mur 'dug gi chos dang /ma rabs kyi gzhung la bsten pa dang /a b+hi d+harma bshad pa slob pa dang /theg pa chu ngu'i yi ge dang //'dug par slob na de ni
120a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chad pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no//de lta na ched kar byas pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu
120a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na chos 'chang ba bdag po byed pa dang /dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang /ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag po dang /bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i bdag po dang /'gro zhing
120a5(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i bdag po dang /de lta bu byed na byams pa'i sems bskyed la mi mdza' ste/'thab cing rtsod pa'ang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigaso//dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrungs
120a6(mdo sde): te ma 'os par mi spyad/bdag gis bdag gi sgor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o//de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang /rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog gsuM
120a7(mdo sde): gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la byang chub sems dpa' dang /dge slong 'dron pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang /mkhan
120b1(mdo sde): tham yan/thamachab mtsham sa samathams mtham/am/thas maHtshaH thas nathamaca mam kham mabam gas sa ma ma ka' chan/amatha mas thamagam mamam
120b2(mdo sde): dang /grong dang /rgyal po'i khyim dang /dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang /'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa na thong na snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni bsu 'ablo na ni bskyal te zas kyi bsti stang
120b3(mdo sde): dang khang khyim nyal ba'i mol cha dang /dri dang /sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin no//la la zhig bdag la nor med ni bdag gi lus dang bu pho dang /bu mo dgra btsongs te/ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te
120b4(mdo sde): sbyin dgos so//sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te/dge 'dun phol dang /dge 'dun gyi 'dron pa zhig gnyer te yon gyi nor skal pa yod pa'i sar dge 'dun khyim bdag pos dge 'dun
120b5(mdo sde): 'dron pa'i rnams rims kyis gnyer ba btang ste/de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste/dge 'dun 'dron pa ma btang na dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag
120b6(mdo sde): bo sdig grangs med par thob ste byol song dang mtshungaso//dge sbyong ma yin shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/de ltar byas pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu ci'ang go rim su ma
120b7(mdo sde): bab par logs shig tu yon blangs shing bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo //de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas ni phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na phyogs/
120b8(mdo sde): bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang /sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa rnams dang /mkhan po dang /dge 'dun dang /pha ma dang /nad pa'i rdzas
121a1(mdo sde): bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang /rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gis dge 'dun gnyer te/bsod nam
121a2(mdo sde): bskyed cing smon lam gsol na dge 'dun gyi nang du song na dge skos la dris te/de ring go rims gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs bcu'o 'phrul gyi dge 'dun 'thob po//gud nas dag
121a3(mdo sde): bcom pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas go rimasu bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o//de las dge 'dun gzhan
121a4(mdo sde): gnyer ba ni mur 'dug ngan pa'i chos so//sangs rgyas bdun la ni gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do//sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o//sangs
121a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu ngan sems snad de gso ba'i khe'i phyir pho smos kyi g.yem pa 'tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan bde ba dang /bdag rdung pa/bdag 'du ba po smos kyi mtshan lha rmi lam bzang
121a6(mdo sde): ngan 'gro la pho zhes zer mo zhes zer/log po'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/dgra bslab po'i chos byed/dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la dug rtsi rnam pa brgya stong byed de
121a7(mdo sde): sbrul dug/gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang /byad ste ma la sogs pa snying rje yong med pa lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed/bdag gi lus
121b1(mdo sde): kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur pa byas te gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/kha ni stong pa 'chad/las ni yod pa'i las byed la/tha mal pa'i bud med dang /skyes pa'i sman byed cing mi tshangs par
121b2(mdo sde): spyod par sbyor te/ci la'ang mi 'jigs shing chags pa med/dus drug tu mched ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang /lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtog tu byed pa'i tshe sems can gsod//
121b3(mdo sde): rkun po dang //chom po byed cing mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bsheg pa ni ltung ba'o//tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la rtag par gzungasu gzung ba'i rigs so//khrims gzung ba'i le'u'i nang
121b4(mdo sde): nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad//sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang /mi ngan pa'o cog dang /rkun po
121b5(mdo sde): chen pos sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge 'ching pa mthong ngam/dge slong dang /dge
121b6(mdo sde): slong ma 'tshong ngam/gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dang /la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas bran po bran mor byas pa zhig byang chub sems
121b7(mdo sde): dpas de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed/thabs kyi sar mda' dang /skyabs byas te gnas gnas na 'khod cog kyang slar slob cing ston cig/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
122a1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /chos dang /chung khrind kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na nor gyis slus shig/de ltar ma
122a2(mdo sde): slus na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu 'chung du mi gnang ba la mtshon cha dang /mda' dazhu 'chang ba dang /tshong spobs byed pa dang /srang dang dri che chung 'chang ba dang /rtsal blo snyems
122a3(mdo sde): shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang /sems can la drug dog byed de/pha log bo bcings drags byas pa dang /nges don du yod pa zhig pa dbyil dang /sel byi dang /khyi dU /
122a4(mdo sde): phag dang /bya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo //de lta bu che dkar gsos na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi drung ngan sems bskye po smos la sogs pa 'thab pa cag lo lta ba dmigag su
122a5(mdo sde): dang dgra chom po byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung //yang gcig tu dung 'byed pa dang /rnga gling dang /gyim shing dang /dzong dang /gling bu dang /klo ra hi'u dang /glu len pa dang /rol
122a6(mdo sde): mo'i sbrel mnyan du mi rung //tshe lo dang /mig mangs dang /par sig gi rtsed mo dang /ra 'bri lug ni byed mo dang /pho long rdo ba dang /rdo 'phen gyis rtse ba dang /bum bu la rde'u
122a7(mdo sde): 'phen pa dang /khras byed pa dang /me long byud pa byar mi rung ngo //rtsa ci tsha'u dang /rgya lcang dang /phor kha ru ba dang /mi'i thod pa dang /de rnams la mo gdab du mi rung ngo //rkun
122b1(mdo sde): ngopo'i zin gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung //de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'o//sungs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims rngub par bzung ba'i rim gro byas na 'gro nyal 'dug langs/nyin
122b2(mdo sde): mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha tIn+da klags ni rdo rje dang mtshungs//rgyal po thogs pa mtsho chen porgal ba dang me tshungaso//bcig tu na dge slong rtsas bcings pa dang mtshungs te/
122b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsams pa nga ni da dung sangs rgya sum phyin pa'i sangs rgyaso//sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams ni sangs
122b4(mdo sde): rgyasu phyin pa'i sangs rgyaso snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de bar mi chad par sems la bsams la de skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang /mur 'dug la sems kyis bsams
122b5(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la/pha ma dang /mkhan po dang /dge 'dun dang /dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal
122b6(mdo sde): par smon//rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang //tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i ye shes dang /khrims dang //g.yo
122b7(mdo sde): zhing phyogs pa bcu dang /bskyed cing gso gso ba bcu dang /chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang sa bcu la sogs pa bdag byed cing shes la chos bzhin du las byed par smin to//
123a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims pazung la sman bu' par bya ba ni lus pa spyo/kyang bar te sems la sam+b+hasmra pa'i bar mig cad par sems pas so//de la byang
123a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam me bskyed na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzung su bzung ste
123a3(mdo sde): smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo//bdag gi lus 'di ma chen po'i nang du tshig kyang rung khung zab mo dang /ral gri'i re la stong yang rung ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos
123a4(mdo sde): kyi yi ge dang /tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang /nam du'ang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad sogs pa mi byed par ston to//gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar sman to//ldugs
123a5(mdo sde): bsreg pa'i dra ba dang /de lta bu rgyu mo rim pa stong gis bskor te lus dkris kyang mthar yun du tshul khrims bral ba'i lus kyi dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi gos thams cad mi bgo bar
123a6(mdo sde): smon to//yang gcig tu sbyinI lom 'di ltar smon to//kha 'di'i nang du lcags kyi thu ma gyi sregs pa dang /me chu bzhin du drub ste 'du bra la bsgral pa brgya stang gi bar du lon
123a7(mdo sde): kyi tshul khrims pa shig pagi bas dar nga'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams cad mi za bar smin to//rang gcig du sprin la mi bI dwe ltar smon to//lus 'di mchen pos bag
123b1(mdo sde): pa'i lcags kyi ba dang /lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bskul kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dang pa'i sbyin bdag gi khyu ba cag gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to//yang gcig tu smon lam
123b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar sman to//lu su~M 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar dumadu rgya khaM gsum pa sum pa rgyas brtsegs kyi rung ste/mthur chul khrims zhig pa'i lus kyi dang pa'i sbyin bdag gI N+DI sman
123b3(mdo sde): mas da ma bar smon to//yang gasbyi smon lam 'di ltar smon to//lus 'dris bskol bA swA gri bar du lcags kyi dang tsho che ba'i nang du bcu ga kyang rlung ste/mthun tshu la zhin
123b4(mdo sde): dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyi mo cog dang /lci mir dang /bskyed shing dang /zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to//yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to//lus 'di
123b5(mdo sde): mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun dus brdungs te rdul phra ma bzhin du song yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi'i chal
123b6(mdo sde): blar smon to//s+yAng gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smyon te/stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang /mdud rjes mig ga ti sa smras shing btsigs kyang tshul khrims pa shig pa'i
123b7(mdo sde): sems gyis pa logs kha dge 'azing ba la me lci bar smon te//yang gcig d+ha sprin lam 'di ltar blon+do /lcags kyi spyang du stong phrag pa rgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus
124a1(mdo sde): kyi chu ba dang /rna ba'i rtsa bar btsugs kyang tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan pa la mi mnyan pang smon to///yang gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smon to//bskal/
124a2(mdo sde): pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing gzhogs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spros cog la mi sdom par smon te//yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to//bskal pa
124a3(mdo sde): brgya stong gi bar du lce ral gris bcad gtubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis mi'o cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to//yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar
124a4(mdo sde): smon to//sta rnon pos lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi bad mi chags par smon to//yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon te//
124a5(mdo sde): sems can no cog sangs rgyasu yod par smon to//byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyisu spangs pa'i yon tan pa
124a6(mdo sde): dgun dang /dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang /tshul khrimasu 'jug pa so shing dang /sran phye dang /chos gos gsum dang /ril ba dang /lhung bzed dang /gdong ba dang /gsil byed dang /
124a7(mdo sde): pogi phar dang /chu chags dang /lag phyis dang /gri dang /gtsub shing dang /ge tsu bstan dang /smed char dang /tha gu'i khri dang //dar ma dang /khrims dang /sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan
124b1(mdo sde): spyad pa'i chu grong rgyu ba'i tshe 'gro zhing 'ongs na rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na yo byad bco brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni dpyid zla ra ba chos bco lnga nas dpyid zla tha chungs chos
124b2(mdo sde): bco lnga'i bar du'o//ston zla 'bring po ches bco lnga nas dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bco brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/dper na bya'i mdab ma dang 'dra'o//de sto gso sbyin gyi nyi ma
124b3(mdo sde): la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing kha ton du phas pham pa bcu dang /ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi khrims kha ton du lhogs shig/de ste khrims klog pa'i
124b4(mdo sde): tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang /gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton klags la gcig gos
124b5(mdo sde): 'thol tshangs bya ste/gcig ga mau gnyis sam gang yang rung ste/stong brgya de'ang mi gcig gis kha ton klog go/kha ton klog po nis mthon po la 'dug la nyan pa ni dma' ba la 'dug go/
124b6(mdo sde): so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang /lnga pa dang /bdun pa bgos te tshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o//sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i tshe bgegs yod cing mi
124b7(mdo sde): bde ba'i nang dum 'gro cig/yul gyi bgegs dang /rgyal po mi srun pa dang /sa mtho dma' dang /rtsi shing zab mo dang /dbyar seng ge dang /stag dang /smyung ki dang /chu ste rlung gi bge
125a1(mdo sde): dang /rkun po chom po dang /sbrul gdug pa'i lam la sogs te//bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung //de la che dgar
125a2(mdo sde): song na ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig/tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig/tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni phyi nas 'dug shig/rgan
125a3(mdo sde): gzhon mi lta/dge slong pho dang //dge slong mo dang /ya rabs dang /btsun pa dang //rgyal po rgyal bu dang /nyung rum dang /bran po smos la sogs pa tshul khrims sngar nus pa ni sngar 'dug
125a4(mdo sde): shig/phyis nos pa ni phyis go rims bzhin du 'dug shig/mur 'dug ngan pa dang /mi glen po bzhin du rgan yang rung //gzhon yang rung //snga med phyi med pa'i go rims med pa
125a5(mdo sde): ni g.yung po bran gyi chos so//nga sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na ni snga ma ni steng du 'dug/phyi ma ni 'og tu 'dug go/byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhin du go rimasu ma 'khod na ltung
125a6(mdo sde): ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems can no cog bstan cing bcos te/dge 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing ri dang /tshal dang /ra ba dang /zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang po
125a7(mdo sde): byas la dbyar dgun du tshul dang /bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang /gtsang ma'i 'chags 'dzug su gzhug pa'i rig so//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can no cog gi phyir
125b1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos dang /tshul khrims kyi yi ge bkrol ba shad na na man cha byung ba dang /yul gyi bgegs dang /dgra'i bgegs dang /pha ma dang /phu nu bo dang /mkhan po la sogs pa thog
125b2(mdo sde): ma shi ba'i dus dang /bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang /bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang /bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang /bdun bdun gyi nyi ma la de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /tshul khrims bkrol ba shad/
125b3(mdo sde): mchod ston byas te/dge ba'i bsod nams thob par gsal cig/'gro 'ongs kyang gson po'i mtsho bsod nams byed pa la me chen pos bsregs//chu chen pos khyer/rlung nag po chen pos
125b4(mdo sde): gru bus pa dang /rtsang po dang mtsho chen po'i dgra'i bgegs la sogs te/sdig go cog bgegs dang lan gyis na mtshams med pa bdun/bgegs brgyad//log sgril/rkang sgril ltung dang /
125b5(mdo sde): lcags dang lus bcings drags te/g.yem zhing kho ba mang po dang /blun zhing glen pa mang po dang /na tsha'i mang po'i ngag zus na kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi go dang /tshul
125b6(mdo sde): khrims kha ton klags te dgrol ba bshad//byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na ltung ba'o//tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la gus par rtag par gzungasu zung zhig/
125b7(mdo sde): snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do//sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas kyi bu mi la tshul khrims shig sbyin na bye brag dbye
126a1(mdo sde): zhing bdam du mi rung /rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po chen po dang /blon po phal dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang /po g.yem
126a2(mdo sde): mo g.yem dang /gzugs kyi gnam bco brgyad dang /'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang /dbang po med pa dang /dbang po rnams gnyis yod pa dang /nyung ru ma dang bran pos smos dang
126a3(mdo sde): lha ma srin la sogs te/thams cad kun khrims mnong du rung ngo //lus la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni kha dog bsgyur bar ston la chos dang mthun par gyis shig/kha dog ser
126a4(mdo sde): ba sngon po nag po dmar po//mal gos yan chad kha dog bsgyur ro//lus la gos pa go'o cog chos te kha dog sgyur cig/yulo tsag gi nang na mi'i gosu bgo ba la/dge slong ngo tsug
126a5(mdo sde): gos ni tha mal pa'i gos dang mi mthun no//thog ma'i tshul khri mas sbyin pa'i tshe mkhan pos dri ba khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdun gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig/chos kyi mkhan po
126a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo //log pa bdun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba dang /pha ma dang mkhan po dang slob
126a7(mdo sde): dpon bsad pa dang /lus kyi tshul khrims gtsang ma bshig po dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa'i 'phags pa bsad pa yin te/'di rnam bdun tshang bar byas te bsgribs pa'i tshul
126b1(mdo sde): tham yan thamamacamamatsham sa samamam samatsham/am/tha.a naH Thas nathamaca mas khas thamasamams 'am sa tham mamasa' mamacan ama' ya masas ma
126b2(mdo sde): la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung //gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims sbyin du rung //rab tu byung ba'i chos ni rgyal po la'ang phyag mi 'tshal//pha ma la'ang phyag mi 'tshal/gnyen pa rnam pa
126b3(mdo sde): drug la 'di zhes mi bya/lha ma srin la'ang phyug mi 'chi lo//chos kyi mkhan po skad shes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi lom nas 'ongs te/khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sems
126b4(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi mkhan pos ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed/sems can no cig la tshul khrims ma byin na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te/yid ches pa'o sems
126b5(mdo sde): g.yo bar bya na byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bston pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te/tshul khrims mnod du 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong na sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du bong zhig
126b6(mdo sde): mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shig/de la'ang tshe 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na mkhan pos tshul khrims sbyin pa mi rigs
126b7(mdo sde): bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig med na tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo //la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu pa shi gang zhig yod ni mthol tshangs byed du chug shig/sangs rgyas dang byang chu
126b8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i zhal sngar nyin mtshan drug tu ba po bcu dang /ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du glags la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems phog pa nas phyog
127a1(mdo sde): 'chal de'i tshe ltas bzang por bye da/so//de la nyi ma bdun dang /bdun gnyis dang /bdun gsum dang /lo gcig tshun chad ltas bzang po mthong dgos//ltas/
127a2(mdo sde): bzang po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gshegs te/spyi bo la byugs te//'od mthong ba dang /me tog mthong ba dang /ltas ci'ang rung ba bzang po mthong na mod la sdig 'byin to//de la ltas bzang/
127a3(mdo sde): po med na mthol tshangasu zin kyang mi phan te/de'i tshe lus kyis ni tshul khrims mi thob bo//lo dang nyi mas bstan te spogs te byas la/ltas 'ong byung bdag mthong na tshul khrims mnod du
127a4(mdo sde): rung ngo //la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa shig pa ni mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la 'byung ste/bdun gyis posgribs pa dang mi mtshungaso//de bas na tshul khrims ston
127a5(mdo sde): paba'i mkhan pos chos 'di'i nang nas kyang gcig nas gcig nas khrel nA mkhan po bya'o//theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /tshul khrims yang ba dang /lci ba dang /yin pa dang ma yin
127a6(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs dam pa mi shes na gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang /snga ma'i rang bzhin gyis sa bon dang /da ltar bskyed cing gso ba'i rang bzhin dang /gtan mi rlag pa'i rang bzhin
127a7(mdo sde): dang chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin dang /drang po'i rang bzhin dang /de'i nang nas rtogs pa dang /dpyod pa'i rang bzhin dang /phyi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te chos
127b1(mdo sde): kyis las bya'o//cho ga dang tshul khrims dang /chos kyi yi ge 'di gcig nas gcig nas khong du ma chud do//byang chub sems dpa' g.yo ba'i khe dang /ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i phyir slob ma la le
127b2(mdo sde): brkam pas/ngan pa btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang /tshul khrims kyi yi ga kun shes zhes zer zhing yon len pa'i bdag la'ang bslus shing brnyas/gcig tu na gzhan la'ang
127b3(mdo sde): slus shing brnyas te/de lta bus mi la tshul khrims byin na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdun du mur 'dug
127b4(mdo sde): dang /ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen po 'di bshod du mi rung ngo //log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo //rgyal po ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du'ang bshad
127b5(mdo sde): du mi rung ngo //mi ngan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims ma mnos pa ni ming byol song zhes bya'o//gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing rdo shing dang mtshungs sems
127b6(mdo sde): med de mong chos log pa zhes bya'o//log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing dum pa dang mtshungaso//byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngon pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de
127b7(mdo sde): bstan na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam pa mnos la chad kar sems bskyed de/'phags pa'i tshul khrims ba shig na sbyin
128a1(mdo sde): bdag gcig yon blang du ma rung //gcig tu ni rgyal ba khab kyis dris la 'ang 'gror mi rung /rgyul tshul 'du 'thung du mi rung ste/'dra chen po lnga stong gis
128a2(mdo sde): rtag par de'i mdun bcad nas 'dre na re dag chen po khyim dang /mkhar dang /yul gyi nang du 'ong so zhes zer te/de rnams kyis khor mor mi de'i rjes phyagaso//'jig rten na re'ang sang+yas
128a3(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro'o zhes zer te mig gi mthong du 'ong mi dga'o//tshul khrims bshig pa ni byol song dang mtshungs/shing dum pa dang mtshungs te/drang po'i tshul khrims bshig na
128a4(mdo sde): ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te rtug par gzung smra bzung ste kha ton du 'ang klog go//pags pa bshus te ni shog shog byas/khrag byung bas ni sdug tshar byas
128a5(mdo sde): rus pa bcag ste smyug gur byas la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ger bri'o//shing gi shun pa dang /thong kar la bris te rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang /rin med pa'i spos dang /
128a6(mdo sde): me tog la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gze ba dang snod byas te/nang du chos kyi yi ge tshul khrims kyi glegs bam gzhug/de la chos kyi bzhin du ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o//
128a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems rgya cher bskyed/yul mkhar dang khang khyim mo cog tu phyin te/sems can cog ni mthong na khyod la sogs pa sems can tsog thams cad dkon
128b1(mdo sde): mchog gsum la phyogs shing tshul khrims bcu nos shig ces bsgo ba'i rigaso//byol song gi khams shig na'ang sems la bsam khar smras te/khyod ni byol song na byang chub sems dpa'i
128b2(mdo sde): sems skyed cig ces bsam zhing bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni raM lung dbye thang ga l-i gnas kyang rung ste/sems can no cog kun byang chub sems dpa'i sems skye bar byas shig/byang chub
128b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can ma bstan ma bcos na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par bstan cing bcos pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed nas chos byed pa dang /ya rabs la sogs pa sprin bdag
128b4(mdo sde): dang /'du ba mang po'i nang du 'grong la gos skya ba gyon te chos bshad du mi rung ngo //gos skya bo gyon pa 'du ba mang po'i nang du chos bshad na chos kyi mkhan po ni sa mthon por 'dug la spos dang /
128b5(mdo sde): me tog gis yon gsol te/mthar bzhi ro nyan pa'i rnams dma' ba na 'khod la gus par mnyan to//pha ma la sri zhu mi 'gal bar bya ba dang /slob mas mkhan po la bya ba bzhin chos la'ang
128b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gus par bya'o//bram ze ma lha can chos byed pa bzhin gus par bya'o//de bzhin ma byas te chos 'chad pa po chos bzhin du ma bshad na ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang
128b7(mdo sde): the tshom med pa'i yod kyi khrims nos shig/rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang slob ma sde bzhi dang /bdag mtho zhing btsan snyems te/sangs rgyas kyi chos dang tshul khrims pa shig pa nan tur gyis
129a1(mdo sde): chos byas te/nga'i slob ma rnam bzhi rab tu byung zhing chos byed par mi ster te/bgegs gcig tu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /mchod rten 'dzugs shing chos//
129a2(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims yi ger 'brir mi ster te/dkon mchog 'jig cing de lta bur ched dkar chos 'jig pa ni ltung ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi bu dge ba'i sems spyod pa la rab tu phyung shig/lags
129a3(mdo sde): pa'i ming snyan pa 'dod pa dang /gso ba'i khe'i phyir rgyal po dang /blon po'i mdun du sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de/dge slong dang dge slong ma la byang chub sems dpa'i
129a4(mdo sde): khrims mi rigs par byin te/slob ma rnams bcings btags na seng ge'i lus la srin bu 'dug pas seng gi bdag gis sha zos pa dang mtshungs te/phyi'i srin bus sha zos pa
129a5(mdo sde): me yin na//de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi bu mur 'dug dang /bdud kyi chos ba shig pa ma yin no//bdag gis chos pa shig pa yin//
129a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos na sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rim gro bya ba ni pha mas pha ma bu gcig pu la bsam pa dang mtshung so//pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang 'dra'o//mur
129a7(mdo sde): 'dug dang /mngon pa la ngag ngan pa tshig ngan bro sang+yas kyi tshul khrims la skur pa zer na mdung rtse kha gsum pa'i mdung rtse sum rgyas snying la btsugs pa dang /rol gri stong dbyig pa stong
129b1(mdo sde): khris lus brdegs pa dang mtshungs par bya ste bdag gi lus bskul pa brgya'i bar du sems can dmyal bar song yang sla'i/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshig gcig ngan du zer ba'i skad
129b2(mdo sde): nomo thos par ston to//bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims pashig pa gzhon la lanI lon pa dang /zhar gyis zhar gyi tshul khrims pa shog par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dkris te/srin
129b3(mdo sde): dang mi 'gal ba'i sems med de//de lta bu byas na ltung ba'o//tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la sems gus par gzung su zung zhig/sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams tshul khrims yang ba
129b4(mdo sde): bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad khyed la sogs pas rtag por gzungasu zung zhig/sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha ton zin to//da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub
129b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis ni da ltar kha ten byas so//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyis 'ong ba'i rnams ni da de'i khar kha ton byed do//sangs rgyas kyi bu nyon cig/phas pham
129b6(mdo sde): pa bcu dang /ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa ba gyod cig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kha ton zin/da ltar gyi kha ton byas phyis kyang kha ton byed/nga'ang de bzhin da ltar kha ton byed do//de lta bas
129b7(mdo sde): na khyed la sogs pas sems can pal mang po rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang /blon po dang dge slong dang dge slong mdong dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen mas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos na
130a1(mdo sde): 'grus par kha ten klogs la bkrol ba shad de/yi ger dris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis skul pa rtag par 'dug ste/khrims kyi glegs pam dus
130a2(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing thogs pa med par byas te/sems can thams cad bstan cing bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas mthong la sangs rgyas gcig gis
130a3(mdo sde): gcig la gtade/tshe tshe rab su yang ngan song dang bgegs brgyad kyi nang du'ang mi ltung zhing rtag par mi'i lam dang gnam gyi steng du skye'o//ngas da ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug ste/
130a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phye ba khyed la sogs pa snying gcig tu brtul te so sor thar pa la bslabs la dga' zhing gus par gyis shig/gzugs
130a5(mdo sde): med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blo na 'debs pa'i nang nas gcig pu gcig pu nas rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do//de'i slob ma mkhas pa su mi stong 'dug cing nyan pas
130a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis kha ton klags pa thos nas sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te/dga' gzha' nas rtag par gzungasu bzung ngo //de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi sa yan chad
130a7(mdo sde): pad+mo'i me tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos kyi sgo mo le'u yi nang na zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bcu bshad zin to//stong phrag brgya 'bum
130b1(mdo sde): byi thub pa'ang de bzhin no//dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na chos dang tshul khrims kyi le'u yang bshadado//byang chub
130b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la bsgob pa shad kyi mi lang ngo //mang po phal rtug par gzungasu zung la kha ton du lhogs shig/de'i gzhung bkrol bshad pa de yin no//stong phrag brgya'ang
130b3(mdo sde): 'bum gyi khams pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi khams kyi tha~Md kyi ses kyi snod tshul khrims kyi snod grangs med pa'i smon lam gyi snod yon tan dang /sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin
130b4(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i snod de sangs rgyas thams cad grangs med/chos kyi sgo mo'ang bshad zin to//stong phrag brgya'i khams kyi nang na sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung ste dga' zhing gus
130b5(mdo sde): par byed do//sems kyi gnas rgya cher phye ba'i gzungs ni sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal ba'i le'u yi nang nas bshad do//sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/
130b6(mdo sde): sAng+yas rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad pa/bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thub zhugs//bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'da'//gzhan la gnod pa de ni byang chub ma yin/
130b7(mdo sde): gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/mig can mi bad yod las byol te 'gro/mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na//sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs//gsum ste thams cad
131a1(mdo sde): skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa//gnod la mi sgyu mi sems te//so sor thar pa bzhin du sdom//zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya//gnas kyang dben par 'jug/
131a2(mdo sde): bya//rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni//de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o bzhi ste log par dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa/ji ltar bung ba me tog gi/kha dog gsung la mi gnod
131a3(mdo sde): par//khu ba blangs te 'phur ba bzhin//de bzhin byang chub grong du spyod//gzhan gyi rnams la mi blta bar//gzhan gyis legs pa byas la'o//bdag rang nyid la ltos/legs
131a4(mdo sde): nyes ci byas pa//lnga ste gser thub sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/bsam gtan la ni ma byol bar//thub pa rnams kyis tshul thub slobs//mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur mgon//
131a5(mdo sde): mngon par zhi bas rtag tu dran pa'i yid//drug ste bsod skyabs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa//thams cad sdig pa mi bya'o//dge'o cog ni rdzogs par bya//bdag gi sems kyang
131a6(mdo sde): shin tu gdul//de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o//bdun tau shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/lus kyis su ni sdom pa dge/ngag gi sdom pa yang ni dge/yid kyi sdom pa
131a7(mdo sde): yang ni dge/dge'o thams cad sdom pa ni//byang chub kun la mgon skyabs byed//nyon mongs thams cad kun las skyob//byang chub ngag bsrung yid kyang sdom//lus kyis
131b1(mdo sde): mi dge mi bya zhing //'dri gsum las las rnam par skyongs//'thob po drang srong gsungs pa'i lam//mi yis brdegs spyos sha mi glan//sdig gi mi la sems mi 'khon//gshe ba'i mi la
131b2(mdo sde): 'ang rtag tu gtsang //mi yis ngan byas bdag mi byed//sangs rgyas kun gyis rabs gtsun byas//'jig rten ra mda'o pha skyabs nus//sangs rgyas 'dis tshul khrims bshad pa//ngas
131b3(mdo sde): rgya cher bshad du kun rdzogs//sangs rgyas kun dang slob ma rnams//chos kyi tshul khrims gus par 'dzin//gcig la gcog kyang gus par byos//ches la drin gzo chog tshang
131b4(mdo sde): no//bya ba med pa'i tshe se thob nus//tshul khrims yi ge bshad zin nas//sems gcig brtul te byang chub thob//chos kyi rgya ro rdzog so///
131b5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya sUr+ya gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA bai bu l+yaM s+ye tra/bod skad du/'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas
131b6(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ni bzhugs
131b7(mdo sde): kaugang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag nas der lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med/dpag tu med
132a1(mdo sde): brjod du med pa dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltaso//de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas der 'dus te lhags pa'i nyan
132a2(mdo sde): thos chen po grangs med/dpag tu med/brjod du med pa dag gis kyang yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so//de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas
132a3(mdo sde): 'dir lhags pa brgya byin dang /tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /lha'i dbang po dang /klu'i dbang po dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /dri za'i dbang po dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /nam mkha'
132a4(mdo sde): lding gi dbang po dang /mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po grangs med/dpag tu med/brjod du med pa dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang naM
132a5(mdo sde): mkha' la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to//de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lha ma
132a6(mdo sde): yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gzhan dang gzhan grangs mod dpag tu med pa dag kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das lo gyen du lta zhing /bcom ldan
132a7(mdo sde): 'das ring po mi thogs par mthar phyin pa/nam mkha' ltar snang ba/byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba rab tu 'byed pa/dbugs rngub pa/'byung ba dran pa 'chi ba med pa'i sgo//tshangs pa'i
132b1(mdo sde): gnas pa lung bstan pa ston pa na cang mi spro bar 'khod de/thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang na mkha'i lam gang bar gyur cing /da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi
132b2(mdo sde): chos kyis char gyi ston pas tshim par mi gyur nas thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das kho na la blta zhing 'khod pa ni dper na nad pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /mun pas
132b3(mdo sde): khebs pa dag snang ba lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag skyabs la lta bar byed pa bzhin te//da ltar mi mjed kyi
132b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang na mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /nyan thos dag dang /dbang po brgya byin dag nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag gi
132b5(mdo sde): the re dang /'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag nas mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal
132b6(mdo sde): po la lta zhing thal mo rab tu sbyi te cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to//de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba
132b7(mdo sde): bskyed pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa shin tu yongasu sbyong ba byas par gyur to//de nas tshangs pa chen po pad+ma
133a1(mdo sde): 'bar bstan las langs to gas drug pa gcig tu bzar nas sus myogalas pa'i /ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gal bde 'i gsung ma
133a2(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis chos bshad par gsol ba bta'o//ring du gshegs shing myur ba'i rkyen dang ldan//zad pa lhur mdzad
133a3(mdo sde): mo g.yo 'di gsal ba//rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa'o//khyod gsung rab zhi rgyu skar tshul mkhyen mkhas//dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa mkhyen//tshangs
133a4(mdo sde): ba'i gnas pa bzhi po dag dang ldan//srid pa gsum po rdo ltar dag 'gyur bar//sems can 'gro ba sdong por mdzad pa zo//tshul gcig ldan pa nyid kyi mkhyen mnga' ba//lha mi
133a5(mdo sde): rnam pa mang po khri dag kyang //som nyi rga la mdzad dge brnyes chu ba rgal//bde 'gro'i mkhyen pa myur dang ldan pa po//byang chub spyod dang sangs rgyas chos mngon sum//sems gam
133a6(mdo sde): sems can kha cig 'dod klung lhung //mun pas khebs shing mig dang ldan pa'i//sdug bsngal thams cad bcom par gyur lags pa//ma thos dge bral slob dpon mkhas
133a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i/skye bo bral la mdang 'i thugs rje skyed//mnyam pa'i chos nyan skye ba'i pha rol mi che//srid pa gcod pa bshad par mdzad du gsol//skye rlung pha rol gshegs thub thug
133b1(mdo sde): rjes gnas//blo 'tshul skye mang sred pa'i dri ba'i lam//de dag thams cad nyon mongs rgya bcan//dor ni sems can 'khyams 'gyur gcad du gsol//gang du sdug bsngal rag zhing bang
133b2(mdo sde): drug dang //yid kyang zhi 'byor srong skyon rgyal ba gsungs//sred pa dral ba srid rgyu mi mnga' ba//sems can gdung ba dpal kun dril gyur pa//de slad thub pathugs brtse ba yi rgyus//
133b3(mdo sde): srid pa yi ni chu klung skems mdzad de//myur du bde ning 'chi ngo ma mchis pa'i//chos kyang sred pa gcod pa bshid par gsol//de nis bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa pad+ma 'bar ba'i
133b4(mdo sde): dpel la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//gleng dag sngon chad pa ro nyid//rnyed pa smad cing spyo 'gyur ba//de dag nyan thos chos rnams la//nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste//sangs rgyas
133b5(mdo sde): chos lnga nyams 'gyur ba'o//ltung ba gnyis pa gzhan med de//de ni yang dang yang du yang //gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yin//khyo dang nyan thos chos rnams dang //rkyen gyi byang
133b6(mdo sde): chub 'jug pa yin//chos gsuM rnam par spangs bstan//sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur//skye gnas pani lhun sems can 'di//sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags
133b7(mdo sde): po dang //thams cad 'dod brten mo byed//thams cad mi sdug thob pa yin//'di nasems can mkhas pa gang //byang chub mchog gi phyir zhugs shing //gong blo gzungs dang
134a1(mdo sde): bzod pa la//brtson zhing logs par gams byas la//dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing //skyil mo klung gis dron gzhag nas//rang gi spyod yul sa non pa//
134a2(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs//nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa'ong yin//'dir ni mi sdug tshul bshad na//kun bzhi gang yin sems can gyi//'chi ngo ba brtan pa 'dir bshad
134a3(mdo sde): 'gyur//ngas ni chos kyi ser sna spangs//sems can srung phyir ma bshad de//'di la byang chub sems dpa' yis///byang chub phyir sems 'dir ma btang //phyogs bcu'i
134a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de dag gis//chos 'di yun ring gnas bya zhes//sa 'di yongasu spyad mdzad cing //sa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin//de bzhin du ni khyod kyis kyang //zhing 'di la ni
134a5(mdo sde): rtse bar byos//de bzhin bzod pa dag gis rtses//bsdams nas yun ring gnas par byos//nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de//sems can chags las thar bya zhing //phung po
134a6(mdo sde): drag dang khams rnams dang //skye mched stong pa ngas bshad//zhi gnas rnam pa bcu gsum dang //lhag mthong nga yis bshad bya ste//'dod pa'i 'ching bas dam bcings pa'i///
134a7(mdo sde): sems can de yis rnam dag 'gyur//sems can rnams la snying brtse bas//nyan thos rnams kyi bden pa bzhi//chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang //zag pa med phyir ngas
134b1(mdo sde): bshad do//nyan thos bden pas 'dul ba ni//srid pa'i mtsho las ngas basmra'o//byang chub spyod pa thams cad kyang //phyi nas khyed la bstan par bya'o//de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i
134b2(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/kye mo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni nyan thos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad
134b3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa chen po'i gtam ni mi mdzad do snyam//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
134b4(mdo sde): 'dir sa yongasu spyad pa'i phyir dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad
134b5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir dong /mo 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lho ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mau dang /mi ma
134b6(mdo sde): yin pa ma dod pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang /chos la gnas pa
134b7(mdo sde): dag dang /yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang /tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams bde bo la reg pa dang narnam par tho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang /byang grol gyi
135a1(mdo sde): bde ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /ji nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu yon tan dag gis bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir dang /phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sangs
135a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang bsgre ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /bla ma la gus pa dang /phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par bya ba'i phyir bodag cag rlung du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pas
135a3(mdo sde): ma la bdag cag gis de de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bdag cag thams cad kyis so'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par bya zhing /rang rang gi rnam
135a4(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang /gzungs dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /rnal 'byor dag gis gnas po dag tu bye gor ma chogo snyam mo//de nas de'i tshe byang
135a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dgra dang /gang dgas bcu dag dang /gang dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar dag dang /
135a6(mdo sde): gang dag sangs rgya spyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang /mi 'jigs pa thob pa dag gi bar de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir
135a7(mdo sde): skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to//de bzhin du rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyi bzod pa dang /gzungs dang /ting 'dzin dag la mnyam par bzhig pa dag tu
135b1(mdo sde): gyur to//yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta bu bzhin du rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag rang /byang chub
135b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag las kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/dper na mar me'i 'od lta bu'o//kha cig gi ni skar mda' dang mnyam pa
135b3(mdo sde): dgo/kha cig gi ni brgya byin dang mnyam pa dag go/kha cig gi ni mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang mnyam pa nas kha cig gi ni zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go/kha cig gi ni nyi
135b4(mdo sde): ma dang mnyam pa dag go/kha cig gi ni nyi ma gcig dang mnyam pa dag go/kha cig gi ni nyi ma gsum dang mnyam pa dag gro/kha cig gi ni nyi ma lnga dang mnyam pa dag go//kha cig gi
135b5(mdo sde): ni nyi ma stong dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go/kha cig gi ni lus las ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i 'od dag byung ste/mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sngon ma mthong
135b6(mdo sde): ma thos pa'i snang ba chen po rgya che ba de lta bus 'jig rten khyab par gyur to//de dag gi lus las mchog tu sems can gzhan dag gi lus dang sems kyi bde ba la rag pa dang /dgar/
135b7(mdo sde): pa dang /rab tu tshim par byed pa/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/lta ba ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/lus kyi gnas ngan len thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa
136a1(mdo sde): bkres pa drang skom pa thanas cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/'dod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/klod thams cad dang /'jig pa thams cad dang /rgyun mongs
136a2(mdo sde): pa dang /'ching ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od byung ste//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na srid pa gsum gyi btson ra'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams cad kyi bar rab tu zhi bar byed//
136a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri na sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang de/chos la 'bab pa dag dang /dge 'dun gyi yon tan la dga' ba la mkhas pa dag
136a4(mdo sde): 'khod par gyur to//yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang /stong pa ma yin pa dag dang /yongasu dag pa dang /yongasu
136a5(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pa dang /na kun nas lham mo/lhan ne//lhang nger yang dag par snang ba ni 'di lta ste/mtshan mo mun pa byung ba na zla ba dang /nyi ma brgya stong shar nas lham me/lhan ne/
136a6(mdo sde): lhang nge ba bzhin te/de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stod pa dang /stong pa ma yin pa dag dang /yong su dag par
136a7(mdo sde): yongasum dag bdag na kun nas mchog tu lham me/lhan ne/lhang nger gyur to//de nas sang sa rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod
136b1(mdo sde): pa dang gang dag bskul ba brgyas nges par bye lu na dang /gang drug sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa drag dang /mi 'jigs/
136b2(mdo sde): ba thob phra'i bar de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas rgyas te/sems kyi skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin sra steng du skyil
136b3(mdo sde): mo krung gis 'khrod par gyur to//de bzhin du rang gi dgo ba'i phyogs la nan tan dag tu byed cing ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa de dag dang /mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang
136b4(mdo sde): rkyen dang ldan pa de dag gi lus las de 'dra ba kho na'i 'od byung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong pi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor nas nyan thos chen po rnams la bka
136b5(mdo sde): stsolnga pa/khyed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig/byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang /klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas/sngon gyi de
136b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dir chos kyi tshul dang /dkon mchon/gsum gyi gdung rgyur mi 'chang ba'i bIr dang //gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
136b7(mdo sde): zhing 'di thams cad yongasu spyad par dzad do//de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po grangs med/de dag tu med pa gaN+DI klu gi bye ma spyad pasam gtan dang /
137a1(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par rje ba dang ldan pa dag gis myi ma rjed kyi srungs rgyas gyon bu denachos kyi tshul spyan ring du gnas par byu ba'i phyir dang /gsapa
137a2(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mo dang /mi ma yin pa ma dad po rnams dang /
137a3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir dang /dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'bol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag drod/chos kyis gnas padag dang /yon tan gyis phyug
137a4(mdo sde): dag dang /sems la dbang dang ldan par gyur pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang /rnam par tho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang /nga'i bstan pa rab tu mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir dang /
137a5(mdo sde): bya grol gyi bde ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sa chen po 'di yongasu spyad par byas pa yin//don de nyid byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
137a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtse bar byed//sa phyogs gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'khod cing bsam
137a7(mdo sde): gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtsen par byed pa de dang der/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang kha cig tu la la rang 'das na son 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag par byed cing mya ngan
137b1(mdo sde): sa 'das pa 'dod pa dag sku gdung gi mchod rten dag byed du 'jug par 'gyur TI/sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag gam//sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gam/chos kyi bzhugs khang
137b2(mdo sde): dag byed par 'gyur ro//yi na der glegs pam dro bri ba byas nas nga'i chos kyi sku'ang 'tshang bar 'gyuraro//der yang mchod pa rnam po sna tshogs dag kyang byed par 'gyur zhing /der rin
137b3(mdo sde): tshe rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'bul bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste/gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shel dang /mu tigi dmar po dang /rdo'i snying po dang /spug dang /nor
137b4(mdo sde): bu dang /mu tig dang /dbyig dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru la sogs pa dang /dar yug dang /dril bu dang /za bug dang /gso ras bzang po dang /yul ka shi'i ras bzang
137b5(mdo sde): po dang /dbu rten nang tshangs can dang /gding ba dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /chos gos dang /mgur gyi rgyan dang /spos dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /
137b6(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra dang /lus 'dus pa dang /bla ma dang /gus pa chen po dang /gces par byed pa dag tu 'gyu ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag sor bcu'i thal mo sbya
137b7(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de dag gi mchod pa ni de nas nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzadade/sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir
138a1(mdo sde): mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyu ro//sa phyogs la lar ni gtsug lag khang dang /gnas khang dang /'chags dang /dgon pa'i gnas dang /skyed mos tshal dang /kun
138a2(mdo sde): dga'i ra ba dag rab tu shom par byed do//yang na nyan thos kyi chos kyi gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang /rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /
138a3(mdo sde): mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gso sman dang /yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba'am/byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro//gtsug lag khang dang /'chag sa dang /dgon pa'i gnas
138a4(mdo sde): de dag tu'ang bkur stir byas te chos nyan pa dang /rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i gtam byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba'am/glegs bam dag klog par 'gyuraro//gtsug lag khang dang /
138a5(mdo sde): 'chag sa la sogs pa de dag tu'ang yongasu gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste/zhing gi bzhi 'am/khyim gyi gzhi 'am/kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi
138a6(mdo sde): 'am bran dang /bran mo dang /glang po che dang /rta dang /rdzi mo dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang /bong bu dang /phyugs gzhan dag dang /snod spyad kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag der
138a7(mdo sde): yongasu gtong bar 'gyur zhing /nga'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi gnas pa rnams lo spyod par bya ba'i phyir mal cha dang stan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogos dag sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang
138b1(mdo sde): sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang /rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang /byang grol gyi bde ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir stob dag tu byed do//dra ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la
138b2(mdo sde): phan gdags pa'i phyir yong su gtong po rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs gtong bar byed//de bzhin du sems can de dog gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad
138b3(mdo sde): la ci nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir du rje su thugs rangs par mdzad do//bzhes par mdzad do//sems can log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan
138b4(mdo sde): 'gro gsum rnam par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro//sems can bdag yun ji srid du 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de/
138b5(mdo sde): srid du'ang longs spyod gnyis po chos kyi long spyod dang zang zing gi longs spyod dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro//ri dang /nags khrod dang /shing ljon pa chen po dang /dgon pa dang /nags
138b6(mdo sde): 'dabs gang du'ang rung ste/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thar pa don du gnyer ba chos kyi gnas pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma sgra bsrungs pa
138b7(mdo sde): dag dang /gcom bsgyings pa dag dang /nang du yang dag mjog gi tshul dang bcas pa dag dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang 'tsham pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /lha dang /klu dang /
139a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag gdul du'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthul ltos shig/bdud thams cad kyi yul dang /klu
139a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /dkon mchog
139a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sngon yang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongasu spyod pa mdzad do//da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dpag
139a4(mdo sde): tu med pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu bo dang /zhal blta ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /mchod pa dang
139a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /na mkha'i mig dang ldan pa/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa/chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mnyan pa'i
139a6(mdo sde): phyir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang nga la snying nye ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i don dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyan
139a7(mdo sde): mi gcad pa'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyis sa steng du 'khod nas//bdud thams cad kyi yul tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang 'khor bas skrag pa sbyin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems
139b1(mdo sde): can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri yongasu spyod pa dag tu byed//da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di dang /dam pa'i chos sam/dam pa'i chos kyi gzu
139b2(mdo sde): brnyan yun ji srid gnas par chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang /kun dga'i ra ba dang /zhing dang /bla na dang /bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos pa de la
139b3(mdo sde): sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag tha na 'drab ma gcig dang /'bras bu gcig dang /me tog gcig cig yongasu spyod pa dag tu byed na de ni mi blun po de la don ma
139b4(mdo sde): yin pa dang /phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/de la gnod pa bzhi'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin/mdza bo dang /nye
139b5(mdo sde): du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /rim gro ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur pa yin/nad tshabs chen po yun ring
139b6(mdo sde): ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin/de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed grang yod pa'ang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur bya yino//lnga gang dag gis zhe na/'di lta ste/rgyal
139b7(mdo sde): po dang /chom rkun dang /me dang /chu dang /bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so//de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub
140a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba yin te/bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/lus zhi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi zad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/de gal te brgya la ros 'ga' zhig dus
140a2(mdo sde): ring zhig 'das nas sems can dmyal ba de nas she 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du dud 'gro dang yi dgas kyis ri su long ba dang rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /de la
140a3(mdo sde): brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang //skom pas yongasu gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba yin//gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas de dag
140a4(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sbrul gdug pa long brdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du
140a5(mdo sde): skyes nas/'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu mi nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing /mong rtul ba dang /tshul du mi shes par 'gyur ba dang /mig ma
140a6(mdo sde): bo dang /lag pa ma tshang po dang /rkang pam tshang ba dang /khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha zas la gdu zhing rkyag khung sa'i kha zas za ba dang /'dam rdzab dang /phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang /'drog
140a7(mdo sde): dang /dgon pa dang /pham po che rnams na 'tshe bar 'gyur la/de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras
140b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa ma yin pa de ltar lci ba 'byung zhen/'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dag srung doni 'di/ chos kyi gnas pa rnams la khyim dang /sbyong dang //kun dgra' ra ba dang /bran dang /dran
140b2(mdo sde): ma dang /blugs dag go bar bsngos pa dag phyogs nis gang zag ring gi mong su longs spyod pas longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/sdig pa skyed pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni de ltar dum
140b3(mdo sde): rgyud du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang //rnam pa rog zhig po dang /rkyen gcod pa dang /nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa
140b4(mdo sde): yin no//de bzhin du dkon mchog gdum gyi gdu med par bya ba nas nub par bya bral 'du rtson bri man// phyir na nA~M/'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs dang ldan pa yin
140b5(mdo sde): lurna chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum myi gdu yang dge ba'i ga sa kyi yo bye ba sbyin te/de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras rnam par smon pa lci ba mngon par 'grub
140b6(mdo sde): yin//de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srung gis mtsho ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma thob kyang mi bsdu'aM//rab tu byung nas brnal
140b7(mdo sde): ba dang chung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal 'od skye chen po rdo minino//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/gong du de'i sngon
141a1(mdo sde): gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni sla'o//'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin//'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi
141a2(mdo sde): nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba rnyede legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa/zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur 'tshe mchir rmad du byung ba'i
141a3(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas 'on kyang skyes bu blun po de dag gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang /bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur
141a4(mdo sde): ba mi dge'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongasu bsams nas rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang /zhing dang /kun
141a5(mdo sde): dga'i ra ba dang /skyed mos tshal dang /bran dang /bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag gi bar dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/yon tan gyis phyugs dag longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dang /
141a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i phyogs dong mthun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsngos pa la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dmang du thos pa'i mthu 'am/khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod
141a7(mdo sde): dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas pad/nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongasu spyod par byed de/skyes bu blun po de'i log par bsgrub pa de ni de lta bur 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan
141b1(mdo sde): 'dus la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dge slong chos kyis granas pa/yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i
141b2(mdo sde): ljongs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dregs nas bdag nyid kyis yongasu smod par bgyid pa'i dge slong rab tu byung ba'i mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de lta bu 'byung lags na/dpe tsam du bgyi na gang yang
141b3(mdo sde): khyim na gnas par gyur la/dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongasu spyod par bgyid na de bsod nams
141b4(mdo sde): mo lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/rgyal po chen po thong khyod kyis smras pa des ci zhog bya/gsol pa/bcun
141b5(mdo sde): ba bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/yon tan gyis phyug pa de lta bu dag la longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dag gis stsol bar ni bgyid kyi/'phrog par ni mi bgyid lag
141b6(mdo sde): so//'on kyang skad ma'i dus na rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmyangs rigs mi dad pa 'jig rten pha rol gyi sa 'jigs par mi lta ba dag 'byung bar gyur zhing /dge
141b7(mdo sde): slong chos kyis gnas pa/yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongasu spyod par bgyid pa gang dag legs pa de
142a1(mdo sde): gi rgud par 'gyur ba gang lagros/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gral to ngas lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs dag nas/dmangs
142a2(mdo sde): rigs dag gi bar dag chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyis phyug pa dag 'di ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa'i phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis longs spyod par byed pa gang dag
142a3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag gi log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/de'i tshe de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i phrin las kyi skabs thob nas spong ba dag tu byed la yid ches pa dag tu mi byed de/
142a4(mdo sde): de dag ni phung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyis ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gnyi su 'ang 'di skad
142a5(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta
142a6(mdo sde): zhing /bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi
142a7(mdo sde): bar de dag gi rigs rgyud rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das de dag ni khyod kyi bka' phrin las bstan pa thos nas stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu
142b1(mdo sde): chen pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid pa dang /yongasu stong pa dag tu 'gyur zhing //gang zag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang /chos kyi gnas pa dag
142b2(mdo sde): dang /yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la'ang mchod pa bgyid pa dang /srung ba bgyid pa dang /yongasu skyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lagaso//khyim ni gnas pa dang /rab tu byung ba de dag kyang
142b3(mdo sde): 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyim na gnas pa gang gis gang zag chos kyis gnas pa dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis
142b4(mdo sde): yongasu sprod par bgyid pa de'i rgud par 'gyur pa gang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gal te ngas mo 'ongs pa'i dus na lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs nas

142b6(mdo sde): yin pa de dag gis log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i phrin las kyi skabs thos nas spong ba dag tu byed la yid ches pa dag tu mi byed de/de dag ni phung
142b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur pa'i gnod pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyis ka dang ldan par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gsum du'ang 'di skad ces gsol to//

143b4(mdo sde): sdug gi gnyen 'tshams dag gis kyang de'ang yongasu gtong bar 'gyur/de'i dag po dag kyang mang bar 'gyur ba yin nor dang nor gyi yo byad dag las kyang yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba yin/

143b6(mdo sde): dug gi bya ba byed pa yin/sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral ba thob pa yin/rtag tu gzhan dag dang thab mo 'byung ba yin/pho dang /ma dang /spun dang /chung ma dang /pu

144a1(mdo sde): kyang thams cad gsang shor ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba la sogs pa lngas kyang longs spyod dag chud za bar 'gyur ba yin/nad tshabs
144a2(mdo sde): chen po dag gis kyang myur du thebs par 'gyur ba yin/sman dang rim gro pa dang bral zhing sha dang khrag skams nas sdug bsngal nyamasu myong bar 'gyur ba yin//rang gi ga shang gci dag
