144a4(mdo sde): bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang /nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed cing /bdag nyid kyis kyang yongasu spyod par byed pa de 'tsho ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po
144a5(mdo sde): mnar med par skyes par 'gyur ro//de der yang tshe bskal par lcags dang zangs bzhun 'thung bar 'gyur zhing lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur la/me'i gos dang /longs spyod
144a6(mdo sde): dang nye bar spyod pa smod par byed cing gnod pa mi zad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs nyamasu myong bar 'gyur ba yino//tshe skal pa zad nas kyang de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam
144a7(mdo sde): dag gi nang du lam du skyes pa'i yi dgas rnams dang skal ba mnyam par rkang pa dang /log pa dang /mig ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro//der yang phyogs bzhi nas langs pa'i rlung kun
144b1(mdo sde): tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu gdung bar byed cings spu bri dang 'dra ba'i steng du dmyal bar byed/yongasu dmyal bar byed/de der lo brgya stong mang por sdug bsngal de lta bu nyamasu myong bar byed pa yino//
144b2(mdo sde): da gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi'i phos nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lus dpag tshad brgya pa'i sha nar nar por skye bar 'gyur ro//sngon gyi las kyi rgyus de'i dpagra tshad khor
144b3(mdo sde): yu gi chu zangs bzhun ma ltar dmar po 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de der yang lo brgya stong mang por chu'i nang du sems can dmyal po'i gnod pa myong bar byed pa yino//de de nas shi 'phos
144b4(mdo sde): nus kyang 'brog dgon pa chen por rdzus te skye ba sha nA ra nar po chen po ri drang mnyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyogaso bzhi kun tu'ang rlung kun tu che ba dag gis kun tu sreg par byed//
144b5(mdo sde): der yang phyogs bzhi nas ri dgas dang bya dag lhags te yongasu za ba dag tu byed do//de brgya la res 'ga' dus ring zhig 'das nas de nas re zhi 'phos nas yang sems can dmyal ba chen
144b6(mdo sde): po dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//de nas kyang shi 'phos nas yang dang yang du log par sgrub pa chen po de lta bu nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/yongasu brtag pa nye bar bzung na/de
144b7(mdo sde): brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dog tu cig mtshang ba dang /tshul du mi shes par skye bar 'gyuraro//
145a1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po gang chos kyis gnas pa dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang /nar kyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de'i log par sgrub pa de ni de lta bu yin//
145a2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das skyes bu gang zag de lta bu ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas par mi bsngo lags kyi/
145a3(mdo sde): gang gis mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas bsod nams ma lags pa chen po de lta bu kun tu spyod par 'gyur po'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni de lta ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
145a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs chos kyis gnas pa khyed cog gi lag tu gang zag yongasu gtad kyi khyed kyis bsrungs shig/yongasu srungs shig/rab tu
145a5(mdo sde): byang ba'am//khyim na gnas pa gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsos pa'i longs spyod dang /lto bar sdod pa dang nga /nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de la khyed kyis
145a6(mdo sde): dziji nas kyang chos dang mthun pas chad pas gcad par bya'o//rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te gang dag dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar
145a7(mdo sde): bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang //nye bar spyod pa dang /nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag ci nas chos dang mthun pas chad pas gcod par mi
145b1(mdo sde): bgyid cing //de la rgyal po btang snyoms par gnas par bgyid lags na rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
145b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /rang rgyal ba dag dang bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed yod pa'i bsod nams
145b3(mdo sde): kyi phung po de lta bu dang /sems can gcig cig ldan par gyur na/sems can de nyan thos dang /rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /ches bsod nams dang
145b4(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba yin nam/rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can de ches khyad par du 'phags pa lags te/de
145b5(mdo sde): grang la sems can 'tsho ba kun phyi nang na nyan thos dang /rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches bsod nams dang ldan pa ni skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung bar bso lagaso//bcom ldan 'das
145b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gal te sems can snga ma de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu
145b7(mdo sde): gyur la/de la gang sems can 'tsho ba thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par byed cing /mig 'byin pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dag rnam par
146a1(mdo sde): gcod par byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems//skyes bu de bsod nams ma yin pa sdig pa'i las ji snyed cig skyed par
146a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po len thob cig lan thob cigo/de
146a3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po chen po gzugs can snying po shum zhes du bzhin du gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa de lta bu gcig gi yan lag dag
146a4(mdo sde): rnam par gcod par bgyid cing mig 'byin pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par bgyid pa'i skyes bu de'ang bsod nams ma lags pa sdig
146a5(mdo sde): pa'i las grangs ma mchis/tshad ma mchis//dpag tu ma mchis/dpe ma mchis pa skyed par 'gyur pa lags na/gang de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can thams
146a6(mdo sde): cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing /mig 'byin pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dgra rnam par gcod pa lta ci smos lags bcom ldan
146a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gishegs pa 'tsho ba'am/yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste/lnga brgya pa tha ma
146b1(mdo sde): la dam pa'i chos zad par 'gyur ba'i bar du khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba gang chos kyis gnas pa/yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa
146b2(mdo sde): dang /nor gyi yo byad dang /zhing gri gzhi dang /khyim gyi bzhi dang /kun dge'i ra ba dang /skyed mos tshul dang /bran dang /bran mo dang /rkang bzhi pa dang /chos gos dang /bsod snyoms
146b3(mdo sde): dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dag yod pa de las 'brog gom rku ba de la rgyal rigs btang snyoms par byed cing /rab tu byung ba dang khyim na gnas pa
146b4(mdo sde): rkun ma de dag chad pa ci yod pa bzhin chad pas gcod du mi 'jug ni rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skyed//rgyal rigs ji lta ba bzhin grong gi blar bskos pa dang /grong
146b5(mdo sde): khyer gyi bla dang /grong rdal gyi bla dang /ljongs kyi blar bskos pa'ang de bzhin du btang snyoms par byed cing /de ltar rku ba'i sems can de dag zlog par mi byed na de lta bu'i grong gi bla nas
146b6(mdo sde): ljongs kyi bla'i bar de bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po'i las ches mang du skyed//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po nyid
146b7(mdo sde): ni shin tu lci ba lagaso//rgyal rigs ni bag ma mchis pa mang po dang ldan par gnas pa lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang yang rgyal po bag ma mchis par gnas shing /gang
147a1(mdo sde): zag chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu dag srung bar bgyid pa dang /de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig par
147a2(mdo sde): las de las slar zlog par bgyid pa dang /grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar yang de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa dag rku ba'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i
147a3(mdo sde): las de las slar zlog par bgyid na de bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gal te ngas sngar gsungs
147a4(mdo sde): pa bzhin bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan po dag tu gyur la/thams cad kyang btson rar bcug cing bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gzir bar gyur
147a5(mdo sde): la//de la gang sems can thams cad de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa dag btson ra de nas yongasu thar par byed cing /lo brgya tshang bar yang sems can de dag thams cad la
147a6(mdo sde): chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dag gis rim gro byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na rgyal po chen po
147a7(mdo sde): 'di ji snyam du sems/ci skyes bu de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ram/gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lagaso//btsun pa bde bar gshegs
147b1(mdo sde): pa skyes bu de ni bsod nams kyi phung lo grongs ma mchis/tshad ma mchis/dpag tu ma mchis bskyed lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bas kyang gang
147b2(mdo sde): da ltar nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar la chos kyis gnas pa/yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las sgyur
147b3(mdo sde): zlog par byed pa'i rgyal rigs sam ljongs kyi bla de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro//rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te dge slong chos kyi
147b4(mdo sde): gnas pa gcig gi ma bsrungs na de bsod nams ma lags pa de snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags na/gang yang gcig gi srung bar bgyid pa de bsod nams de snyed cig skyed par 'gyur
147b5(mdo sde): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gang zag gcig gi len pa ngas mA gnang ngo //gnyis las ma yin/gsum gyi ma yino//bzhi'i ma yin
147b6(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po chen po phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang gcig dang /dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu ye nyung na'ang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa lnga'i len par ngas gnang
147b7(mdo sde): ste/gaN+DI brdungs na so phyogs bzhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag dang lhan cig tu longs spyod pa dang /nye bar spyod pa dang /gnas khang dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /bza'
148a1(mdo sde): pa dang /btung ba dang /na dA'i gsos sman dang /yo byad drag long spyod par ngas gnang ngo //gal te gtsug lag khang gcig dang /dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu dge slong
148a2(mdo sde): brgya stong gi bar gnas par byed na/der yang gaN+DI brdungs nas phyogs po zhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag dang lhan cig tu sman gyi yo byad kyi bar dag la longs spyod par ngas gnang //
148a3(mdo sde): ma chags pa dag dang /ma bcings pa dag dang /mchums pa dag dang /nam gyi cha stod dang /nam gyi cha smad dag la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rje su brtson pa dag dang /'khor ba la rgyab
148a4(mdo sde): kyis phyogs pa dag dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du phyogs bdag dang /gzhan la ma smod pa dag dang /bdag la mi stong pa dag dang /chog shes pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan
148a5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang /rab tu dben pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag dang /mnyam par bzhag pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag gis longs spyod par ngas gan //rgyal po chen po
148a6(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag gnas te/rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag la seblo can rnams kyis longs spyod dang /nye bar
148a7(mdo sde): spyod pa yongasu btang bas bsod nams tshad med par bskyed do//rgyal po chen po gtsug lag khang dam/dgon pa'i gnas gang na dge slong lnga 'am/lhag par gnos kyang rung ste/
148b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongasu dag pa dang /kha na ma tho ba phra mo dag la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dag gnas par byed cing /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
148b2(mdo sde): pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde de dag kyang ston par byed/kha ton du byed la/gzhan la mi smon cing bdag la mi bstod pa/phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par spangs pa/sems can thams cad
148b3(mdo sde): la snying brtse ba/thar pa la mngon par brtson pa dag gnas la/gauN+DI brdungs nas longs spyod par byed na dge slong gi dge 'dun de lta bu las sems can rnams bsod nams tshad med pa de lta
148b4(mdo sde): bu 'dzin pa dag tu byed//rgyal po chen po yi nyung ste dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga'i tshogs shig yod du zin kyang /gal te'ang tshul khrims yongasu dag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod
148b5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs la 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang 'phags pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa yin na/rgyal po chen po de ni dge slong
148b6(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang 'dra bar gsungs shing //de ni mi dpag tu med pa dag la phan pa byed pa dang /don byed pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu rnam
148b7(mdo sde): par thar par byed pa yin par gsungs na/dge slong gi dge 'dun bcu'i tshogs dang zhes bya ba nas brgya stong gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/rgyal po chen po
149a1(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gang la bram ze dang /khyim bdag chen po dang bcan dka rim gro bya ba'i phyir gaN+DI rdung ba dag tu byed cing /der yang gal te dge sbyong ltar bcas
149a2(mdo sde): ba sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong nyung yang rung /mang yang rung ba dag kyang 'dul/der gal te dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/tshul khrims yongasu dag pa//ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel
149a3(mdo sde): yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dge slong lnga'ang 'dun/rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun de ni chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin zhing sbyin gnas chen po dang /lha dang mi thams cad kyis
149a4(mdo sde): mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na dge slong chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bo dag khyed kyi lag tu ngas yongasu gtango //khyim
149a5(mdo sde): na gnas pa dang rab du byung ba la las de dag la rkyen gang yang rung ba dag gis gtses sam/gnod par byas na mi rung gis khyed kyis srungs shig/'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen
149a6(mdo sde): bo'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//bam po gnyis pa//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci dge slong sdig pa spyod
149a7(mdo sde): pa tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du longs spyod par bgyi lags sam/chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos smon dang //
149b1(mdo sde): yo byad dam pa dag kyang longs spyod dang nye bar spyod par bgyi lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal ba chen po gang khyed kyi dran pa chen po dang /sna chen po la gtogs bdag
149b2(mdo sde): rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang /nyung rum dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag gzhung lugs las 'gol ba nyes pa dang bcas pa zhig yod na/gang ni rgyal po chen po'i dga'
149b3(mdo sde): ston nam dus ston nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi nang der nyes pa dang btsos pa'i skyes bu de 'jug pa dang /longs spyod pa dang /dga' ba dang /rtse ba nyamasu myong bar bya ba dang /bde ba dang
149b4(mdo sde): yid bde ba mang zhing gnas par nus sam/rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang tshul
149b5(mdo sde): khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khAs
149b6(mdo sde): 'che ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gnod pa yin te/de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma yin zhing
149b7(mdo sde): bdud kyi stobs kyi rigs kyis zin pa yin//gong zag de ni lam nyam nga ba la gnas pa yin te/de ni byis kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du bgrang be ma yino//de bzhin du der 'jug
150a1(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin te/dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos na tha na til gyi phub ma tsam yang longs spyod par 'os pa ma yin na/dge 'dun gyi nang du nye bar
150a2(mdo sde): longs spyod par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ni chos 'dul ba 'dis bor ba yin no//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
150a3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma gang dag gis dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa/sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi nang du slan chad gnas

150a5(mdo sde): pa'i mgo 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gang myur du rnam par shes par mi nus te/rgyal po chen po 'di ni nang gri dang por sangs rgyas la ma gus pa yino//chos dang dge 'dun dang /mkhan po
150a6(mdo sde): dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams la ma gus pa yin/'phags pa'i rigs btang ba yin/rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la kun dga' ba ma yin//ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel
150a7(mdo sde): yod pa rnam par spangs pa yin/khyim na gnas pa dang 'dris pa yin//tshig kyal pa smra ba yin/bdag la bstod pa yin/gzhan la smos pa yin//de lta bu dag la kun dga' ba yin/sdig
150b1(mdo sde): pa'i snyi la chags pa yin/lam ngan par zhugs pa yin/khengs pa yin/kha drag pa yin//'phral g.yor can yin//'phyar po yin/kha shring can yin/g.yo sgyu can yin/sgra byed
150b2(mdo sde): pa yin/dge sbyong yon po yin/dge sbyong g.yo can yin/dge slong ste long lta bu yin/dge slong gi dge 'dun mi mthun par 'dod par smra ba yin//rnyed pa dang /ba kur sti dang /cho gas
150b3(mdo sde): su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba yin//'du 'dzi'i kun dga' la dga' ba yin te/sdig pa can gyi dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni ji srid du de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo byung
150b4(mdo sde): bar ma gyur gyi bar du gang gis kyang mtshan ma de dag gis myur du shes par mi nus so//sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gang gi tshe khyim gyi gzhi dang /zhing gi gzhi dang /kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi
150b5(mdo sde): dang /bran dang /bran mo dang /glang po che dang /rta dang /rnga mo dang /bong bu dang /lug dge gang zag gir srel bar byed na do ni de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo byung ba yin te/tshul
150b6(mdo sde): khrims 'chal ba'i mgongs ni sdig pa can gyi dge slong de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang nas dor ba yin/gnas par bya ba ma yin/longs spyod par bya ba ma yin/dge slong gi dngos po las
150b7(mdo sde): lhung ba yin/pham par gyur pa yin te/dge slong gi tshul las kyang phyis bslang du med par 'gyur ba yin//rgyal po chen po mi gdol po gdun gon par byed pa ni sla'i/dge slong gdol
151a1(mdo sde): /pa yong su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/rgyud chog pa/don la mi lta bu/'jig rten pha rol btang ba/snying rje'i busam pa med pa/byas khung chen po dud 'dru ba bdud
151a2(mdo sde): kyi lam du zhugs pa/lha dang dri rnams la gnod pa byed pa'i dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa rnams la smra bar byed pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung chos kyi mar me me
151a3(mdo sde): par byed po/chos kyi rgya mtsho skems par byed pa/chos smra ba'i dbyin byed pa/sbyin pa po dang sbyin dadag 'drid par byed po//dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la po 'tsham par
151a4(mdo sde): byed do//dge 'dun mthun par byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed de ni de sgo ma yin no//sdug pa can gyi dge slong ni ni yongs su na pa'i rkyen gyis mtho dag kyi lam las rgyal ba ldan par
151a5(mdo sde): byed pa min//rgyal rigs da /bram ze dang /rje'u tshigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /skyes pa dang /bud mid dang /khye'u dung /bu mo lkog par byed pa yin//ngan song gi lam gsums
151a6(mdo sde): rab tu gnog par byed pa yin//rgyal ba chen po sdig pa can gyi dge slong du yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lha dang mi snyed cig mi skyed par byed par 'gyur ba la ltos/rgyalapo
151a7(mdo sde): chen po de lta bas na yongasu 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong chos kyi gnas pa/yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba gcig dang /gtsug lag
151b1(mdo sde): khang gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o//gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de kha drag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par spangs te/dge slong de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed na/de'i phyir dge

158a7(mdo sde): rtsod pa yin/mi ma ci rnams dang par byed pa san/spyi de phyi chen po rnams skrag par byed pa yin/pas kyi tshul ba rnams 'dul por byed pa yin//rgyal rigs rnams ma
158b1(mdo sde): da par byed pa yin//bras rnams 'ag par rjod bston/de gas rna sa ga' ba spyod pa san//dam sarnam tu ga par spyod ba som zad med 'an chugs dang
158b2(mdo sde): rmu bar byed ba yin/ma sa pa rnams skyo ba byed pa skyen/rnal da dzin pa ra byu bsan//rang sa cad ma smin par byed pa min/thabam dang /
158b3(mdo sde): sre gre dang /dus ma yin par 'ichi ba dang /pha rol gyi dmig tshogs dang //dus mi yin pa'i r+g+ha dang /dus ma yin po'i char dang /shwa dang /dus ma yin pa'i lhags pa dang /dus ma sbyin
158b4(mdo sde): pa'i cha ba dang /dngos po khya ba dang /tsha ba dang /nub po dang /drung drud po dang /reg par dgaka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar byed pa/sdug par byed pa/mngon sum du gyur pa rnam par 'gyes
158b5(mdo sde): bar byed pa/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gsal bar byed pa yin/dekoni mchog gsum gyi gdung sbyin mi gcod par byed pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi bstan brten par byeng ba yin/'khor
158b6(mdo sde): bas sgrog pa rnams du drug 'byin par byed pa sbyin pa nas zad pa shes pa'i bar spyod par byed pa yin/mi skye ba shos partogs par byed po yin/mAM rig pa'i mun po'i phung po thams cad
158b7(mdo sde): rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin//sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa min//skyed mthaM na/ba ma~M bi sa pa b+hA ra~M/thA haH ha~M riSh+Tara~M/brim ze//bri thaib+hA pa b+hair/A
159a1(mdo sde): A b+hA ba ri bA re/d+hi dzi te dzaM pA ri bA re/mA le mU la pa ri bA re/kha ge kha ga pa ri b+hA re/A lo ke A lo ka pa ring+gare/s+thA me s+thA ma pa ri bA re/ri dzo ri dza pa ri b+ha ra/
159a2(mdo sde): si le si la ba ri bA re/ga mi ga ma po b+hur/A bo pa A bo pa pa ri bI re/mA la maM la ma/b+h+rUM ma lam/rA la rA la ma/b+hidz+nyA na b+hU taSh+Tha ti/b+hU ta gra h+NA ba ri b+hA re/tsak+Shu gra ha dA
159a3(mdo sde): ri/swaR+Ya grA hwe/smanA grah+NA pe ri b+hA ra/bau dra nA gra he/be da nAM grah+NA pe rid+d+ha /tr-iSh+Tha grar+b+he/tr-iSh+Tha grah+Na bai ri ThA re/u b+hU dA na gr-i he/u ba dA na gra h+Na pA ri b+hai re/b+hA ba grah+Na/
159a4(mdo sde): b+hA ba grahI pi ri bA re/dz+nye ta gr-i hi/dz+nyA ti grah+Na pa ri bI ri/dza ra ma ra Na gr-i hi/dza ra ma ra Na gr-i hA pa ri b+h+ra dzi//duHkha san tA b+hAn gra hai/duHkha sana? ta pA ne grah+NA pe ri b+hA re/A ra pA ri dA
159a5(mdo sde): dzaM gra he/A ra pA ri dA dzi grA hA pa ri bA re/e brta bi bar+t+ta s+ya/aM ba ra mu ba mas s+ya/bai ga bi ni/bir+N+Na Ar+ya rasmi saM baM ga shAn ti swA hA/rigs kyi bu nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis
159a6(mdo sde): gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'od la nges dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing bden pa dang rjes
159b1(mdo sde): mthun pa'i brjod pa 'askur bar mdzod kyis long la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod du song shig/nga'i bkas bzhon gshegs pa shAt+tha thub pA d+ga la gnad bachung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs/
159b2(mdo sde): dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus la/dri la 'di skad du/shar phyog su sangs rgyas kyi zhing chud ma mchis pa gang+ge'i klung gi bye ma skyed 'das ba de na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
159b3(mdo sde): gdung ba med pa zhes bgyi ba mchi so//sangs rgyas kyi ldid ni de bzhin gshegs po tsam+b+ha ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa des
159b4(mdo sde): kyang bdag de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das la yongasu zhu ba'i sla du btang lags na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/gnod pa chung ngam/khyod kyi 'khor bro
159b5(mdo sde): 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/gnod pa chung ngam/dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ji ltar thos pa bzhin du chos dang ldan pa lags sam/chos de la nan
159b6(mdo sde): tan snying por bgyid pa lags sam//chos kyi gnas pa dang ldan par gnas lags sam/khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bdud kyi yul dang /klu'i yul bcom lags sam/
159b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gcig yul lags sam/'dir khyod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa ma mchis par bskor bar mdzad lags sems/gang la la sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma
160a1(mdo sde): lags pa'i 'khor lo skor ba de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+ba ka'i mdog des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyi gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /
160a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa gnang ste/de nas kyang bden pa dang rje su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/phan yon che ba/'dod pa'i 'dod
160a3(mdo sde): chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags kun tu zad par bgyid pa nas ma rigs pa'i
160a4(mdo sde): mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i bar bgyid pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi phung po'i khur 'dor bar bgyid pa 'di bskur lagaso zhes gsol cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
160a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang rje su mthun pa'i bzod pa yon tan dang phan yon dang bcas pa
160a6(mdo sde): bdag gis bzung lags na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du mchi ba la 'jigs pa 'ba' zhig mchis lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ltar bcom
160a7(mdo sde): ldan 'dra wa bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du gzungs lags te/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na sems can rnams 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dmus long dang 'dra
160b1(mdo sde): bdag lags te/de na bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang /tshul du mi shes pa dang /mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa nas sems can rnams bsam gtan la rab tu spyad pa
160b2(mdo sde): bgyis pa/mngon par shes pas rnam pa'i rtse ba/skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa chen po dag kyang lhag par bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur lag so//bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
160b3(mdo sde): cad las yongasu nyams pa dag dang /ngan song ba dag dang /sems can dmyal bIn+da 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+ba ka'i
160b4(mdo sde): mdog des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod ni bdag gi don du smra ba ma yin zhing bdag la phan pa'i
160b5(mdo sde): phyir zhugs pa ma yino//rigs kyi bu khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi dran du smra ba yin zhing khyod ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yinano//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
160b6(mdo sde): kye zhing mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor na dge bsnyen dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba snang ba gang yin pa de'ang su yin/de ni khyod nyid ma yin nam/de cang mi
160b7(mdo sde): smra bar gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa tsi m+ba ka'i mdog nga'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med pa 'di'i bar du sems can yong su smin
161a1(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir la lar kha cig tu ni tshangs pa'i lus byad du kun tu snang //sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir kha cig tu ni dbang phyug gi lus byad du kun tu
161a2(mdo sde): snang //la lar ni dge sbyong gau lus byad dang /la lar ni brgya byin gyi lus byed dang /la lir ni lha'i lus byad dang /li lar ni klu'i dbang po'i lus byad dang /la lar ni lha ma yin gi
161a3(mdo sde): dbang po'i lus byad dang /la lar no na mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus byed dang /la lar ni mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i lus byed dang /la lar ni shed las skyes kyi dbang po'i lus byang
161a4(mdo sde): dang /la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lus byad dang /la lar ni nyan thos kyi lus byed dang /la lar ni rgyal rigs kyi lus byad dang /la lar ni bram ze'i lus byad dang /la lar
161a5(mdo sde): ni khyim bdag gi lus byad dang /la lar ni bud med kyi lus byad dang /la lar ni khye'u'i lus byad dang /la lar ni bu mo'i lus byad dgal lar na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus byang
161a6(mdo sde): dang /la lar ni yi dgas kyi lus byed dang /la lar na sems can dmyal ba'i lus byed du kun tu snang ngo //de lta mod kyi 'khor 'di na gang dag nga dang thobs cig lhan cig tu
161a7(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug par mdzad cing bzhengs par yang mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri yod do//'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig blo
161b1(mdo sde): g.yo ba dag dang /blo rgyud rnam par mi gan bdag kyang yod te/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /'dus pa chen po de la'ang blta
161b2(mdo sde): pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de las kyang 'dus pa chen po mnyan par mchog tu 'dod par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang nga kho na dang babs cig tu de nyid du
161b3(mdo sde): 'dong bar 'dod de der de dag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis rgyas slu bar gyur na mi rung zhing der nga'i skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i byed pa 'gro bar gyur na mi rung bas de dag gi don du ngas pashado//
161b4(mdo sde): yang de bzhin gshegs pa tsa m+ba ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/
161b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyed la 'di lta ste/gzungs sngags gang gis srid pa gsum gyi btsan rang thams cad du mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes can dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin rnam par
161b6(mdo sde): thor pa'i sgo la reg nas rdzogs par byas de gnas pa dang //mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /mgo mnyam du yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyi ma snang
161b7(mdo sde): ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba lus kyi tshor ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/lus kyi 'du shes thams cad sgrub par byed pa/dul ba'i so sgrub par byed pa/rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed pa/srid
162a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu gcod pa sgrub par byed pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi gegs ldog pa sgrub par byed pa/byams pa chen po sgrub par byed pa/snying rje chen po
162a2(mdo sde): sgrub par byed pa/shes rab rnam par grol ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/bdud bzhi dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba sgrub par byed pargyu zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes bsgrub
162a3(mdo sde): par byed pa/longs spyod dang /tshe'i 'du byed thams cad dang /zhi ba dang /gtan du yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa/ngas sbyin par mdzadado//rigs kyi bu gang la lo nyi
162a4(mdo sde): ma snang ba'i gzungs sngogs 'di sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad srab mor byed//'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang lha rnams kyi
162a5(mdo sde): nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur la der 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro//de rnams kyi nang du lha'i drang srong du 'gyur zhing lha rnams
162a6(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa'i 'osu 'gyur ro//de de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams kyi nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis rje su gos par yang mi 'gyur ro//'dir mi
162a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du mi'i drang srong du 'gyur zhing lha dang mi thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os gyur pa dang //mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyuraro//gang la la 'dir nyi ma snang ba'i gzungs sngags sems
162b1(mdo sde): rtse gcig pas lan bdun gyi bar du nyan par byed na de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du lan bdun gyi bar du drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad
162b2(mdo sde): kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro//de 'dir mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du drang srang mngon par shes pa lha dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin
162b3(mdo sde): dang /lha mo yin dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang /mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyu ro//rigs kyi bu gang la la lha rnams kyi nang du'ang lha'i 'dus pa rnams
162b4(mdo sde): la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'di lan bdun du rjod par byed la/de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na lha dang lha mo de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan
162b5(mdo sde): lnga po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro//gal te la la 'dir rgyal po rnams sam/rgyal rigs rnams sam/bram
162b6(mdo sde): zi rnams sam+b+ha/rje'u rigs rnams sam/dmangs rigs rnams kyi rna gung du lan bdun du rjod par byed la/gal te de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na de dag thams cad
162b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bar 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu bud med gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i
163a1(mdo sde): pad+ma zhes bya ba 'di nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par rnam par sems par byed dam/lces kha ton du byed na de'i ras mthun pa la 'dod chags
163a2(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro//'di ni de'i bud med 'thob pa'i tha ma yin no//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
163a3(mdo sde): 'gyu ro//de phyis kyang bla na med pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du rang gi smon 'am ma gtogs par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bud med 'thob pa rnyed par mi 'gyu ro//rigs kyi bu
163a4(mdo sde): gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'dis lan bdun du rtsi grang mo las byabs nas rnga bo che'am dung la byugs nas/rnga bo che de rdung bar byed dam/dung 'bud par byed na
163a5(mdo sde): gang nang gang du de dag gi sgra 'gro ba de dang deri mi rnams la byad stems thams cad kyi rgyu med par 'gyuraro//der smin gyi sbyor ba 'gro ba dang /pho nya dang /yig 'bru dang /yid la byed
163a6(mdo sde): pa dang /lus 'gyur ba dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /'ching ba dang /lus dang /snying gi kun tu gdung ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//las sgrub pa med par 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur
163a7(mdo sde): /rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yino//tad+ya thA/sid d+ha mA te/bi lo ka ma de/e le ke te ri She/rU tse sU rA tsi/bud
163b1(mdo sde): d+haid+hi b+hi bud d+he/mahA bud+d+ho/un myA de una? mud ta/prA ti she d+ha ne/rag d+hA ra ga d+hA pa pra ti she d+ha r+m+ma bin du/bIn du ma te/tsi Ta tsiT/pra ti shi d+ha nI/ar+thA \u0f7fna dra a d+h+ye/ha ta tsid tI ha
163b2(mdo sde): ti narmaM/ha ta ka me bo gai/ha ta baun b+hU bau re dze/ha ta tsAk+Sha sa ma ti/hat+tA piM ta ma br-id d+he/ha ta yAM gaM/ha ta bi sa ma g+ho/hA ta su mu dr-iH/ha taM bi ta mA rA dzaM/ha ta tIta/ha ta d+harma
163b3(mdo sde): tsate/haM ta d+harma rA dzA/ta tA baT nA dzau/hata pa badz+ra ma ti/ha tau b+ha ra sh+mi ha tA d+harma sid d+hi/ha ta sarba u byA d+hA na d+hA dz+nyA d+h+waM/bidz+nyAd+h+r-idz+nyi/ri bid+hA dz+nyA dz+nyA/sarbaM s+t+rair+k+kadz+nyAM dz+nyAM/o Sha An+d+ra saM sAr
163b4(mdo sde): duHkhe swAhA/rigs kyi bu 'dod pa'i chu bo thams cad kun tu snyoms par byed pa nges par 'byung ba'i pha ro 'gro wa'i 'i gzung sngags 'dra'i bzung nas mi mjed kyi
163b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khamasu song zhig/khyod kyis 'dod pa'i bdud kyi mchi lam thams cad dang /pha rol gnon pa dang /yul la brtson pa'i pha rol gnan pas pha rol gnon pa byad du zin kyang //
163b6(mdo sde): sus kyang khyod kyi lus sam sems la 'dod pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dag gis gos par byed mi nus na gzungs sngags 'di ji ltar thos pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song nas kyang sbyor
163b7(mdo sde): 'byos shig/der gal te bdud bye ba phrag brgya gsong sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /sman gyi sbyor ba thams cad dang chos kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /lha dang /mi gzhan dog
164a1(mdo sde): gis 'dod de'i drung ba dag gis gos par bya ba lta ci smos//de nas de'i cha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyu snang po la sogs pa byung
164a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /lho bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong mang po dang /lha dang /mi rnams ngo mtshar rnyed cing rmad du byung ba rnyed par gyur nas 'di skad
164a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gzigs pa dang /mnga' brnyes pa ni ngo mtshar lag so//mchog tu ngo mtshar legs te/'dod pas kun
164a4(mdo sde): tu gdung ba rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags 'di ni bdag cag gis sngon ma thos lag so//de nas 'khor der lha'i bu mo dang /mi'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis
164a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas nas gzungs sngags 'di thos par gyur to//thos ma thag tu de dag ge mo mtshan nub par gyur cing //pho mtshan byung bar gyur te/thams cad kyang bla na med pa
164a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+ba ka'i mdog gis me tog tsim+ba ka'i phreng ba bzhes te byang chub sems dpa'
164a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye rigs kyi bu me tog tsam+ba ka'i phreng ba 'di dang /gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba
164b1(mdo sde): 'di dang /bden pa dang rjesu mthun pa'i bzod pa de zung zhig/'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar byed pa 'di gnyis dang /chos kyi sgyu ma dAr khyer la nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod/
164b2(mdo sde): pa chung ngam/skyong ba yang ngam/stongs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhuso la/de la 'di skad du khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+ba ka'i mdog zhu bar mdzad lags te/btsun
164b3(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'odas ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/gnod pa chung ngam/khyod kyi 'khor gus par nyan lags sam/chos 'tshal ba lags sam/chos kyi gnas pa lags sam/
164b4(mdo sde): chos la brtson pa lags sem/sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa de dag dang /chos kyi sgo la de bzhin gshegs pa des dad pa stsal te/de nas 'dod pa
164b5(mdo sde): glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar bgyid pa/chos kyi sgo'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba phan yon che ba/'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/gzugs kyi 'dod
164b6(mdo sde): chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa nas/ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po zed rab tu 'dzi bI bAng gyi dang /sdug bcwa lci lung 'do sde byid bskur lag so zhes gsol cig/'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde

171a5(mdo sde): cad kyi bar gyis bsams par 'gyur zhing dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyuraro//

171a7(mdo sde): rtog pa kun tu skyed par byed//de las kyi sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed pa/'phangs
171b1(mdo sde): so sor ma rten pa/ma zad pa/ma sbyangs pa gang gA'i klung bri bye ma spyod kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur te//de la 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyuraro//'tshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'o//
171b2(mdo sde): chos spong bar byed pa dang /'phags po la skur pa 'debs par byed pa'i las rnams ni ma gtogs so//de gang gi tshe 'phags pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na
171b3(mdo sde): de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang rgyal ba dang /dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//dben pa
171b4(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro//gang dag gis de la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po legs par sbyang bar byas pa dang /shin tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dag de'i
171b5(mdo sde): sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//de chos thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur zhing the tshom med pa dang the tshom las brgal bar 'gyuraro//lha dang lha ma yin
171b6(mdo sde): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro//de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /na mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /mi'am ci'i
171b7(mdo sde): dbang po dang /mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'o su gyur pa dang /dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /mchod pa bya ba'i
172a1(mdo sde): 'osu gyur pa dang /phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /rab tu bsrung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yi no//de phyi ma'i dus na 'chang 'a cha phyogs bcu kun tu goms pa'i sangs rgyas
172a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 'di skad du skyes bu de bded kyis sa kyi zhing yongasu dag par chur shog/
172a3(mdo sde): der gnas par byos shig/der nged kyis rigs pas sa bcu la gzhag par mdzad//zhes kyang gsung par 'gyur ro//de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /'phags pa'i dga' ba dang /dad pa
172a4(mdo sde): des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//de der yang sa bcu 'thob cing ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
172a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rigs kyi bu mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar phan yon che ba yino//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa thams cad nas
172a6(mdo sde): smad cing bor ba mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i sems can gang mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa
172a7(mdo sde): chen po 'di thos nas byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /phra ma mi byed pa'i
172b1(mdo sde): sa dang ldan pa dang /tshig rgyal bams pa'i sems dang ldan pas po bdun du gnas par byed cing rtag tu sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa skyob par byed la/nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rgyas
172b2(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo'i lha gnyi ga se la btsugs /thel mo sbyor nas mngon du sangs rgya sa yi la byed pas mdzad pa'i sbubs lung bsten pa 'di dran par byed na la

172b5(mdo sde): btsugs te/thal mo sbyar nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na bud med de ris mthun par dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyu ro/
172b6(mdo sde): phyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyi chub kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor bar bud med kyi dngos po 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//khyod mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med
172b7(mdo sde): gang zhes bya ba nas rigs mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang /nor mngon par 'dod pa'i dud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang /mngasan du yod pa'i khur gyis skyo ba'i
173a1(mdo sde): bud yod gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang /shu mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar de khrus byas nas byi 'tshor bsrung bar byed cing nyin lan gsum dben par/mtshan
173a2(mdo sde): lan gsum dben par pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di drang

173b6(mdo sde): mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang /lung bstan pa gang gis sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bgegs bgyid pa chung ngu dang /'bring dang /chen po sku

174b1(mdo sde): ldan nas dag tug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAn drub la n+d+har dang /rgyan du rgyo dang /mdzad pa dang /bskyon ts+tsha dang /'dus pa chen po blta ba dang /nyi ma'o myong ba sa/
