178a1(mdo sde): bzung legs te/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na sems can rnams mchog tu lta ba mi zad pas sdug bsngal thob par gyur pa mchog tu 'dod chags kyi
178a2(mdo sde): shes che ba/dmus long dang 'dra ba dag lags te//zhes bya ba nas bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongasu nyams pa dag dang /yud tsam kho nas mnar med par
178a3(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhi no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i
178a4(mdo sde): snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu lan thob shig lan thob shig/'o na khyod kyis zhag dgu la gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bya'i
178a5(mdo sde): rgyal po na mkha' lding gi cha byad kyis rgya mtsho chen por klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jigs pa'i rkyen kun tu bstan pa'i rkyen gyis skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la rnam par ma bkod dam/
178a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems snyed du ma bcug gam/des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lagaso//ji skad gsungs pa de lta
178a7(mdo sde): lags te/bdag gis klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'jigs par kun tu bstan pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod lagaso//rigs kyi bu 'o na khyod kyis gling
178b1(mdo sde): bzhi pa bar ma de na n+da na rdzab med pa der bang bstan pa bas de na gnas pa'i klu thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur zhing de dag 'khrugs nas kyang zhag bdun du char ba mngon par rab tu 'bebs par byed pa'i
178b2(mdo sde): glang po che'i klu chen po dag dang /rta'i klu chen po dang /sbrul gyi klu chen po dag ma bstan tam/des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lpags te/sngon gyi
178b3(mdo sde): smon lam gyi bye brag gis lagaso//bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ngas khyod der mngags na de ji ltar khyod dngang par byed/byang chub sems dpa' des 'di skad ces gsol to//
178b4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste rin po che'i gter chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la der mchis nas sen mo dag gis rko bar bgyid
178b5(mdo sde): na de ji lta ji ltar sen mo dag gis rko bar bgyid pa de lta de ltar rin po che'i phung po chen po ches mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin du mkhas pas de bzhin
178b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gter yang tshig de lta bu dag gis ji lta ji ltar phyung ba de lta de ltar de nas chos rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa ches phal cher 'thob par 'gyur lags pas der sems
178b7(mdo sde): can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sladadu chos kyi phyag rgya gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs skyed pas der bdag gis sems can ches mang po yongasu smin par bgyid pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya
179a1(mdo sde): ches mang du de bzhin ga shegs pa las bdag yongasu tshol bar bgyid lug so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal po rdzogs rgyal po ngas byung
179a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu ngas lung bstan pa chen po rig sngags kyi rten ces bya ba khyod la sbyin par
179a3(mdo sde): mdzad do///'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//bam po bzhi pa/tad+ya thAM/sarbi raNA sham/sa mud
179a4(mdo sde): b+hA nA sha ma/a brdza nA sha ma/ska raM ga sha sa ma/saM yo ga sha ma/pan d+ha na sha ma/sa ma bi sa ra sha ma/b+ha dra ni sha ma/sam+ba kra ma sha ma/a ngid+b+ha sha ma/saM ka
179a5(mdo sde): raire sha ma/bidz+nyA na sha me/nA ma rU ba sha ma/Sha Ta ya ta nA sha ma/s+phAR+sha sha ma/be da na sha ma/tr-iSh+Ta sha ma/u pA dA na sha ma/b+hA ba sha ma/dz+nyA ti sha ma/dza rA ma
179a6(mdo sde): ra Na shA ma/yA bad sarba me nu Sh+ya sha ma/yA bad sarba trai d+hA tu ka saM skr-i tA sha ma/a ra pA ra sha mA//'di ni rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po yin te/lung bstan pa
179a7(mdo sde): des na der sems can rnams kyis thos pa tsam gyis sred pa chung ngu dang /'bring dang /rab dang /srid pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing gzugs dang /gzugs
179b1(mdo sde): med pa'i srid pa'i rgyu byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yino//nyon mongs pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro//'gro ba lnga lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi
179b2(mdo sde): nyes par spyod pa sngon chad byas pa 'bras bu mthar ma phyin par ma sbyangs pa thams cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro//rigs sngags kyi rten lung ston pa 'di gang gis res mthun par sems rtse
179b3(mdo sde): gcig pas mnyan nas nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par chos 'di rnam par sgom par byed na dge ba'i phyogs thams cad las yongasu nyams par byed pa dang /bgegs byed pa dang
179b4(mdo sde): nor yongasu nyams par byed pa dang /sdug pa'i dngos po dang bral bar byed pa dang /lus la kun tu gnod par byed pa dang /sems kun tu 'khrug par byed pa dang /dge ba thams cad la
179b5(mdo sde): mngon par mi dga' bar byed pa dang /mi dge ba thams cad la mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad ma lus par 'bras bu mi sgrub par zad par 'gyur te/mtshams
179b6(mdo sde): med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spyong ba dang //'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba ni ma gtog so//de dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu kun tu spyod par byed de//gal
179b7(mdo sde): te sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu rtsom par byed na de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis de rlabs par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' dang /rkyen gyi rgyal ba dang /dgra bcom bzed
180a1(mdo sde): kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro//de'i khyim longs spyod zad mi shes par yang 'gyu ro zhes bya ba nas sngar gsungs pa bzhin tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang
180a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gonas par byed na lha dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
180a3(mdo sde): dang /de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang zhes bya ba nas//mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin/dran par bya ba'i 'o su gyur pa dang /mngon par dga'
180a4(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i 'osu gyur pa dang /mchod pa'i 'os gyur pa dang /phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /rab tu bsrung bar bya ba'i 'os gyur pa yino//de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs
180a5(mdo sde): bcu kun tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'thong bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 'di skadadu/skyes bu dam pa dag 'ongs
180a6(mdo sde): ba leg so//tshur nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par gnas par byos shig/der nged kyis khyod sa bcu dag la gzhag par mdzad do zhes kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro//de sangs
180a7(mdo sde): rgyas mthong ba dang /'phags pa'i dga' ba dang //dad pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/de der yang sa bcu thob par byed cing
180b1(mdo sde): rang ba mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o//rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yino//rigs kyi
180b2(mdo sde): bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can rnams ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yong su nyams pa dag yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/Na'adi ltar de dag
180b3(mdo sde): ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas bor ba dag yin zhing mtshams med pa byed pa dag dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dag dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag dang
180b4(mdo sde): ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba dag yin pa'i phyiraro//de dag thams cad kyis ngan song gsum du yun ring por sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu drag po rab tu rtsub po nyamasu myong ngo //de dag
180b5(mdo sde): ngan song gsum las yongasu thar pa dang /yongasu dag pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis rgyus
180b6(mdo sde): de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang mi nyid rnyed pa thob po//gang de dag gi sngon gyi dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar dang /sbyin pa dang ldan pa la goms pa nas shes rab dang
180b7(mdo sde): ldan pa la goms pa'i bar dang /smon lam la goms pa dang /'khor ba la yongasu skyo ba la goms pa dang /byang grol gyi bde ba la gos pa dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa sgom pa la
181a1(mdo sde): goms pa/sngon chad byas par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal nyam su myong ra la goms pas ma lus par brjod/ma lus par brjod/
181a2(mdo sde): nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes te/da dung yong nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyis rgyus de dag gzugs mi sdig pa dag dang /tshul du mi shes pa dag dang /yan lag dang bral
181a3(mdo sde): bdag dang /bza' ba dang btung ba dang /gos dang /mal cha dang /rgyan dang bral ba dag tu gyur to//de dag der yang tshe thung ba dag dang /yid gzhungs pa chung ba dag dang /blo
181a4(mdo sde): chung ba dag dang /longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dag dang /bsod nams chung ba dag dang /grub pa chung ba dag dang /bya ba chung ba dag dang /
181a5(mdo sde): bya ba ngan pa la zhugs pa dag dang /lta ba ngan pas zin pa dag dang /bstan bcos ngan pa la dad pa dag dang /smon lam ngan pa dang ldan pa dag dang /nad mang ba dag yin/rnam
181a6(mdo sde): por g.yeng ba mang ba dag yin//'jug pa la sbyor ba mang ba dag dang /nyes par spyod pa gsum mang ba dag dang /ltad mo dag dang /ltas ngan pa dag dang /gzu lums can dag dang //
181a7(mdo sde): rtsub pa dag dang /zhe sdang dang ldan pa dag dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag dang /dkon mchog gsum 'gog par byed pa dag yin te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems///
181b1(mdo sde): can ni ngal char dran song gsum du 'gro ba dag yin//rigs kyi bu dag der rig sngags kyi rten lung snyan pa chen po 'di dag gis thos pa tsam gyi mod la de dag nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun
181b2(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba dag gi kun tu sbyor bas ngan song gi lam dag las sgrol bar byed//de dag sngon byas pa'i dad pa'i dbang po la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba nas/shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar
181b3(mdo sde): la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang /smon lam dang /'khor ba'i skyon dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa goms pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba yino//thos pa tsam
181b4(mdo sde): gyis de dag gi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro//nad med pa 'phel ba dang /longs spyod dong nye bar spyod pa 'phel ba dang /dge ba'i bya ba 'phel ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgra la 'phel
181b5(mdo sde): ba dang /shes rab 'phel ba dang /byams pa 'phel ba dang /btang snyoms kyi bar 'phel po dang /legs par byas pa'i las 'phel ba mchog tu 'gyur ro//thos pa tsam gyis de
181b6(mdo sde): ngag thams cad yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro//gang dag rig sngags kyi rten lung bstan pa chen po 'di bkur sti byas te nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed
181b7(mdo sde): par sems rtse gcig pas chos 'di dag rnam par sgom par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag dang //legs par spyod pa gsum dang ldan pa
182a1(mdo sde): dag dang /dkon mchog gsum la skyangs dang smon lam gyi shugs la mngon par dga' ba dag dang /chos kyi gnas pa dag dang /dkon mchog gsum
182a2(mdo sde): gyi gdung gsal bar byed pa dag tu 'gyur te/sems can gang dag der sngon gyi skye gnas rkyong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa byed pa nas ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i bar dag ni ma gtogs
182a3(mdo sde): so//de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'drir skyes shing skyo bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/gang dag gi sdig pa'i las rab tu chen po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par
182a4(mdo sde): sngon chad yongasu ma spyad pa'i sems can de dag gis rig sngags kyi rten lung stan pa chen po 'di thos na'ang yon tan de lta bu de dag thob par 'gyuraro//thos pa tsam gyis mod la'ang
182a5(mdo sde): de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa dpag tu med pa ma lus par yongasu zad par 'gyur ro//sems can de dag gis kyang der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag bri bar bya'o//yang dag par
182a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bdun yang bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chos kyis gnas pa rnams
182a7(mdo sde): kyi kun dga'i rab 'ong bya'o//der sbyin bdag kyang rab tu gasbyi zhi par bya'o//dus dus su gso sbyong gi sdom pa la'ang mngon par brtson tshun chos mnyan par bya'o//der sems can
182b1(mdo sde): gang dag dkon mchog gsum la dga' bya dang //mchog tu dga' ba chen po de lta bu 'thob pa'i gnas de yod de/de dag gis gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por ngan song gsum du
182b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drug po rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de'ang ris mthun pa 'di nyid la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro//kha cig lo ni yun ring du nad 'byung ngo to//
182b3(mdo sde): des de'i sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las 'phongs pa dag kyang yongasu zad par 'gyuraro//kha cig ni yan lag bcad pas yongasu zad par 'gyu ro//kha cig gi ni nor zad pas yongasu zad par
182b4(mdo sde): 'gyu ro//kha cig gi ni 'khor zhig pas yongasu zad par 'gyur ro//kha cig gi ni longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas yongasu zad par 'gyur ro//kha cig gi ni 'khor dang /
182b5(mdo sde): bran dang /lus la gnod pa byed pa dang /btsan rar gzhag pas yongasu zad par 'gyu ro//kha cig gi ni mi snyan pa dang /nyes par smras pa'i tshig thos pas yongasu zad par 'gyur
182b6(mdo sde): teris mthun pa la de dag gis mi dge ba'i las ston byas pa rnams yongasu zad par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi gzhi lung ston pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin/
182b7(mdo sde): tad+ya thA/khe ga pa rits+tshed/gar+b+ha k+Sha saM/gan+d+ha re bidz+dzi/pra b+he ga k+ShaM/k+Sha ba yog/pra ti ha ra/sha ma ma si ke the/sa ma ma g+har+N+NaMSh+TaM/a k+Sha ya ta te/k+Sha b+ha badz+re/
183a1(mdo sde): ni nad nad+h+yA She sa mAk+kha d+h+mA She/A da d+h+yA sha sa d+b+haSha/bi pra b+hAdz+dzAH/k+Sha d+h+mA She/sat+sa dza bar+N+Na Sha/sai n+ya dza badz+dza She/sa li la gu d+ha dz+dzA She/sa la gu h+ya byAk+Sha/
183a2(mdo sde): pan g+ho She/sa dA na ko ne/sarba d+ha nan b+h+ye/bi ta pra bid te/u pa kra ma na the/a nats+tsha d+ya br-i khI/pra ti kra ma naM/sa ke t+ye she/sa lo tsa na ba mau/kro d+ha d+ha re kA shA sa she A
183a3(mdo sde): ka sha kha ge/na ya kuny+dza/bi d+ya ba na/krA na ba ne/u b+ha ba ne/sa me ma kA re/shwa ri ya baM ne/mo g+ha dz+yA She/ha ri kro ne ba na ya mu gaM/sa rak+Sha ko le/na rA ya na d+h+yai She/in dra ba sa naM/
183a4(mdo sde): o a/a ba a/a ra ba a/dza rA a bi rA ba/sa me g+ha duHkhin stir Ni nir+Ya he swA hA//rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni yon tan che ba/phan yon che ba/
183a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa dang /khrus byed pa snang bar byed pa/dran par byed pa/nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin te/de la gang dag sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed cing
183a6(mdo sde): ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
183a7(mdo sde): bo thams cad dang /rkyen gyi rgyal ba thams cad dang /dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de dag thams cad ni lha'i dbang po nas/mi'i dbang po'i bar gyis
183b1(mdo sde): bsams pa dang /dad par bya ba'i 'os gyur pa dang /phyag bya ba'i 'osu gyur pa dang /mchod pa'i 'osu gyur pa yino//shin tu bsrung bar bya ba'i 'o su gyur pa yino//sems can de dag ni phyi ma'o//
183b2(mdo sde): dus na 'che ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la phyogs bcu kun nas mdun na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la
183b3(mdo sde): phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing 'di skad du/kye yon tan gyis phyug pa dag chur shog/nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par gnas par gyis shig/der nged kyis khyod sa bcu dag la
183b4(mdo sde): gzhag par bya'o//zhes kyang gsung bar mdzad//de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dang ba 'phags pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
183b5(mdo sde): zhing stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing da der yang sa bcu dag thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/rig
183b6(mdo sde): sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba dang /rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba dang /byang grol gyi bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar don che ba dang /
183b7(mdo sde): ben yon che ba yin gyis long la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khar su song zhig/nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhus shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184a1(mdo sde): mas du 'dun sa med na nasman du na sa sa na ga she pa
184a2(mdo sde): kyi la'u sems can rnams kyi lam dzes par 'gyur ba'i ga rgyas sngags thos pa la/bdag TIg kya ting nge len mi rnal spyir sa 'angs nas dam lanas
184a3(mdo sde): kun phyin lagasun btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag cag kya mchi bar gran du pa mdzadu par gsol//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la ma
184a4(mdo sde): brtsegs rgyal po des 'di skad ces pa/'a stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag thams cad lhan cig mthun par sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang /rtags dang /gzugs dang /dbyings dang /
184a5(mdo sde): spyod la mo dang /cha byad kyis khyed dang shig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal legs zhes kyang gsol te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sno
184b1(mdo sde): snying po dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang /rtags dang /gzugs dang /dbyings dang /spyod lam dang /cha byad du bdag/
184b2(mdo sde): nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpa la brtsigs rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan gsumo du bskor ba byas nas de nas
184b3(mdo sde): chas te yud tsam gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bcom
184b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab po//de dag gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di ga la ba dang /yul ma ga d+ha'i zhing ga la ba de logasu dong
184b5(mdo sde): ste/dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod to//bcom ldan 'das ni da dung yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po
184b6(mdo sde): dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad//yang de'i tshe byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bad+ma'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing spros thams cad yang
184b7(mdo sde): dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me
185a1(mdo sde): tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pa zhes bya ba chos
185a2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos stong gi nam mkha' la ltaso//des kyang der na mkha' la byang chub sems dpa'
185a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas lho phyog su 'dong ba dag mthong bar gyur to//des lho phyogasu rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas des de
185a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po ga la po de log su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ting 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las
185a5(mdo sde): langs nas ring por ma lags te/bdag gis ni steng gi na mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis//dpag tu ma mchis pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas
185a6(mdo sde): lho phyogasu mchi ba dag mthong lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogasu rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po 'thob nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/'di la rgyu ni gong lags
185a7(mdo sde): snyom lagaso//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog ge snying po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi
185b1(mdo sde): bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs spyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod do//'di ltar snyigs ma lnga
185b2(mdo sde): dang ldan por gnas pa de na de bzhin gA shogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gau zhes la 'dus pa chen po la chos kyi
185b3(mdo sde): tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rkyen mi bcad par bya ba'i phyir da ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gtan la dbab pa
185b4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyis rnam grangs rab tu ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa dang /dri ma med par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan
185b5(mdo sde): bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang /chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur to//der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i
185b6(mdo sde): tog gi gzungs sngags gsungs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu spyad nas gshegs//de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
185b7(mdo sde): dang nyan thos chen po rnams kyis 'dus pa chen po yang dag par sgrub par mdzad/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa mig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas bstan
186a1(mdo sde): kyang de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod sa dang na mkha' gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba'i chos bstan pas
186a2(mdo sde): tshim par ma gyur to//mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa de'ang sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od
186a3(mdo sde): zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par byed pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed do//de bzhin gshegs pa de 'di snyam du dgongs te/phyogs bcu dang /sangs rgyas
186a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bskal pa brgyas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba nas gang dag srid pa tha ma pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
186a5(mdo sde): bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mje du 'jug par gyur cig/'dir 'khor nas kyang rang rang gi dge
186a6(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis gnas par gyur cig/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag par mthu dang ldan pa dang /bcud dang ldan pa dang /yon tan
186a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig/'di ltar 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin du thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang /brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag dang /gtong ba dang ldan
186b1(mdo sde): dag dang /shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang
186b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i nang du chud par gyur cig/de nyid 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la stobs ji lta ba dang /ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du 'khod nas bsam gtan
186b3(mdo sde): byed par gyur cig snyam dgongaso//bsam gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu/dper na 'bru mar gyi mor me lta bu byung zhes bya ba nas kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu//
186b4(mdo sde): dper na zla ba dag nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyaro//da na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi
186b5(mdo sde): mjed snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//da ltar gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni snyoms par zhugs par gyur la/sngon chad der phyin pa ni ma yin pa'i byang chub sems
186b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de ltar ting 'dzin las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der cha so//der phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro//'dus pa chen
186b7(mdo sde): pode'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//gzungs sngags chen po da'ang thos par 'gyur ro//skyil mo krung du 'dug nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rtse bar 'gyuraro//
187a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod kyang/ 'dzin las la sa rigs kyi zla khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi nang mi mjed der 'gro bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de
187a2(mdo sde): na'ang sems can dag mchog tu che thung ba dag yin//nad mang ba yinablo chung ba dag yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba yin/bsod nams chung ba dag yin/dge ba'i
187a3(mdo sde): ba'i bya ba chol chung ba dag yin/'jig rten pha rol pa 'jigs par mi lci ba dag yin/longs spyod dang nye bar spyod do chung ba dag yin/'dod pa la chums pa dag yin/mi dge ba
187a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dag yin/phrag dog dang ldan pa dag yin/jo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dag spangs pa yin te/de dag phal cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan
187a5(mdo sde): song du 'gro ba dag yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/sdig pa
187a6(mdo sde): byed pa'i lus sral po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/sdig po byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar de dag kyang der sI bcud kyi mdangs phrogs nas
187a7(mdo sde): yongasu spyod par byed//'bru dang /sman dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'dab ma dang /ro rnams kyi mdangs phrogs nas kyang yongasu spyod par byed//des na stobs dang
187b1(mdo sde): ldan pa dag yin//rjer de dag mngalan gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdas dag 'phrog par byed do//mi rnams skyes pa tsam gyi modo dag la myur du mdadas 'phrog par byed do//bza' ba dang 'atu
187b2(mdo sde): ba'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed//der de dag gis mi mngal du zhugs pa'i mdangs phrogs shing skyes po tsam gyis mod la mdas phrig rtsi bas de zhin kyang mdongs la mi reg cing bza'
187b3(mdo sde): dang /btung ba nyams pa yongasu spyod zin pa la yongasu spyod par byed/rgyu des des na mi rnams mchog tun bdag dang /tshe thur pa dag dang /dran pa nyams pa dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa bzad
187b4(mdo sde): las yong su nyams pa dag dang /bsod nams dang bral ba dag dang /'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag dang /longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba dag dang 'dod pa la
187b5(mdo sde): chums pa dag dang /kun spyod pa mi gtsang ba dag yin zhes bya ba nate mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no zhes bya ba'i bar yin no//rigs
187b6(mdo sde): kye bu sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta bur gyur te/'di ltar da bya ba la brtson pa dang /spro ba dang /brtul ba brten par gyur to//sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs
187b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa ra ngas bsnyen bkur byas//nges thabs gang gis bud med snum pa bsrung bar nus pa'ang yongasu zhus so//nga'i brtson 'grus gang gis ma bde lag su 'gyur
188a1(mdo sde): 5/mngalan yod pa bdi legasu 'gyur ba mosu nus//lha 'am/k+ShA A/gnod sbyin nas/srin po 'am//namakha' lding dam/mr-i cu
188a2(mdo sde): 'am s+ho 'phye chen po la9/bral dum 'am/yi dgas sam/sharba 'am/skyel po'am/lus sru pa 'am/mdzes 'jog pa 'am/brjid byed dam/rims nyin gcig
188a3(mdo sde): pa'am/nyon gnyis pa'am/nyin gsum pa'am/nyin bani pa'am/ langs gang yang dug gam/sngags kyi sbyor ba'am/sman gyi sbyor bas lus dang sems la gnod par
188a4(mdo sde): bya bar mi nus pa yongasu zhuso//gang gis kyang ma 'am/mngal na yod pa dang /skyes ma thag pa dang /'o ma 'thung ba dang /bza' ba dang /btong ba yongasu spyod pa la gnod par bya bar
188a5(mdo sde): mi nus par yongasu zhus//gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa'am/lus dkrug pa'am/khams dkrug pa'am/sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus par yongasu zhus so//gang
188a6(mdo sde): gi phyir sems can de dag ba mal par mngal na gnas par yongasu zhus/lus dang sems la rnam par tho ma brtsams pas bde bar ma'i mngal nas gnod pa med par 'byung ba
188a7(mdo sde): yangasu zhuso//bde bar 'am 'thung ba yongasu nuso//bde bar bza' ba deng bachung ba yong su spyad pa yang su zhuso//gnod pa chung ba dang /tshe ring ba dang /blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas
188b1(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i bar dang /sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag
188b2(mdo sde): kyang yongasu zhuso//ngas gsang sngags gang dag dang /sman gang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag yongasu smin par mdzad par spyod pa'i gsang sngags de dag ni gang yin/sman de dag ni gang
188b3(mdo sde): yin zhe na/gzungs sngags gang gis nges sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi
188b4(mdo sde): ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs sngags lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang nga la bstan par gyur to//rtag tu brtson 'grus dang //brtu'
188b5(mdo sde): ba brtan pa ngas rtag par rgyun du tshe rabs de dang de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med la rig pa yong ba'i sbubs zhi bu gzungs spags gsang sngags kyi gzhi rig sngags 'dis bsang ba byaso//
188b6(mdo sde): bud med da mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te skyabs gsum la rnam par gzhag go/phyin chad kyang lha 'am zhes bya ba nas//bdud dam/brjed byed dam/mi dang /mi ma yin pa zhes bya/
188b7(mdo sde): ba'i bar gyis ma'i mngal na bu yod pa bcos te/rnam par tho brtsam pa 'am/rnam par gtse ba'am/lus dkrug pa'am/khams dkrug pa 'am/sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus//
189a1(mdo sde): /lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten byi bar gyis kyang mdangs 'brog sa'am/sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya bar mi nuso//de dag gis mdal na bu
189a2(mdo sde): yod pa'i ma rnam par tho brtsams pa dang /mngal na bu gnas pi'ang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyi dbang po thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang /gzun
189a3(mdo sde): bzang ba/blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dag dang /shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde la gsu ma'i lto nas byung zhing brjed ngas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan
189a4(mdo sde): pa dag tu gyur to//de dag skyes pa tsam gyi mod la'ang lha stobs dang ldan pa dbang che bar grags pa re re la'ang 'khor brgya stong yod pa dag bsrung ba dang /rje su sba bar byed par kun tu
189a5(mdo sde): gnaso//de dag mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gis kyang rnam par tho brtsam pa'am/rnam par gtse ba 'am/lus dkrug pa'i'o//khamra krug pa'aM/seMs dkrug par bya bar mi nus//
189a6(mdo sde): mdangs blang bar yang mi nuso//gsang sngags dang /sman gyis kyang rnam par tho brtsam par mi nuso//gang gi phyir sems can de dag mchog tu gzugs dang ldan pa dang /tshe
189a7(mdo sde): rabs dran pa dang //'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lci ba dang /byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /snying rje cheni po dang ldan pa dang /gtong ba dang ldan pa dang /tshul khrims la
189b1(mdo sde): rjesu dga' ba dang /bzod pa dang /yon tan dang ldan pa dang //brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /dben pa la dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
189b2(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba dag dang /de thob par byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to//sems can nye bar zhi
189b3(mdo sde): ba la gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gro bya bar brtson pa dag yin te/mi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la skyon du blta
189b4(mdo sde): ba dang /byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur to//de dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag ris mthun pa de nyid kyis myur du byang chub
189b5(mdo sde): kyi sems ma brjed par byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//ci ste rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyed na de dag myur du skye ba dang /'jigs pa dang rje su mthun pa'i
189b6(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par gyur to//ci ste sems can de dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems skyed par byed na sems can de dag ris mthun pa nyid kyis bden pa dang rje su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par
189b7(mdo sde): byed//sems can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum dang bral ba dang /mtho risu 'gro ba dag tu gyur to//rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can
190a1(mdo sde): drag yongasu smin par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bskung so//rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan
190a2(mdo sde): pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no//rigs kyi bu ngas sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis sman sing hak+Shir
190a3(mdo sde): la brabs nas nad pa la byin na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to//gang na sman seng ha k+Shir med par yang ngas de'i mdun du bza' ba dang /btung ba gang yin pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbungs
190a4(mdo sde): zhi ba lung bstan pas drabs nas nad pa la byin nA nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to//gal te med par gyur na ngas sman bkrus te bor ba la rig pa yod pa'i sbungs zhi ba'i gsang
190a5(mdo sde): sngags kyi gzhi dag gis brabs nas nad po la byin na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu nges thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can rnams yongasu
190a6(mdo sde): smin par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrub so//gang na shing ljon pa dag me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas rig pa yod
190a7(mdo sde): baba'i sbung so zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gis tshar po'i tshul thams nas shing dag la btab na shing da dag lo mang por chu med kyang me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyur /
190b1(mdo sde): danan du run shing dang /rgun 'du dag dang /'bru dang /snad dag bar dag 'a' bya'o//gang na chur mi 'ad cing chu rnyed der Ang+ga rus sbrul snying la rigapa yod pa'i slabs na pa gas //
190b2(mdo sde): sngags kyi ni 'dis drangs nas deshi ts+yai m+bi ka'i mdang ma dkris te//klu mtsho'i 'gram du gno gan char chen po dang /nu chen po'i tshogs byung bar gyur to//der chu chen po d+has pas sems can
190b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi khyim dang /zhing dang /kun dga'i ra ba'i bar chud za bar gyur na der yang ngas spyir gyi rgyal po'i nor bul rig pa yod pa'i spungs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis blangs nas klu'i
190b4(mdo sde): gnasu gzhag na char chu rab tu zhi bar gyur to//gang na dus ma yin par rlung dang /nyi ma dang /dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /mun pa dang /rdul gyi char pa dang /grang ba dang /dro ba dang /
190b5(mdo sde): dus phyin ci log tu byung ba'i bar dang /dmag tshogs dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /gzu' dang /rgyu skar dang /zla ba dang /zlab byed dang /dus tshigs dang /lo rnams yang dag pa
190b6(mdo sde): byung ba ma yin pa'i bar langs snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ched du zhag bdun pa gcig gi nyin mtshan du khrus byas nas 'o mdong 'dus chan gyi kha zas pa zhing tshangs pa'i gnas
190b7(mdo sde): sgom pa la mngon par dga' bas rig pa myong ba'i sbungs zhi ba lung bstan pa 'di las gzhan mi byed par brjod de/nyin 'dun pa la gal te yul yong su ma bskyangs na der nga'i mdun du rang gi
191a1(mdo sde): /dam bcas pas mi gnas pa min no//der yang ngas rtsi ldum pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dim brangs shing skyugs
191a2(mdo sde): sman ma ngana'i 'bras bu dag dang bsres te/g+ha rten sar gzhag pas des dus ma yin pa'i sgra dang /nyi ma dang /sprin dang /mun pa dang /rdul gyi char paM dag dang /grang ba dang /dro ba thams
191a3(mdo sde): cad zhi bar gyur to//yang dge pa'i dus tshigs dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /gza' dang /rgyu skar da /zla ba dang /zla ba phyed dang /lo yang dag par byung bar gyur to//rigs kyi
191a4(mdo sde): bu des na gang na sems can dge mtshan dang /bkra shis dang /so sor ldan pa dag dang /lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag la ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi bar
191a5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa chen po 'di'i chos bstan to//gang dang gang du sems can rnams kyis thos pa de dang der yang nyon mongs pa chung ngu dag tu gyur to//dge mtshan dang /bkra shis dang /lta
191a6(mdo sde): bangan pa thams cad spangs te/de phyin chad dge ba'i las dang yang dag par ldan pa legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /smon lam dag mang ba nges pa'i phung po dag tu gyur to//
191a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can rnams yong su smin par byas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar yong su rdzogs par byas te/blan med
191b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas//rig dpang yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar sems can rnams la gces spras byed pa yi no//de
191b2(mdo sde): ltar phan yon mang po yin to//sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/nad thams cad ba tu zhi bar byed pa//bud med sbrum ma thams cad srung bar byed pa rab tu thar par byed pa/nyon mongs
191b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/phung po dang /khams thams cad yong su shes par byed pa/chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed pa/thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed
191b4(mdo sde): pa/byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongasu rtogs par byed pa/sems can thams cad rab tu dad par byed pa/chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par byed pa/bdud dang phas kyi rgol
191b5(mdo sde): ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod par byed pa/bdud kyi yul thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po
191b6(mdo sde): 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te/lha rnams dga' bar byed pa/gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/lha ma yin
191b7(mdo sde): rnam par 'joms par byed pa/no mkha' lding rnams dngang par byed/mi 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa/lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/'thab pa dang //thab
192a1(mdo sde): ma dang /mu ge dang /'chi ba dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /char pa dang /nad thams cad rnam par
192a2(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa/grang ba dang /dro ba dang /kha ba dang /tsha ba dang rtsub pa dang /hrud hru po dang /reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa/chos thams cad kyi chos kyi
192a3(mdo sde): tshul 'bar bar byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par byed pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/
192a4(mdo sde): zad pa shes bskyed par byed pa/mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du byed pa/ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rabu 'jig par byed pa/sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed
192a5(mdo sde): pa yino//rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di yin te//tad+ya thA/man+ta kA/a pu kA/g+ha sa kA/dza ne k+Sha//marma na k+Sha/k+Sha bak+She/maN Da//na Tak+ShA/
192a6(mdo sde): nadarash+tsa/da~M san+na da/kha gaun+nad/a t+ta naH/kun Ta/ba ri na nu/nAT+Tan+daHbadz+ri nIn+da/ud t+ta n+naH/g+h+nAT/s+'uSh+TAn+naT+Ta/tsa bi bi rin+da n+ya/kha g+ni sa dz+nyAn
192a7(mdo sde): bikA ra nAT/sa ha ru dran /sa mnAT/shaM kr-i si kr-In+da/ti 9/ts+yaik+Shi ba ti k+She ma jub /na nr-i to sa ni tre ran dzag a me he rag rda la~M/ma
192b1(mdo sde): rapa dza la/a tri nA/a tI nA/ra ba/a tr-i nA kA/a ba hA/mArga tri nAk+Sha/e Sha e ban to duHkha s+ya swA hA//bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor der srog chags bye ba
192b2(mdo sde): phrag drug cu ni rje su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//dkrigs pa phrag drug cu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur to//rigs kyi du rig pa yod pa'i sbungs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen
192b3(mdo sde): po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la ngas khyod kyi la gnas bsku ro//der yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems
192b4(mdo sde): tsan+da rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad//rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba 'di long la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod der song zhig/nga'i bkas de
192b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/bskyod po yang ngam/bde ba la rog par gnas sam zhes kyang zhus shig/'di skad du byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
192b6(mdo sde): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod/sangs rgyas
192b7(mdo sde): kyi nga de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bocom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal mi tig gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//de bzhin
193a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas bcom ldan 'das la yongasu zhu ba'i slad du bdag mngags pas lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snang ba ma
193a2(mdo sde): mnga' lags sam//gnod pa chung lags sam/khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba dag me mchis lags sam/gnod pa dag chung lags sam/dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag
193a3(mdo sde): lags sam/ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de'i nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/chos kyis gnas pa dag gis gnas par bgyid pa lags sam/khyod kyi
193a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri na bdud kyi yul dang //klu'i yul bcom lags samakhyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/'di na thogs pa ma mchis pa chos kyi
193a5(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam/gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa de dag gi che du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'dir
193a6(mdo sde): nyi ma'i snying po chos kyi gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing de nas
193a7(mdo sde): rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba/phan yon che ba 'di bskur lags te/sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa/nad thams cad rab tu zhi//
193b1(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa zhes byang nas sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'ang
193b2(mdo sde): bskur lagaso//zhes kyang gsol cig/de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mcher thob cing rmad du byung ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
193b3(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to//mchog tu ngo mtshar to//de lta lags pas da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la mngon ma
193b4(mdo sde): thos pa 'di ltar zab pa'i rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa 'di kho na bstan to//gang la yon tan 'di lta bu grangs med dpag tu
193b5(mdo sde): med pa de dag mchis pa 'di la mkhas pa byang chub tshol bar byed pa su zhig mngon par brtson par mi bgyid/de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
193b6(mdo sde): sems can gang su dag 'khor bas skrag cing byang grol gyi bde ba mngon par mtshal ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan yongasu bsgrags pa dang rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags
193b7(mdo sde): kye ming bsgrags pa na dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /gus par sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po dang /dge ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lag so//de nas
194a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dang la me tog gi snying ngos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rigs
194a2(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpar gyur te brtson pa 'dis spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam 'di lta bu bta'o//bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad
194a3(mdo sde): nA sbyin po la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba nas shes rab la brtson pa'i bsam po can zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis bdag gi ming sgrogs par byed cing sems can thams cad
194a4(mdo sde): kyis sems par byed na gal te de dag la lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sems can la la pha rol tu phyin pa de dang de dag gi bar chad byed par nus pa zhig yod na sems
194a5(mdo sde): dedag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya stong du mar gyur cig/sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtog so//bdag kyang re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
194a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/gang yang bud med bu la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/bu'i khur gyis skyob zhes bya ba'i bar dang /gang bud mod snyam pa
194a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar bdag la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang /gus pa dang /dad pas bdag gis mong yongasu sgrog par byed la/gal te ma
194b1(mdo sde): 'am mngal na yod pa de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa snang ba'i sems kyi rnam par tho 'tsham par byed dam/sman dang gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste/lus kun tu 'khrug par byed dam/sems
194b2(mdo sde): kun tu 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas bcis pa tsam gyi bar la'ang tha na yud tsam gcig tsam yang rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na/bdag re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
194b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig ces sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab po//de bzhin du da ltar yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na
194b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal de lta dus gzir ba dag kyang zhes bya ba nas ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang /gus pa dang /dang bas bdag gri mI yongasu sgrogs par byed pa thams
194b5(mdo sde): cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongasu grol bar 'gyur te gzhan du ma yino//sbyangs pa ma yin na sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtog so////
194b6(mdo sde): 'bags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//bom po lnga pa//des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni ngo mtshar
194b7(mdo sde): lags te/de na sems can rnams mchog tu sdang ba/gzu lums can/rtsub pa/phrag dog dang ldan/snying brtse ba ma mchis pa/bgyis pa mi gzo ba/tshig rtsub par smra ba/log
195a1(mdo sde): par lta ba dag lags pas der kha cig gis bdag la rnam par tho brtsams na mi rung ste/bdag mchis pas ci la'ang mi sman lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
195a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/sus dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa legs par bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas par gyur pa de la ni bdud
195a3(mdo sde): bye bas kyang rnam par tho 'tsham pa 'am/bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni gnas medo//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas par shin+d+ra bsgoms shing
195a4(mdo sde): legs par yad la byas zin gyis ma 'jigs shig/rigs kyi bu khyod la gsang sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /gang gis bzod pa
195a5(mdo sde): dang /dran pa dang /rab tu dang ba thob par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med de'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa byams pa chen po sbyin par mdzad do//tad+ya thA/bo dr-i ha/bu
195a6(mdo sde): bu la/i la ba ra/i la sa ha/ha T+ya n+ya ga ga nAk+Sha/sha ma sha ma/mi tra mi tra/tsakra brti ti le/sAM ga ra ti lau/dur+N+Na li/hi hi le/ha ba he na rA dzi ta/ya pa na ma
195a7(mdo sde): k+ShA na ti mi tre/mri traR+Ya me/mi tra kha g+ha/sarbe satwa dza mi tre/man brta mi tre/bi ti sha ra mi tre swA hA//rigs kyi bu sdang ba zhi par byed pa dang /rmongs par byed pa'i gas
195b1(mdo sde): sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dis tsam+ba ka'i 'bya mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas lag pa gnyis bskus na sdang ba thams cad dad par byed pa/rmongs par byed cing sdang ba'i sbrul dag dang /sdang ba'i
195b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /grul bum dang /srul po dang /bdud bye ba brgya stong yang rung ste/sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ci'ang byed par mi nus//gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan
195b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur kyang skyor chu gcig gis thams cad de'i mod kho na la med par 'gyur ro//gal te chu rnyog pa can gyis rgya mtsho bzhi yongasu gang bar gyur kyang rung /sbyor
195b4(mdo sde): chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang bar byed/'di la the tshom med kyis long la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du song zhig/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu
195b5(mdo sde): med pas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thob pa la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur
195b6(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang /'dus pa chen po blta ba dang /nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od rjegyi me'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs
195b7(mdo sde): sngags de'ang mnyan par 'tshal lags na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag kyang mchir gnang ba lta na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mje du bdag cag mchi logaso//de nas
196a1(mdo sde): de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pad la me tog gi snying po ngas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyad thams cad so so nas gling bzhi
196a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor los sar ba'i cha byad dang /rtags dang /dbyibs dang /ya byad dang /spyod lam gyi lhan cig mthun par deng zhig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu de dag
196a3(mdo sde): thams cad gling ba zhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang //rtags dang /dbyibs dang //yo byad dang /spyod lam mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la
196a4(mdo sde): sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal mo tog gi snying po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas na mkha' la 'khod do//byang chub
196a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang rin po che las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa bdun bdun dang /dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang mngon par sprul to//spyod lam
196a6(mdo sde): delta bus de nas chas te/de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad 'drir 'khod de//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /
196a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du kha cig gis ni gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo//bcom
196b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshezlas pa shAkya thub bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir kha cig gis ni dngul gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo//kha

196b3(mdo sde): cig gis ni mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tu phab po//kha cig gis ni dpung rgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu phab bo//kha cig gis ni ras dang /ras bcos bu dang //
196b4(mdo sde): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
196b5(mdo sde): tu 'khod par gyur to//theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u lnga pho nya'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so///
196b6(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sngon ma mthong ba tshangs pa chen po dang /brgya byin dang /sred med kyi bu dang /gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa mthong nas
196b7(mdo sde): mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te//stan las langs nas ha cang yang thag mi ring bar 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi po de dag 'khor
197a1(mdo sde): dang sa te/d+hA na ga shegs pa sh+tsa khung pag la 'du gasmra bal ma du tu rgyunasal na// nas byung chung so srung ba soms sgyur
197a2(mdo sde): chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub po ga la bde log su mi tog tsamAM ka'i phreng bdag gtor te//de'i mchog sa bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to//
197a3(mdo sde): nang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i snang ba 'dzin//lta ba nyams pa'i 'gro ba'i lam stsol ba//mnyam nyid ldan pa 'grol pan mdzad khyod//bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod /
197a4(mdo sde): gdul du//'gro ba nyon mongs par mdza 'a//chos 'dir snang ba yun ringa'i ba nga khyod//desam gtan sgo dag gis skyes mchog ldan//zhing sems rang
197a5(mdo sde): tu mdzes par mdzad//rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas dgu li//rgyud ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod pa mdzad//gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'di dka' ba ste//de mthong ba dag 'dir chos
197a6(mdo sde): ched chog su mchis//'gro ba mor skye ba ni rnyed par dka'//shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang //nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub khyod ni//rang myur nyen mongs drang
197a7(mdo sde): gcod mdzad lags//sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs klung lhung ba//khyod kyis gleng chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral//rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag po nyer mngags//khyod
197b1(mdo sde): sa chos kyi gtor la yi rang mdzad//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa don
197b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchi so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam+ba ko'i mdog ces bgyi ba
197b3(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa
197b4(mdo sde): kwa'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/skyod pa
197b5(mdo sde): yong ngam/stobs dang bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags som/gnod pa chung lags sam/khyod kyi
197b6(mdo sde): 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/gnod pa chung lags sam/chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por
197b7(mdo sde): bgyid pa dag lags sam//chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa lags sam khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam/khyod kyi
198a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/'don thags pa ma ma myos par 'khor ma sgong lagasus ma/sus rgyas kyi yul 'don gang su ga
198a2(mdo sde): 'khor ma sbya bar 'gyur ba de dgra gdon du de bzhin gshegs pacas mdag de khyod dang nyim nga chos kyis gnas pa/ yul 'jig pa'i 'di ra byi'i gdung sngags
198a3(mdo sde): 'di la dang pasbyin par med lags//de nis ben pa dang numathun pa ga sa rmugs pa/ldan mnachod pe'i 'di dgas thams cad rung par brjod pa/ge
198a4(mdo sde): kyi 'ad tshigs thams cad zang par brjed pa//gzugs me pa'i dod rdzogs pa'i su cad rjed pa /bya ma 'i/sbyin rgyar nga / snyam pa rgyal
198a5(mdo sde): 'ad par bgyid pa 'di'ang bskur lagaso zhes bya ba dza ltar sngur bshad pa bzhin te/bden pa dang rje su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni 'dud rnams char gcod pa/klu rnams pa mo par
198a6(mdo sde): gyid pa/lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/gnod sbyin rnams tshim par bgyid pa/lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'dzem par bgyid pa/rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/
198a7(mdo sde): dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar 'gyid pa//bud nga 'dod chags dang brel par babyid pa/mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa/rnam 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon
198b1(mdo sde): par dga' bar dgyod pa//nad thams cad rang duni par bgyid pa/'thab pa dang //bab mo nga /mu ge dang /dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag chags dang /rlung dang /char bad//
198b2(mdo sde): chu bo dang /grang ba dang /dra ba thams cad rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/kha ba dang /chab dang /rim gro 'i dang /rtsub pa dang /drung drung po dang /reg par dka' ba'i dngos de rnams ring rje zhi bar 'gyi
198b3(mdo sde): ra chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/chos kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par bgyid pa//'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/zang du
198b4(mdo sde): shes pa skyed par 'gyid pa/mi skye ba shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa/ma rig pa'i mun pa'i dung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/sred pa
198b5(mdo sde): klung skems par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te/tad+ya thA/bA ye ba ya pa ri bA ra/ba he ba ha pa ri b+ha re/pr-i ba bi pa ri bA re/a be a pa bi ra b+hI re/tidza ta dza pa riShA
198b6(mdo sde): r-i/maM lem la pa ri bI re/kha b+he khaM g+ha ba ri bA re/a lo ka a lo ka pa ri bA re/s+tha me s+tha ma pa ri bA re/rA dze rA dza ba ri bA re/si li si la pa rI b+ha ri/ga me ga ma pa ri bA re/a bo tsa a bo tsa
198b7(mdo sde): ri bA re/ma la ma la lem/la me lam/rI la rA la lam/did+hu dz+nyA na ma b+hu ha ga me/b+hU tang ga ma pe ri bA re/tsak+Shu gra he/tsak+Shu gra ha pa ri bA re/sho tra gra he/sho trag ha ba ri bI ri/g+hA
199a1(mdo sde): /Na gra he/g+hA Na gra ha pa ri bA ro/dzi hA gra he/dzi hA gra hAM pa ri bA re/kA ya gra he/kA ya gra ha ba ri bA re/ma na gra he/ma na gra ha pa ri bA re/s+phar sha gA he/s+phar
199a2(mdo sde): sha gra ha pa ri bA re/be da na gr-i he/be da na gra ha pa ri bA re/triSh+NA gr-i haM/triSh+NA gr-i hi pa ri bI re/u pA dA na gra he/u bAM dA na grA ha pa ri bA re/b+hA ba gra he/b+hA ba gra hA pa ri bA re/dz+nyA ti gra he/
199a3(mdo sde): dzA ti gra ha pa ri bA re/dza ra ma ra Na gra he/dza ra ma ra Na gra hI pa ri bA re/duH/khaM sa na ta pA gra hi/duHkha se na taM pA gra ha pa ri b+hA re/A rA pA rA d+hI dzi gra he/A rA bA rA d+hA dza bra ha pa ri bA re/A
199a4(mdo sde): rI bA rA dwi dza gra he/A rA pA rA dri dza gra hA pa ri bA re/a brta bi bar+t+ta s+ya a ba ra mu ba ma sra s+ye bi ga pi ni brta/AR+ya rasmi sam bai ga shAn ti swA hA//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
199a5(mdo sde): ga shegs pa tsam+ba ke'i medag des bden pa dang rje su mthun pa'i bzod pa bskur ba ni 'di lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang leg so zhes bya ba gnang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed
199a6(mdo sde): du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dag ni ma gtog so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
199a7(mdo sde): dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'dir ngo stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/tshig 'bru dang bcas
199b1(mdo sde): pa dang lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang /rjesu mthun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par mdzadado//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+ba ka'i mdog gis gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa
199b2(mdo sde): lus kyi khyad par thams cad sgrub pa zhes bye ba na so shin tu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i bar nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i sbu bu'i gzungs sngags de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/de nas byang
199b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//s+yAd ya the da nI/sid+d+ha me te/bi lo ka ma te/e le gi ta rI she/ruM tsa su ru tse/bud+d+ho/
199b4(mdo sde): dr-i bud+d+he/mA hA bud+d+he/un mad+h+we/u na mad+d+ha pra ti She d+ha ne/ra ga d+hu pa pra ti She d+ha ne/bin+du bin+du mi te/tsi ta tsi tA ba ti Sha d+ha ne/arge tsan+d+ra a d+he/ha ha tsi ti/ha ta ni rme/ha ta k+Sha mi be
199b5(mdo sde): de//ha ta pau ne b+ha bai ri dze/ha ti tsak+Shu sa ma to/he ta bi ma ta mu twe/ha ta yA g+ha/ha ta yA g+haM/ha ta sa mu dra dza be/hA ta bi ma na rI dze/ha ta hi te/ha ta tsi ta Te/ha ta d+harma rA dzaM/he ta
199b6(mdo sde): ba hu ra dze/ha ta bar+Na mi ta/ha tA yu pa ga ma te/ha ta ro sa rasmi/ha ta d+harma sid+d+hi/hA te sarbo na ma dA/dz+nye d+h+we dz+dza/bi dzi r+N+Na r+N+Na/serba mArga dz+nyA dz+nyA e Sho na da sau ser duHkhe swA hA//btsun
199b7(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+ba ka'i mdog des dngag ches pa'i dus kyi tshe bsrung ba'i sla'i du nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i ge hU~M ngas sngags stsal ba ni 'di lag so//de nas
200a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa/sbyin pa khyod kyi nyi ma'i snying po'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/snyan pa de
200a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//de bas kyang nyi ma'i sbyin pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par
200a3(mdo sde): dka'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung /gang gis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bam/rgyu mirgya chen po'i yon tan dang phan yi ni brjod
200a4(mdo sde): par nus so//nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di'i yon tan dang phan yo ni bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang rung ste brjod par mi nuso//nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags
200a5(mdo sde): 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/'khor bzhi po de dag la'ong rgyas par yang dge par
200a6(mdo sde): rab tu ston cig dang /der sems can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas zag pa thams cad zad pa dang /byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar
200a7(mdo sde): du'ang 'gyuraro//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to//shing gi rgyal po'i drung du bdud ni gcig pu khyod kyis bcom//byang chub rab mchog
200b1(mdo sde): dam pa'ang ni gcig pus brnyes pa lags//lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gcig pu khyod kyis dbang du mdzad//rgyal ba nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od zer lags//'di na mu stegs gzhan
200b2(mdo sde): gcig pus 'od dang bral mdzad pa//'jig rten kun na srin du mo khyer dag la nyo ltar mdzes//thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
200b3(mdo sde): drung chos tshul yun ring gnas par mdzad//khyod gcig pu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa//dge dang byang chub yongasu btsal phyir chos don gnyer ba lags//rgyal ba
200b4(mdo sde): khyod ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i chos ston pa//khyod ni ye shes byang chub spyod pa rab mchog ston par mdzad//gcig pus zhi 'gyur bdud rtsis sems can rnams kyang ni mdzad pa/
200b5(mdo sde): yang srid ma mchis mdzad slad srog chags khrag khrig sgrol po khyod//zag pa zad cing lha dang bral ba nyon mongs spangs gyur pa//gang na mya ngan byed med zhi ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod//'di
200b6(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs lags te//rgyal ba rnams kyi khyod la zhu ba'i slad pho nyar mngags//rig pa'i rgyu mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa'o//
200b7(mdo sde): grub pa zla ba'i chos dngango gsan nas gzungs kyang bskur ba lags//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dper bgyi na grong khyer rgyar dpag tshad tsam mchis
201a1(mdo sde): pa bye mas gtams pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bkyi ba mchis te/
201a2(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/de bzhin gshegs
201a3(mdo sde): pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas bklu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa
201a4(mdo sde): sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das cing snang nga mi
201a5(mdo sde): mnga' lags sam/gnod pa chung lags sam/khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags samaganod pa chung lags sam/dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags//
201a6(mdo sde): sam/ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa dag lags sam/khyod kyis sangs rgyas
201a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang /klu'i yul bcom lags sam/khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo bskur lags
201b1(mdo sde): sam/sangs rgyas kyi yul 'drin gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam
201b2(mdo sde): par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad 'goso//de nas stong pa nyid dang rje su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags
201b3(mdo sde): mthu che ba/phan yon che ba/'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/
201b4(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyi ng+ge gyi ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar dang /sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa'i bar 'di'ang
201b5(mdo sde): bskur lags te/tad+ya thA/d+hu ma te/d+hu ma ti/ak+Shau d+h+ya ma te/pra b+hA sa d+h+ya ma te/s+yAn+duk+ShA sha d+hu mA t+te/a gai kha g+he/be me ta kham+b+hi/e bik+Shi kha g+h+rA/a mo ha kha g+hA/an
201b6(mdo sde): kha g+haM/byA bi ti khaM b+ha/saM ru tsa khaM g+hu/a nai ma khaM b+ha/yo tsa nA khai g+h+rA/shi khi khe g+ne/bi d+d+ho mi da kha g+ha/uMk+Sho mu kha b+ha/U ro kha g+h+ra/ak+Shi kha g+ha/a bad ma no kha g+d+ha/
201b7(mdo sde): rU pa kha g+hA /yA bang bi dz+nyA na khaM g+ta/tsuk+Shu d+hu d+ya kha g+ha/yA pad ma no bod+hA d+hAd+ya kha g+ha/br-i ba bI d+h+r-i ta kha g+ha/yA bde bidz+nyA na b+hUHkha g+h+na/tsaut+ta smr-i t+yA bas+the na kha g+h+na/yA bed A bo na ka/
202a1(mdo sde): g+huHs+'u k+ShaH/swA bang nAH/m+b+ha/ can/ /ananas s+'u n+danA/s+yA rA na na/san pa ldan nu/ b+hU nAn/a ts+tshin+dan//b+h+ya
202a2(mdo sde): i le i i le/i i le mi le swA hA//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dngang rgyal pos khyod la stong pa nyid dang rjesu mthun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lag so//de
202a3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legaso zhes bya ba gnangango //sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legaso zhes bya ba byin te/bsam
202a4(mdo sde): gtan dang ldan pa dag ni ma gtog so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
202a5(mdo sde): 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/lhag chad med pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjesu mthun pa'i gzungs sngags rgya cher
