271b7(mdo sde): spro bar byos//dze sto shAMka bu tshogs bcas bsad nus na//klu rnams kyi ni yul yang mchog tu gyur//de nas bdud sho tshul khrims rten de bdud kyi gnas de nas srog chags
272a1(mdo sde): brgyad khri dang lhan cig cha so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sngon gyi smon lam mthar phyin pas drang srong thub pa thams cad dbang du mdzad/sems
272a2(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu smin par mdzad/sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi cho 'phrul byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyu mthun pa bshad pa yang dag par bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272a3(mdo sde): chen po thams cad skyo bar mdzad/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas mi dang /mi ma yin pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar mdzad/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad shin tu
272a4(mdo sde): yongasu sbyong ba mdzad//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di mchog tu ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang //ches skal pa dang ldan pa dang /chos
272a5(mdo sde): bsod namos kyi sa bon byed pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi mchod par 'os pa mdzad/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
272a6(mdo sde): pabargyun bcad//de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri ni sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud par gyur te/de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das
272a7(mdo sde): kye shes pa so sor sbyang so//de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rgyu mthun pa'i cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi ting 'dzin stongs rgyun bcad pa dang /de'i
272b1(mdo sde): sngon ji ltar bzhugs pa bzhin du yang dag par snang ste/de de ltar shin tu lha me//lhan ne/lhang nger bzhugs so//de de'i bar du'ang ra shi zi brjid kyi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs
272b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas bzhug go//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob
272b3(mdo sde): sto bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /dri dang /phye ma dang /rin po che dang /ras bcos bu dang /chos gos dang /phyeng 'phrul dang //rgyan sna tshogs dang /rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs
272b4(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa byas te/bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha
272b5(mdo sde): ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /srul po dang /lus srul po dang /mi dang /mi ma
272b6(mdo sde): yin pa thams cad kyi byar de drag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /dri dang /phye ma dang /rin po che sna tshogs dang /ras bcos bu dang /chos gos dang /phyung
272b7(mdo sde): 'phrul dang /rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas mchod pa'i bar du byas te/bskor ba byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//bdud shor ba tshul
273a1(mdo sde): khrims rten bdud kyi ris brgyad khri dang de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir babs nas/dge sbyong gau ta mas sku yangs pa kun tu bstan pa ji ltar rgyun bcad pa mthong ste/de
273a2(mdo sde): yul ma ga d+hA na bzhugs par kun tu snang //de bdag cag gis skrag pas sgyu'i stangs las ma nyams sam snyam zhing /da lta na 'khor dang bcas te/'dus pa'i nang du 'dug na/de
273a3(mdo sde): taha dag cag phyir 'dug nas sdig pa mi byed dam snyam ste/gang bdag cag gis der dang por song nas 'di la rgyu gang yin par 'gyur ba mnyan par bya gor ma chag snya mo//de nas bdud shor
273a4(mdo sde): /kha tshul khrims rten 'khor dang bcas te de nas babs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/de'i tshe'ang des tshigasu bcad
273a5(mdo sde): ba spobs par byas pa/khyod kyis nad ni chen po dag/rga shi'i mche las ma rgal to//'di ltar sems can slu byed na/byang grol du ni ji ltar zhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das
273a6(mdo sde): kye bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten la tshigasu bcad nas slar bka' stsal pa/nga ni sems can chu bo rgal//nga la yong srid med pa yin//sems can rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir//
273a7(mdo sde): srog chaDa rnaMs la chos ston to//'khor bar yun rings brtsams na su//khyod kyis byang chub phyir spyad//mar me mdzad ni tshun chad du//sbyin dang tshul khrims kun tu skyabs
273b1(mdo sde): sas rgyas bye ba drag stong gro//de dag khyod kyis ri mor byas//rdeg pamachog dan na//da mis khyod la lung bstan te//sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun tu spyad//mtshan ma med par rnam par bcwos
273b2(mdo sde): nga yis mig rnam dag pa sbyin//sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par byos//de nas bdud shor 'i tshul khrims rten sngon gyi tshe rabs dang //smon lam dang /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba
273b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bskul pos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'ongs par gyur te/gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas zil mo rab tu sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom
273b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang /mos pa ji lta ba dang /sems 'khrug pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pa 'chags lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nongs pa 'chags lagaso//'di ltar bdag
273b5(mdo sde): gis dran legs te/grangs ma mchis pa gcig rdzogs par bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa spyad lag so//dge
273b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sbyang ba mang du bgyis lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams bzhugs pa brgya stong phrag bye ba la bdag gis bsnyen bkur ba dang bkur sti
273b7(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te chos kyang thos lagaso//smon lam yang btab lag so//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab lel dge slong la la nyan thos kyi gtam rjesu bskul bar
274a1(mdo sde): bgyid lags te/de nas bdag gis ma bsams par kye ma dge slong gi lus byad kyis gang zag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du nyan thos kyi
274a2(mdo sde): gtam 'chad pa 'di ni bdud do zhes sdig can gyis tshig brjod lags te/der gal te bdag gis sdig can gyi tshig de ma smras par gyur na ni der bdag gis bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs
274a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur lags na/sug las kyi lhag ma dos bdag de nas shi 'phos nas bdud kyi gnasu skyes te/dgung lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /dgung
274a4(mdo sde): lo brgya stong dag du der bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi sems bskyed pa gcig kyang ma byung lags ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/
274a5(mdo sde): zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lani gnyis kyi bar du bzod pa gsol to//ji srid du sngon gyi mtha'i 'khor bar 'khor pa de srid du slad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i mur sems
274a6(mdo sde): can du myal bar gnas par spro lags kyi//bla na ma mchis pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems ldog par ni mi bgyid lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rigs
274a7(mdo sde): kyi bu log so//gang la li snying rje'i sems kyis byang chub tu sems gzhil bar byed na 'di ni 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog dang phul yin te/'dren pa'i spyan sngar la la mar
274b1(mdo sde): me ri rab tsam du 'bar bar byed kyang bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed yongasu bzung ba ma yin gyis khyod longs shig/nga la sdig pa'i las sra ba 'or shing //phung po dang khams 'di dag la smras pa dang /
274b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa dang /'dus byas thams cad dran par byos shig dang /khyod yon tan mchog tu kha lo sbyar bar 'gyu ro//de nas de nyid kyi cha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274b3(mdo sde): po tshul khrims rten gyis rjes mthun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rten stan las langs te/bcom
274b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rin thang med pa'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng gis sku la g.yogs nas gsol pa/gang bdag cag gis chos thams cad myur du rtogs nas dbu ba dang 'dra ba'i lta ba thams cad yang
274b5(mdo sde): dag par 'joms par bgyid pa dang /byang chub tu ni bzod pa mchog thob par 'gyur ba dang /yun ring po mi thogs par sems can thams cad thar par 'gyid pa'i chos ni gang lags gang
274b6(mdo sde): zhig ni byang chub sems dpas spang ba'i slad du bsgom par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshul khrims rten mkhas pas chos bzhi myur du bskyed par bya ste/bzhi
274b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/sems can gyi phyir sdug bsngal tshad med pa thams cad la spro bar bya ba yin//sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi bslab pa dang g.yas pa gzung bar bya ba yin/ma nyams par
275a1(mdo sde): dazung bar bya ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos dngag tu med pa thams cad myur du yo su rtogs par bya ba yin//yang de'i tshe tshul khrims rten gyi 'khor bdud
275a2(mdo sde): kyi sde brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bris lung bstan pa de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa dang po mchog skyes shing bus po skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la lhag pa'i bsam pas
275a3(mdo sde): bzod pa gsol bar gyur to//de'i tshe de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/de dog thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i
275a4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin thob bo//bcom ldan 'das la de dag gis rang rang gi lha rdzas kyi chos gos dag sku la gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod//bdud sdig can gyis mthong ste/mthong
275a5(mdo sde): nas kyang yang shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag nas 'di skad ces smraso//dge sbyong gi ni ltor chud pas/'khor de dag dang bral bar gyur//'di na gang du dong ba ni/thams cad de
275a6(mdo sde): yid dang du song //des su yang phyi rol tu mi 'byung shig/bdud kyi spyod yul 'dir bdag cag gnas par bya'o zhes smras nas myur du grong khyer gyi sgo bcad gab tu bcu'o/de nas
275a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ji ltar na mkha'i spyan las gsungs pa bzhin du de dag la tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnam pa gsum po sems can la dmigs pa dang /chos la dmigs pa
275b1(mdo sde): da ngamigs pa med pa rgya cher bstan par yang dag par brtsam du mdzod//ri khya la ti ra'i rtse bo drang srong thub pa'i gan suk+Sha gang dag rten cing 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gis
275b2(mdo sde): lus chung ngur mthong ste/dper na mig sman bsku ba'i thung ma bzhin//ji ltar sngon gyi lus bzhin du 'ang bzhag par mi nus so//sgyur 'byung bar yang ma nus te/de dag thams cad
275b3(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag la spu zing zhes bya ba'i bai spu'i khung bu byung nas/de dag thams cad kyis dga' bo dang nye dgar la rab tu bdud nas 'di skad ces smras//grang de tshe bdag cag blong du na
275b4(mdo sde): smang dang /sbrang bu mchu rings dang /steng bu gdug pa rnams kun tu byung ba de'i tshe bdag cag gnas thams cad bor nas bskyab pa'i phyir 'dir zhugs nas 'di nas gang du'ang mchi bar ma nus
275b5(mdo sde): telus dag kyu chung gyur lags ni gang gis bdag cag gan su mchi bar bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/mi 'jigs pa stsol bar gsol/dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/
275b6(mdo sde): dge sbyong 'di ni g.yo rgyu can gyis blo//shAkya'i bu po sgyum byed pa yin//sangs rgyas zhing 'dir zhugs par gyur na su//lus kun la ni thams cad chung par gyur//des ni klu rnams
275b7(mdo sde): kun gyi gnas dag tu//sha sbrang sbrang bu mo chu rings sbrang bu sprul//sa 'di bskyob phyir nged cag lhags gyur te//thams cad stobs rnams las ni nyams par gyur//gau ta ma
276a1(mdo sde): ni blo gros g.yo can yang //las des rdzu 'phrul de las nyams gyur cing //de ni lus kyang chung ngur gyur na su//stan gyi stengs na mdangs ni kun tu snang //
276a2(mdo sde): des ni bdag cag lus kyang chung ngur byas//btson ra 'di ni bcings par gyur na su//nged cag ci yang byed par mo nus kyis//mi 'jigs lha la khyed cag phyag 'tshal cig/'dod pa'i
276a3(mdo sde): dbang phyug bdud sdig can la klu de dag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te smras pa/gang bdag cag btson ra de nas 'byer ba dang rang rang gi gnas rnam su gnas por rngo thog par bdag cag
276a4(mdo sde): bskyab tu gsol/klu'i rgyal pos srung gi bus de dag la 'di skad ces spros//bdud dpung bcas pa rang nyid skrag nas su//gau ta ma sgyu ma g.yo sgyu can la skyo//'khor dang lto gol rnams
276a5(mdo sde): kyang g.yo yis//des ni de'i skye bo mang po phrogs//bdud la mthu ni ci yang yod ma yin//'gro ba dang ni rdzu 'phrul de la nyams//gzhan la khyed cag myur du skyabasu dang //lha
276a6(mdo sde): rnams la ni kun gyis rjed par byos//de nas klu thams cad kyang kha cig ni rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal bar byed/kha cig ni brgya byin lo phyag 'tshal bor byed//kha cig
276a7(mdo sde): ni rab 'thab bral la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//kha cig ni yongasu dga' ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//kha cig ni 'phrul dga' la phyag 'tshalo bar byed do//kha cig ni lha'i
276b1(mdo sde): /bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/kha cig ni tshangs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//klu'i rgyal po thams cad la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces smras//lha
276b2(mdo sde): dang lha dang di kun 'khod nos//mchod po rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang /gau ta ma mongangs la thams cad sbyangs gnas pa//khyed cag no hU~M ya~M phyir mo mthong //dka 'brub drug
276b3(mdo sde): srong chen po dag/gzhan rnams la ni srog dge khyed phyag 'tshal//rtas bsrungs mthon pur skar ma dga' ba dang //ngan stong bu la ci phyir phyog mi 'tshal//de nas klu de dag thaMd
276b4(mdo sde): kha cig ni drang srong rab tu dpal ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed//kha cig ni brtan po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//kha cig ni rtas srungs la phyag 'tshal bar byed//kha cig ni mthon por 'phyar la phyag/
276b5(mdo sde): 'tshal bar byed do//kha cig ni skur ma la dga' ba la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//kha cig ni drang srong ngan spong gi bu la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag po
276b6(mdo sde): skya su bar //ya de'i tshe drung blo mngon par shes palta dang ston pa de dgu gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngas la drang srong skar ma lo dge' ba'i mdun na shAkya khyu mchog yon tan bsdugs
276b7(mdo sde): po nyin cing la da do//drang srong de dag gis klu thams cad 'dzid 'dzi pa khris//thos nas kyang drang srong lnga po de dag sbyin las langs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la
277a1(mdo sde): dka' bul 'di skad ces smras//btsam ldan 'das drang srung thub pa'i gnas na du klu khams cad gnod par gyur rdzong bdag cag la m+b+ha ma nyaM bar gnas pa gags/
277a2(mdo sde): sam bzhengs te der bzhud la klu'i sde thams cad mang suM thar bar mdzod cig/des smras pa/khyed dang ni/lha dang /klu dang /gnad sbyin brgya stong phrag mong po 'di dag nga'i mdun du
277a3(mdo sde): 'khod nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa yongasu 'dri bar byed/ngas de dag gi sems yongasu mgu bar bya'o//de nas skar ma la dga' ba'i'o rkang pa gnyis la drang srong de dag thams cad mag
277a4(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ste drang srong thub pa'i gnas kyi gzhi rten du 'khod do//de nas de dag la klu de dag mgo bos phyage btsal te 'di skad ces
277a5(mdo sde): smraso//khyod bsod nams can shes rab dang ldan pa thabs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drang srong chen po lags na bdag cag yong su bskyab par gsol/btson ra'i 'jigs pa 'di las bdag
277a6(mdo sde): /yong su dgrol bar gsol/de nas drang srung de dag gis 'di skad ces smras//de kyis ni khyed 'di nas yongasu grol bar byed par mi numos//lag 'gro'i bdag po dag gangs kyi nub phyogs
277a7(mdo sde): kyi ngos la drang srong thams cad kyi bla ma dang che bar grags pa/shes rab dang thabs dang /gauzi brjid chen pos rgyas bskor ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/des khyed 'di nas maungasu dril
277b1(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur ro//de la phyag 'tshol cig/de thos nas klu thams cad drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas dbyangs gcig gis 'o dod poso//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
277b2(mdo sde): drang srong gi cha byad can drang srong skar ma la dga' ba lha dang /mi'am ci dang /gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang pos mdun du bdar cing yongasu bskor te/de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas drang srong thub pa'i gnas
277b3(mdo sde): der yang phyin par gyur te/de la klu thams cad mgo bos phyag btsal te gus pa mchog skyes nas 'di skad ces smras//gang bdag cag rang gi gnasu mtshos nas dga' bar 'gyur pa bdag cag yongasu
277b4(mdo sde): bskyab pa gsol/gan+da 'di na bdag cag yongasu dgrol ba gsol/dus shre ba dus la blta ba drang srong chen po des kyang rkyen gyi dbang gis de dag la rgyu skar gyi go rims kyi gtam brtsams pa/ji ltar thams cad thar 'gyur
277b5(mdo sde): bo//de bzhin du ni shes par bya//khyed la phan pa gzhan med kyis//mthar gyis su ni mnyan par gyis//'dir ni nam so gang gnas pa//de ni dbyar zla tha chungs te//de ni nyi ma
277b6(mdo sde): lha yin zhing //klu rnams kun dang 'brel pa yis//skar ma'i dpyad ni phangs pa dang //snying por drang srong sbyor bas bstan//gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams//na mkha' la ni su yis
277b7(mdo sde): bzhag/mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bgyid pa//lo skor shes pa bshad du gsol//zla ba nyi ma rgyu skor dang //gza' rnams 'gro ba ji ltar lags//zla ba rnams kyi dang por ni//
278a1(mdo sde): rgyu skar gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur//zla ba'i yud tsam gang zhig lags//go rims kya na ci 'dra lags//lhan ci lags rus ci lags//lce bci lags
278a2(mdo sde): yang bgang //phan pa ci legs gnod pa ci//stobs bci bdag la myur du gsungs//gang gisuni mtshan mo 'thob//nyi ma'i mdun na ci nag lags//grib ma'i gom pa du zhig tu//nyi
278a3(mdo sde): ma 'khor bar bgyid pa lags/zla ba gang la lho phyogasu//nyi ma byeng du ji ltar gnas//drang srong khyod la kun zhun//bdag cag la ni kun ston cig/shes rab chen pos 'jig
278a4(mdo sde): rten mkhas//skar la dga' bas de skad smras//duskal pa bzang po zhugs pa na//sngon chad byung bkyi lag 'gro/dpal ldan grong khyer lnga lon du//'dod pa spangs shing chos
278a5(mdo sde): dang ldan//gtsang ma 'dod cing rab mkhas pa'i//mi rgyal 'byor pa chen po byung //de yi btsun mo dam pa ni//'dod pa rnams le'i chu mas gyur nas//de tshe yul ni dben par yang //
278a6(mdo sde): gzu lums can dang lhan cig spyad//mngal ni sbyin por bya ba'i phyir//yang dang yang du spyad nasu//de tshe chos kyis sbrum par gyur//mi sdug pa yi khye'u zhig byung //bung du
278a7(mdo sde): migo la bong mgrin po//bong rnaM pa la bang gdong gi//thams cad rtsub po ral pa can/kau mi mi lus ni phyed yong ba//de mthong 'jigs nis myur dun//sna ma phye sa ri ni de zer/
278b1(mdo sde): sar+b+ba marung mi gtsang ba//dpyir srin mo byung mos blangs//ga sa ky-i gan su song nas smra//bul chags pas gsos pa yin//bcud kyis lan 'thungs pas na//dri tshe lha dang lhan cig
278b2(mdo sde): 'grogs//shes rab chen po skal ldan po//rab tu badzin ldan snying rje'i sems//gzi brjid chen po byams pa thob//sems can kun la phan byed pa'o//lha yi tshogs kyang 'dus nas
278b3(mdo sde): smad rje bong la ni phyag 'tshal nas//de la'ang n-i snying rtse'i phyir//gangs kyi ro basprul ba byes//shong dang me tog 'dus bur ldan//dri zhim dga' bar byed pa ste//sna chog
278b4(mdo sde): yis khengs pa la//d+ha rnams sna tshogs rten pa yin+da//dor ni drang srong rnga bong de//rnam par dben par rten nas//yon drug khro rngam par yang //rkang po gcig gis dkri 'a thub gnas/
278b5(mdo sde): brgya byin tshangs pas phyag byas te//lha rnams kun gyis mngon par bstod//gzugs rten lha rnams thams cad dang //der ni tshangs pa nye bar 'ongs//'dod rten lha rnams thams cad
278b6(mdo sde): dang /der ni brgya byin nye bar 'ongs//klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum dag/thams cad der ni nye bar lhags//'jig rten gang su mkhas pa ni//drang srong tshangs por spyod pa rnams//
278b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams pa//thams cad dor ni nye bar lhags//kun gyi drang srong rnga bong la//mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas//'du nas thal mo sbyar byos te//
279a1(mdo sde): rkyen tshangs pas 'di skad smras//skam ldan chen po kyi khyod na//skye sbyor do la mngon par dga'//rab ci 'dra dri la bsams//ci 'dod pa ni smra ba dgyes//dang /
279a2(mdo sde): slong rnga bong gis smras pa//gza' dang rgyu skur skar ma rnams//mkha' la ci 'drar byung gyur do'o//sngon gyi bskal pa bdag gis dran//nyin zhag du ni rgyu skar rnams//re ra nas
279a3(mdo sde): rgyu bar byed//tshe rabs kun tu rgyu skar gyi//yon tan las rnams rnam par shes//bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni//'di ni ci yang mi snang na//snying brtser gyis de khyod kyis ni/
279a4(mdo sde): ts+tshaskar go rams kun zhog cig/ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir gnas bzhin//de yi las dang yon tan gsungs//yon tan rgyu mtshos shong cag ces//lha yi 'tshogs rnams
279a5(mdo sde): kun gyis smras//drang srong rngu bong gis smras pa//re zhig dang por smin drug ces//rgyu skar dkyil 'khor thams cad la//nang gi dang por gzhag par bya//ji ltar sprismin drug gzhag
279a6(mdo sde): pa bzhin//'di la su shig dad pa 'brel//lha yi bu ni nyi ma yang //skar ma drug po ston par byed//smin drug rgyu skar de dag ni//mkha' la rtag tu rgyu bar shog/thams
279a7(mdo sde): cad ldan pa'i 'khor dga' nas//me lha zhig ni sprul pa byas//gzi brjid chen po drang srong lha//me bzhin 'jug gos bus smras pa//bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'odi dag/gling bzhi par
279b1(mdo sde): ni gnas par shog/drang srong rnga bong slar smras pa//dang por smin drug de dag yin//rgyu skar chu yi rus tsa ni//gnyis pa yang ni yin par bya//skye dgu'i bdag gis 'di skad smras//bdag gis
279b2(mdo sde): bu lnga dbul lags te//rus ni drang srong chen po chu//rab tu brtson ldan snar ma legs//chu yi rus kyi rgyu skar ni//snar ma'i ming gis gnyis pa lags//zla ba'i bu pa gsum po ni/
279b3(mdo sde): ming ni mgo zhes bgyi ba lags//ba ra dwa dza'i rus su ni//mgo zhes bgyi ba bzhag pa lags//rab tu mi zad lag ces bya//lha drag rnams kyis bstan pa lags//ljang sngo'i bu yi
279b4(mdo sde): bu rus su//de ni bzhi par gzhag pa lags//dang srong bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyis//nyi ma'i bu ni bstan lags te//na ba so lags shing gnas 'jogs rus//phur bu'i bu ni gsum
279b5(mdo sde): legs te//lagi bu yi rus lags shing //rgyal zhes bgyi bar de dag bshad//sa srung go ni bu lnga po//brtul zhugs spyod pa mkhas pa rnams//mdza' ba'i bu yi rus lags
279b6(mdo sde): te/de ltar de dag rgyu sbyar bdun//shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnamasu gzhag/de'i las dang go rims dang //sbyor ba kha 'dzin gzhungs las bstan//ngas kyang yang ni khyed cug lnga//gleng
279b7(mdo sde): gzhi pa ni gnas byed cing //las ni ci 'dra sgrub byed pa//mdor ni myur du bshad par bya//phur bu ya ni bu lnga po//byang grol brtul zhugs 'chang ba dag/ser skya'i bu yi rus
280a1(mdo sde): su ni//lho yi phyogasu ngas gzhag/dbyangs can gyi ni bu gnyis po//ming gis kyang ni gre yin te//drang srong gau ta ma rus su ni//lho yi phyogasu ngas gzhag/lha
280a2(mdo sde): mo yi ni bu gnyis po//ming gis kyang ni dab yin te//ko Di n+ya yau rus su ni//lho phyogs kha 'dzin gsum pa ga zhag/sdig pa yi ni bu bstan pa//drang srong kA ti'i bu yi rus//lhar bcas
280a3(mdo sde): drang srong rnams kyis der//me bzhi zhes ni bya bar gzhag/dri za'i bu ni nag pa ste//kA tA'i bu'i rus yin no//sa ri de ni ma'i bu//ka tA'i bu chen rus yin no//'dir ni sa ga dpal
280a4(mdo sde): gyi bu//k+Sha tA'i bu rgan rus yin te//drang srong rnams kyis rgyu skar bdun//lho phyogs kha 'dzin rnamasu gzhag/'ja' bo'i bu yi bu bzhi po//drag po'i bu yi rus yin te//ming
280a5(mdo sde): gis lha mtshams zhes bya ba//nub phyogasu ni gzhag pa yin//dbang po yi ni bu gsum ste//zla ba kA tA'i bu yi rus//'jam pa'i las ni thams cad la//gnyis pa sgro ni gzhag pa yin
280a6(mdo sde): sa yi lha me'i bu gsum ste//snabs ni lag pa'i bu yi rus//rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste//kA tA'i bu yis rus yino//thams cad lha zhes bya ba bzhi//maud+gal bu yi rus yino//
280a7(mdo sde): tshu /rgyuskar gsum bzhin pa men/sra rje rdzun rdzu ga/ zhin la /shin dug
280b1(mdo sde): la rdzus//dem+b+ha de dgan myur dun//na byanas sbyin nA smin+da//nAd+hAd+ha na man sas+ho//nArgan sa na/nan 'dun ga kunab+h+yo/
280b2(mdo sde): sri ma yin drung //nam sa ldan/mamaldan klu gnas pa yin//rkyen du s+t+wa~Ms te//mas skyed rjes ni bya bar drwa sh-ig/chu rkyen bya'i chus kun//gas
280b3(mdo sde): pa 'di ni gnog pa yin//l-I y-i drang sring chu lha'i zla//kha mos smad kyis ni bya bar bshad//bye nye drang srong dus yin par//ni daM 'di ni gnog pa yin//b+h+rUM mi dring srong rgyal gyi blo//rnam//
280b4(mdo sde): g+hu zhes bya de bstan te//drang sopa bang po'i dus du ni//lAM pa 'di ni gan gro pa yin//dri na'i rgyal po'i bu gsu ma ste//rtswa len du mi nus yin zhing //d+hU skAr bskor zhes bya ba//'dzi
280b5(mdo sde): mkhyem pa rnams kyis gzhug/drag po bu ni gsum yin te//byaste ngan spo rus min//rgyu skar bdun pa de dag ni//byid phyogs kha pa ni rnam su gan//rgya skar nyi
280b6(mdo sde): brgyad do//khe 'dzin pa nir ni gzhung sa ba shud//gat+to mo sa dang yin+da tan rnams/ya nA yi sno shud par bya//thams cad rab tu thal sbyar ladzang//sgra dang sh+lod
280b7(mdo sde): las skyes rnams kyis//drang sring rje khong la ni spros//mi dge sngon du 'gro ba'i las//gang byas khyed ni mi sma skyes//gang du thams cad myur zad 'gyur//'din myed mi rnam
281a1(mdo sde): dang /drang srong dag ni zhi ba rnams//thams cad gzugs ni 'azang por gyur//rig dang snyan ldan de dag kun//drang srong rnga dong de la ni//brgya byin lhan
281a2(mdo sde): cig 'khod na su//'khor kun rangs te thal sbyar gyur//bsam pa gcig tu smras pa ni//na mkha' 'di la rgyu skar ni//gang zhig dang por rgyu bar byed//kha zasu ni tso zo shod//
281a3(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ni las ci sgrub//yid ni ji srid rgyu bor byed//drang srong de dag thams cad la//rnga bong gis ni ji skad smras//ji ltar nga yis brjod pa bzhin//'dir ni khyod kyis dad pa phul
281a4(mdo sde): rgyu skar 'di la ngas mchog byin//de ni khyod la brjod par bya//go rims shes pa de bdag bzhin//gling bzhi'i sems can dran pa'i phyir//la skor yang ni shes par bya//dang
281a5(mdo sde): par nyi ma gang yin pa//nges byas pa ni ngo yi mig/bu drug g.yo can sems rangs pa//de ni nga yis dang por brjod//de yi phyir na smin drug ni//rgyu skar tshegs ni thams cad du
281a6(mdo sde): nang gi gtso bor 'gyur bar shog/zla ba nya dang nyi ma yi//nyin mtshan de dag mnyam par gnas//mtshan mo bzhin ni mun khyab dang //chu lha yang ni gnas par 'gyur//
281a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba bzod pa bgrang ba dang //bra nye gnas bzhin 'di ltar bshad//mon sran bcu drug brgyar bsgyur te//skyes bu dang ni brgyad pa gcig/brgyad pa phrag ni bcu drug la//
281b1(mdo sde): chano gcog tu 'gyur ba yin//rtani drug cu bamA pa lA//yu ts+tsham cig na de yin//de tsam yud rnam sur rgyal//'dir ni 'jig rten gnas pa yin//ri rab ga yas nas bskor ba
281b2(mdo sde): yud cem sum cus 'gro bar byed//'dir ni mon srin tshad ma za//bye ba nyung ngu bsgrub par gyis//rgyal po nad pas 'gro dkun//zhag bcu rnam pazlar bar gyis//rtag tu
281b3(mdo sde): dad pa me tshon chas bsrungs//mchog sbyin khyod kyis bu skye gang //tshong pa dbang po thul ba dang //chos kyi blo gros nab so la//mngal du nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur//'dir ni
281b4(mdo sde): grel bya ba mang //chu smad bla nye gsum pa yon//me zin snar ma gro bzhi ni//nor chung byed par 'gyur ba yin//sbubs dang skrag dang na ma g+ha ni//lngas ngag gi ni rgyu skar yin
281b5(mdo sde): khyams stong dang ni snron dang ni//rgyal dang yang ni khrums slang ni//phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin//mchu dang chu stong tha sgur dang //mun grwa dang ni smin drug dang //dbo zhes
281b6(mdo sde): byi ba dag gis ni//bde bsgrub par byed pa yin//'dir ni mgo dang nag pa dang //mon gru dang ni mon gre dang //sa ri l-ig ni rnam drug gis//glegs pa dang ni grogs mchog 'gyur//
281b7(mdo sde): lha yi dbang pos 'di skad smras//don gyi tshe na ches gnyis la//yud tsam sum cur mi zad par//bya phyir mkha' la khyod gnas kyis//khyod kyis kyang ni la phug dang //bu ram
282a1(mdo sde): sal gnas par gyis//nad pa zhag ni rgyu gsum khyol//da ltar skye dgu skyed med//shin tu tshul 'tshal snying rje smrangs//mchod sbyin dang nan
282a2(mdo sde): ba dang //sngon la skye tshe rtag tu ni//mngal du mtshams sbyor bsrung bar gyis//nag pa dang na mon grwa dang //mgo la grags pa mang du byed//bye zhin dang ni gre dang dog/
282a3(mdo sde): dag gi ni rgyu sker yin//khyams stong dang ni khrums smad ni//chung byed chu dang chu stong dang //tha skar phun sum tshogs par byed//skabs dang skrag dang nam gru dang //mon gre me bzhi
282a4(mdo sde): snar ma ni//bde ba sgrub par byed pa yin//pra nye dang ni gre dang ni//chu smad mdza' bo'i mchog tu 'gyur//khyams stod dang ni si ri dang //mon gru dang ni nab so dang //sa pra
282a5(mdo sde): dang ni lag kyang ni//'dir ni rnam pa drug tu 'gyur//lha yi drang srong dris gsob kyis//snabs bshad pa ni ches gsum la//yud tsam sum cur na mkha' la//bya ba
282a6(mdo sde): chung khyod gnas kyis//bas ni 'bras bu la phug dang //bdug pa deng me tog ste//zhag ni sum tshur bdag nyid kyis//nad pa yang ni thar bar byed//gang zhig spyod par byed
282a7(mdo sde): pas ni//skye dgu mi skye nor dang 'bru//skal ldan skyes bu'i rnam pa dang //sa laM las ni byed par 'gyur//mgo la mngal du mtshams sbyor ba//rta dang yang ni rnga mo dang //glang
282b1(mdo sde): poche dang khyu mchog dang //dred dang bcas pa'i rnam par 'gying //chu snod drung ni gre pA ni//bra nye dang ni gsum pa ste//'dzin bu'i rgyur 'gyur skag dang stabs//de la 'phel bar
282b2(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur//nam gri bzung dang mnyam 'gyur te//mon g+hu las ni rgyu skar yin//khyams spyod ces ni bya ba yang //de la rgud par byed par 'gyur//lha mtshams na sa
282b3(mdo sde): gsum pa yin//lag ni de la rgud byed 'gyur//sa ga dang na mon gre yang //gsum pa zhes ni bya ba yin//tha skar de la skyeng par 'gyur//chu snod zla ba gnyis pa ste//
282b4(mdo sde): snron dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang //dri la bde bar byed par 'gyur//khrums smad ces ni bya ba ni//grogs dang grogs po mchog tu 'gyur//drug po 'di dge lag dang ni//gro
282b5(mdo sde): sbyin sbyar ma gsum pa yin//sprin drug ces ni bya ba yang //byi bzhin dang ni dpo yin//'di ni khron pa sa rir gyur//me lha yin te sags ba shad//gling bzhir chos na
282b6(mdo sde): bco lnga la//khyed spyod yud tsam bini bcu lngas//'gro bar byed cing bya ba ni//chen po mi zad pa yis gnas//zhag ni bco lnga rnam par yang //nad pa yang ni thar par
282b7(mdo sde): gyis/dasu zhig kyang ni khyed kyi bur//dge par rjesu skye 'gyur ba//gzi brjid dang ni dpal dang ni//longs spyod dga' ba 'bar bar 'gyur//bud med brnab sems shin tu
283a1(mdo sde): smras//de skye'i rgyusar lag yin//de'i las rgyu sang dron bre sbyin//mchu dang bskur chu stong rgya//sprin drug ces ni bya bra la//de ni 'chi bar 'gyur bya yin//
283a2(mdo sde): byi bzhin dang ni ngan yang ni//'dir ni chud par byed pa yin//khyams stod de ni sngon dang ni//nabs yang ni gsum s+ho//'i tshoms zhes ni bya bar ying //de ni phun sum tshogs
283a3(mdo sde): spyod yin//nab so khyams stong sgrungs dang ni//nam gru skyed ni 'di byed ni ma/ dang yang ni chu smad dang //gsum pa bra nye sgrub pa yin//mdza' bo dang ni mdza' mchog tu//de dag der ni
283a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin//nAH/ba snor mi mon gru bzhin//mig gnyis mo bani gro bzhin yang //'drir ni de bdun lho phyogs kyi//kha 'o na drugs zhes bya ba yin//'phags pa shin tu rgyas
283a5(mdo sde): pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mang//bam po bcu pa//mdza' shes kyi ni lha mo yis//yar gyi ngo yis chos gcig la//'gro bar byed pa'i go rims kyang //lho mtsha
283a6(mdo sde): la ni smras pa yin//bre nye chos ni bco lnga yi//nyin por yang nAM yud tsa ma yin//mtshan mo yang ni de tsam ste//nyin mtshan gcig la brany+tsa yin//chu yi lha mo de yang ni//nyin dang
283a7(mdo sde): mtshan du mnyam paste//dud tsam sum cu them pa ste//de'i longs spyod cing cig shig/rgyal po legs brtan snying rje sbangs//mthun par yul 'khor skyong ba bzhin//de bzhin du ni mi
283b1(mdo sde): zad pa'i//bla nye yang ni 'gro bar shog/'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog/de bzhin khyed cag thams cad kyis//de la dmad pa bor bar gyis//de bzhin 'gro la bstan par gyis//kun gyis
283b2(mdo sde): sngas pa/de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog/mi zad pa yi bya ba gyis//khyod kyis spyod pas gang skye ba//mi yi thu bo mi zad 'gyur//de yi mngal 'jug chu stod yin//bre nye la ni skyes pa'i mi//
283b3(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i tshe na lha mtshams dang //khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin//'di la mkhas pas brtag bya ste//sa ri mon grum ma yin gzhi//dmag 'gro rtsod pa'i gnas dag gis//bye spang smra
283b4(mdo sde): gri'i las mi bya//snar ma me bzhi bya bzhi ni//nung byed dgra rnams khyod kyi gzhom//khyod kyi las ni che chung kun//gri yi tshe na bya bar gyis//chu smad dang ni dbo yang ni//phun sum tshogs
283b5(mdo sde): par byed par brjod//sman rnams brten bya sbyin dang dul//gos dang rgyan gyi bya ba'ang brjod//mgo dang nag pa zhes bya dang //gro bzhin mchu ni bde par byed//sa ga nab so man gre ste//
283b6(mdo sde): de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin//skag dang snabs zhes bya ba dang //tha skar dang ni mchu dang gre/grogs po mchog tu 'gyur ba yin//bsgrub tu mi rungs las kyang gyis//'di tshe khri
283b7(mdo sde): bzhon gos dang mal//mdza' bo rnams la'ang brtsam par bya//nyi ma'i bu ni mig dmar te//drang srong chen po der dbang btsugs//bcu gnyis khyim dus gnas de nas//der yod las
284a1(mdo sde): mthun grib gom drug/der ni dus kyung mnyam pa yin//nyin dang mtshan kyang mtshungasmra bla yin//de yod pa slar mtshan ma krung //khyu mtshams sbyin par gnas
284a2(mdo sde): ban//khyod kyis nga ni spang bar gyis//mkha' la spyod cing khyod kyis ston//gling bzhi pa ni mthu bya phyir//'di ni ji ltar lhags pa bzhin//ngas 'dir gA zhig yang dag brjod//lha yi
284a3(mdo sde): dradu skyong kun dga'agyur//de bzhin khyod ni kun tu song //smin drug de bzhin me yi lha//bdag nyid gling ba ni der gnas shing //khyod kyis me bzhin myur bya gyis//yud tsam sum cur chal
284a4(mdo sde): dustong //der gang mi yi zas 'byung ba//dam pa'i grags dang longs spyod kyang //zla nya khyod 'dir ying legs rdzogs//de ltar nga yis thob pa yin//zhag bzhi tham par nad pa ni//myur
284a5(mdo sde): ba kho nar thar par gyis//mngal du 'jug pa me bzhi bsrungs//chu stod 'chi bar byed pa yin//skrag khrums stod smad nab so dang //mon gre 'phel bar byed pa yin//khyod kyis bya ba 'di springs
284a6(mdo sde): shig/dmag dang rtsod pa'i gnas 'gro dang //spu br-i yi ni las rnamaso//gro bzhin dang ni nag pa dang //mgo ni rgud par byed pa yin//lagri dang dponi 'dor 'joms byed//bye ba'i
284a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'di kyis shig/tshe dang chung ba gang ci yang //sner mas phun sum tshogs par byed//phyi bzhin dang ni nag pa ri bcas//der ni bya ba gang rtsi dang //gome pa sbyin pa gos dang mol
284b1(mdo sde): der ni rgyan gyis brgyan par bya//lag ni bde bar byed pa ste//mon gru dang ni sa ri yang //gsum po dag ni de dag yin//lam du 'jug pa'ang de dag yin//rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod ni//las
284b2(mdo sde): dag sgrub par byed pa yin//mchu sbubs skrag dang khams smad dang //de dang de rnams drag byed grogs//skal bzang ngag ma gtong dang banon//mal yang der ni de bya ste//khyim dang dus shes bya ba
284b3(mdo sde): dang /gza' rnams bdag gis brjod pa yin//de ltar bdag gis dus kun brjod//khyod ci drang srong lha mi dga'//bdag gis byed bshad pa bzhin//lha dbang drang srong 'khor dang bcas//mi
284b4(mdo sde): yis thal sbyar 'di skad smras//'byung po kun la phan pa khyod//'gro ba la ni skyob pa khyod//de ltar shes mnyam ji bzhin khyod//yang smras pa//rnga bong can gyi drang srong ste//snar ma chu yi rigs/
284b5(mdo sde): kyang yin//chu yi lha mi khyod yin na//gsum par yang ni 'gro bar gyis//byed pa chung dang 'bring yin zhing //bzhi bcu rtsa lnga thim pa yin//yud tsam du ni khyod kyis 'gro/dug dang sha ni zas
284b6(mdo sde): yin no//khyod la spyod par byed pa yis//gang dag mi rnams skye 'gyur ba//de dag phyug cing chos dang ldan//zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos//de 'dir khyod kyis bstan par gyis//
284b7(mdo sde): bzhin nam gros mang lo du 'jug/'chi ba sbubs dang mchu bzhin to//rgyal dang lha mchims khrums stong 'phel//dmag 'gri bag ma gtong ba yi//gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa dang /
285a1(mdo sde): nya tshong dang ni ban byed pa//de 'dra ba mi bya ba spros//sa ri mon gru de dag 'dir//rgung byed dag 'dir gnom par bya//me bzhi las kyi rgyu skar yin//
285a2(mdo sde): chung thams cad 'dir gyis shig/mgo drung nag pa gro bzhin te//de dag phun sum tshogs par byed//rtsi byed na yod de dge sten//der byin gos rgyan sna tshogs sgro gas//nab so
285a3(mdo sde): dang ni sa ga dang //mon gre bde bar byed pa ste//de dag la ni lam du 'jug/snron ni sgrub par byed pa yin//skag ces bya ba khrums smad ni//drag po'i las dag byed pa yin//chu
285a4(mdo sde): stod chu smad tha skar dang //bla nye khrums stong chu smad mdza'//dngos ni skal ba bzang po sbyin//brtson pa dang ni bzhon pa dang //mal dang khri ni bshem pa yang //'di la bya ba de 'jug
285a5(mdo sde): go/yang smras pa//'gro ba bzhi dang ldan par ni//mgo la khyod ni gnas par 'gyur//mi yi las bya myur du sgrubs//yud tsam sum cu 'gro bar gyis//zhag brgyad
285a6(mdo sde): nad pa myur du gsos//khyed zas tshon sha zla ba'i lha//der ni skyes dgu gang dag skye//dpa' zhing 'byor par 'gyur ba yon//khyab 'jug bden 'di shin tu bsrungs//de byed
285a7(mdo sde): ji bzhin nga yos bshad//gro bzhin tha skar mngal du 'jug/chu gnyis gre dpe 'chi bar byed//snron gyi tshe ni bya ba 'phel//skag dang gzhan bcas thob par byed//lamo dang
285b1(mdo sde): dro dang gnas nas 'gro/bya ba de 'dra spang bar gyis//nub sa rgud par byed pa ste//mon gros ga bzhin du shos//gsang pa'i gnas banon brnam par gyis//brdzun g.yo dmangs
285b2(mdo sde): 'joms par byed//nag po las kyi rgyu skar te//'di la che chung thams tsud rtso mo//lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed//mon gru sa ri gzhan thob byed//'dir ni sman dang sbyin 'dul bzhon
285b3(mdo sde): rgyan dang gos kyang thob par byed//rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod bde//de dag lam du shin tu 'phrod//skabs dang nam bya mchu sgrub byed//'di la gtum po'i los kyang bya//
285b4(mdo sde): ma bzhi dgra zin bra nye dang //snar ma dper med chu gnyis bzhin//skal bzang bag ma gtong dang bzhon//mi la kun 'dir ni byed du chug/lag lhu drag mos de tshe smras//chos
285b5(mdo sde): lnga la ni khyod gnas te//yud tsam bco lnga khyod 'gro byed//khyod kyi zas ni ma ra sar te//drag cing mi zad snang byed sgrub//nod pa yin zhag bcu yin//khyod la spyod pas mi
285b6(mdo sde): gang skye//srid pa gsum du mi zad 'gyur//nor tshol byed cing tshom pos 'chi//khyod kyi sbyor bas de yin//mi ni gru snabs la mngal du 'jug/chu dang nam grus 'phel bar
285b7(mdo sde): 'gyur//dpe yi tshe na 'chi bar byed//chu gnyis bra ste ji bzhin no//skye dang 'jig dang 'phel ba yi//byed pa de ni spong bar gyis//lha mtshams dang ni khrums stod der//byed
286a1(mdo sde): pa bstan nas chud par byed//sa ri las kyi rgyu skang yin//byed pa chung nguthams cad 'jug/sag dang ni ron+da dang //nang so phun sum tshogs par byed//khru ma smang
286a2(mdo sde): pabar ni bde byed yin//snron dang skag ne lam ni mnyam//pre ni sgrub par byed pa ste//chu stod tha skAr gsum pa yin//me bzhi'i bar gzhan grogs mchog ste//smin drug nagi pa
286a3(mdo sde): gro bzhin dang //byi bzhin bag ma gtong dang bzhon//mal dang skal pa bzang por sgrub//nyi ma'i lha mon pa sos smras//tshes drug la yang gnas par 'gyur//sbrul shar khyod kyi
286a4(mdo sde): su shod//las kyang drag por bya bar gyis//yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'gro//'dir ni nad pa zhag brgyad yin//khyod spyang su yang mi nang skye//zhing pa longs spyod ldan par
286a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/rta dang glang chen zad par 'gro//nab sos mngal du 'jug par 'gyur//'di ni mon bre'i zas yin te//smin drug lo ni 'chi bar byed//khrums smad rgud par byed pa yin
286a6(mdo sde): skag snron las kyi rgyu skar yin//sa ga brtul zhugs bstan pa yin//rgyal yang phun sum tshogs par byed//lag dang lho mtshams zhes bya dang //khyams stod kyang ni bde bar
286a7(mdo sde): mchu dang nir bla bzhin du skye//de dag lam du zhugs na zang //bra nye chu smad bre dang dbo//sgrub byed nag pa gro bzhin dang //sa r-i sngar ma mgo min gru//mi yin
286b1(mdo sde): khyod grogs mchog 'gyur//rgyal 'dir lha mo phur bu khyod//chos bdun gnas khyod yud sum cu//'gro byed bu ram sbrang rtsi zas//chos ldan byed chung myur du skrag/nad kyang zhag lnga
286b2(mdo sde): ljon ste//khyod spyod su yang mi nang skye//tshul dga' chos smras mdun 'don blon//zhing ring bag gtong de dag 'jig/khrums stod dang ni lha mtshams la//mngal du 'jug par byed pa
286b3(mdo sde): ste/dbo dang yang ni tha skar dang //chu smad la ni 'phel bar byed//skar ma nes po blo bzhin 'chi//gsum po de dag shes par gyis//mchu skabs nam gru de dag gsum//rgud byed
286b4(mdo sde): mkhas pas shes par gyis//lha mtshams byed pa thams cad la//las dag gi ni rgyu skar te//mkhas pas shes pa kho nar gyis//sgro ni phun sum tshogs par byed//khrums smad
286b5(mdo sde): skrag gis thob byed gre/chu stod tha skar gsum po bde//me bzhi sgrub min drug dbyer med//de bzhin mkhas pas gsum shes gyis//sa ri grogs dang grogs mchog ste//mgo dang
286b6(mdo sde): lag dang mon gru bzhin//sa g+hu dang ni mon gre yang //don ni 'bras bur bcas pa yin//sbrul gyi lha mo skag 'dir smra//tshe sa brgyud la ni khyod gnas kyis//yud tsam bco lngas
286b7(mdo sde): khyod 'gro byed//god pa'i sha na zas yino//'gro ba'i nang du gshin rje mi//byed pa mi zad khyed gnas kyis//nyin der khyod spyod su mir skye//khro zhing sdig pa can du 'gyur//
287a1(mdo sde): shin tu mi sdug tshul khrims nyams//chos gos gding ba zad 'gyur zhing //khrums smad ces bya rab mchog la//mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed//me ba ni
287a2(mdo sde): smin drug 'chi bar byed//mgo snabs bri ni ri myangs pas//rlung byed chu spyod tha skar dang //snron ni las kyi rgyu skar yin//snabs dang nam gru mchu zhes pa//gsum po phun sum tsho/
287a3(mdo sde): par byed//bra nye bde byed ge dbo dang //gro bzhin chu gnyis khyod zos sgrub//nag po snar ma mchu gnyis dang //mo ni gre lha mtshams sa ga dang //lag dang nab so de dag
287a4(mdo sde): grogaso//khrums stod kyang ni de bzhi no//ge shin rje'i yi dgas lha mos smras//tshes dgu la ni khyod gnas shing //yud tsam sum cur nyin mtshan tu//til gyi sbyar
287a5(mdo sde): thug zas yin no//sems can byed pa chung 'bring sgrubs//zhag brgyad tham par nad pa sos//gong ma'i bra nye su mir skye//bsod nams byed par bshad pa yin//
287a6(mdo sde): brdzun srog shin tu yun rings bsrungs//sbubs ni las kyi rgyu skar yon//'dir yang nA mA grus mngal du 'jug/sa go la yang 'chi bar byed//lag ces bya ba kho na
287a7(mdo sde): dang mon gre yang ni gsum pa yin//snar ma dang ni nog pa dang //gsum pa gro bzhin 'dir dga' byed//dbo dang bra nye rgud byed yin//chu smad phun sum tshogs
287b1(mdo sde): par byed//skar dang ni glu dang ni//mchu gnyis 'phel bar byed pa yin//gsum po de dag shes par gyis//me d+ya zhi dang ni byin zhin+ya dang //smin drug kyang ni bde bar byed//sa ri de la sgrub pa/
287b2(mdo sde): yin//mgo gnyis dang ni mon gru bcas//de gsum rje grogs shes par gyis//snron rgyal lha mtshams chu stod dang //nab so lhag par zla ba'ang yin//skal ldan lha mo gre yi sa
287b3(mdo sde): smas//tshes bcu la ni khyed gnas shig/bil ba mA ra sar zas yin te//yud tsam sum cur khyod kyis 'gro//'gro 'dir bya ba chung ngu bsgrubs//zhag bdun nad pa khyod spyod pas//su zhig
287b4(mdo sde): mir skya dri dga' 'dod//gos dang rgyan dag 'dod pa yin//bye brag phyeng rnams srung ba//tha skar la ni mngal 'jug 'gyur//nab sos 'chi mgo zin ro myang //'phel byed smin drug rgud
287b5(mdo sde): par byed//me bzhi'ang mkhas pas mngon shes kyis//gr-i zhes bya dang bre nye dang //chu smad ces ni bya ba gsum//phun sum tshogs byed shes par gyiso//'di ni sa go mo ni gre yang //
287b6(mdo sde): sgrub yin lag la'ang bde ba ste//snar ma nag pa gro zhin nyin//mkhas pas grogs gnyis shes par gyis//rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ba ni//skag dang nam gru rgyal dag dang //sbubs
287b7(mdo sde): dang snron zhes bya ba dang //khyams gnyid gang yin 'dir yino//lhag par yang ni de bzhin du//thams cad kyang ni bgrad par gyis//mkhas pa blo gros ldan pa yis//rang gi thams
288a1(mdo sde): cad shes par gyis//gle daH nya ma'i lha mos smras//ches ni bcugacig/khyod gnas kyis//yud tsam lani bcu rtsa lnga yis//khyod ni rnam par grol bar gyis/

288a3(mdo sde): 'gro la sdang mi sdug/dug gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste//de yi mngal 'jug bra nye shog/nam gru min gre 'phol bar byed//lag ces bya dang sa ga dang //snron zhes bya ba gsum pa
288a4(mdo sde): ste/de dag 'tsho bar byed pa yin//khyams smad dang ni rgyal yang 'dir//rgyud byed yin par shes par gyis//snar ma dang ni chu smad kyang //de'i las rgyu skar shes par gyis//

288b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la phan par byin//me mkhyed zas l+h+wam+bu mchugasher//zhag ldan pam+bAr d+ha gsos//de gnas skye dgu gang skye ba//dbang phyug gtso ba nAr ldan yin//chom rkun

288b3(mdo sde): srung bar byed pas na//de yi grags pa mngal 'jug kyang //skrag ces bya ba kho na yin//lha mtshams 'tsho bar byed pa ste//de yi 'phel byid napa sde yin//khyams ston ces ni bya ba

288b5(mdo sde): yin//mon gre byed par byed pa ste//'dir ni sa ga lag gsum po//snron dang rgyal yang sgrub pa ste//'dir ni khyams smad gsum pa'ang yin//grogs dang grogs mchog

292b1(mdo sde): be ma'i gom drug 'dir kun 'khor//ba skar gyis ni mtshan mo thon//nyi sa dun ni lho mtshams te//lha phyogasu ni nyi ma 'khor//rdo go dkyil 'khor mig dmar yin//gnyi bu lha srong rab sme byas//khyed/
292b2(mdo sde): kyis zla ba 'di la ni//rtsa dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin dang //sdig pa las sogs bsrung bar gyis//cha dpo tshor ni dus bzhag par//sdig pa zhes bya khyed pa na song //phyogs dang phyong su las bzhag par//
292b3(mdo sde): khyod ni yang dag phan par song //mithun 'thun dang 'phel 'di yin//'gro ba la ni pham pa yi//rjesu mthun pa bdag gisu//dang por bsdu ba byas 'di yin//de nas drang srong rnga nga gis thams cad la thal
292b4(mdo sde): mo rab tu sbar te 'khor la go bar byed cing smras pa/'di ltar bdag gis go rims dang po dang /mtshan mo dang /nyi mo dang /zla ba dang /zla ba phyed dang /rgyu skar dang gza' dang /dus dang /khyim dang /gnas dang /
292b5(mdo sde): 'gro bar byed pa dang /'khar ba dang /'gro ba dang /mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /rnam par shes pa de bzhin du da ltar yang bstan cing rnam par bzhag ni/ci khyed cag 'di ltar rnam par bzhag pa dang gdags bya
292b6(mdo sde): rgyu skar dang /gza' yongasu mgu ba la rje su yi rang bar byed/'on ta ma yin/de nas de nyid kyi tshe lha ma yin dang DA mi dang /drang srong dang /lha dang /lag 'gro dang /mi 'am ci'i tshogs thams cad kyi thal mo
292b7(mdo sde): rab tu sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras//kye khyod ni lha thams cad kyi bla ma/lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na gar+b+ha bo//mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngon par rtogs pa'i snying brtse
293a1(mdo sde): bskal pa pha rol dran pa'o//sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o//dpal thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o//yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
293a2(mdo sde): pa'o//dus gsum thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang /nyin mo dang /skad cig dang /rgyu skar dang /gza' dang /zla ba dang /zla ba phyed 'dogs par byed pa'i ye
293a3(mdo sde): shes de lta bu yod pa'i sems can de lta bu su'ang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na med pa yino//ji ltar khyod kyis de ltar btags pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyis dor dang ba byin/
293a4(mdo sde): pa yin//rje su'ang yi ra //legs ldan legaso//sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang /gza' dang /khyim dang /dus kyi tshogs kyi yongasu bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa yang
293a5(mdo sde): gdags par gyis shig/drang srong rnga bong gis rab tu smras pa//bdag gi rgyu skar smin drug brjod//zla ba nya tshes zla rangs 'gyur//ston zla tha chungs zhes bya ba//'di ni rab tu brjod pa yin//
293a6(mdo sde): mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam cig/yongasu skor te slar ldog byed//bra nye dang ni smon drug kyang //lan gnyis yongasu 'khor bar byed//de bas rgyu skar thams cad kyang //phyir zhing 'jug par byed pa ste/
293a7(mdo sde): sngar ma gcig pu'ang zla ngo der//tshes gcig la ni mkha' la 'gro//ji ltar sngar bya bshad pa bzhin//de bzhin khyod kyi skye dgu srungs//de tsam mgo tshes gnyis la 'gro//de tsam lag chos gsum
293b1(mdo sde): la paklo/tshes bzhi la yang nab so ste//rgyal yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro/tshes drug la ni skagi tshigs//mchu yang tshwas ni bdun la srung //tshes brgyad la ni pre yin te//tshes dgu la ni dngo 'gro byed/
293b2(mdo sde): me bzhi'ang tshes ni bcu la 'jug/nag pa'ang tshes bcu gcig la 'gro//sa ri'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas//tshes bcu gsum la'ang sa ga ste//tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams yin//
293b3(mdo sde): tshes bco lnga la de bzhin ston//'di ni zla ba phyed du bshad//yar gyi ngo la snabs sgrub ste//tshes gcig la ni skye dgu srung //tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin//tshes gsum la ni chu
293b4(mdo sde): smad yin//tshes bzhi la no byi bzhin srung //chos lnga la ni gro bzhin yin//tshes drug la ni mon gru tshigs//tshes bdun la ni chu lha yin//tshes brgyad la ni khrums stong yin//tshe/
293b5(mdo sde): dgu la ni khrums smad yin//tshes bcu la yang nam gru srung //de bzhin bcu gcig ches tha skar//ga shin rje'i lha mo tshes bcu gnyis//tshes bcu gsum la me lha mo//tshes bcu bzhi
293b6(mdo sde): lnga'adra sngar me yin//zla ba rangs la mgo bshad//dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba 'dir//lha yi bla ma phur bu ste//'di ni lhan cig byed par gzung //de bas gza' zhes bya bar bshad//dwa
293b7(mdo sde): phyir nyin mo tshes bcu bzhir//yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste//smin drug gis ni mtshan mo 'thob//snrubs kyang nyi ma'i mdun na ste//grib tshod dgom pa brgyad yin zhing /
294a1(mdo sde): nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed//lho phyogs nyi mar khwa ltas 'khor//de bzhin dgun zla ra ba yi//zla 'dir khyim gzhur shes par bya//mar gyi
294a2(mdo sde): ngo yi chos gcig la'ang //lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin//chos gnyis la ni nab so ste//tshes gsum rgyal du shes par gyis//'dor chos bzhi la'ang skag yin te//
294a3(mdo sde): mchu yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro//tshes drug la yang gre yin te//tshes bdun la yang dbo yin bshad//chos brkyang la ni me bzhi yin//tshes dgu la ni nag pa gnas//chos
294a4(mdo sde): bcu la ni sa ri 'gro//chos bcu gcig la sa ga 'gro//chos bcu gnyis la'ang lha mtshams te//tshe sa bcu gsum la snron yin no//tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snabs yin
294a5(mdo sde): te/tshes bco lnga la'ang chu stong pa shad//yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la//chu smad kyang ni rung ba yin//ches gnyis byi zhin gro zhin te//tshes gsum
294a6(mdo sde): la ni mon gru 'gro//tshe sa bzhir mon gre 'gro rung ste//tshes lnga la ni khyams stod yin//tshe sa drug la yang khrums smad yon//tshes bdun la ni nam gru 'gro
294a7(mdo sde): chos brgyad la ni tha skur rung //tshes dgur ge shin rje'i lha mo yin//tshes bcur smin drug 'gror rung ste//tshes bcu gcig la'ang snar ma yin//chos bcu
294b1(mdo sde): kanyis la'ang mas yin te//chos bcu gsul lag kyang 'gro//chos bcu bzhi ldan bas ste//zla ba nya la rgyal yang yin//rga ba nya bu 'di la yang //'dir ni rang bzhin brjod par bya/
294b2(mdo sde): lha yi phyogasu phyin nas kyang //nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed//nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis//mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed//mtshan mo yang ni
294b3(mdo sde): mchog shes gyis//nyi ma'i mdun du'ang gro zhin te//grib tsho dgem pa bcu tham pa//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang /
294b4(mdo sde): 'dir ni spen pa'i zhing bstan pa//'di la mgro yon shes par gyis/zla ba gsum pa rnam gzhag nas//zla ba mar gyi chos gcig la//skrag ni sgrub par byed
294b5(mdo sde): pa yin/chos gnyis la ni mchur shes gyis//chos gsum la ni gri yin no//chos bzhi la ni dbo 'gro ste//tshes lnga la ni me bzhi 'gro/tshes drug la ni
294b6(mdo sde): nag bsgrub/tshes bdun la ni sau ra 'gro//tshes brgyad la yang sa ga ste//tshes dgu la ni lha mtshams yin//tshes bcu la ni snron 'gro ste//chos bcu gcig la snrubs
294b7(mdo sde): 'jug bya//chos bcu gnyis la chu stod yin//chos bcu gsum la chu smad yin//tshes bcu bzhi la byi bzhin te//ches bco lnga la gro zhin 'gro/zla ba yar gyi chos gcig la//mon gru sgrub par byed pa yin//
295a1(mdo sde): /chos gnyis lanI mon g+ha ste//chos gsum la yang khrums stong yin//chos bzhi la ni khams smad yin//tshe lnga la ni nam gru 'gro//tshes drug
295a2(mdo sde): la nI tha skar tshigs//tshes bdun gshin rje'i lha mo yin//de bzhin tshes brgyad smin drug ste/tshes dgu la ni snar ma 'gro//ches bcu la yang mgo yin to//lag ni tshes bcu
295a3(mdo sde): gcig la 'gro//tshes bcu gnyis la'ang nab so ste//chos bcu gsum la rkyal yang yin//chos bcu bzhi la'ang skag yin te//mchu ni zla ba rab rdzogs byed//dgun zla tha
295a4(mdo sde): chung rang bzhin yang //mthar kyis kyang ni brjod par bya//lho yo phyogs su phyin nas kyang //nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//mtshan mo bco brgyad shes par gyis//nyin
295a5(mdo sde): bAr yang ni bcu gnyis yin//rgyal yang mtshan mo 'thob par byed//nyi ma'i mdun na mon gre yin//grib tshod kyang ni sor bcu bdun//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//
295a6(mdo sde): spen pa lha yi blo ma dag/zhing der rab tu brjod pa yin//'dir khyim bum pa mnyam pa med//pyid zla rA ba mar gyi ngor//tshes gcig gre ni sgrub par byed//tshes gnyis la
295a7(mdo sde): ni dbo yin no//tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste//chos bzhi'i bor du nag pa yin//tshes lnga li ni sa ri ste//chos drug la ni sa ga yin//chos bduni la ni lha mtshams te//
295b1(mdo sde): chos brgyad la na snron yin no//chos dgu la ni sbubs yin te//tshes bcu lnga rI chu stod yin//tshes bcu gcig la chu sma da yin//tshe bcu gnyis la byi zhin te//tshes bcu gsum
295b2(mdo sde): la gro zhonA yin//tshes bcu bzhi la mini gru ste//tshes bco lnga la mo ni gri yin//de ni zla ba phyed yin ni//zla ba ya ra gyi tshes gcig la//khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin//ches
295b3(mdo sde): gnyis la ni khrums smad yin//tshes gsum la ni nam gru ste//tshe sa bzhi la ni tha skar yino//tshes lnga la ni bra nye yin//tshes drug la ni sman drug te//tshe so bdun la ni snar
295b4(mdo sde): ma yin//tshes brgyad la ni mgro yin te//tshes dgu la ni ldo ga yin no//chos bcu la ni nab so ste//tshes bcu gcig la rgyal yin no//chos bcu gnyis la skag yin te//
295b5(mdo sde): tshes bcu gsum la mchu yin no//tshes bcu bzhi la gre yin te//zla rangs chos bco lnga la dbo//'dir ni dpyid zla ra ba yis//rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya//byang phyogs
295b6(mdo sde): su ni kha ltas te//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis//mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed//ma nus kyang mtshan mo 'thob par byed//
295b7(mdo sde): nyen par khrums stod 'gro bar byed//grib tshod sor ni bcu gnyis su//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//zhing der lha yi bla ma yang //rnam par gnas pa kho nor ni//
296a1(mdo sde): bshad pa yin te 'dir yang ni//der ni mtshon mo 'byung ba yin//dpyid zla 'bring po'i zla ngo yi//dang por chos gci gu mi bzhi ste//chos gnyis la ni
296a2(mdo sde): nag pa yin//tshes gsum la ni sa ri yin//tshes bzhi lu ni sa ga ste//chos lnga lnga ni lha mtshoms yin//tshes drug la ni sgron yin no//tshes bdun la ni snrubs yin no//tshes
296a3(mdo sde): brgyad la ni chu stod yin//tshes dgu la ni chu smad yin//tshes bcu la ni byi zhi na te//tshe sa bcu gcig la glo zhin yin//tshe sa bcu gnyis la mon gru ste//tshes bcu gsum
296a4(mdo sde): la mon gre yin//tshes bcu bzhi la khrums stod yin//tshes bcwo lnga la khrums smad yin//de ni zla ba phyed yin te//zla ba yar gyi chos gcig la//nam gru tshes gnyis tha
296a5(mdo sde): skarA te//tshes gsum la ni pra nye yin//tshes bzhi la ni smin drug ste//tshes lnga la ni snar ma yin//tshe so drug la ni mgo yin te//tshes bdun la ni lag yin no//tshes brgyad
296a6(mdo sde): la ni nub so ste//tshes dgu le ni rgyu la yin no//tshes bcu la ni skag yin no//tshes bcu gcig la mchu yin te//tshes bcu gnyis la gre yin te//tshes bcu gsum la da'i
296a7(mdo sde): yin no//tshes bcu bzhi lo me bzhi ste//tshes bco lnga la nag pa yin//dpyid zla 'bring po kho na yi//rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya//byang gi phyogs su kha ltas te//nyi ma
296b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'khor bar byed//'dir ni phyis kyang yud tsam dag/yongs su 'khor bar shes par byed//yud tsam yang ni re re zhig/nyin mtshan dag la 'jug par byed//nyin por bcu bzhi
296b2(mdo sde): shes par gyis//mtshan mo 'ang bcu drug shes par gyis//bre dbo mchen mo thobs par bye'o//nyi ma'i mdun nu tha skar yin//grib tshod ser brgyad nyi ma 'khor//nyi ma'i bu ni mig dam
296b3(mdo sde): te//gza' rno shin tu mi zad yin//khyi ma lug la ni yang dge gnas//dpyid za tha chung mar gyi ngo'i//dang po tshes gcig saM ri ste//tshes gnyis la ni sa ga yin//tshes gsumu la ni
296b4(mdo sde): lha mtshams yin//tshes bzhi la ni sbyin yin te//tshes lnga la ni sbubs yin no//tshes drug la ni chu stong yin//tshes bdun la ni chu smad yin//tshes brgyad la ni byi zhin te//tshes

296b6(mdo sde): bzhi la nam gru ste//ches bco lnga la tha skar yin//de ni zla ba phyed yin te//zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la//bre nye sgrub par byed pa yin//chos gnyis la ni smin drug ste//tshes gsum/
296b7(mdo sde): la ni snar ma yin//tshes bzhi la ni mgo yin te//tshes lnga la ni lag yin no//tshes drug la ni nab so ste//ches bdun la ni rgyal yin no//tshes brgyad la ni skag yin te//tshes dgra
297a1(mdo sde): la ni mchu yin no//rdzas bcu na yin te//rjes bcu gcig la ma yin no//chos bcu gnyis lA maHzhwa yin//chos bcu gsum m+b+ha nag pa
297a2(mdo sde): ste//chos bcu bzhi la sa ri yin//zla rangs tshes nr-i bcoM lnga la//sa ga yin te sa ga yi//go rims brjod pa byang phyogs su//kha bltas nyi ma yongs su 'khor//myi chen mo mnyam
297a3(mdo sde): mtshungs rnam pa ste//bco lnga bco lngar bshad pa yin//nag pas mtshan mo 'thob par byed//nyin par yong ni smin drug yin//grib tshod dag kyang gom pa drug/nyi ma yongs su 'a
297a4(mdo sde): bar byed//lha min bla ma pa ba sangs//'dir yang zhing zhes gdags pa yin//khyim glang yin te mkhas rnams kyis//zla ba bdun po bshad pa yin//dbyar zla ra ba mar gyi ngo'i//dang
297a5(mdo sde): po chos gcig lha mchims skrag/chos gnyis la ni snron yin te//chos gsum la ni sbubs yin no//chos bzhi la ni chu spyod yin//tshes lnga la ni chu smad yin//tshes drug la ni bya
297a6(mdo sde): zhin yin//tshes bdun la ni gri zhin yin//tshes brgyad la nI mon gru ste//tshes dgu laM ni mon gre yin//tshes bcu la ni khrum stong yin//tshes bcu gcig la khrum snad yin//
297a7(mdo sde): chos bcu gnyis la nam gru ste//tshes bcu gsum la tho skar yin//tshes bcu bzhi la bra nye yin//tshes bco lnga la smin drug ste//de ni zla phyed zla ba yang//tshes gcig la ni snar
297b1(mdo sde): masgrub//chos gnyis la ni mgo yin te//chos gsum la ni lag yin no//chos bzhi la ni nub sngo ste//chos lnga la ni rgyal yin no//tshes drug la ni skrag yin te//chos bdun la na
297b2(mdo sde): mchu yin no//tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te//tshes dgu la ni dbo yin no//tshes bcu la ni me bzhi ste//tshes bcu gcig la nag pa yin//tshes bcu gnyis la sa ri ste//chos bcu
297b3(mdo sde): gsum la sa ga yin//tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams te//tshes bco lnga la snron yin no//dbyar zla ra ba'i rim brjod bya//byang phyogs kha ltas nyi me 'khor//'phel byed nyen par
297b4(mdo sde): bcu drug tu//shes bya mtshan mi 'ang bcu bzhi yin//sa gas mtshan mo 'thob par byed//nyi ma'i 'dun na mgo yin no//grib tsho dgom pa bzhi yin te//'di ni yongs su 'kho
297b5(mdo sde): bar byed//dar zhing gza' ldag nyi ma'i bu//'jam par byed pa'i gza' yin no//sbyor ba'i khyim yin nyin par 'gro//brgyad pa yin par brjod pa yin//dbyar zla 'bring ba'i
297b6(mdo sde): gcig la//snrubs ni sgrub par byed pa yin//chos gnyis la ni chu stod yin//chos gsum lo ni chu smad yin//chos bzhi la ni byi zhin te/chos lnga lin gri zhin no//tshes drug
297b7(mdo sde): la ni mon gru ste//chos bdun la ni mon gre yin//tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin//chos dgu la ni khrums smad yin//tshes bcu la ni na ma gru ste//tshes bcu gcig
298a1(mdo sde): la tha skar yin//chos bcu gnyis la bra nye ste//chos bcu gsum la smin drug yin//chos bcu bzhi la snar ma ste//chos bco lnga la mgo yin no//
298a2(mdo sde): de ni zla ba phyed yin te//zla ba yar gyi chos gcig la//lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin//chos gnyis la ni nab so yin//chos gsum la ni rgyal yin no//chos bzhi lnga ni
298a3(mdo sde): skag yin no//tshes lnga la ni mchu yin no//ches drug la ni gre yin no//chos bdun la ni dbo yin te//tshes brgyad la nI me bzhi yin//tshes dgu la ni nag pa ste//tshes
298a4(mdo sde): sul ni sa yin//chos bcu gcig lngas pa ste//chos bcu gnyis la lha mtshams yin//chos bcugs ma mo dz+nyAn yin te//chos bcu bzhi la sgribs yin na/
298a5(mdo sde): bar chu stod yin//bdag gis dbyar 'bring rim brjod bya//byang phyogs bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bltas//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//nyin par yud tsam bcu bdun te//
298a6(mdo sde): mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin//snron gyis rkyang ni mtshon mo 'thob//nyi mar bcas ni nab so yin//grib tshod gom pa gnyis yin te//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//
298a7(mdo sde): zla ba zhes bya zhing yin te//lag dang yang dag ldan pa yin//'di khyim sbal pa zhes bya ba//zla ba dgu par bshad pa yin//dbyar zla tha chung mar ngo yi//tshes gcig la
298b1(mdo sde): ni chu smad sgrub//tshes gnyis byi zhin gro zhin te tshes gsum la ni mon gru yin//chos bzhi la ni mon gre ste//tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin//tshes drug la ni khrums smad yin//chos
298b2(mdo sde): bdun la ni nam gru ste//tshes brgyad la ni tha skar yin//tshes dgu la ni pra nye ste//tshes bcu la ni smin drug yin//tshes bcu gcig la snar ma yin//tshes bcu gnyis la mgo yin na//
298b3(mdo sde): tshes bcu gsum la lag yin no//tshes bcu bzhi la nab so yin//tshes bco lnga la rgyal yin te//de ni zla ba phyed yin no//zla ba yar gyi ches gcig la//skrag ni sgrub par byed pa yin
298b4(mdo sde): tshes gnyis la ni mchu yin no//tshes gsum la ni bre yin te//tshe sa bzhi la ni dbo yin no//chos lnga la nI me bzhi ste//tshes drug la ni nag pa yin//tshes bdun la ni sau ri ste/
298b5(mdo sde): tshes brgyad la ni sa gre yin//tshes dgu la ni lha mche ma ste//tshes bcu la ni snron yin no//tshes bcu gcig la snrubs yin te//tshe sa bcu gnyis la chu stod yin//tshes bcu
298b6(mdo sde): gsum la chud smad yin//tshes bcu bzhi la byi zhin te//zla ba rangs la gro bzhin no//bdag gis dbyar tha'i rim brjod bya//de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni//nyi ma gdong phyed
298b7(mdo sde): bltas te 'khor//nyin par bco brgyad thob nas kyang //mtshan mo yang ni bcu gnyis te//chu stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob//nyi ma'i 'dun na mchu yin no//grib tshong gom pa
299a1(mdo sde): na rgyu tu/ sa na rlong/ na na // / /da rgyu sngon
299a2(mdo sde): zlab btsu shud pas na//don myur bamyur byung ga//dang par chos gasmon phyus//rjes na min /chos ga ma ni khrims sto minasbyin
299a3(mdo sde): khrims rnyed sbyin//chos sbrul nI na mgru ste//tshes drug la ni tha skad yin//rgyas na la ni branya ste//chos brgyad d+hI sbyin drug yon//sa dbu n+ti swA ma ste//chos
299a4(mdo sde): namani man na//rjes bcu gcig pa yon yin to//rgyas bcu gnyis la nab so yin//rgyus bcu ga sum la rgyal sbyin+da te/kyi bcu bzhi la sgra ga yin no//chos tsawA
299a5(mdo sde): yin te//de ni byed yin+di mi//zla ba yar gyi chos gcig //gr-I ni sgrub par byed pa ste//chos gnyis la ni dag yin no//sa sgyum la ni me bzhi ste//che na
299a6(mdo sde): ldan pa ste//chos drug pa nasarjerje 'dun yin snyam rnams te//chos brgyad ldan dz+nyAn ldan no//ches dbu rnaM sa
299a7(mdo sde): bcul ni chu spyod yin//chos bcu gcig la rgyu smad yin//klo zhin byi zhin chos bcu gnyis//ches bcu gsumo la mon glu ste//tshes bcu bani la mau na gre yin//zla
299b1(mdo sde): 'i/Sh+Ta sA lA//khyams spyod d+has d+d+ha/ dag blo skor na rje ma brjod//rta rgyan pa nyima'i 'khor mo ldog/nyin par yang na cu bdun te//mtshan mo yang ni bcug
299b2(mdo sde): yin//gro zhin gyis kying mtshan mo sgrog/nyi na dunan gro yin te//sring tsho kyang gom pa gnyis//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//nr-i bu gza' lhag ces bya ba// dzin
299b3(mdo sde): zhi la yang dag gnas//de banyin du mo wAg / du de rje rnyeng na gi ba shang //skyon na 'dzing dri mar gyi ngo'o//dang po sa ga/khrums spya //sug
299b4(mdo sde): na m+bu /na lani yin//sa drug sun m+b+ha maste// dzu ma tshun min na/
299b5(mdo sde): ni min yinate// skye dgu ldan nubs sbyin//chos bla na sbyin te/ ma na men ni//chos na sbyits+tshi/ sa 'du gsum lda we/
299b6(mdo sde): yin+da no//chus bcu na ny+dzad po yin no//tshes bco rje pa mye bani yin//de ni rna ba skyed yin te//nA yar tshes gci nag pa skrag/tshe bu gnyis li ni sA ri ste//chos gsum la nis
299b7(mdo sde): g.yon//chos bzhi la ni lce mtshams te//chos lnga la ni skyon yin no//chos drug pa ni snru ba yin te//chos bdun lani rgyus de yin//chos brgyad pa ni rgyu smang yin//chos dgra
300a1(mdo sde): b+hI zhin po zhes/sa brtul ni non rgyu seM ma/ches bcu gcig lenon gri yin//su 'acuganyis la khrums spyod sem//chos bcug du la khyams
300a2(mdo sde): smad yin//chos bcu bzhi la na mgro ste//zla rangs nya tsho thaskar yin//dI ni nA da b+h+r-i yin te//skyon zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni//lo skar dadag gis brjod par bya//l-I yi phyogs su
300a3(mdo sde): ltas te//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//nyin par bcu drug 'gro phyed cing //mtshan mo yang ni bcu ban yin//khrums stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob//nyi ma'i mdun na nag
300a4(mdo sde): pa yin//grib tshod dgra ni gom bzhi s+ho//nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed//lha min bla ma pa ba sangs//gza' ni zhing la rnam par bzhid/'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhag/zla ba
300a5(mdo sde): bcu gnyis bshad pa yin//yongs su 'khor ba de yis ni//po ni de ltar 'gro bar byed//mig spyong yang dang yang du ni//'dus te chos kyi phyogs lo ltos//khyod ni shes rab bzhi
300a6(mdo sde): yin no//chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis//chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs//thos phyag mkhas pa bsam gtan pa//de dag khyod kyis chos gos dang //bza' btu
300a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rjes su srungs//yang dag gnas te brgya byin gyis//rnga bong la ni thal sbyar nas//rab tu smras pa bdag cag gis//bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis//smras pa/lha yi bla ma khyod kyis
300b1(mdo sde): //rtag par chungs par spyod pa srungs//rig sdugapa sma/na dang gsang sngags rnams//thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs//las kun drang srong zla ba dang //zla ba chu dang zhag dang bzhi//bzo yi las kyi mtha' kun
300b2(mdo sde): //gtso bo yin por bgyid pa yin//drag po dung gi sna can dang //dgon pa da lci ba ste//don sbyin zhi do de na no//mchod sbyin ring mdzo gtso bor bkod//rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po /
300b3(mdo sde): chen ldan skyod dang ring du 'gro//sa yid chos nga srings dang //gan thar byed pa rgya mtshan/gtso bo gzhag ste ma dros dang //khab kyi lu su 'bigs chu lhas byim//ri dgas 'khrugs pak+ku
300b4(mdo sde): de bzhi//klo rnams kyi ni gtso bor bkod//khyod ni dge ba rab skyed pa//ne tso yi ni khyab byed pa//mkhas pa zhing gri gtso bo ste//de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu//khyed ni snying po kho nus kyang //me
300b5(mdo sde): nI mo'i gtso ste//khyod ni rlung mar 'phrul gso pa//rlung yang ba men Na bya sbyin//dza dang sa 'i mig//legs mthong lag na mdung gsum rdzogs//mA mo bzhi pa d+ma dag ni//grong
300b6(mdo sde): khyer gtso bor bkod po yin//gong ma'i chur skyes rtsibs mu khyud//'khor lo sbyin pa gnod sbyin bzhi//de dag rin chen brtag pa laM//nyi tsheng byed pa'i gtso bor bkod//phyogs
300b7(mdo sde): mtshams su ni bzhi yin te//bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gi nos//yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du//bsrung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod//drang srong dag ni thams cad dang //lha
301a1(mdo sde): tshogs dang klu rnams dang //lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi//bar yang rjes su yi rang byed//lung bstan rab tu rgyal ba mchog/thug po yi ni gtso bo ste//khyod ni sgyu
301a2(mdo sde): dang 'grag pa dang //zas dang ro dang me tog mchog/khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste//shu dag rdzogs byeng 'bras bu'i mchog/khyod ni lam bde skyed pa ste//rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i ga
301a3(mdo sde): dga' bo drang ni nye dga' gnyis//ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod//nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing //lci mchog mig dmor skugs byed skam//khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso//khyod ni
301a4(mdo sde): grub dang yid 'phrog pa//zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste//bcud kyi len gyi gtso bo yin//gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin//khyim bdag thams cad rnam par gzhag/rgyal po chen po/
301a5(mdo sde): bzhi yang ni//skal ldan rgyur ni rnam par bzhag/lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso//grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po//klu rnams kyi ni mig mi bzang //dri za rnams kyi yul
301a6(mdo sde): 'khor srung //thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi//gling gzhan brgyad khri thams cad du//drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs su skyong po ma bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci'ang med do//
301a7(mdo sde): de ltar lce dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tse dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi mo yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes
301b1(mdo sde): bya ba byas par gyur to//drang srong rnga bo gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar gyur to//bya ba de ni mchod pa dang /rim gro bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to//de'i rjes la shin tu yun
301b2(mdo sde): ring zhig na drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste/des kyang skar me'i byad rab tu byas so//zhag gis mi thub pa dang /shol yod pa yang bshad do//yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i
301b3(mdo sde): gnas rten ga le bar klu thams cad 'dus te/de dag drang srong sar ma lo dga' ba mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te/de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nus
301b4(mdo sde): su brtson par gyur to//'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde thig pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs te/rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par bzhog pa'i le'u
301b5(mdo sde): rdzogs so////'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//bam po bcu gcig pa//rgya mtshos smras pa/na mkha' la
301b6(mdo sde): ni rgyu skar tshogs//ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni//khyod kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran//mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi gtso//khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper//shes gsal 'gro la
301b7(mdo sde): snying brtse bzhin//kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni//lag 'gro thams cad thar bar gyis//srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod//lag 'gro de kun tshim byed khyod//khyod
302a1(mdo sde): ni drang srong kun gyi bla//mi rnams kyis ni mcho par 'os//'gro ba kun dpal khyod la ni//lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs//rten gyi yul rnams
302a2(mdo sde): thams cad pa//lag 'gro myur du thar bar gyis//de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsumo la mchog tu yid dang ba bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs
302a3(mdo sde): thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//yon tan de 'dra bdag la med//drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin//khyed cag 'di nas thar byed
302a4(mdo sde): par//bdag gi nus pa ma yin no//gang gis bskal pa du mar ni//dka' thub dka' ba bzod par spyad//khyed cag thar bar byed pa yi//drang srong gzhan de blta bar gyis//
302a5(mdo sde): rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin//mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni//shing rta bu dang chung ma dang //nor gyis sems can phan pa byas//rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang //mig dang pags
302a6(mdo sde): pa khrag dang ni//bu bon bran mo bza' btung mang //mal chu kha zas sngon chad btang //snying rje dang ni byams pa yis//khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na//mtshungs med bsam gtan
302a7(mdo sde): dga' 'byung ba//de ni drang srong rnga bong ste//kun tu brtse zhing byang chub sems//sngon chad rig byed pha rol phyin//sems can mong po sdug bsngal gyis//nyam thag pa ni thar
302b1(mdo sde): bar byas//sems can gcig gi ched du yang //sngon gyi tshe rabs de bsgral par//dmyal bar 'gro bzod de yi dgas//de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung //sems can sdug bsngal
302b2(mdo sde): mthog kun+sa//sdug bsngal mthar mdzo na dadra yin//sems can sprin phyir brtson 'grus dang //snying rje rtun pos de srid 'khor//rnga bong don skyes pa na//rgyal smos bu ma
302b3(mdo sde): shing pa yi//rigs su zas gtsang gi ni sras//des ni bcas ma thag tu khyu'o//snying gsum bde 'byung 'jig rten dpal//yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang //lha dang kA ya~M bu rnams dang
302b4(mdo sde): 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab//der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags//de yis gom pa bdun bor te//ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi//sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur
302b5(mdo sde): bA nAnd/glo dang //'tsho bas+ya gzir las das skul zhing //zhi bya bde ba mya ngan med//sgyum la dgod nas shwAk+ka/sras gsungs//m+me d+h+r-ig dri dang rin tshon dag
302b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis gau ti gyur cing/'byung ba'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis//sras po la ni bskyed gyur pa//bskul pa meng po du ma yang//sngan chad khyod kyis dul ba dang //sbyin dang
302b7(mdo sde): bsam gtan dgyes la rten//sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod//'di la skye ba 'di yang ni//thams cad kyi ni the ma lags//sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par/
303a1(mdo sde): ring po ma thogs khyod 'chang rgya//des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur//mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs//drug khri tham pa spangs nas su//spyod pa rab gastan lo
303a2(mdo sde): drug spyod//g.yo sgyu can ni sder btsos pa'i//bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang //byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes//mya ngan med lam don dmo gzigs//byams/
303a3(mdo sde): dang ye shes thugs rje yis//sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing //'byung po dag ni thams cad la//de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa//sems can gang la'ang mtho mi 'tsham
303a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las//thar par mdzad cing de yang ni//rnam bcings btson ra thar mdzod pa//ma ga d+ha na daM gnas shing //'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston//
303a5(mdo sde): de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob//byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos//drang srong mchog gi thad du dang //'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las//khyed cag yongs su thar
303a6(mdo sde): bar byed//rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bor gyis//dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis//phyir gcad mkha' lding thams cad las//'jigs pa khyed lo mi 'byung ngo //rtag bde
303a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis//btson ra 'di ni g.yo sgyu can//bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'chi//ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin//thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis//
303b1(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang /klu chen po pho dang /mo dang /khye'u dang /bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad
303b2(mdo sde): ces smras so//'jig rten thams cad lde khrid par du 'phags pa/chos thams cad kyi dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad
303b3(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa/dga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa/shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/thugs
303b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis khyab pa/phyin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/lam thams cad ston pa/yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba/lha dong klu rnams kyis mchad pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
303b5(mdo sde): srid pa gsum gyi so dgra bcom pa/mchod pa thams cad 'os pa/bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi btson rwa 'dir 'bangs la na 'dra nas bdag cag thar bor mdzad par
303b6(mdo sde): gsol/klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de//gnas de nas
303b7(mdo sde): 'gro bar mi nus so//de dag thams cad kyis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bden te/sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa
304a1(mdo sde): rnam par mi 'che ba'i chos nyid yin no//de la bdag cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so//'di nas myur du bzhud cig/bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag
304a2(mdo sde): cag thar bar mdzod cig/skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa thams
304a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang /byang chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya
304a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dang /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir mang por ma byung ba la dmigs po
304a5(mdo sde): dang /nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to//yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams
304a6(mdo sde): las yang dag par byung ba dang /so sor brtags pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to//da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi byed
304a7(mdo sde): ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang //
304b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bskul ba'i phyir dang /bdud bzhi gdul ba'i phyir dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do//da ltar
304b2(mdo sde): shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa nod pa/kun nas snang ba med pa/rgyu ba med pa/bzhi med po/mtshan nyid med pa/mtshan ma med
304b3(mdo sde): nga/chags pa med pa/rnam par bzhag pa med pa/rdul med pa/mun pa med pa/snang ba med pa/gzung ba med pa/gsal byed med pa/spyod pa med pa/tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas phung
304b4(mdo sde): po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /'byung ba chen po thams cad dang /mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i bar nas/yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa'i
304b5(mdo sde): bar la smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag po'i mtha' dang /'gag pa med pa dang /de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa
304b6(mdo sde): dang /grang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba/phyed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/yang dag
304b7(mdo sde): par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/sems na mkha' dang mnyam
305a1(mdo sde): zhing mtshungs pa/ma chags par ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la tshangs
305a2(mdo sde): ba'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa ston to//kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na'ang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang /klu'i
305a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zla ba la brtsub pa zhes bya ba dang /klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas de ngag
305a4(mdo sde): snang ba dang /rnam par bsgyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur to//de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag
305a5(mdo sde): par rjes su dran pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dgo' ba la de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//khyod bzhud la
305a6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po thob pa gong gis 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob pa de la bdag cag gi tshig gis
305a7(mdo sde): gsol ba thob shig/de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang de nas
305b1(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo //'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg chen po'i mdo las nyi rwa'i snying po'i le'u cu gcig pa las le'u brgyad pa'o///bcom ldan 'das la klu thams
305b2(mdo sde): tsad sbyangs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te/shas cher 'khrugs shing slab la rgya shug gi 'dang ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rdul nas lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste 'di skad ces/
305b3(mdo sde): smras so//lag 'gro rnams ni skyabs su dong //skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing //'chi med la ma la gzhog byed pa//ma zad g.yo sgyu can la ltos//de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes
305b4(mdo sde): bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//sems can gang dge thos tsam gyis//dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchis//gang dog de yi tshig thos shing //de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal//brtson 'grus sna
305b5(mdo sde): tshogs sbyor ba yis//khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs//bka' mched sna tshogs lhon cig mdzad//de yi sgyun ma bslabs sam//bdud kyis slar smras pa/dge sbyong gau ta ma brtan pa yin/
305b6(mdo sde): rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste//stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs//rgal nas skye dgu sgrol bar byed//mun bral mas smras pa/spyod pa la ni gang zhugs pa//bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyod de//
305b7(mdo sde): byang grol bde ba sbyin bgyid pa//de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi//mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi//de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing //ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin//de lo bdag ni skyobs su
306a1(mdo sde): mchis//sgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi//sems can thams cad rnam par 'gro la//chos rnams kun la dbang bsgyur ba'o//bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/
306a2(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to//bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dadungs te rmongs nas stobs kyis shugs
306a3(mdo sde): kyis 'chags sar zhugs te/bdud kyi stobs kyi shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so//gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas
