306a4(mdo sde): ring po ma lon par drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas na mkha' las rdo'i char pa me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te/klu thams
306a5(mdo sde): cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu pha ba ste/klu thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to//dga' khyab mas smras
306a6(mdo sde): pa/kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyod ltos shig/dzam+bu'i gling der dge sbyong gau ta ma la kla gang dge skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'di sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na gang
306a7(mdo sde): dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so//sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su
306b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba//bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te/tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang //de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro//ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing //byang chub/
306b2(mdo sde): smon lam brtan po bskyod pas na//de ni bdud rnams dri mas bsad mi nus//nemA nu re med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur//de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing //tshig
306b3(mdo sde): gi dun gcig tsam yang nyan byed na//byang chub phyi ri ni sems kyang bskyed pa de//sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med//yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis//der
306b4(mdo sde): ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs//sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos//der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to//gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing //bdag cag gi
306b5(mdo sde): ni las kyi sgrib 'byung ba//ched du lung bstan pa ni der nyan pa'i//rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs//de nas bdud sdig can shes cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste//sdug
306b6(mdo sde): bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i
306b7(mdo sde): gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar mjug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go//bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das
307a1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dgra' blas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa/
307a2(mdo sde): rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol//gzungs span kyi gzhi de dag gis ni sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na lus kyi
307a3(mdo sde): slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug ste btson rar stsal nas//zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcing ba lngas bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa
307a4(mdo sde): man+da ra ba'i gsung la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man+dA ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas
307a5(mdo sde): kyi shul kar bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa de lta bus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan te/
307a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus btso na ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par grags so//gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa'i ngag gis bdag cag dga'
307a7(mdo sde): ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /lan grangs gzhan la myong
307b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /sems can gyi sgrib pa dang sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas
307b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /nye bar spyod pa dang /longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /tshe'i 'du byed bas pa'i sgrib pa dang /bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang /
307b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i sgribs pa yongs su bas shing /der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa
307b4(mdo sde): tsam gyis mdo la mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol ti/btson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cig/de nas na mkha' la chas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
307b5(mdo sde): man+dA ra ba'i bsung gri tha da du nye bar phyin to//de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thang
307b6(mdo sde): du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas slan chad bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyeso zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de bzhin du da ltar
307b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma legs pa dpago tu ma mchis pas khyab ste/de dag
308a1(mdo sde): ni las kyi sgrib pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zin to zhes bgyi ba nas sangs
308a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su ma dag pa dag gi sgribs te mchis par mi nus pa lags so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o//sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag
308a3(mdo sde): tu sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgo
308a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib po zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang /nye bar spyod pa dang /longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /dge bcu'i las kyi lam gyi
308a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad dang pos mo thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang /
308a6(mdo sde): chos bstan pa des sems can rnams bzod pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang /ji srid 'tshe ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nus sems can rnams ji
308a7(mdo sde): ltar bsim pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thog par 'gyur ba dang /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /rtag par rgyun du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
308b1(mdo sde): yang dag par len pa dang /log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang /sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang /
308b2(mdo sde): chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang /bas mi gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /tshangs po'i gnas bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyurab
308b3(mdo sde): dang /'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du chos de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i
308b4(mdo sde): slad du btsun pa bcom lda ni 'dis b+hA pa rab kyi mtho'o gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzung sa sngags de legs par bshad por gsal/bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs
308b5(mdo sde): bu gang khyod skye bo mang po lnga phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes//bya bo nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i byer du'o//dge slong ngam/dge slong mya
308b6(mdo sde): 'am/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can sul la theg pa gsum las thog pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgol bar 'dod pa ni myur du theg du de sangs su rdzog
308b7(mdo sde): bar bya bar 'ad pa yin la/sdug bsde pa khrims cad 'joms par 'do pa yin//thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/lus dang /ngag dang /maud kyi gan so na
309a1(mdo sde): len thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa yin/bstan pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yin/snyan pa 'dod pa dang /rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/bza' ba dang gtung
309a2(mdo sde): ba mang po 'dod pa dang /dbang phyug 'dod pa dang /gzugs 'dod pa dang /stobs 'dod pa dang /'khor 'dod pa dang /nor dang 'bru 'dod pa dang /thu bo 'dod pa dang /mi dang mi ma yin
309a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin/rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin/rtag tu lus dang /ngag dang yid kyis kun tu gnon par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang //
309a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang gzungs dang bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod pa
309a5(mdo sde): yin no//de ltar yang las kyi sgrib pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phangs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'go ba'i sgrib pa
309a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba blangs pa de'i bar gyis myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna chags de lta bu de dag sgrub par mi nus te/las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i
309a7(mdo sde): phyir ro//gang zag de khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing /kho zas gtsang ma dang mal gtsang ma der skyil mo krung ngam 'chags pas kyang rung ste/rjes su mthun pa'i tshes
309b1(mdo sde): brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas gzhan yid la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin pa'i bar gyis re zhig
309b2(mdo sde): mtshon gcig gam zhes bya ba nas mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na des rang gi sru byang du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs
309b3(mdo sde): chung ngur rtog par byed na chung ngu kho nar mthong ngo //yang na tshad med par rtog par byed na gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag por rjes su mthong ngo //des mtshan thog thag mtshan sum
309b4(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo //mtshan gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do//tad+ya thA/badz+ri ma
309b5(mdo sde): b+ha badz+re ma b+ha/ud pA da/byA ya/bi dz+ri ma b+ha/sna ba pha ra a nud ta thA tA b+hU ta ko Ti badz+ri ma b+ha swA hA//ji srid du kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par spel nas de dag byung ste/rang gi
309b6(mdo sde): mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par migro ying ba'i yid kyi rjes su bltas nas tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya/mi dngang bar bya'o//rang gi lus
309b7(mdo sde): la mer rlom par blta bar bya ste/ji lta zhe na/des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'gro ba mthong nas rang gi lus thams cad
310a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang //phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin
310a2(mdo sde): du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs snang ba gang yang mi 'byung po 'di ni de'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no//rigs kyi bu su la la sangs rgyas
310a3(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa de lta bu'i bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgom shing mchod sbyin legs par byas la shin tu yid la byas na de'i las kyi sgrib
310a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas ma lus pa'i bar du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang /dam pa'i
310a5(mdo sde): chos spangs pa rnams dang /'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so//de 'dod na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cad dang /phyi rol
310a6(mdo sde): pa'i bstan bcos thams cad dang /rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang /gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags su byas pa rnams des the tshom med par shin tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de
310a7(mdo sde): nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang /gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i
310b1(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms par 'dod na des shin tu sgoms pa yin no//de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i tshe 'pho dang /skye ba dang sems/
310b2(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro//de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis na mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam/sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/brgya byin gyi bar ram tshangs po'i bar ram/
310b3(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu'i bar ram/dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram/rgyal mye ma bzhi'i bar ram/'khor los sgyur ba'i bar ramo/chu'i bar 'am/me'i bar ram/sa'i bar gyis gang bar
310b4(mdo sde): byed do//de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis na mkha' thams cad me tog gi bar dang /rin po che'i phreng po dang /spos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dun dang /ras
310b5(mdo sde): bcos bu dang /chos gos dang /rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed de//sus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu shin tu/
310b6(mdo sde): bsgoms pa yin zhing shin tu 'dris par byas la shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro//de de ltar bsod nams dang /stobs
310b7(mdo sde): dang /brtson 'grus dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /rnam par rol pa dang /mngon par shes pa tshod med par 'gyur ro//des de ltar gang yang rung ba
311a1(mdo sde): dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na myung du 'khor ba las rnam par thar bar 'gyur te/mtshams med pa pyod pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /'phags
311a2(mdo sde): pa la sgyur ba 'debs pa ni ma gtogs so//de lta yin yang 'tshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /'phagaso pa la bskur ba 'debs pa de'ang /bdun phrag bdun
311a3(mdo sde): du bzhi pa rlud kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas las kyi sgrib pa sum
311a4(mdo sde): tsu ma zad cing lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro//bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa de lta bu de ni de ltar don che ba
311a5(mdo sde): yin no//sul pa bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yod la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsom rna lam du thos pa de la mi 'am mi ma yin po'i bar de nye bar btu/
311a6(mdo sde): nas dad pa dang /dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba skye'o//de btson ri'i 'ching bu dam po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro//gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems
311a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thor bar 'gyur ro//longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang /chad pa dang /brdeg pa dang /g.yengs sa dang /me dang /chu dang /
311b1(mdo sde): dug dang /dgra thams cad dang /'byung po thams cad dang /nad kyi 'jigs pa dang /gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas bran gyi 'jigs pa zhes/
311b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro//bde 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro//su sangs rgyaso rjes su dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam
311b3(mdo sde): rna lam du grags na de la nye bar gartags nas dad pa skyes s+ho/de ltar don che zhing phan yon che ba yin na su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du bsgom po lta smos kyang ci dgos/chos kyi rnam
311b4(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur to//ji ltar
311b5(mdo sde): sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to//de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//
311b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor deng 'bras bu dang po la gnas par gyur to//kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par
311b7(mdo sde): gyur to//de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed do//mun bral ma la sogs pa'i bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag
312a1(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs su spang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'dri thams cad thos so//thos nas
312a2(mdo sde): kyang bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa nyid thob bo//gang dag sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dog thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur to//ji skad
312a3(mdo sde): bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to//de dag thams cad tshangs po chen po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag
312a4(mdo sde): mang pos yongasu bskor cing bye ba brgya phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te/sil snyan dang /pheb rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi
312a5(mdo sde): khyab pa bkod pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du babs te/bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dag dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
312a6(mdo sde): dong /ba dan dag dang rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing mngon par gtor te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan
312a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i
312b1(mdo sde): lde'u ste dgu pardzogs s+ho///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku ma la dga' bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs
312b2(mdo sde): kyi bu legA 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal ta byos shig ces bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus
312b3(mdo sde): lags kyis gshegs shig/bcom ldan 'odas gang khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzod cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i
312b4(mdo sde): las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no//yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas grul bum thams cad ces bya
312b5(mdo sde): ba'i bar dag me tog dang /spos dang /rin po tshe dang /ras bcos pu dang /chos gos dang /rgyan dang /spud pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gyi char pa dog
312b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyun bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis sngags pa'i yon tan gyis bstod nas bcom ldan 'das
312b7(mdo sde): gdan las mngon par bzhengs te ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so//'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang gang
313a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bdun du bdur ts+tshe byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes yongs su sorang kyi glu shugs par//
313a2(mdo sde): bzhed par shes so//de ltar rig nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'dres kyi phyir ro ni de che sna bdun las byas pa ras bac+doMs bu sna tshogs dang /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me
313a3(mdo sde): tog bkram pa'i themaska sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the mo skas las gshegs par gsol/lce'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyis kyang bcom
313a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi phyir dzaM m+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi tham skas tsan+dan sbrul gyi steng ba'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsil to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi thems
313a5(mdo sde): skas rnams las gshegs par gsol//lha'i bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi gser gyi them skas tsan+dan sa mchog sna tshogs bskum pa sprul nas 'dri
313a6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai DUr+ya
313a7(mdo sde): them skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsal//
313b1(mdo sde): sna'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi d+hir+ya lha rdzas kyi phyem sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par
313b2(mdo sde): gsol/sku rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'ongs kyi phyir mu ti gA dmar bo'i them skas lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi bye me sna tshogs dang /rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis
313b3(mdo sde): yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas la gshegs par gsol/rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rgyus
313b4(mdo sde): kyi rin po mardo'i snying po lus byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos pu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs pa'i tham skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi
313b5(mdo sde): tham skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas kyi lha rdzas
313b6(mdo sde): gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid du sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi the mo skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par
313b7(mdo sde): gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtsonas bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku drug sprul nas sangs rgyas bdun po de dag lha'i dbang po dang //
314a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyi mdun du 'dar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas bcom
314a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rje mod gshegs so//sangs rgyas bdun po de dag mchog tu ljon ni lhung nger ri rab kyi rtse mo ni bzhugs so//sangs rgyas kyi su re re
314a3(mdo sde): las 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/dper na zla ba dang nye ma bye ba drug stong shar ba bzhin no//klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du lhags par de dag thams cad kyis de mthong nas
314a4(mdo sde): spyad mor gyur te gcig lha gcig dris ste/snang bachen po'i nang na rten par rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa bdun pa de dag ga las 'dis/dga' ba dang /nye dga' gnyis kyis smras pa
314a5(mdo sde): rirab rtse li lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'den pa 'di gnas pa/kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyi rig pa'i phar rol phyin//bdag cag yin
314a6(mdo sde): brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed//'ching po rnams las thar bar byed kyis kun kyang de la mgo bos phyug 'tshul cigo//ma dros pas 'di skad
314a7(mdo sde): ces smras so//de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can//khyod la snying rtse ba yis bu dang skyo bas yongs bskor 'di ni gnas
314b1(mdo sde): yi//'di ni gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing sgom pa'i nad kyis 'jigs//sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams las thar
314b2(mdo sde): bar byed//sa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so//de lta ma yin 'dir rgyal lha dbang 'thab bral dga' ldan 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul pa//de dag khyod la snying la rtse ba yis ri la
314b3(mdo sde): gnos shing klu yi tshogs la lta//bdag cag yongs su skyobs shes kun gyis gsang 'thor de dag la ni 'o dod pas//de dag rtag tu pade dang ldan pas khyed cag btson ra dag nas
314b4(mdo sde): zhi bar byed//rgya mtshos smras pa/de dag ma yin 'di ni lho dbang brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba//de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su yod brtse ba'i yid kyis
314b5(mdo sde): blta//khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la khro ba myur du dor bar gyis//de yis myur du lag 'gro bar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun nas thar bar byed//shin tu
314b6(mdo sde): brtan gyis smras pa/de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs brten lha tshegs bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can//sems can rnams kyi ched du drang srong 'dir 'dzegs 'khod nas brtse
314b7(mdo sde): bas phyogs rnams su//myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'go ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char pa 'bebs//lha yi yid kyis thams cad de la phyag tshol 'di nas bdag cag
315a1(mdo sde): thar bar byed//klu lus 'jigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so//'di ni gzugs na rten pa'i lha min bzhi po 'di kun bdud kyi 'byor pa yin//lus /
315a2(mdo sde): ngan skye mchog bdud rtsi'i skom dang rgyu bar btags pa 'di dag gnas pa ni//gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi sbyang byed sdig pa'i skye bo sgrol//de dag gis ni
315a3(mdo sde): bdag cag sems can gzhan mthong 'di ni myur du thar bar byed//klu rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smras so//de dag mo yin de ni mgo brags ngur smrig gos can 'khod par snang
315a4(mdo sde): ba yin//de dag la ni kun lha thal mo sbyar 'khod skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin//bdun po de dag cher sbubs brtul zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs dag gis mthong ba yin//dur smrig gos
315a5(mdo sde): bgos mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os par mthong //klu lus 'bigs pa'i khabs kyis 'di skad ces smras so//'di ni bdag nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'dren
315a6(mdo sde): pa yin te nga la de ltar snang //sems can rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal ba rgya mtsho sel byed pa//gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams kyang ni de yis
315a7(mdo sde): sprul pa yin//bdag cig la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams thar par byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo de la bzhugs ma thag tu ri rab dpag tshad brgyad
315b1(mdo sde): cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo brgya spyod yod par gyur to//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi stong du lta rdzas kyi rinong tshe sna bdun las byas pa'i khang /
315b2(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thugs pa'i bar man tshod sna tshogs pa/blta ni sdug pa/dpag tshad brgya stong du mar spras pa de srid cig sprul te/de ni bcom ldan 'das la
315b3(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang /chos gos dang /rgyun dang /sdud pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdan dang /spos dang /me tog ste tshogs kyis
315b4(mdo sde): shin tu brgyan pa ro sprul po yin no//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bos te bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni nga dang /sangs rgyas
315b5(mdo sde): rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams dang /drang srong rnams dang /bdud rnams dang /dbang cher bar grags pa'i lha dang /klu
315b6(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to//de bzhin du da lta re ri rab 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis shin tu longs spyad
315b7(mdo sde): zin te/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad rten te/
316a1(mdo sde): ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i 'byung po khyed la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na btsun pa
316a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /ri rab la longs spyad par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gal
316a3(mdo sde): te yang geng su dag bdud dam/brgya byin nom/tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang po 'am/klu'i dbang po 'am/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/dri za'i dbang po 'am/lha ma yin gyi
316a4(mdo sde): dbang po'am/na mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/mi 'am ci'i dbang po'am/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/sems can dbang che bar grags pa/dbang che bar grags pa
316a5(mdo sde): lce'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas mi'i drang srong gi bar de dag thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur na 'dir bdag cag la shas cher phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so//
316a6(mdo sde): drer bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/de'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /lib rganA dang /shel
316a7(mdo sde): gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo //'od zer de dag gshegs nas bdud kyi gnas byi ba phrag brgya dang /brgya byin gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang /chongs pa'i
316b1(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba nas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang /lha ma yin gyi gnas dang /drang srong gi gnas bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad du 'od zer
316b2(mdo sde): de dag zhugs so//de dang de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang med par grags po bdud dam zhes bya ba nas drang srong rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du btags pa de dang de
316b3(mdo sde): dgra thams cad la rab tu glo bar mdzad nas bdud ces bya ba nas drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de dag de nas chas rje bcom ldan 'das go la ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku drug
316b4(mdo sde): po de dag ga lwa bar skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gos 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul pa dag rgyan bcad nas bka' stsal pa/de'i srings
316b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na ri rab 'di ni mchog drang phul yin par ngas br-i shud de/ri rab 'di ni 'dus pa chen po
316b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis longs spyod pa yin zhing ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no//de thos nas brgya byin kau shi ka dang zhes bya ba nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i
316b7(mdo sde): bar mchog tu yid bde ba dang rangs pa skyes so//bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de nas song ste/klu'i rgyal ba
317a1(mdo sde): rgyu mtsho ni 'di nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug mas 'dug nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo gzhag te bcom ldan 'das 'ba'
317a2(mdo sde): zhig la lta'o zhes bya ba nas klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni byang phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /klu'i
317a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa ni shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas re rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhig sti bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lte'o//
317a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni de nas 'drong bar ma nus so//de dag thams cad kyis gsang stod de 'di skad ces smras so//btson
317a5(mdo sde): ra 'di nas bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol//yongs su thar bar mdzad par gsol/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' gnyis bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas
317a6(mdo sde): 'dir gshegs shing gnas rten 'dir bzhugs nas klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste dri dag gnyis gnas rten nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de srid kyi rang gi lus sprul
317a7(mdo sde): to//de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/klu de dag ni lus rtsub cing 'dus te reg na gdug pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral bar gyur nA me rung ngo //
317b1(mdo sde): snyam nas/des lag 'gro'o lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongs su g.yogs shing mgo la tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas yongs su g.yogs te lhardzas
317b2(mdo sde): kyi me tog dag mngon par gter to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de rgya dpog tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtswa bzhi par sprul to//mi
317b3(mdo sde): 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ras bcos pu dang /rgyan dang /ner bu dang /rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag gting ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
317b4(mdo sde): ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas kun shes kau DI n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi yul/
317b5(mdo sde): kyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston te/kau Di n+ya gang mig gi skye ba dang /gnas pa dang /'byung ba dang /nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni
317b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi skyo ba'o//'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnos pa'o//'dri ni rga shi'i 'byung ba'o//kau Di n+yai gang rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi skye
317b7(mdo sde): bi dang /gnas pa dang /'byung ba dang /nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o//'di ni nad dang /srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o//
318a1(mdo sde): /'di na//shi'i 'byung //Don+yA gang ts+tshig gi 'phrog pa dang /dar zhi ba dang /nub pa dang /nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba 'di ni rdzu/bsngal gyi 'gag
318a2(mdo sde): pa'o//'di ni sred pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar bzhi pa'o//'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o//kau Di n+yas gang rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'gog pa dang /nye bar
318a3(mdo sde): zhi ba dang /nub pa dang /nye bar len pa rnam par zhi ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o//'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o//'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o//chos
318a4(mdo sde): gang gis dra lha dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa dang /lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye 'i 'jig rten na phul yin par grags pa dang /
318a5(mdo sde): byams pa chen pos mchog yin par grags pa dang /snying rje chen pos dam pa yin par grags pa dang /'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas bla na med par grags pa dang /sbyin
318a6(mdo sde): po dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyi sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i chos kyi sbyin po dag dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /
318a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos de ni ngas sems can thams cad la rgya cher bstan to//
318b1(mdo sde): gsol bar mdzad do//ston pa thugs brtse ba can phan par bzhed pas gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa ni ngas mdzad zin te/du khyed cag gis bya ba yin no//rga shi'i mthar/
318b2(mdo sde): dbyung ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang /shing drung dang /dur khrod dang /ri dang /ri khrod dang /bas mtha'i gnas mal de dag tu phyis 'gyed pa can du gyur nA mi rung gis sgoms
318b3(mdo sde): 'ad //rtsolo cig/nged kyis rjes su bstan pa ni 'dri yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod 'dri'i gling bzhi pa bye ba
318b4(mdo sde): phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gling bzhi pa re rer yang sems cad dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po de dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed de//kha cig ni ting
318b5(mdo sde): dri 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa rnams la rnam par gnas par gyu to//de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig bskyed do//kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las
318b6(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa rnams byung ngo zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i bar dang /kha cig gnod sbyin dbul po nyid kyi bar dang /kha cigo ni mi dbul po nyid du
318b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su byang ngo //nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to//sems can rnams btson ra nas yongs su thar par gyur to//de nas
319a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/dge ba sna tshogs dri ma med pa'i gser can spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes phyug/lha
319a2(mdo sde): dang shed las skyes dang lag 'gro'i dam pa nyon mongs rnyog pa sel mdzad pa//tshul khrims thos rig gsum po phun sum tshogs pa sems can thams cad 'jud pa'o//lag 'gro'i
319a3(mdo sde): tshogs rab thar mdzad thugs rje brtan po sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs par mdzod//gzhan sems sems can slad du sdug bsngal ji ltar btang ba bzhin//lag 'gro'i skad cig mtha'
319a4(mdo sde): yas 'dir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs//dag yis phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba//ye shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad tshim par mdzad du
319a5(mdo sde): gsol//'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////'phags pa shin du rgyas pa chen
319a6(mdo sde): po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//kham po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang /rin po che dang /chos gos dag gi char rab tu 'bebs shing /sil snyan
319a7(mdo sde): dang /pheb rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin thams cad sdod pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te/bcom
319b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten gyi dbus su gdan gting ba nyid la
319b2(mdo sde): bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir steng gi na mkha' la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan pa dang /phye
319b3(mdo sde): ma sna tshogs dang /me tog sna tshogs dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo//bcom ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang me tog sna tshogs dang /dri sna tshogs dang /rin po tsho sna/
319b4(mdo sde): tshogs dang /ras gos dang /res bcos bu dang /chos gos dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
319b5(mdo sde): phyag btsal nas spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol te//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das su ga las gang
319b6(mdo sde): drug gis sems can rnams klu'i skye gnas su skye lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po las kyi sgrib pa bcus sems can 'byung po rnams myur du klu'i
319b7(mdo sde): skye gnas su skyeso//bcu gang zhe na sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag yin lo myur
320a1(mdo sde): du 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su lta ba ma yin zhing shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la ldag pa brkyang ba dag yod de/de dag smon lam gyi dbang
320a2(mdo sde): gis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod
320a3(mdo sde): da/de dag gis tshul khrims thams cad rdzogs par skyon med par bsrung bar ni ma nus so//de dag sems can dmyal po dang /yi dgas kyi 'jigs pas skrag nas rang gi smon
320a4(mdo sde): lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol bar byed cing shin tu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dag yod do//de dag nga rgyal gyis
320a5(mdo sde): mthus rang gi smon lam gyi klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/de dag shin tu khro ba mang zhing
320a6(mdo sde): sems can gzhin rnams la rab tu sdang ste/de dag sha kho na la rten pas 'chi ba'i dus tha mar klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/de dag smon lam gyis der skye'o//yang
320a7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang yang dag par ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas yongs su bcol ba dang mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag yod de/de dag rang
320b1(mdo sde): gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skyo'o//yang sems can gang dag sar sna can dang nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag yod de/de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag
320b2(mdo sde): nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing mu btsor smra la brdzun du smra ba dag yod de//de dag las dos klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa
320b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa mang ba dag yin zhing /chos dang /dge 'dun dang bslab pa dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /bla mI gnas lta bu dang /pha ma rnams lo gces par byed po ma yin//
320b4(mdo sde): pa mang ba drag yin pa yod de/de'i tshe de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang /lus dang /ngag dang /yid chung ngus 'khrul pas klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang ///
320b5(mdo sde): gti mug gis zil gyis non cing ma dul la skyon med pa ma yin par spod pa dag yod de/de dag klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang /phra ma smra ba dang /
320b6(mdo sde): tshig rtsub po slu ba la goms pa dag yod de/de dag 'chi ba'i dus bya sngo nr-i klu rnams kyi nang du skye ste bcu po de dag yin no//chos gzhan gsum dang ldan no klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//
320b7(mdo sde): gsum gang zhe na/sems can gang dag lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi nyes par spyod pa shin tu dam po dag gis sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag yod de
321a1(mdo sde): de dag de nas shi 'phos nas nyes par spyod pa'i lhag ma chung ngus klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang /de bzhin du yi dgas rnams nas/
321a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/chos gsum po de dag gis sems son rnams klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//rgya mtshos kyang gsol ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no//btsun/
321a3(mdo sde): pa bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni klu gang dgo longs spyod pa dang /nye bar spyod pa'i dpal dang ldan pa lha dang 'dra ba dag mchis
321a4(mdo sde): pa nas ma smad rims dang 'dra ba dag gi bar mchis pa'i bar dang yi dgas dang /'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang /gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /'dra ba dag mchis
321a5(mdo sde): pa'i bar dang klu gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba dag gi bar mchis lags te/de dag sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba myong bar 'gyur lags so//de nas klu'i rgyal po'i
321a6(mdo sde): bu pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol te//bdag sug las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas gzugs mchog tu lham me zhing lus kyis reg pa gang chung
321a7(mdo sde): zad ci reg kyang kun tu tshig cing 'bar ba lags/bdag dus thams cad du mchil lham bo ro nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/bdag gi pha ma de ni dpal
321b1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa'i ches khyad par du 'phags pa myong ste/dper na gling bzhi bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye
321b2(mdo sde): lag 'gro ston byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sumo cu rnaM bcig pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
321b3(mdo sde): ba'i bar gtsug ter can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/rgyal po me tog bral des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug
321b4(mdo sde): gtor can nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad phul nas rtag tu chos mnyan
321b5(mdo sde): te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo//bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so//rgyal
321b6(mdo sde): pe me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/do shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga'i ra
321b7(mdo sde): bA de rjes skyong zhing 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang /de na gang dag gza' ba dang /gtung ba dang /mal tsho la longs spyod
322a1(mdo sde): par byed pa thams cad ma tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub rji drasha dog byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de
322a2(mdo sde): nas dong ngo //de'ang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyod par mi byed/gzhan dog la'ang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas dge slong de'ang 'chi ba'i dus byas
322a3(mdo sde): nas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bor du'o//de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmal ba chen po'i nang du skyes
322a4(mdo sde): nas bcas so//de do nas shi 'phos nas yi dgas rnams kyi nang du smyos te/lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo //phyi'ang sems can dmyal ba dang yi dgas rnams/
322a5(mdo sde): kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo //lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang srid skyob bcas zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste/de nos shi 'phos nas de ltar yun por ngan song gsum du
322a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems can gzhan yin par yang blta bar mau bya ste/de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa'ang khyod yin no//'di phan chad
322a7(mdo sde): bskal ba sum bcu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan sang gsum gyi nang du skyes so//de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi
322b1(mdo sde): khyod yin te/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo //gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis
322b2(mdo sde): gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do//klu'i du de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
322b3(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang /rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /mi gsal ba dang /mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin nongs pa so sor 'cha gas lags so nongs pa so sor 'chags lags
322b4(mdo sde): so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsam pas sdom pa gzungs par bgyi'o//bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa
322b5(mdo sde): spangs pa lags so//bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//khyod lhag pa'i
322b6(mdo sde): bsam pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su zad do//'di nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te/byams
322b7(mdo sde): pa'i tha dad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang
323a1(mdo sde): bcas pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang /de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thums cad phun sum tshogs
323a2(mdo sde): par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhi ga yin par khyod sems ni de gzhan yin par yang mi lta ste/de na klu'i rgyal po rgyo mtsho 'di yin no//'di ni bskal
323a3(mdo sde): pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes so//lha'i dpal dong skal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myang ngo //'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i phyir
323a4(mdo sde): smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/'dir dpal dang skal pa bzang po de lta bu myong ngo //de skad ces thos nas klu thams cad skye zhing mchog tu yid mi
323a5(mdo sde): bde nas bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtog pas gces par byed par gyur to//de'i nang na klu gzhan mig med pa long po 'bras bu nyam chung ba zhes
323a6(mdo sde): bya ba zhig yod de/des gsang bstod nas 'o dod bos te gsol pa/sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba bdag cig yongs su bskyab pa gsol//yun ring bdag gi
323a7(mdo sde): lus la sdug bsngal tshe rab rab mi zad//srin bu sbal pa skye bo sgrog chags sna tshogs 'tshal bar bgyid//bza' ba gtung ba ma mchi so tshab chen nang na bdag gnas lags//
323b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'khor ba 'jig rgyal bstan pa la//sngon gyi dge sbyong khyod gyur to//mkhas shing gtsang sbra spyod lam ldan//dbyen pa dag tu'ang sdig pa byed/
323b2(mdo sde): lhan cig gnas pa dag kyang mang //khyod bdag ston pa 'dri bar gyur//dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul tshon po yang //khyod la slob ma rnams kyis brjod//rnyed dang bkur sti byung ba ni//khyod
323b3(mdo sde): gcig bu yis longs spyad cing //khyod kyis dge slong nges pa mthong //de dag la ni mi sbyin brjod//lhan cig gnas de mi dgar gnas//khyod ni tshe rabs stong dag tu//nged kyi zas su
323b4(mdo sde): gyur cig ces//de lta bu yi sems bskyed do//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//'dir yang khyod ni lag 'gror skyes//khyod rang gi yang lhan cig gnas//phyi phyir za bar byed pa
323b5(mdo sde): yin//chu chen nang na gnas pa dang //long bar de is gyur pa ini//kun tu 'bar ba'i lcags dang zangs//phyis kyang da na/la bar za bar 'gyur//stobs med oMd ni
323b6(mdo sde): mi dgra' bas//klu dbang kun gyi nang na du//nyes pa so sor bshags byas na//sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su grol//de nis bcom ldan gser 'dra ba'i//phyag gis
323b7(mdo sde): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor reg/spyod pa dka' ba dgongs mdzad nas//ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to//rgyal po mig bzangs nga byung ste//sngon tshe bden pa gang gis ngas//
324a1(mdo sde): bram ze long ba'i don du ni//mig dag gnyis ka phyung bar gyur//bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis//khyod kyis dri med mig thob shog/nga yi legs
324a2(mdo sde): par spyod pasna khyod//sngon gyi las de byung bar shog+sa/tid+ya thA/tsak+Shu kha ba/ra~M sa na kha ba~M/karma kha ba/a nan dza nA/bir dzi bor an+ta/dz+nyA mA ni sa ra Na to ya/aH
324a3(mdo sde): /m-i shwAr+t+ti/pas bAd+d+ho/at+te/tAk+Shed+hIn tu ma~M/bsad+g+has ke/d+hamat+te/DUr te/mahAn+d+ha bi/tri radA na brAh+mehU~M/bcom ldan 'das kyis
324a4(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig de bshad pa na klu 'bras bu nyam chung ba'i mig yongs su dag par gyur to//klu gzhan stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi mig kyang yongs su dag par gyur
324a5(mdo sde): to//gzhan gnod sbyin dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang sha za dang /mi khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtse bzhi ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zad cing mig yongs su drag
324a6(mdo sde): pabar gyur to//de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas smras pa/'jig rten 'dron pa rnams kyi stobs la ltos//rab tu lam med rnams la mig
324a7(mdo sde): kyang bya na//gal te ston pa 'jig rten mi 'byung na//su yang 'gro bor sha'i mig phyis mi 'thob//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la
324b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/kau Di n+ya khyod kyis gsang sngags chen po'i gzhi'i gzungs sngags mig sgrub pa 'di gzung zhig/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la sems can rnams
324b2(mdo sde): kyi sngon gyi las kyi lhag mo dang /khams kun tu 'khrugs pa dang /gsade sngags dang /sman dang /dug gi sbyor bas ldong bar 'gyur ba dang /cung zad mthong bar yang
324b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba des mig sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di rang gis bklag par bya'o//rang gi las so sor gshags par bya'o//des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems
324b4(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing las gzhan mi byed par zhag bdun phrag bdun du rang gi mig la byi bas na mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//yang sems
324b5(mdo sde): can gang dag mtshams med pa'i las lhag ma lus pas long bar gyur cing dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lhag mau lus pa dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i lhag ma
324b6(mdo sde): lus pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang /gleg snga bam du sgris pa rnam par 'jig pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang /gzhan gyi mig rnam par 'jig pa'i
324b7(mdo sde): las kyi lhag mas long bor gyur pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di yi ge 'drar bcug ste/yang dang yang du klog tu gzhug go//las kyi sgrib pa bshags par bya'o//
325a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i grub dang //shing mngaru dang /sman katsa dang /'bras bu gsum dang /rus sbrul gyi snying rnying ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig
325a2(mdo sde): gtags cing btsos la gsang sngags 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad mngon par brjo cing mig gi phyi rol tu bskur bar bya'o//zhag bdun phrag bdun du las gzhan
325a3(mdo sde): mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur zhing de'i mig yongasu dag par 'gyur//
325a4(mdo sde): gzhon yang dge slong rnams kyi gnas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas na 'ong de'i las kyi sgrib pa byung bar 'gyur ro//phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma ching bar mi
325a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor des 'di skad ces gsol to//thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan
325a6(mdo sde): par mdzad pa nad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas de'i tshe klu tshon rtsi sngon pos gsang stod de 'di skad ces gsol to//sdig pa thams
325a7(mdo sde): cad sbyong ba khyod//khyod ni dka' mjed dpal kun ldan//khyod kyis las kyang rab tu me khyen//srog chags kun gyi rgyal po khyod //bdag ni chu dang rnam bral zhing //
325b1(mdo sde): tsha ba'i klung gis kun gdungs pa'i//'brog dgon pa na gnas pa lags//dri mi zhim pa'i gnas na gnas//lo ni bye ba phrag stong du//zhag gcig bdag la bde ma mchis
325b2(mdo sde): rtag par 'khor dang lha ni cig tu//bdag ni gzhan gyis bza' ba lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems can de dag sdig byas nas//phyis kyang bdag
325b3(mdo sde): nyid bsod nams sgrub//lus kyis gaN+DI brdungs nas su//dge slong dge 'dun tshim byed na'ang //las kyi lhag ma de yis su//gang dang gang du skyes par no//sdug bsngal
325b4(mdo sde): ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur zhing //bza' gtung dag dang yang dag ldan//yang na klu yi skye gnas su//las kyis skye bar 'gyur ba yin//de yi mgo oM klad pa de ra//nor bu'i
325b5(mdo sde): rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur//kun tu chu 'byung zhes bya ba//chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyur ro//gang na klu ni gnas byed pa//de nas chu ni 'bab par 'gyur//sa'am na mkha'
325b6(mdo sde): la yang rung //gang dang gang du 'gro ba der//sems ni bskyed ma thog tu yang //chu yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin//yong na sems can gang dag gis//mo'i dngos po thob nas su//
325b7(mdo sde): sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas//dge 'dun rim gro mi byed na//de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs ni//ngan song gsum du myong nas kyang //de nyid klu yi skye gnas su//skye ba
326a1(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba yin//de las kun tu chu mi 'byung //mgo lnga nor bu rin chen med//stong pa skom pa'i gnas dag tu//chu med par ni gnas par 'gyu/
326a2(mdo sde): sngon 'das dus na khyod kyis ni//rgyal ba sker rgyal bstan pa la//dge slong dgon pa bar gyur te//phrag dog ser snas gang ba yin//dge slong glo bur 'angs mthong nas//khro gnyer
326a3(mdo sde): can gyi bzhin byas nas//de dag la ni sbyin gtong byed//de la yang ni mngon sum gshe/der ni gang dag chur yang ni//myur du mi gtsang ba yis bkang //'chags sa gnas khang
326a4(mdo sde): dag gi khanas//dri nga ba yis bkang bar gyur//dge slong nges pa 'gro ba na//brgyad bkag gis ni gshi bar gyur//dge slong des pa gzhan dag kyang //rgyang ring bar ni yongs su
326a5(mdo sde): spangs//de phyir phrag dog ser sna'i rgya//me chod par ni khyod gyur nas//dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong //myur du khros nas gshe bar 'gyur//sbyin pa po la khro bas gshe/ngo tsha khrel
326a6(mdo sde): yod rnam par spangs//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//sems can dmyal por so sor skyes//lus ni byi bas sems dmyal du//sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong //yi dgas
326a7(mdo sde): rnams su dus ring por//sdug bsngal rab tu mi zad myong //khyod ni klu yi skye gnas su//skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal gyur//stong pa 'brog dgon rdzong rnams su//chu dang bral
326b1(mdo sde): bar gnas pa yin//sems can dmyal ba rnams su khyod//sdug bsngal tshor ba phyi phyir myong //shin tu yun ring yi dgas dang //dud 'gror sdug bsngal tsher ba myong //su zhig tha ma'o
326b2(mdo sde): dus tshe gnod sems byung //rtag tu phrog dog ser sna khros pa li//bsam gtan mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min//tshul khrims mi skye ba dgon par gnas pa mino//yang de'i tshe klu'i
326b3(mdo sde): 'khor de'i nang na klu yi dgas lta bu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa drug sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran por gyur te/skad po cher rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
326b4(mdo sde): bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol//sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bdag cag gis 'dra mtshungs par las
326b5(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa de lta bu 'phang so lags so//de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong lags so//da ltar yang klu yi dgas lta bu rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal de
326b6(mdo sde): lta bus gzir legs te/dper na klu yi dgas lta bu tshon rtsi sngon po bzhin no//bcomo ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis chu long la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
326b7(mdo sde): zhabs kyi drung du chag chag thob cig dang /des ni khyed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro//de nas klu yi dgos lta bu de dag thams cad kyis lag pa
327a1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis kr-izlas pa dang /lcug na chu 'dug pa de rab tu 'bar ro//de nas me'i phung po shrI ta la drug srid du 'phags te/lan bdun gyi bar du
327a2(mdo sde): bzhin no//klu'i tshogs de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas mchi ma dag phyung ngo //thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dri'ang yid kun tu mi dga' nas de bzhin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis
327a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/de 'dra ba yis 'bras bu 'thob/dge ba yin ni bzang po ste/sdig pu byed pa'ang sdig te'o//de nas yi dgas lta bu'i klu/khyed kun
327a4(mdo sde): 'di skad tshig smros shig/bden pa gang gis ston pa ni/sems can kun la thugs snyoms pa//bden pa'i tshi ga de kho na yis//nged kyi chu ni ma 'bar cig/rmi tha mos
327a5(mdo sde): cad kyis de skad ces smras so/lan brgyad pa la lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtor nas nyes pa la nyes pa so sor bshegs so//
327a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yi//lhag ma lus pa yongs su zad /byams pa'i tshe na khyed cag ni/mi yi srid pa thob par 'gyur/
327a7(mdo sde): byams pa yi ni bstan pa la//myur du rab tu 'byung ba thob//rnal 'byor la ni mngon brtson dang //myur du dgra bcom thob par 'gyur//yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
327b1(mdo sde): mthus klu'i tshogs de ji ltar ltogs pa bzhin de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dang bdag gi las dang /'gro ba dang /skye ba rjes su dran te/'khor de'i nang nas klu brgya stong
327b2(mdo sde): phrag mang po rang gis nyes par byas pa'i sdig pa'i lus kyis rab tu nguste nas kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsal te/sngon gyi dro bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa li bdag
327b3(mdo sde): khyim na gnas par gyur te/ho du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang /chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis dge slong rnams dang lhan cig tu dge 'dun gyi sngon du gyur pa bsngos pa'i me tog dang /
327b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang /khu ba dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba nas pa cig gis gsol pa/bdag cag gis phyogs bzhi pa la bsngos pa longs spyad
327b5(mdo sde): lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/bdag cag gis rang gis bsngos pa longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'i/kha cig gis
327b6(mdo sde): gsol ba/bdago cag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /bdag cag gtsug gtor con gyi zhes bya ba'i bor dang /bdag cag 'khor ba
327b7(mdo sde): 'jig gi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /bdag cag gser thub kyi zhes bya ba'i bor du'o//klu kha cig gis ni 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bstan pa
328a1(mdo sde): la bdag cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang /chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis de bzhin du bsngos pa'i dge 'dun gyi/
328a2(mdo sde): me tog dang /'bras bu dang /khu ba dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dge slong rnams la stsal ba de bdag cag gis longs spyod lags so//sdig pa'i las des kyang sems
328a3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal mi zad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu mi zad pa mang po yang dang yang nyams su myong lags so//dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi
328a4(mdo sde): nang du dus yun ring por rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir lags so//las kyi lhag ma des bdag cag klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes nas chab bskol ba kun tu tsha ba'i//
328a5(mdo sde): nang du btsos lags so//bye ma kun tu tsha ba nang du bsregs lags so//bdag cag gi kha'i sgor kha zas stsol pa 'ang lcags kyi thu lum du gyur lags so//de bzhin du
328a6(mdo sde): khar ltung ba stsal ba'ang lcags dang zangs su gyur legs so//gang dang gang du mchis pa thams cad sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong lags na bdag cag yongs su
328a7(mdo sde): bskyab tu gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye lag 'gro dag khyed kyis dge 'dun gyi longs spyod pa de ni 'os pa mo yin te/mtshams med pa dang //
328b1(mdo sde): yin no//rnam par ma sbyin par gang gis kyu myur du bshags par mi nus so//kyai lag 'gro dag hUM m+b+ha in+ta yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du skyabs su 'gro ba la 'khang kyi
328b2(mdo sde): dang /de lta na khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//rgyu des de bzhin gshegs pas khyed 'ding ba bzhin 'khor bar gzhig par mdzad de//de dag thams cad gsum/
328b3(mdo sde): basbyangs su 'gro ba la'ang bkod par gyur te//yang 'khor de'i nang na klu mo long ma zhig yod do//de'i kha srin bus gang zhing gcin rul pa lta bu'i rnag dring ba zag go//
328b4(mdo sde): smad kyi tshan ma la 'ang de bzhin no//de'i lus thams cad rul cing rnag 'jog pa pol mig dang srin bus gang ba la sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu mchu rangs dang /sbrang bu gdu
328b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis za bar byed do//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/bkris smras pa/sring mo khyod kyis sus la sdig pa'i las ni ci byas/
328b6(mdo sde): bu zhig/des gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba sdug bsngal ba lcags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba chub lags te//glang nas
328b7(mdo sde): blo'i spyi gnas dman pa 'dir skyes pa'i dgung mi stong drag sum cu rtsa drug bdag gis mngon par 'tshal lags so//bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu ni gdu
329a1(mdo sde): zhag gcig kyang rgyun ma chud lags so//bka' stsal pa/sngon gyi las ci zhig byas/des gsol pa/'dri nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig/
329a2(mdo sde): pa la rgyal ba rnam par gzigs kyi bstan pa la mi'i rgyud kyi bud med du gyur lags te/bdag de 'dod pa'i dregs pas mos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ra
329a3(mdo sde): tu byung ba dang lhan cig tu dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni dge 'dun gyi mal tsha'i steng du yang dang yang 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i tshe so 'dod pa dag so so yang dag par myong lags te/
329a4(mdo sde): nor gyi slad du ma skrag lags so//bcom ldan 'das de tshun chad bdag rtag tu lha dang mi'i rnyed pa dang bral lags so//rtag tu ngan song gsum gyi tshe ra ba mi zad pas rab tu gzir
329a5(mdo sde): lags so//bka' stsal pa//sring mo gang gi tshe 'dir bskal pa chen po 'jig par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod gang du song des gsol pa/sngon gyi las la brten pa'i rlung chen po de dag gis
329a6(mdo sde): 'phangs nas/'jig rten gyi khams snyigs me lnga dang ldan pa gzhan drug tu 'phangs legs so//yong gang gi tshe der 'jig par gyur nas de nas yang 'dir 'phangs lags na/bcom
329a7(mdo sde): na 'das thug rje chen pos bdag yongs su bsgrub tu gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis ka sa ma ci
329b1(mdo sde): chos dang sbyar ba'i chu bzhes te bden pa brjod par mdzad do//bden pa gang gis sngon thi ba'i phyir nga'i lus chags pa med par yongs su btang ba'i bden pa des khyod kyi nad de dag zhi
329b2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/klu mo de'i khar blugs shing lus la gtor bas nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/gsum la skyabs su nye bar gnas par gyur to//yang de nyid ni klu gzhan zhig
329b3(mdo sde): lus dra nga zhing srini bus gang la srin bu ser skyas gang nas de las rnag khrag tsha zhing gor gor po zag pa/sma mi nus po/mchog tu skyon du bgrang ba zhig yod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis
329b4(mdo sde): klu de gzigs nas bkas smras pa/lag 'gro khyod kyis sngon mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/klu des kha'i sgo phye nas srin bu'i rigaso dang /rnag khrag dang /mes grang ba'i kha'i sgo spyad
329b5(mdo sde): thims te smra ma nus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor chu zhig bzhes te bka' stsol pa/ri bong gyur to drang srong phyir//rang gi me yi nang bo re ba//bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis//
329b6(mdo sde): kle ni smra bar nus par sheg/skyor chu de klu'i khar blugaso nas de'i kha'i nang du me rab tu zhi zhing srin bu dang rnag khrag kho'i phyi rol du byung ngo //klu de kha yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di
329b7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba 'od srung gi bsten pa la bdag zhing par gyur lags so//bdog gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gzhan zhig la
330a1(mdo sde): spyod du sgrol cig dang /snron gyidus su khyod la dra du bA rnas gsor lda du zhig/gsol ba btu ba lags so//des bdag la 'gron bu brgyad cu ran
330a2(mdo sde): ban+da zhig stsal te/lnga bcur mi sku l-i legs so//dag gis dge sbyong de la khri bas zil gyis no/nas 'aglen buM brgyud nu'i rin bcu blangaswA te/de la skad yang mi sme lo legs
330a3(mdo sde): so//gzhan yang dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba dor bdug mchis nas der dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa a mra'i 'bras bu bcu gsum
330a4(mdo sde): pa longs spyad lags so//sug las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma de kho nas de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa skam po 'dir nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmal ba rnams kyu nang du skyes
330a5(mdo sde): te/rtag tu bdag gi lus srin bu dag dang rnag khrag brdung pas gang lags so//bkres pa dang skom pas kun tu gzir nas sdug bsngal gyi tshur po myong lags so//yang mo/
330a6(mdo sde): dag pa'i las kyi rgyu des bdage 'dre nas shi 'opho sde nas yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes legs so//dge slong de 'ang khro ba drang ser sna'i rgyu des 'chi ba'i
330a7(mdo sde): dus bgyis nas 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du bdag gi mchan khung du skyes te/dus rtag tu bdag la g.yo bar bgyid do//de rtag tu khro bas zil gyis non nas dbugs tsha bas
330b1(mdo sde): bdag gi lus la yongs su gang bar bgyid do//rgyu des rtag par rgyun du bdag gi lus srin bu dag dang rnag khrag gis gang lags na de bzhin gu shugs pas bdag yongs su bskyad/
330b2(mdo sde): tu gsol/sbrul dag dang 'dra ba de las bdag yongs su thar bar mdzad par gsol/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag tu chab ba zhes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mu
330b3(mdo sde): ge dag ni byung ba'i tshe//nga ni 'dir yang nyar gyur te//shra dang khrag gis tshim byas pas//khyed cag gnyis ka badre bar shog/chu des klu lnga gtor nas de'i mchan khung nas klu
330b4(mdo sde): bu byung ngo //gnyi gas 'di skad ces gsol to//yun ji tsam gyis ngan song dog las bdog cag thar bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye lag 'gro
330b5(mdo sde): dge gang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun nas dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa'i me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'dab ma dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /mal cha dang /rtsi/
330b6(mdo sde): dang /yo byad kyang rung /dge 'dun las gal te bdag gir longs spyod dam/gzhan la byin na sdig pa'i las de rnam par smin cing so so yang dag par ma myong bar sus kyang
330b7(mdo sde): myur du zad par bya mi nus te/'di ni mtshams med pa dang nye ba shin tu lci ba yin ni//log 'gro dag khyed tshur shig/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su deng shig dang /
331a1(mdo sde): des na khyod cag chu la gnas pa dag tu 'gyur ro//zhes bya ba nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su rnam par bkod de chu la gnas par gyur to//
331a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/su gri rnon po dag gis su//rang gi yan lag gtubs pa sla'i//bsngos zin pa yi dngos po ni//khyim
331a3(mdo sde): pa rnams la sbyin mi bya//me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi//lcags kyi thu lum zos smra yi//dge 'dun dag las gal te ni//dge 'dun gyi la longs mi spyad//lhun po dang ni
331a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i me//blang ba byas te zos pa sla'i//khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun gyi//longs spyad par ni mi bya'o//thams cad 'byung ba byas pa dang //gsol shing steng du steg
331a5(mdo sde): pa sla'i//khyim par gyur pa dge 'dun gyi//longs sprad par ni mi bya'o//mo mdag gis ni gang ba yi//gnas khang der ni zhugs pa bla'i//kham pas dge 'dun gnas
331a6(mdo sde): khang du//mau chen mo gnas par mi bya'o//me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi//lcags kyi thu lum blangs pa sla'i//rab tu byung dang khyim pa yis//dbyig ni blang par mi bya'o//'khor
331a7(mdo sde): lo rnon pos bdag gi lus//kun tu gtubs par byas pa sla'i//legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams la//rgyagaso dang gshe ba bskyed mi bya//legs par gsung
331b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos can gyi//mig ni rang gris phyung ba sla'i//sems can du ni bgrang ba lnga//khros pas skye dgu mo mngag go//legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyi//me yi gos ni gyon pa/
331b2(mdo sde): sla'i//tshul 'chos pa dang mthu yis su//khyim pa las ni gos mi bslang //me 'dra dar nri nga skol ba yi//rtsub 'gyur chu ni 'thungs pa sla'i//rab tu byung bas g.yo sgyu yis
331b3(mdo sde): bza' btung bslang bar mi bya'o//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu khri bzhi stong snyed sngon gyi nyes par byas pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu dag las yongs su thor bar

331b5(mdo sde): bcom ljon 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/kau Di n+ya sems can rnam sau rang la slu ba la ltos sems can gang dgra dbul po nyid kyi 'jig pas skrag
331b6(mdo sde): nas rang gis dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir yo byad kyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs bsngos la/kha cig gis ni rang gis longs spyad do///
331b7(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni gzhan dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir byin//kha cig gi mthus phrogs nas longs spyad pas de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal brten to//

332a3(mdo sde): tshig 'dron po btang nas nyams par gyur pa de dag kha cig ni dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin du bsngos pa rang gis phrogs

332a5(mdo sde): ngas nyes dmigs de yang dag par gzigs nas rang gis nga'i nyan thos rnams la dran par bya ba bca' bar mdzad de/nga'i nyan thos sus kyang dge slong la

332b1(mdo sde): zang zing gis yongs su bsdu ba'i rkyen gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal dag la dgod par mi bya'o//sems can rnams chos kyi sbubs bsdu bar bya'o//mi byed pa'i dad pa bzhi dang /theg pa
332b2(mdo sde): gsum dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la dgod par bya'o//'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde/nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo le'u bcu gcig pa las klu skyabs su 'gro ba'i le'u ste bcu

332b4(mdo sde): la gnas brtan kun shes kau DI n+yas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lag 'phro dag byin gyis brlab tu gsol/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las bstan pa'i spyod pa dang 'brel
332b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yun ring por 'bar bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji srid du gling bzhi pa 'dir mchod rten chen po 'di dag rnal 'byor yid la
332b6(mdo sde): byed pa la mngon par brtson pa thams cad kyis stongs par ma gyur pa de srid du gling bzhi pa 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro//mchod rten chen po gang dag ce na/
332b7(mdo sde): dzem+bu'i gling 'di na mchod rten drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni sngon ched sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang rgyal ba dang /nyan thos mang po gnas
333a1(mdo sde): gnas shing ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang gnas par 'gyur ba ste/rjes su bstan pa chen po yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun
333a2(mdo sde): rten 'di ni sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chu lha'i lag tu yongs su gtad pa mdzad do//ngas kyang de nyid kyi lag tu yongs su gtad te/'di'ang spro bar 'gyur
333a3(mdo sde): zhing gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//gang dag gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams la

333a6(mdo sde): mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyang chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so//gang dgra gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams
333a7(mdo sde): la rim gro la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de dag kyang de bzhin lags te/ji srid du dam pa'i chos 'bar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du bdag gis gnyis
333b1(mdo sde): ka bsrung lags so//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyi bar dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bar gyis kyang de'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi
333b2(mdo sde): ba'i slad du gtad lags so//de bzhin du da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten nas gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis
333b3(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang /gang dag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang sbyin
