371a3(mdo sde): po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod
371a4(mdo sde): kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang rgya chen po shes pa/
371a5(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa/gsal ba/le lo med pa/yi ge sgrub pa la mkhas pa/gnas dang gnas ma yin po khong du chud par byed pa/rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/'dul
371a6(mdo sde): ba'i myu gu dang ldan pa/ngo tsha shes pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa/snying rje'i bdag nyid can/sems can la mnyes gshin pa/ting nge 'dzin mang po dang ldan pa/shes rab kyi lag pa
371a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bla ma li sre zhu che ba/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gling dang mtshungs pa/dge ba dang mi dge ba shes pa/g.yo khong du chung par byed pa/
371b1(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig dang spobasra pa zad mi shes pa zung khong du chud par byed pa/rnam par rgyal ba thob pa/sems can thams cad la khong du chud par byed pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' lus
371b2(mdo sde): byung zhing brten pa/shin tu dpa' ba/gnas pa med pa/chos bla ma'i rang bzhin la nges pa/rang bzhin med pa'i khyad par sems dpa' snying po la dpa' ba/skye ba la smod pa'i
371b3(mdo sde): skyes bu/chos khong du chud par byed pa/mchin gyi gzhi shes pa/yul 'khor srung bya/yul 'khor skyong ba/zla grad pa po/rgyal ba'i sgra dang ldan paM/rnam par rgyal ba'i mdzod dang ldan pa/
371b4(mdo sde): yi ge med pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/shin tu gnyid kyis ma log pa/ye shes kyi phung po la gzhol ba/rong gi las la mngon par dga' ba/rang gi rig pa sten pa/kun tu bzang ba/mnyam
371b5(mdo sde): pa nyid la dga' ba/rnam par dag pa/rang gi rgyud dang /pha rol gyi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/rnam par rgyal ba thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
371b6(mdo sde): chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshwa sgrogs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i gnas dang /byang chub
371b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sprul pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gi 'byung gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon
372a1(mdo sde): lam brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang /byang //
372a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro ba 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i sgra dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa
372a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i mdab ma'i mig dang /byang chub
372a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i gdong dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na nor bu dang thabs cig go/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen
372a5(mdo sde): po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa shra stag dang lha ni cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems
372a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byamos po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang rgyal tshab tu gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems
372a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni brgya byin du ma dang lhan cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
372b1(mdo sde): mkha'i snying po dang rgyal po chen po bzhi ni 'khor los sgyur ba du ma dag dang lhan cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
372b2(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni tshangs pa du ma dag dang lhan cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yid ni 'khor rnam thos kyi bu du ma dag dang lhan cig
372b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po ni 'jig rten skyong ba lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid gnyis 'joms dang /
372b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad 'dzin pa du ma dang lhan cig/shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /
372b5(mdo sde): med+gal gyi bu dang /'od srung chen po la sogs pa dgra bcom pa thams cad dang lhan cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge mang dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
372b6(mdo sde): po khyad par sems ni lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman/
372b7(mdo sde): yang dag byung dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na zla ba dang nyi ma rang gi gzi brjid snyoms pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
373a1(mdo sde): der dong ste/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa de'i tshe dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gsor gyi mdun du snag tsho'i yug gzhag pa de bzhin du/zla ba dang nyi ma
373a2(mdo sde): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyir zhing mi mdzes/phyir zhing mi 'bar/phyir zhing lam me ma yin/phyir zhing lhan ni ma yin/phyir zhing lhang de ma yino//srid med kyi bu la so/
373a3(mdo sde): pa lha'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang /klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /'jog po dang /ma dros po la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /dri za'i bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong bya/
373a4(mdo sde): ni dri za bye ba phrag du ma dang lhan cig nam mkha' ldeng gi rgyal po dri ma med pa chen po ni namakha' lding bye bo phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //phyogs bcu'i
373a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod pa de dge rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa las gnang ba mnos te/'khor bzhi dag dang lhan/
373a6(mdo sde): cig dong nas/bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nas rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan
373a7(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bcom ldan 'das la
373b1(mdo sde): yi ge gnyis shig zhu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du/ngas gnang gis khyad par sems khyod ci bsams pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig/de bzhin gshegs/
373b2(mdo sde): pa ni sems can gcig gi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ba ma yin gyi nga ni khyed kyi don gyi phyir 'dor byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par
373b3(mdo sde): sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang sprad par bgyi ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gong
373b4(mdo sde): bsrungs na bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs
373b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems la ldeg so zhes bya ba byin te/tshangs pa de skad
373b6(mdo sde): ces smra ba ni leg so legs so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis spobs pa 'di lta bur byung ngo //rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlasmra/
373b7(mdo sde): pa ma mdzad na/de bzhin gshags pa la su'ang zhu ba 'di lta bu zhu bor mi 'gyur ro//khyad par sems de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dong ngas khyod
374a1(mdo sde): la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems kyi bac+doMs kyis ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das
374a2(mdo sde): kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas chos gcig gang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig po grang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod chags kyi
374a3(mdo sde): chos te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar zhe sdang gi chos te/'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig
374a4(mdo sde): go/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar gti mug gi chos te/'di ni sbreng bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar bdag
374a5(mdo sde): tu 'dzin pa ste/'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig//yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar le lo ste/'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/yang spang bar ba
374a6(mdo sde): bo'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar rmugs pa dang gnyid de/'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar sred pa ste/'di ni spang
374a7(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i chos gcig go//rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' spong bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/'di ltar ma rig pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
374b1(mdo sde): dpas spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun tu mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig po de gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub
374b2(mdo sde): sems dpas gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la mi bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i gang la la zhig chos gcig po de srung na/des de bzhin gshogs pa'i byasla
374b3(mdo sde): pa'i gzhi thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi srog phangs par 'dzin pa de srog mi gcod do//gang bdag gi nor phangs par 'dzin
374b4(mdo sde): pa dri ma byin par mi len to//gang bdag go chung ma 'phangs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du mi 'grol//rigs kyi bu de la sogs te/gang la la zhig 'di snyam du de
374b5(mdo sde): bzhi no gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya'o snyam du sems pa des chos gcig po 'di srung bar bya'o zhes bshad do//do ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu gang la la bla na meng
374b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub don du gnyer ba de thams cad ni rang gi bde ba'i rgyur don du gnyer gyi/su'ang bdag sdug bsngal ba mi 'dod do//'gro ba ni bde ba 'dod
374b7(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i tha tshig go//gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la ma byed cig ces nga smra'o//rigs kyi bu 'di ni gang byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par
375a1(mdo sde): bsrung bar bya ba 'chos gcig go//rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gla shugs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyasra pa'i chos gcig po dgang yin zhes de skad
375a2(mdo sde): zer ba ni rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang yang med do//rigs kyi bu gang la chos gang yang rtogs pa med pa de//
375a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o//rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do//de bzhin gshes
375a4(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad 'gags pa med par thugs su chud do//rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtha' gnyis las grol bar thugs su chud do//rigs kyi bu de
375a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byung bar thugs su chud de//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas las bdag gir bya bar thugasu chud do//de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams
375a6(mdo sde): cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las par thugs su chud do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen ni glog dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do//de bzhin gshegs par rgyu dang rkyen med par
375a7(mdo sde): las skye ba med par thugs su chud do//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par snang mjed kyi snying po'i chos nyid thugs su chud de//ci'i phyir yongs su rtog pa dag rnam par snang mdzad
375b1(mdo sde): kyi snying po zhes smra zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes la sogs pa gang dag ci 'byung ba'i mngal de yin pa'i phyir ro//glang gi tshe ye shes de rang bzhin
375b2(mdo sde): la yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ni mngal du chud pa yin te/de'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo//rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs
375b3(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang 'dra bar thugasu chud do//de bzhin gshegs pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ring gi chos nyid thugs su chud do//rnam par grol ba gang
375b4(mdo sde): yin pa de rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid do//rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sgo gcig thugs su chud de//rigs kyi bu gang la 'gro ba med pa dang /'ong ba
375b5(mdo sde): med pa dang /rgyu med pa dang /rkyen med pa dang /'chi 'pho med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa dang /'grib pa med pa dang /'phel ba med pa dang /rigs kyi
375b6(mdo sde): gang rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin med de/gang la dper bya bar mi nus pa dang /gang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig po de de bzhin gshegs pas thug
375b7(mdo sde): su chud do//bkod pa'i rgyal po bstan pa yi ge med po'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mig
376a1(mdo sde): la rdul phra rab ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de skad kyis sems can rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de snyed gcig
376a2(mdo sde): gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so//de bas ches mang ba'i sems can dag sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni sa thob
376a3(mdo sde): par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon du gyur to//mang du ci dgos te gtam 'di ni su la'ang don med par mi gyur te//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
376a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa sgro gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/sgra gcan zin khyod nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar spro bar gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu sangs rgyas
376a5(mdo sde): kyi mthus 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
376a6(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul 'di badrag cog gis gzung bar bgyi'o//slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i snod du 'tshal bar bgyis la/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du yang dag
376a7(mdo sde): par bshad par bgyi'o//rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa
376b1(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la gzigs
376b2(mdo sde): nas bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag shin tu rgyas pa bsdus pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung
376b3(mdo sde): ngudu dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga la skyes bu dam pa de dag gis dkur stir byas/bla mar byas/btsun pa dbyas pa'i phyiraro//rigs kyi bu de dag ni nga'i byang chub
376b4(mdo sde): phrag pa la thogs par 'gyur ro//de dag gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro//de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu yongasu dag par 'gyuraro//'chi ba'i
376b5(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas mdan na bzhun
376b6(mdo sde): par gyur to mthong bar 'gyuraro//nga'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig tu rI'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de dag
376b7(mdo sde): gi chos kyi mdzod mi zad par 'gyur ro//de dag tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'ogyur ro//rigs kyi bu nga ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i
377a1(mdo sde): tshig 'di smra ste/rigs kyi bu dbu gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed par 'gyur la/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la btags sam/yI gor 'dri 'am/
377a2(mdo sde): klog gram/kun chub par byed na de ni ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar ngas ma mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur
377a3(mdo sde): zhing mig lnga thob par 'gyuraro//dbang po nyams par mi 'gyu ro//sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung //byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongasu bzung //du
377a4(mdo sde): las tshad med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu tshigro 'di ni tha mar smra ste/de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ngas mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
377a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/khyad par sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /brgya byin la sogs pa lci'i bu rnams dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha dang /mi dang /
377a6(mdo sde): lha ma yin+da dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi 'ongs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par
377a7(mdo sde): snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya Aka sha gan+d+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/
377b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsho lo//'di skyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
377b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ri kha la te ka na gnas thub pa'i drang srong rnams kyi gnas na 'di lta ste/nyan thos chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs
377b3(mdo sde): cig po/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen+da po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po drang yang
377b4(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugaso te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu'ang de'i tshe na nub phyogs na brgya byin thogs pa'i nor ba
377b5(mdo sde): rin po che 'bum phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/yang nor bu rin po che de'o 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
377b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus par mi gnang bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/gang lha drang mi rnams dang gang
377b7(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams dang /gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /gang sa dang /chu dang /me dang /rlung rnams kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba chen po/ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba
378a1(mdo sde): chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing nor bu rin po che snang ngo //ltab ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu mod pa brjod du med pa na mkhwa' bzhin
378a2(mdo sde): du snang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/lhan ne/lhang nger gyur to//sems can+da gang dag der 'dus pa da ga kyang bdag kyang mi mthong ngo //gcig gis gcig kyang mi
378a3(mdo sde): mthong ngo //de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gags nas yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to//bdag bdag gis lus kyi gzugs dang /mtshan dang /dbyig
378a4(mdo sde): dang /rig pa'ang mi dmigs par gyur te/gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par mthong ngo //nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang mi mthong /skar ma'i gzugs
378a5(mdo sde): dang /sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams kyang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to//sgra dag kyang rna lam du grag par ma gyur to//dri dag kyang sna la bre/
378a6(mdo sde): bar ma gyur to//sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yi rA 'dzin pa dang /skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung bar gyur to//yang 'byung ba chen+na //
378a7(mdo sde): dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/phyogs gang dang gang du brtags pa de dang /de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang /kha dog dang /dbyis/
378b1(mdo sde): dang /gzugasu mthong bar gyur to//rgyang ma nas kyang brgya byin thogs pa'i rin po chus bskor ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to///
378b2(mdo sde): gang de ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas 'jigs
378b3(mdo sde): par mi byed/dngangs par mi byed/skrag par mi byed de/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /de bzhin nyid dang /stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/de'i
378b4(mdo sde): phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed/dadengs par mi byed/skrag par mi byed do//gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos dag dang /lha dag dang /
378b5(mdo sde): klu dang /gnod sbyin dag dang /dri za dag dang /lha ma yin dag dang /na mkha' lding dag dang /mi 'am ci dag dang /lto 'phye chen po dag dang /grul bum dang /yi dgas dang /sha za
378b6(mdo sde): dang /srul po dang /lus srul po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa de dag ma lus par 'jigs par gyur/dngangs par gyur/skyo bar gyur nas/tshu rol dang pha rol la
378b7(mdo sde): rmongs shing sems 'khrugs nas de dag gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong /de na 'di ci zhig/'di ji lta bu zhig/'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes dri ba'ang gang yang mi snang ngo/
379a1(mdo sde): nayang de'i tshen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzod bu chen po zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de lagasu thal mo sbyar hA//
379a2(mdo sde): bdudang gsol pa/chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la//gang zag gang dag mi 'tshal lo//gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas//dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur//phung po gcig ni mi
379a3(mdo sde): mthong zhing //gzugs kyi phung la rtog bgyid de//'di la gang zag kha cig ni//sangs rgyas chos la the tshom 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la//chos kyi de bzhin mtshan
379a4(mdo sde): nyid gsungs//de dge tshu rol pha rol la//bzod pa'i na mkha'i mtshan 'tshal to//'di ni mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste//brjod du med pa'i gnas lags so//yid bzhin nor bu rin
379a5(mdo sde): chen tshe//spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'//nor bu rin chen brgya byin thogs//gang dag la ni rgyung nas gda'//sems can de dag skal pa che//dpa' 'gro'i pha rol shin tu phyin//
379a6(mdo sde): pa lta bar mo chis pa rnams//de dag thams cad shes rab che//di ring 'dir ni zab mo'i gAtam//mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon me 'tshal//bcom ldan gang dag 'dir phyin pa'o//
379a7(mdo sde): sems can dag la dbugs dbyung mdzod//sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du//'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yul lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji skad
379b1(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin te//gang na kun+da bzhi thos gyur cing //shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas//de ni ting 'dzin spyod yu'o//de ni na mkha'i snying po yi//byang chub sems dngu'i spyod du
379b2(mdo sde): te//snang ba med cing spros med pa'i//ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan//lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa//phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur//rtag dang tshod la chags pa ni//bai ro la
379b3(mdo sde): rol shin tu rmongs//lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las//rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa//brjod du med pa bsgom par gyis//de ni myur dus 'thob 'gyur//kye grogs po dag gzhan
379b4(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las thog ma pA la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par
379b5(mdo sde): bya ste/'di lta ste/ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jig pa shes par byas nas/de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi skye
379b6(mdo sde): mi 'gag pa/mi dmigs pa cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cod bsgom par bya ste/ci nas kyang rtag pa dang chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang /mi 'jigs/mi dpas/
379b7(mdo sde): skrag par 'gyur ba dang /chos thams cad la chags por dmigs pa'i sems sum gyur par byas na de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs shing phyin cad kyang chad pa
380a1(mdo sde): dang rtag pa la mi gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/'khor der lhags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji ltar mthong ba dang /
380a2(mdo sde): thos pa dang /rtogs pa dang /shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der mthong bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/'di skad ces bka' stsal ton mkha'i snying po/
380a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ye shes na mkha' dang mtshungs pa
380a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni rgyal mtshan gyi mchog lta bu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams
380a5(mdo sde): kyi ni ded dpon lta bu/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni gter lta bu/sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni bum pa bzang po lta bu/mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma lta bu/lam stor pa
380a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni zla ba lta bu/'jigs pa rnams kyi ni ri rab lta bu//nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyi ni sman bcud kyis len pa lta bu/dge ba'i rtsa ba chud de
380a7(mdo sde): ltung ba rnams kyi ni mkhar ba lta bu/phreng bas 'tshe ba rnams kyi ni me tog lta bu/sdom pa spyod pa rnams kyi me long lta bu/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnams kyi ni gos
380b1(mdo sde): lta bu/mya ngan las 'dra' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni stegs lta bu/pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni gru lta bu/mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni them skas lta bu/tshig ngan pa dang skur
380b2(mdo sde): bas gdungs pa rnams kyi ni gdugs lte bu/pha rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni seng ge lta bu/chad pa rnams kyi ni chu lta bu/bdud kyi dgu rnams kyi ni go cha lta bu/bslab pa 'khrul ba rnams
380b3(mdo sde): kyi ni mig 'byed pa lta bu/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog thams cad kyi ni sa lta bu/nad pa rnams kyi ni sman pa lta bu/bkres pa rnams kyi ni 'bru lta bu/skom pa rnams kyi ni chu shel lta
380b4(mdo sde): bu/ngal po rnams kyi ni mal lta bu/ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni me shel lta bu/byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni shing rta lta bu/skyed mos tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni
380b5(mdo sde): rdzing bu lca ga byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyi ni phreng ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste/rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu lta bu/rigs kyi bu de sa bcu dang ldan pa
380b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni nor bu yid bzhin lta bu/rigs kyi bu de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi no shing yongs 'du dang 'dra ba/gcod pa'i phyir lta ba ngan pa'i sbyar ba
380b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ni mtshon lta bu/'joms pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ni rdo rje lte bu/bdud rnams kyis ni thub par dka' bo/thabs
381a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams la ni ches grangs/ye shes kyi ni 'byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni gnas/rang rgyal ba rnams kyi ni brang ba dang mtshungs pa/nyan thos thams/
381a2(mdo sde): cad kyi ni gos dang mtshungs pa/lha rnams kyi ni mig lte bu/mi rnams kyi ni lam lta bu/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi ni sbyangs/yi dwags rnams kyi ni rten/sems can dmyal
381a3(mdo sde): ba pa rnams kyi ni mgon/sbyin gnas kyi sems can thams cad kyi ni snod du gyur pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni shing rta lta bu/rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
381a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni blon po lta bu/chos kyi grong khyer gyi ni sgo srungs yin te/rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas kyi chos
381a5(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis ni brgyan pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ni ldan/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams
381a6(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyis/da khyed 'dir lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig/mchod pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyis de la
381a7(mdo sde): ci nus par rin po che'i gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /lha'i gos dang /rgyan dang /snod sna tshogs kyis bkur
381b1(mdo sde): sIr gyis shig/rim gror gyis shig/bsti stang gyis shig/mchod par gyis shi /lam byi dor gyis shig/rgyan par gyis shig/bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig/
381b2(mdo sde): khyed thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan thos pa dang /snod du gyur par ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro//de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa mtha' dag stan las langs nas byang chub
381b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logasu mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te/snying ni rab tu dga'/bzhin ni rab tu
381b4(mdo sde): 'dzum/mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang /'khor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /nyan thos chen po dang /lha'i dbang po dang /klu'i dbang
381b5(mdo sde): po dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /dri za'i dbang po dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /drang
381b6(mdo sde): song mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la bkod pa'i mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur sti bya snyam mo//
381b7(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po che sna bdun las byas shing /ri dang /'dro ga
382a1(mdo sde): ri skam dang /phug dang /grog po dang /g.yang sa dang /rtswa dang /brtsig pa dang /bong ba dang /gseg ma dang /dreng ba la sogs pa med la lag mthil lta bur
382a2(mdo sde): mnyam par sprul to//des dpal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu dbyangs dang /shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/dri zhim pa dang /'dab ma dang /me tog dang /
382a3(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang ldan par sprul to//shing ljon pa dang /rtswa dang /skom shing dang /'dab ma sa la rten pa thams cad kyang /rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sprul to//mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
382a4(mdo sde): khams 'di thams cad na'ang nad ni rab tu zhi/sems can dmyal ba pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rab tu zhi///
382a5(mdo sde): sems can dag gis kyang zas dang /skem dang /gos dang /chos gos dang /rgyan dag thob par gyur to//de'i tshe gang dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
382a6(mdo sde): sems can dri dag thams cad kyang bsum pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchag dang ldan zhing yan lag
382a7(mdo sde): thams cad ni yongasu rdzogs/rdul med pa rab rib dang bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni mdzes par byas/nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni bral/sems ni rab tu ni//
382b1(mdo sde): dge ba thams cad la ni sems mos/dkon mchog gsum la ni sems rab tu dad par gyur nas 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can dre re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na'ang nor bu rin po che thogs/
382b2(mdo sde): par mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so dang 'tsham pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang
382b3(mdo sde): bapa chen po des khyab par gyur to//nor bu rin po che de dag las kyang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs byung bar gyur to//nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon pa bab 'gyur te//gos bzang
382b4(mdo sde): po sna tshogs kyi char dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang /me tog sna tshogs kyi cher dang /spris sna tshogs kyi cher dang /phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang /gdugs sna tshogs kyi tshar
382b5(mdo sde): dang /snod sna tshogs kyi char dang /'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to//lha'i gos dang /gser gyi skud pa dang /mu tig gis se mo do dang /me tog pad+ma dang /ut+pa la dang /
382b6(mdo sde): ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /u ra ga sa li dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /shing tA ma la'i 'dab ma dang /tsan+de nas mchog pa'i phye mas lam der bkram par mngon par sprul to//
382b7(mdo sde): pome de'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kar rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang pa dang 'dra ba/rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bzangs kyang mngon par sprulo nas/khang pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi chung mi
383a1(mdo sde): dam pa dang /smras dang 'dra ba dang /yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrogs shing rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to//dad+ya
383a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi na mkha' la lha'i ni re'u rin po che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu dpag ched brgya tsam la rin po che'i dra ba'i skud pa dang /mu tig gi
383a3(mdo sde): rgyan phreng gis legs par brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/rgyan de dag las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan yan+ta lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra 'byung ngo //rtswa dang //
383a4(mdo sde): shing dang /'drab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung ste/sa la rten pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i sil snyan
383a5(mdo sde): las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung bar grag ste/sgra de gang gi rnar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de mas
383a6(mdo sde): 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i bkod pa chen po de mthong ste/shin tu ngo mtshor dang rmad du byung ba'i chos thob nas
383a7(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i stan ji lta bur bsham snyam mo//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po tsha les byas
383b1(mdo sde): pa'i me tog pad+ma sdong bu ni dngul/lo ma ni gser/snying po ni rin po che rdo'i snying po ze ba ni nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od zer las byas pa/rgyar ni rgyang grags gcig tsam med pa/
383b2(mdo sde): me tog pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan rnam pa 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i pad+ma byung nas pad+ma'i steng de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po
383b3(mdo sde): skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo //de yi spyi bo la'ang nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i grwayog byang
383b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bor 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa brgya byin thogs pa'i ne re buM rin po ches brgyan pa 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang rang rang gi pad+ma'i sde
383b5(mdo sde): de'i stan la 'khod par snang ngo //de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa'achen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras
383b6(mdo sde): so//byang chub sems dpa' grag pa chen rnams//gang dag sngon du 'ongs pa ni//gus dang ldan pas phyag byas te//phyi nas stan la 'dug byed na//skyes bu dam pa 'di 'ongs nas//bkod
383b7(mdo sde): chen dag kyang bstan byur na//ston pa phyag kyang ma btsal bar//stan la 'dug pa lta bur snang //smon gyi rgyal pos smras pa//skyes bu dam pa 'o nyid ni//sangs rgyas chos la rab
384b1(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes te/gal te sems can thams cad bse ru lta bu'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad
384b2(mdo sde): phyis bang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi smod yul dang /rnam par gol pa dang /don dam pa la brtag pa dang /sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i
384b3(mdo sde): sbyor ba mi shes so//yongasu brtag pa bzung na gal te sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so so rig pa thob pa/
384b4(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang /mos pa dang /don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'i byin gyis brlabs mi sheso//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
384b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po 'di'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/so sor rig pa thob/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas bskal pa dpog tu med pa
384b6(mdo sde): 'das te/ji ltar da ltar nga'i 'dus pa chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes nas ji ltar 'di na sems can kha cig bkod pa chen po'i 'di de
384b7(mdo sde): phyir 'ong zhing ting nge 'dzin dang /bkod pa chen po blta ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar rigs kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas
385a1(mdo sde): nub phyogs nas 'ong zhing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa/mtha' smras pa'i nam bra'u mtha' yas skyed ched kyi mngon par shes pa
385a2(mdo sde): dang ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/sems can thams cad kyang skyo bar byas nas de'i 'og tu sems can dpag tu med pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pas sgrub pa'i bkod pa
385a3(mdo sde): chen po'ang bstan/ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa chen po'ang bstan pa bzhi no//gal te rigs kyi bu de den dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i bkod pa sten du zin ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
385a4(mdo sde): rmongs par 'gyur/bslad par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i bar du'ang bslad par 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul dang sbyor ba'i mtshan ma ston par mi nus
385a5(mdo sde): te/de ltar chos zab mo'i yon tan la gnas so//rigs kyi bu de ni thabs shes pa la gnaso//sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad la gnas//the tshom mdo//ye shes gzhan la
385a6(mdo sde): rag ma las pa la mkhaso//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' snying po de ni sems
385a7(mdo sde): can thams cad mtho ris dang thor par skye bar ston pa'o//sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongasu thar par byed pa'o//lus kyi dug 'byung ba chen po'i nad
385b1(mdo sde): gso bar byed pa'o//sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog smad nas mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thubs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te byang chub/
385b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming rjod par byed pa'o//phyag 'tshal bar byed/dri 'bul/a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par byed na/rigs kyi bu de ni de dag gi bsam pa dang /bag lnga nyol ba
385b3(mdo sde): dang /de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel ba ci 'dro ba dang /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dra ba la'ang rtog cing sems sbyang ba ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs pa dge ba'i rtsa
385b4(mdo sde): ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/chos la bskyed pa'am/dge 'dun la bskyed pa'am/bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam/tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin nam/bsgom pa'i rang
385b5(mdo sde): bzhin yang rung ste/de dag thams cad rmi lam na'ang rung /bde ba'i tshe 'ong rung ste/de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du lam drang po'i thebs kyis ston te/thabs des lta ba ngan pa dang /
385b6(mdo sde): byed pa dang /smon lam ngan pa'i bsamal dang /s+yAd+ha sa ngan pa dang /dran par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par byed do//ci nas kyang de'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur
385b7(mdo sde): po dang /smon lam drang po dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang /bsten par 'gyur ba dang /myur du dri mi zhim pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang /sdig pa'i lta ba las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ba
386a1(mdo sde): dang /de dag gi dran song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i lam thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang /legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byung bar 'gyur ba dang /de dag
386a2(mdo sde): myur du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang /zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to//gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /
386a3(mdo sde): gang yang sems g.yengs pa dang /gang gis mig gi bar chad byas pa dang /lce bcings pa dang /gang dag gi yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na/gal te de dag gi nang
386a4(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /nud med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying thag pa nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha'i snying po'i ming nas rjod par byed cing a ga ru dang /
386a5(mdo sde): rgya spos kyis bdugs nas skyes bu dam pa na mkha'i snying po la phyag btsal nas/rigs kyi bu de ni de'i rmi lam nA/bram ze'i gzugs kyi mdun du 'dug gam/brgya byin gyi gzugs
386a6(mdo sde): som/dpal gyi gzugs sam/dbyangs can gyi gzugs som/rgyal rigs kyi gzugs sam/blon po'i gzugs sam/dpa' bo'i gzugs sam/sman pa'i gzugs
386a7(mdo sde): sam/pha'i gzugs sam/ma'i gzugs sam/khye'u yi gzugs sam/bu mo'i gzugs kyis rmi lam na nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman

386b2(mdo sde): par 'dod pa dang /gang dben par 'dod pa dang /gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang /shes rab 'dod pa dang /gang yang grags pa 'dod pa dang /gang bzo sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /

387b3(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa chen po la phyir mi ldog par gzhog nas ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa sna tshogs dang /sa bcu la gzhog pa'i bar du nus te/de ltar byang chub sems

399b1(mdo sde): 'tshal bar byed/bdag gi srog kyang de la 'bul bar byed na sems can de dag ni mes 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/chus ma yin/mtshon gyis ma yin/dug gis 'chi bar mi
399b2(mdo sde): byed de/de dag tshe zad pa ma gtogs par mi 'am mi mo yin pa sus kyang de dag gi srog dbrog par mi nus/dus ma yin par mi 'chi/nad bu can du mi 'gyur/bkres pa dang skom
399b3(mdo sde): bos 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/rgyal po'i chad pas chod par mi 'gyur/'chi ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/de dag mig gis gzugs mi
399b4(mdo sde): mthong /rna bas sgra mi thos/snas dri mi tshor/lces ro mi myong /lus kyis reg bya mi shes shing //da dung du dbugs phra mo 'byung ba dang 'jug par byed/da dung du de'i lus la tshe dang /
399b5(mdo sde): drod dang /rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po tha mal par ston par byed de/sems can gang sngon bram ze la gus
399b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa la ni rigs kyi bu bram ze'i gzugs su ston to//gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bar du ston pa
399b7(mdo sde): nas/gang sred med kyi bu la gus pa dang /gang dbang phyug chen po la gus pa dang /brgya byin la gus pa dang /'khor los sgyur ba la gus pa dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /
400a1(mdo sde): tshul 'khor srung dang /'phags skyes po dang //mig/me bzang dang rnam pos kyi bu la gus pa dang /gang dag wA dang /ra dang /shing dang /chu tshig dang /mtsho
400a2(mdo sde): dang /steng ka sna tshogs la gus pa'i bar du gad dang gang gi skyangs su song ba'i sems can de dag la de lta de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun du bstan nas/gang gi bsam pa ci
400a3(mdo sde): 'dra ba bzhin du de'i gzugs kyis 'di skad ces smra so//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag la//gang dag shes rab kyis mthong ba//'khor ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir/'khor ba na ni
400a4(mdo sde): de kun shes//sems can de dag gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon
400a5(mdo sde): par dad pa de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/sangs rgyas kyi gzugs bstan nas 'di skad ces smra'o//sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yis//srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba//ye shes de
400a6(mdo sde): la myur du reg/sdug bsngal kune las 'grol por 'gyur//de'i tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'i sgras dga' zhing rengs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/sangs
400a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa med pa yongs su dag pa/gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa/'tsho ba/gzhes pa/chos kyang ston par der skye bar 'gyu ro//de bzhin
400b1(mdo sde): duchos dang /dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o//de lta ngas na byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i rlung bran yon tan gyi chos byasam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no//gAng yang ting ngange 'dzin dam pa
400b2(mdo sde): rna tshogs la sems kyis shin tu dbang bya bar 'dod na/des tha rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tsha lo te mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o//sems can thams
400b3(mdo sde): cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod do//dgongs shig dgengs shig/na mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po brnyes pa/bdag la dran po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi
400b4(mdo sde): nAlA Sh+Ta b+h+yolA TI ka/'di lta ste/u mu ra NaM khe/b+h+rakrA ma niShe/sa mu tra/A dadwe m+b+ha na ya na ya/mA hA kA ru NI kA/a nu ba mdzam b+ha smr-i tI/akrA dza~M ma d+hA s+thi ti/badz+re dzAm
400b5(mdo sde): smr-i ti/ke Sha~M skr-i ti/a nu pa mr-i smr-i ti/b+hU ta ko smr-i To swA hA/de la dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa sbyin par byed do//gang yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang rung /nyan thos kyis
400b6(mdo sde): shad pa'ang rung ste/bsten bcos sna tshogs klog+sa par 'dod na/des khrus byas te skya reng 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o//mchod pa ci nus
400b7(mdo sde): kyis bya'o//sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya'o//'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o//dgo so shig dgongs shig/mkhas pa chen po sems can thams cad kyi nangs
401a1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rigs kyi bu na mkha'i snying po gang zag gi mchog/dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor bdag la sgrol cig/'di lta ste/
401a2(mdo sde): nI la dzaM/bi Shan duSha dza/bi ya ba na dza/bi dak+ShI su me/pA sha la dzaM si/s+thA na la dzaM si/s+thA na sha ra be/shas+t+ra kat+te/hu ma hu ma/mahA kA ru Ni ka swA hA//gang rgya mtsho chen
401a3(mdo sde): por 'jug 'dod pa dang /gang khung du 'jug 'dod pa dang /gang bcud dam pa spyod par 'dod par gyur pa dang /gang btsun rar bcug pa dang /gang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang /
401a4(mdo sde): glang mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang /gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang /chu dang /mtshon dang /dug dang /byad dang /stag dang /seng ge dang /dug drag po dang /rkun po dang /g.yon can
401a5(mdo sde): gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang /gang dam du bcings pa dang /gang chad pas bcad pa dang /gong gsang ba la thug pa dang /gang nad kyis btab pa/nad kyis 'jigs pa
401a6(mdo sde): dang /gang dag chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal tshwa dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad kyis phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam
401a7(mdo sde): mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod cing /mchod pa ci nus kyis byed la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gzhog pa 'di skad du'ang smra ste/dgongs
401b1(mdo sde): shig dgongs shig/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grags pa chen po na mkha'i snying po 'gro ba'i don bzhed pa/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la gzigs shig/bdag 'di lta bu
401b2(mdo sde): las rab tu thar par mdzod cig/skal pa stsol cig/mthu chen po bdag ni sdug bsngal gyi nyam thag go/shin tu dbu'o//bdag ni khyod la rten nas zhi ba dang bde ba/tshe 'di dang tshe rabs
401b3(mdo sde): gzhan du thob par 'gyu ro//zhes smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po gzugs tha mal ba nas bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/
401b4(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin par byed do//gang dag ci las 'jigs pa de dag de las rab tu thar par byed do//gang dag dbul ba gos med pa nas gang dag yo byad kyis brel ba dag gi bar du de dag la de
401b5(mdo sde): lta de ltar bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//rgyal po'i bu la la zhig gnas chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par sems
401b6(mdo sde): dpa' de gal te byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la/mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa la sogs te/bram ze'i gnas chen po dang /khyim bdag gi
401b7(mdo sde): gnas chen po dang /bzo'i gnas chen po dang /thos pa'i gnas chen po dang /sgom pa'i gnas chen po dang /gang mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa de dag gal te byang
402a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa'
402a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' snying po la skyabs su song nas gsol ba gdab pa 'di skad du brjod par byed de/na mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la skal ba sbrul tsog/bsam pa dang /
402a3(mdo sde): sems pa thams cad dang /bsam pa yid bzhin du rab tu rdzogs par mdzod cig/gang sems shing gang gsol ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis mdzod cig ces brjed
402a4(mdo sde): nu/de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos lce'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa/mi'i las 'das pas sgra de thos nas sems can de dge la bdag ci rigs par ston te/
402a5(mdo sde): de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan no//blo rgya mtsho chen po dang
402a6(mdo sde): snyan no//rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i thig pa nI la la zhig gis tshad bzung bar nus srid kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po thabs dang ye
402a7(mdo sde): shis la mkhas pa dang /thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ni bzung mi nus so//rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad
402b1(mdo sde): kyi tshad ni la las bzung bar nus srid kyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul par byed pa ni chad
402b2(mdo sde): bzung mi nus te/la lar ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul par byed do//lo lar ni bram ze'i gzugs su byed cing /sems can ji lta bus
402b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed do//de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi nang du ni dud 'gro'i gzugs su sprul bar byed do//sems can dmyal ba pa rnams
402b4(mdo sde): kyi ning du ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs su sprul par byed pa nos gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed do//kha
402b5(mdo sde): cig la ni mngon sum du sprul pa sprul par byed/kha cig la ni rmi lam du sprul par byed/kha cig la ni sdig pa'i las sprug pa'i phyir/ngan song las bsgral pa'i phyir/mauthe ris la
402b6(mdo sde): dbyed pa'i phyir/sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/'chi 'pho'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma rgyu ba'i tshe/gzugs sna tshogs su sprul par byed de/de dag la thog mar skyabs
402b7(mdo sde): su song zhing mthong ste/bde ba thob nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnas pa'i bde ba thob pa'i bar du 'gyur bas de'i phyir sus kyang de'i sprul pa thams cad kyi tshad gzung bar ma
403a1(mdo sde): nus so//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' snying po 'di ni thabs dang shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dung
403a2(mdo sde): ldan no//sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ljon no//de bas na rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo //de nos de'i tshe
403a3(mdo sde): 'khor 'das pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la ngo mtshar thob/rmad du byung ba thob/bla ma la bkur sti dang /bsti stang du bya ba
403a4(mdo sde): thob par gyur nas thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha'i snying po la mchod pa dang /bkur sti sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed/ma
403a5(mdo sde): tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /maur me dang /bdug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /chos gos dang /rgyan dang /gos dong /bstod/
403a6(mdo sde): pa dang /glu dang /sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do//byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po des kyang de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo//phul nas bcom ldan
403a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ceso gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can
403b1(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mun pa chen pos rmongs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi don bgyi bar ji ltar rngo thogs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di lta ste/rigs kyi bu nu mkha' na ma/
403b2(mdo sde): bcings pa ma grol ba/nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa mo rmongs pa/rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o//na mkha' la rlung gi rkyen gyis rdul 'thul zhing rlung gis dkrugs pas yongs su ma
403b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste/chus ni zhi bar byed cing dri ma med la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//de la skar ma dang /gza' dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba'i bye brag mi mngon na nI
403b4(mdo sde): skad cig dang /thang cig dang yud tsam dang /nyon mo dang /mtshan mo dang /dus dang /lo rnams kyi bgrang ba'ang mi mngon no//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
403b5(mdo sde): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi/sems can rnams kyi blo bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams
403b6(mdo sde): kyis sems nye bar nyon mongs par byas te/de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad do//sems nyon mongs pa can
403b7(mdo sde): du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang /de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te/de'i phyir sems can de dag de
404a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis tshim par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mo khyab pa la mngon sum du
404a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar lo gnas par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
404a3(mdo sde): bar la gnas par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad snying rje nyid la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro//de dag las kyang 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
404a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sergyas dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
404a5(mdo sde): bATI s+yA ste rgyus rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur//rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sem+b+ha smi mkha' tshe grol gnas sam/gsal bya/bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so//
404a6(mdo sde): ni mig gi rlom par shes pa la gan+d+hes sam/bcom ldan 'das de ma ldan sa~M ni//tsa mig gis kun tu rig pa la gnas sam/bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so//
404a7(mdo sde): yang na du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gisu ma byung ba de la na mkha' gnasas so/gsal pa bcom ldan 'das de ma legs so//de bzhin du na cing/
404b1(mdo sde): sna dang /lce dang /lus la'ang brjod par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'dri snyam du sems/na mkha' yid la gnas pa nas yid kyis kun tu rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la na mkha/
404b2(mdo sde): gnas sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so//rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sems can na mkha' la gnas sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ma lag so//
404b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/na mkha' sems can la gnas sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang

404b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rtog pa ma mchis pa/stong pa nyid de/sgro ma btags pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das nam
404b6(mdo sde): mkha'i snying po ni 'di lta ste/rang gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa/mi rtog pa/rnam par mi rtog pa/mi g.yo ba/gsob lags te/myu gu ma mchis pa/sa bon ma mchis pa/
404b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu ma mchis pa/rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa/yi ge ma mchis pa/rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
405a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen ngos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das/bya ba rA dza//
405a2(mdo sde): mAn tak+Sha ya/dzi na dz+ra la/dza na ni ma myA ni ha ra/a na ya pha la/gu Na gar+b+ha/ni ya ma su ri nA ya/bu ba sha/sha ta sha ba/shA ma shA na/ta thA ka ma/sha mo gu/mA tu
405a3(mdo sde): shi Sha/sha ma tse ta nI yA/kle shAn ta saM shaM Sha NaM swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pi/legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mipra las rgyal bar byed pa'i
405a4(mdo sde): seng ge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzungs 'dis sems can dge 'chi ba'i tshe/tha ma'i rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib paM dang /las kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa
405a5(mdo sde): yod pa sprug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so//khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/grangs med par 'gro ba dang /sems can rnams la
405a6(mdo sde): snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du gzugs dang /cha lugs dang /spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa
405a7(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo sde sna tshogs 'chad pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /rgyal rigs gdol pa nas dge sbyong gdol pa'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang /thams
405b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dri bstan pa'i tshe lha dang ma'i skye dgu dang gA tu med/grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa sna
405b2(mdo sde): tshogs thob par gyur to//gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la ye shes skyes par gyur to//srog chags kho ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//sems cin dag gi gang dag rtsid
405b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba//de dag gi ni gzhi yi rtsa ba spongs//myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gis ni//rtsa ba'i bzhi por thoms cad 'gyur bar gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
405b4(mdo sde): nas/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
405b5(mdo sde): bstod do//'phags pa na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya u pA ya kau
405b6(mdo sde): shu l+ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du//'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
405b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
406a1(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na/dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
406a2(mdo sde): shes pa/mngon par shes pa gzungs thob pa spobs pa thogs pa med pa khri drug stong dang yang thabs cig ste/yang de'i tshe na de tsam ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las
406a3(mdo sde): bzhengs par gyur te/'khor brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos 'chad do//yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma zhes bya
406a4(mdo sde): ba zhig 'khor der 'ongs te 'dug par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma blo gos phrag pa gcig lnga gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhong
406a5(mdo sde): sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gau la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du
406a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das lo bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems /
406a7(mdo sde): da' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mo la rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngos khyod kyi
406b1(mdo sde): sems rangs par bya'o//zhe de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
406b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' seMde' chen po rnan+da kyi thasna ma khyab pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba'i thongs mkhas pa de gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
406b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas po ni zas

413b5(mdo sde): pas kyang bskal pa stong phrag bcu'i bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis ltas shing spangs par gyur to//rigs kyi bu ltos/gang sems can gzhan dag sems can dmyal bar skye
413b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong mau d+gal gyi bu dang shA ri'i bu thabs ma khaso
413b7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan du zin na ni dge slong ko ka li ka de sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na de
414a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa log par dang sel gyi gsung rab la dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/de dgon pa'i drug phug gcig na gnas pa nas
414a2(mdo sde): rgya mi ring ba zhig na drang srong lnga gnas pa las de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po byung /dus ma yin po'i char pa'ang cher bab pa dang /de nas bud med gnyis shig
414a3(mdo sde): tshor ba'i skyabs kyi phyir dge slong dri ma med pa'i brag drug tu zhugs te/slar byung ba dang /drang srong rnams kyis mthong nas/e mra he dge slong dri ma med pa 'di sdig 'dron
414a4(mdo sde): 'o//tshangs pad+mo spyod pa ma yin pa zhes yid byung byer g+hur te//de nus dge slong dri ma med pa'i sems kyis drang srong de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa shes nas/
414a5(mdo sde): chen mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so//de nas drang srong de dag gis dge slong dri ma med pa bar snang gau na mkha' la 'dug pa mthong nas/bdag cag gi gtsug
414a6(mdo sde): lag las 'byung ba sbyar na tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa na mkha'i la 'phags mi nus so snyam du sems par gyur nas/de'i tshe yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te nyes
414a7(mdo sde): bshags sa//rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri ma med pa na mkha' lam 'angags su zin na/de'i tshe drang srong lnga'i lus sems can dmya bo chen par ltung bar 'gyur/
414b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de gzhan du gyur pa snyam du khyod de ltar ma lta zhig/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de'i tshe dge
414b2(mdo sde): slong dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong sha ri'i bu dang /maut+pal gyi bu na mkha' la 'phags su zin na ni dge slong kau ka li ka sems can daumyal bar 'gro bar mi
414b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes gang du 'jug pa de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyan kyi yul ma yin par rig par bya'o//
414b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/smad 'tshong ma thabs drug cu rtsa ba ni dang ldan pa shin tu lobs pa nor 'dod pa ni skyes bu de las nor ma grub kyi bar du sems can de dag gi drung na ci nas kyang bdag
414b5(mdo sde): gris lus gtong ba'ang ston pa dang /yo byad thams cad kyang mi sbed par de lta de ltar gnas so//de nas phyis de la me lta mi sems par 'dod te/de phyir de la 'gyod par yang mi 'gyuraro//
414b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thubs mkhas pa'ang thabs mkhas pa gang gis sems can 'di dag bdag gis yongs su smin par bya bar shes nas sems can rnams
414b7(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtse ba la dga' bas cung zad kyang mi sbed cing bdag gi lus gtong bar byed pa ston pa'i bar du sems can de dag gi drung du de lta de ltar gnos te/nam zhig e ma'o sems
415a1(mdo sde): can 'di dag dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed pa yin te/phyin cad de las lhag pa'i gzhag tu mi nus par shes nas ni de la mi lta zhing dga' bas rtse ba thams cad kyang
415a2(mdo sde): btang ste 'gro'o//de la rag lus pa'i sems kyang med do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste byol song du gtogs pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba zhes bya ba de me tog thams cad kyi dri
415a3(mdo sde): la snom pa'i de gang du'ang rtag par sred par mi sgom mo//dri dang lo ma'ang mi 'phrog go/de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /rtse ba
415a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang spyod kyang gang du'ang rtag par sred pa mi skyed/bdag dang gzhan nyams par yang mo byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lte ste dper na/sa bon yongs su gdungs pa'i kha dog
415a5(mdo sde): nyams pa med kyang ljang bu 'byung bar mi nus so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa
415a6(mdo sde): nI dga' ba dang /rtse ba thams cad la spyod kyang de ltung bar 'gro ba yongs su mi len sangs rgyas kyi yon tan khas kyang yongs su mi nyams so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nya pa
415a7(mdo sde): shin tu bslabs pa ni skud pa gcig lo gzan mi btags pa'i mchil pa sbyar nas mtsho chen por bcug ste/de gang dang gang gi tshe na 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe skud pa de mtsho chen po
415b1(mdo sde): nas 'dren to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thabs mangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems thams cad/
415b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid la brtan por sbrel nas 'dam rdzab chen po ro ltung zhing dri thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de bsrungs pas gang dang gis tshe 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe shi 'phos nas tshangs
415b3(mdo sde): ba'o 'jig rten du skye'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sngags kyi rig 'dzin gyi skyes du rgyal pos bzung ste/zhags pa lnga'i dacings su zin kyang de gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa
415b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de sngags kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcig gis bcings pa thams cad btubos te 'gro'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'ang gang gi tshe 'dod
415b5(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan lngas dga' ba myong zhing de dag gis rgyas par gyur kyang /gang gi tshe 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi reg pa'i stongs bskyed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
415b6(mdo sde): kyi sems gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad rab tu bcom ste/shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta sgo dper na mda' dang mtshon gyi slob
415b7(mdo sde): dpon ral gri rnon po gcig mi mngon par thogs nas 'dron pa mang po'i sel byed na/de la sems can gang me shis pa de dag ni mda' dang mtshan gyi slob dpon de la mi 'di ni mda'
416a1(mdo sde): gzhu yang med/mtshon cha gzhan yang med/g.yog kyang med de/'di ni bdag gi skyabs kyang mi nus na/'don pa'i lta ci smos/mi rgod las rgyal bar
416a2(mdo sde): lta ga la nus te/'di ni de dag tu mi rigs par sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes snying rje sgom mo//de nas mdo' dang mtshon gyi slob dpon de 'brog dgon pa'i dbus su phyin te/
416a3(mdo sde): mo rgod mang po byung ba mda' dang mtshon gyi phyir go cha legs par bgos nas mtshon cha de la yongs su btags te/mi rgod de dag la 'debs so//des mi rgod de dag thams cad
416a4(mdo sde): srog dang phral nas slar yang mtshon cha de log par 'jog go/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon
416a5(mdo sde): che shin tu thogs nas thabs mkhas pa 'dod pa'i ston lngas rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod do/de la gang dag de'i lus kyi dbang po mthong na de dag ma dad par byed cing 'di ni 'di ltar
416a6(mdo sde): bag med par gnas te/'di ni bdag thar par yang mi nus na sems can gzhan lta ci smos/bdud las rgyal bar lta ga la 'gyur zhes snying rje bskyed par byed mod kyi/byang
416a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de thabs mkhas pa shin tu yongs su blangs pas nam 'dod pa de'i tshe des shes rab kyi mtshan gyis nyon mongs pa'i dra badral nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
416b1(mdo sde): su dag pa bud med g.yem pa med pa gzhan du 'gro'o//yang de tsho na byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por ngam snyoms tu phyir song ste/
416b2(mdo sde): bas snyoms de spyong pa las khyim bdag gi khyim du phyin pa dang /de nos du ma bsod nams ldan mchog ces byob khang thag ni 'dug pas dge slong gi smra thos nas zas thogs te/bya
416b3(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der song ngo //de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog gis mthong mo thag tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa'i skad dang bltas pa
416b4(mdo sde): las rjes su rtogs pa'i mtshon ma bzung nas 'dod chags kyis yongs su bzung ba'i sems kyi 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs shing 'greng bzhin du lus thams cad kyang brtul
416b5(mdo sde): nas 'che bo'i dus byas nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog mthong ste/'dod chags kyi sems tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam
416b6(mdo sde): par rtog pa byung ba dod/de'i tshe dri la chags pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin zhes dran pa skyes nas/ci mig de chags pa'am zha na/mig kyang tshor ba med pa/byed pa med pa 'dus byas
416b7(mdo sde): pa/shwa'i phung po ste/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir tshor ba med de//'o na rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang yid chags pa'am zhe na/des nang yang rung /phyir yang rung /'dod
417a1(mdo sde): rtags par gyur du'aH/zhe bar shA gyung du'o chos da gang ya na dumagasas//sa ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sams drongs pa te 'dun
417a2(mdo sde): dwags pa dang shas gamigs pa'i rgong de'i mthal yin cad spyi 'i ba du brtags s+ho//des yang dag pa ji lta bar brtags nis chos thams cad mi skye ba sa
417a3(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thongs pa dang /de dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la shing ta la gung tsam du 'phags nas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer
417a4(mdo sde): chen po lan bdun du bskor te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bu der song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dga' bar byed pa steng go ber snang las dzang
417a5(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par 'ong bya gzigs so//gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba lto bya/'a stsal pa/dga' nga khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sem
417a6(mdo sde): dpa'o chen po dga' bar byed pa par snang las 'ong ba mthong ngam/gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyi sgo bka' sprul pa/dga' bo bya
417a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dga' bor byed pa des ni 'dod chags kyi sems las chos thams cad yongs su brtags so//bdud kyi sde btul lo//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to//
417b1(mdo sde): de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog shi ma thag tu bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te/shi 'phos pa dang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du dum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam
417b2(mdo sde): par skyes so//de skyes ma theg tu gzhal me da khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'ang byung /g.yig bya ba'i phyir lha'i bu mo bzhi khri bzhi stong yang
417b3(mdo sde): skyes nas/de'i tshed dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis 'dir skyes par gyur ces shes pa skyes te/de bsams pa dang /'di snyam du gyur te/bdag ni mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer
417b4(mdo sde): chen po ni khyim bdag gi bu mor gyur pa las/de ni bdag go 'dod chags kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa mthong nas bdag gi sems 'dod pa'i
417b5(mdo sde): chags pas kun tu gzir te/'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /bdag bud med kyi lus las gyur te/bdag gis skyes pa'i lus thob nas bdag gis rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med
417b6(mdo sde): pa 'di dag thob bo snyam so//de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/'dod chags kyi sems kyis rnam par smin po'ang 'di yin na/gang bdag gis byang chub sems
417b7(mdo sde): dpa' dga' bar byed pa la phyag bya ba'am/bsnyen bkur bya ba lta ci smos kyis/gang bdag rtse ba'am/dga' bar byed pa de rigs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/de ltar
418a1(mdo sde): bdag na bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang /dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i bu de 'khor dang bcas te me tog dang /dri
418a2(mdo sde): dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa rnams thogs nas kha dog tshad med pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/me tog dang /phreng ba dang byug pa de dag gis bcom ldan
418a3(mdo sde): 'das la mchod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag bcil te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo
418a4(mdo sde): sbyar te tshig su bcad pa 'dri dag smras so//sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab//byang chub rab mchog gnas rnams bsam mi khyab//de bzhin gshegs pa'o chos rnams
418a5(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab//grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa bsam mi khyab//bdag ni mnyan du yod par bu mor gyur//tshong dpon bu mo ming ni bsod nams mchog/bzang mo na tshod dang po dang yang
418a6(mdo sde): ldan//pho dang ma'ing byams shing yi du mo chi/gang yang sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi sras//dga' bar byed ces bgyi ba mthu bo che//mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms phyir mchis pa//
418a7(mdo sde): bdag gi pha yi khang por phyin pa dang //yid du mchi zhing snyan pa'i sgra thos te//bdag ni rab tu dgo' bas ba shos thogs nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po dga' byed pa///
418b1(mdo sde): mthu bo che de gang na bar mchis nas//mthong ma thag tu bdag gis sems skyes pa//tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod chags ldan par gyur//gal te bsam pa bzhin du ma grub na//bdag
418b2(mdo sde): ni mi 'tsho 'chi ba'i dus bgyi snyam//tshig kyang smra ba nyid du ma nus te//bsod snyoms de yang dbul bar ma nus nas//tshul bzhin ma legs 'dod chags kyis gdungs te//de nyid dag tu
418b3(mdo sde): brtul nas gum par gyur//bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi'i phor gyur ma thag/de tshe bdag ni bud med lus bor te//'od gsal skyes pa'i lus 'di thob par gyur//gum nas bdag kyang
418b4(mdo sde): mtho ris 'jig rten skyes//bdag gis gzhal med khang 'di mchog grub pa//rin chen rgyu ste de 'dra su la'ang med//lha yi bu mo stong phrag bcu bzhi 'di//bdag gis g.yog tu
418b5(mdo sde): thob bo bcom ldan 'das//de tshe bdag kyang 'di 'dra'i sems skyes te//'di 'dra rnam smin bzang po las dag gi/de ltar bsams nas 'di snyam du gyur te//'di ni 'dod chags
418b6(mdo sde): sems kyi rnam smin to//dga' byed mgu byed mkhas pa 'od byed la//bdag gis chags pa'i sems kyis brtags pa dang //de yi las kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste//de tshe bdag ni 'bar
418b7(mdo sde): ba'i mthu can gyur//bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes gar 'jug pa//de ni nyan thos dag dang rang sangs rgyas//de dag sar ni gzhar yang mi 'gyur te//'dod chags sems kyi

419b5(mdo sde): rgyus kun la mchod 'ad pa//byang chub phyir na snyan pa'i sems bskyed cig/bu ma'i pa dang rtswa dang gnyen rnams dang //ldub rgya ma nyung chad pa de dag kyang //smras su

420a2(mdo sde): byo dag la chags bskyed naso//mthi ris su ni skyes dur 'gyur bar shog/lha'i bu ni yis nga la bkur sti byas/gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog nas so//bstad pa mang

420a6(mdo sde): del tsur sti byed pa smos ci dgas//de nas rnaM ma ldan mtshod du ldan pa dag bas 'di ska ci skye gron pa te//barbam+me na 'dis spyi sher na/ri'i rgyu pa ni
420a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i drung du gang sems da kyakying rung //sems ni rdzing yang ru/sems chags pa'ang du chos la bar tshad 'khyod pa'i sems kyi rung ste//mtshanod thams cad
420b1(mdo sde): dran gcig tu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/gser gyi kha do/no//bcom ldan 'das de zhin du ga su'ang rung /byang chub sems dpa'i drung rnams dang dam/sems zhe sa nga rA/
